story:
The objective is to capture the moment of light - being concealed and revealed. This unique lighting design would turn a quotidian routine into an enriching experience, providing an unexpected, fun quality to a daily object. 

We accomplished this by making a simplified and functional lamp, instead of a switch, light is activated when raised(on) and deactivated when laid flat(off). By creating the side facets, a natural handle is made and also directs the light when the brick sits on it’s sides.


  • The concrete version of Brick Lamp is made from a special mix of cement and fine grain sands. It is cast in a high quality rubber mold to create a super fine and smooth finish.



  • An alternative wood version is designed to suit your classic interior furnishing. This version is made from an authentic single piece of wood lumber, coated with an all natural eco-friendly clear stain to give it an elegant finish.

  • The metal version is milled precisely out of a single piece of solid aluminum block by a Computer Numeric Controlled machine. To give it a sleek metallic touch, we use sand blasted matte finish on the bevels and brush texture on the top surface. The finished product then goes through an electric anodized process to permanently seals and protects the aluminum from rust and stain.

Super Easy to use, simply raise or flip Brick Lamp up from the surface it is laying on. Brick Lamp will be on instantly. To turn it off simply turn it over to conceal the light. Brick Lamp can also sit on it's sides allowing it to direct the light sideways, or you can flip it upside down letting the light shine up. 

You can use Brick Lamp with or without the cord attached. When the cord is attached, it simultaneously supplies the power of LED and charges the lithium-ion built-in battery. Once it is fully charged, the protection circuit will automatically disconnect. Brick Lamp’s fully charged battery can last up to 5 hours with normal use.


Our goal was to make Brick Lamp extremely simple to use with a refreshingly clean style. To achieve this we designed Brick Lamp with no buttons or control panel. The sides are beveled so it is easy-to-grab and handle. When sitting on the short side, the light's angle is straight up, and when on the long side, the light's angle is more downward. Keeping things balanced, Brick Lamp is engineered so the weight is perfectly distributed and it can stand both vertically and horizontally.  

Portable and wireless, Brick Lamp is easily recharged using a USB port, you can charge it to your computer, laptop, and wall socket.

Based in New York City, we are a team of designers come from different industries. We strike to challenge the existing world, get rid of the mundanes and see things through fresh perspectives. We believe good products should be simple, innovative, and elegant. By designing products with our vision, it's our goal to break the everyday pattern with something different.

story:
CAMPAIGN ENDED  September 11th, 2012 at Midnight! Over 10,000 Customers and over 21,400 BUG-A-SALT Original Salt Guns sold.  Pity the Fly!

Thanks for your incredible support!  Check in here on Indiegogo for important updates or visit us on our website at www.bugasalt.com to place an order. 

If you have any questions about this campaign or our BUG-A-SALT Original Salt Gun you can also contact us at the LORENZO HOTLINE:  310-392-3288

We started shipping  domestic USA BUG-A-SALT orders as of October 10th.  International orders are delayed pending a review of import and packaging requirements that must be met to ship them to the 70 countries we received orders from.  See Post Campaign Update #7 for details about your options as an international customer.  Thx!

 

SKELL INC. is a start-up company founded by the Santa Monica artist, Lorenzo Maggiore, as a vehicle to bring his artistic creations to commercial life. The initial product offering of SKELL INC. is the BUG-A-SALT™ insect eradication device. Through the help of family and friends, Lorenzo has pulled it off!  SKELL INC. is in the process of developing other interesting products in the near future on other planets.  

Your contributions will help us to create a more sustainable, non-toxic alternative for eradicating pesty insects like flies and mosquitos.  Using ordinary table salt as opposed to using dangerous chemicals and pesticides is a better way to go!     

We are close to achieving our goal of finalizing the manufacturing process in China. $15,000 will help us to cover the first run of manufacting and shipping of the BUG-A-SALT.    

We would appreciate your support!  If you like our idea and project, please spread the word and visit us at  www.bugasalt.com

 

No one pities the fly ...

BUG-A-SALT miniaturized shotgun effect is generated through this ingenious design. Ordinary table salt is utilized as a lethal projectile with accuracy range within 3 feet. Bugs will remain whole for easy clean up.

NO LICENSES, NO LIMITS, NO BATTERIES (18+ years Old Please, Read Safety Policy and Code of Conduct) 

Insect hunting as sport has entered the 21st century with this fun, new non-toxic device.

INSTRUCTIONS

  1. Lift LOADER CAP and pour in ordinary granulated table salt (Holds about 50 shots).
  2. SLIDE COCKING HANDLE towards you and push away towards barrel of gun. This action will activate AUTO-SAFETY and POP-UP SIGHT will appear, indicating gun is ready to fire!
  3. Release AUTO-SAFETY by clicking towards you.
  4. Aim at target and fire!

FEATURES

  • Non-Toxic
  • No batteries
  • Extremely inexpensive to use
  • Excellent for flies on windows
  • Excellent for bugs on ceilings and in corners
  • Fun—Say goodbye to insect intruders

 

 

Campaign Keywords:

BUG-A-SALT, Bugasalt, Skell Inc, A Killer Company, Insect, Insects, Fly, Flies, Horse Fly, Horeseflies, Bug, Bugs, Pests, Pesty Insects, Insect Eradication Device, Gadget, Not a Toy For Kids, Gun, Air Gun, Airgun, Salt, Ammunition, Ammo, Hunting, Hunter, Art, Design, Art and Design Project, Performance Art, Artist, Inventor, Invention, Entrepreneur, Surfer, Mosquito, Mosquitos, Earwig, Earwigs, Ants,  Don't Kill Beneficial Insects, Don't Kill Butterflies, Don't Kill Spiders, Adults Only, Fun, Quirky, Easy to Use, Non-Toxic, No Insecticide, Top Campaign, Overfunded, The Fly Movie, Hellstrom Chronicles, Mr. Pinch,  Limited Edition, Buddy Deal, Campaign Ending Special, BBQ, Special, Lone Gunman Package, Big Game Special, Arms Dealer, Container Load Deal, FPS Russia, Airsoft, Ordinary Table Salt, Pinch of Salt, Grassroots, No Batteries Needed, Patented, Patents, Youtube Channel, Pity the Fly, For the Pest Hunter, No Licensing, No Limits, Insect Hunter, Insect Madness, Bugs Will Remain Whole for Easy Clean Up, Santa Monica, Los Angeles, California, CA, US, USA, United States, Yellow, Black, Adults Only

story:
EXPERIENCE THE MAGIC when you receive this wonderful holiday gift set.

  • Gather as a family to read the story of how you can give Santa his magical powers

  • Make your own Mister Sprinkle & friends Christmas cookies

  • Decorate your tree with the Mister Sprinkle ornament 

My family and I began this journey when our son asked, "How does Santa deliver toys to kids all over the world in just one night?" We replied, "There is magic in the Christmas Cookies!"

Making Christmas cookies together has since become an amazing family holiday tradition for us and we want to share this experience with other families.

To help create the experience, we are launching The Mister Sprinkle™​ Gift Set to encourage bonding through reading the story with your children, baking cookies for Santa together as a family, and decorating your tree with the Mister Sprinkle ornament. Our company is all about “family time” and creating a holiday tradition that is eagerly anticipated year after year.

 The Mister Sprinkle™​ Gift Set is magical and educational!

  • Enhances the holiday spirit
  • Provides joy and happiness to children
  • Gives families precious moments spent together
  • Sparks imagination and creativity
  • Teaches foundational principles of responsibility

Santa is counting on you!

Mister Sprinkle™ wants you to join his social media community. Join us on Facebook and Instragram. We encourage families to post photos of your “magical cookies” and time spent together.

     

The first $5,000 in sales is our annual donation to CHOP.

Our company is about celebrating family time and the magic of being a child. 

Thank you very much for supporting us! Thank you very much for supporting us! 

Mister Sprinkle is in transit and will begin shipping on December 5th. On Dasher, On Dancer...

story:
We will send out the batches as follows, prior to which we will lock the orders on Indiegogo in preparation for the shipment. Please be aware of the lock date in the request of any address update. 

Official Sales Only on Indiegogo Now

Thanks to backers’ feedback, we found that some fake websites are illegally selling our products. As our campaign enters Indemand phase,  Indiegogo is still the ONLY official sales and shipping channel for our NexFan Air Cooler.  If you come across some websites that start to sell our products, please don’t hesitate and email us at global@nexfan.net, and we’ll help you with the discernment. Thanks for your concern and support!

As summertime is just around the corner, providing your home with comfortable cooling proves to be a necessity instead of simply a luxury. When the heat is scorching, we’ve got a solution for you: NexFan Ultra Air Cooler, the world’s first UV-C portable air cooler with strong cooling capacity.

NexFan Ultra doesn’t just provide you with cool air; it is a 4-in-1 device that provides multiple forms of superior air quality, including refrigeration, humidification, air purification and aromatherapy. It produces instant cooling, is ultra-portable with a USB charger and automatically cleans and purifies the internal reservoir.

Scroll down and we’ll explain more...


The NexFan Ultra air cooler creates a comfortable micro-climate anywhere you want by providing a breeze cooled by  5℃/9℉, in an instant. Unlike traditional evaporative coolers, we do it faster and enable more coverage with a much longer wind distance.  

Conventional air coolers take minutes to provide the proper ambience, but with NexFan, you’ll feel the cold wind in just a few seconds. So, what’s the secret? NexFan Ultra has taken cool air to the next level by utilizing an atomizer, where traditional swamp coolers only use a moisture pad. The atomizer provides more spray volume through water depressurization to achieve a rapid temperature drop. Additionally, we have incorporated a 4.8 x 10 cm plant fiber curtain in our device. This thickened fiber is able to soak in more water and thus allows for more evaporation. 

Want it even cooler? Try adding ice for some truly frozen wind. 

Oftentimes a traditional cooler cannot extend the cooling distance, NexFan Ultra’s strong airflow distance can deliver a crisp, refreshing breeze up to 5 ft. NexFan Ultra’s makeup consists of a three-dimensional corrugated network of wet curtains and a filter. This structure is able to produce smooth, natural air and a better wind circulation with multiple blowing angles up to 90° apart. The uniformly distributed wind projects powerful cooling and assures no headaches, given that the wind does not blow in a singular/localized area.

Upgraded atomizer, cool faster. (You can also choose to use ice cubes or ice crystals). Can be used under various situations. (such as after exercise, cooking in the kitchen, RV, etc.)

Using its USB charger, you can either plug it into any power outlet or a power bank; use it stationary or portable; put in indoors or out… The decision is yours, but many options are available.

Worried about leaks? Concerned that your camp bed will get soggy or your office desk may get wet? Thanks to NexFan Ultra’s enhanced structure, this won’t be a problem. Our extensive testing shows the NexFan’s fortified container will stay secure even when shaken and rattled, leaving your belongings safe and dry no matter what.

NexFan Ultra can do more with less amount of energy. How so? NexFan Ultra uses lower operating power while working, making  it an accessible “cooler on the go”. Compared to other traditional swamp coolers or ordinary fans, it is much more energy-efficient. Charging it with a 10,000 mAh power bank supports a 12-hour service length, which is much more efficient than the leading coolers in the market, especially at a full reservoir of 500ml. You’ll never need to worry about interrupting a full-day trip outdoors.

NexFan Ultra is super slick with a uniquely stealthy look and a low profile. With a size of only 14.4×16.1×15.9 cm, NexFan Ultra is very portable and can easily be taken in your luggage. It is shorter than a handbag and weighs less than 1kg . You have plenty of places to go, so why not take NexFan Ultra with you?

Getting tired of your outdated fan sounding like a blaring Generator? NexFan’s new noise-block design keeps the noise level under 68 dB even as it works hard to keep you refreshed. We have enhanced noise reduction level by 30%, so you’ll be guaranteed a quiet, soothing personal space, wherever you take it.

Rather than focusing only on cooling, the NexFan has three other modes upon activation. You can switch between the normal cooling mode and the humidification cooling mode. In a parched environment, cooling in humidification mode is bracing and soothing. In clammy areas, you can turn off the humidification and enjoy the crisp and dry wind.

With the nano-silver ion filter, NexFan Ultra can not only limit the contamination inside of the water tank, but also purifies the air quality in the surroundings  and removes any odor.

To add a bit more fun, the NexFan features added color options. Our ambient LED light features a rainbow array of 7 colors, letting you set the mood however you like. If you’d like some peaceful time by yourself, add some aromatherapy oil to facilitate a better sleep. Leave your LED on at night as your night light in case of emergency, or just to feel more secure in your surroundings.

  • Add water to the tank (capacity~500ml)
  • Plug in the power
  • Click the ON button

Finally, the filter is removable and washable. Instead of ditching a used filter, NexFan Ultra gives  you the option to recycle the filter. With  average use, you only have to clean it every two months. But you always have the alternative to replace the filter completely, check out our options in the “Accessory'' section.

XP Inc. is a sub-company affiliated with WND Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd, and is dedicated to R&D of intelligent temperature control and purification technologies. We have set up R&D teams and data centers around the world since 2016. Our products include refrigeration fans, air heaters, cooling neck fans, purifiers, UV lamps, deodorant equipment, etc. Our mission is to make life better with environmentally friendly technology. Since 2018, our previous generation has launched a solid foundation in the market by selling 1,000,000 units globally. And this generation of product has done upgrades on the cooling capacity and the purifying ability on the filter element.

NexFan has entered the mass production stage as officially verified by Indiegogo. We guarantee shipping in May. We offer a 30-day refundable warranty (send back the product if you encounter any problems) , to deliver the best possible quality for our customers.

The original NexFan Ultra contains a filter element. Each filter element ensures a carefree summertime of 3-4 months upon average usage. As mentioned above, we use an upgraded filter material which sustains its longevity, almost doubling the life of the filter element. Despite that the filter is much more efficient, it still doesn’t change the fact that all filter elements have a limited life cycle. Therefore, we recommend that you buy more filters for future replacements and to save on shipping costs. Note that the extra filter (if purchased) will be sent with the air cooler, and there is no additional shipping cost. You can purchase filter elements solely on the official website after the crowdfunding period.

story:
First invented and patented in 1858, the Mason jar is named after its inventor, John Landis Mason.  Originally used in home canning and preserving, the Mason jar has become ubiquitous due to its usefulness. The jar is used for drinking, storage, canning or crafts.  The one thing that sets the Mason jar apart is its standard mouth size.  The regular mouth Mason jar is 2.75 inches (6.985 centimeters) across the top.  The Ergo Spout will fit regular mouth Mason jars, from 12 ounces to half gallon volumes.

 

The Ergo Spout fits Mason jars whether they were recently manufactured or are of vintage age. This is only for regular mouth Mason jars. 

 

 

The Ergo Spout with different sizes of jars.

 

The Ergo Spout has three physical parts:  

  • The lid is completely removable. It connects inside the spout, creating a hinge for flip-top functionality.
  • The main spout has a curved lip to reduce dripping and connects to a handle that is comfortable and non-slip.  
  • A gasket is underneath where the jar comes into contact with the spout.  This provides a complete seal, so there is no leaking between the base of the spout and the top of the mason jar.  

 

 
 
 

 

The Ergo Spout could become your favorite kitchen tool because of its versatility.  Use it with pint jars to drizzle homemade salad dressings or breakfast syrups.  Add the Ergo Spout to a quart for easy pouring of juice or serving gravy to your crowd.  Attach one to your vintage half gallon jar to brew your sun tea or lemonade.

 

 

The Ergo Spout will be made of food-safe polypropylene, which is BPA and phthalates free.  The material provides the strength to lift heavy jars.  It will not warp in the high temperatures of the dishwasher and microwave.

 

 

 

The Ergo Spout solves three basic problems with Mason jars.  

First, because Mason jars are glass, they become slippery when wet.  With the Ergo Spout you can avoid those slippery jars and pour without the risk of dropping it.  

The Ergo Spout also allows the possibility of pouring hot liquids such as syrup.  Because your hand need not come in contact with the jar, you can safely pour that hot syrup on your pancakes.  

Last, the Ergo Spout prevents sticky drips down the side of the jar by guiding the liquid to the curved spout.  

The Ergo Spout makes for comfortable, safe pouring without the mess.

 

 

 

We have been showing off the Ergo Spout and its development on social media. We are so happy with the love the Ergo Spout has been getting.  Back us today to get your very own Ergo Spout for your kitchen.

 

 

 

 

When my oldest son was younger, he LOVED pancakes with syrup. It might be more accurate to say that he loved syrup with pancakes. We went though A LOT of syrup at our house.  

My mother-in-law had taught me how to make a simple syrup with maple flavoring. It became a family favorite because it's easy, delicious and economical. She also gave me a fancy syrup dispenser. I loved it and used it all the time. Until...  

One day I chipped the edge while washing it. I searched the internet for a replacement, but couldn't find one. 

Then came the light bulb moment: wouldn't it be great if there were a spout and handle for Mason jars!  I looked all over for that too, but couldn't find it.  My husband, Bryce, and I decided to make one ourselves. 

Now, after laboring over a ton of versions for the last 18 months, we finally have it ready to manufacture.  We are ready to bring you the Ergo Spout!

 

 

Why do you call it the Ergo Spout?  

Because of the unique ergonomic handle.  

What about a wide mouth version?  

Due to interest we have decided to launch the Wide Mouth Ergo Spout with it's own Kickstarter campaign.  After the design, engineering and prototyping is done we will be ready to launch.  Look for it Spring 2019! 

What will it be made of?  

The Ergo Spout will be polypropylene.  Polypropylene is a food safe, non-toxic, BPA-free and Phthalates-free plastic. It will also have a silicone grippy over mold on the handle.  

Is it dishwasher and microwave safe?  

Yes. The plastic will not warp in the high heat of a dishwasher or a microwave.  

Is it air tight or does it seal?  

The Ergo Spout includes a silicone gasket to make a complete seal between the jar and the base of the Ergo Spout. We are working to make it as spill-resistant as possible with our flip-top lid. 

Is it dripless?  

The spout's design reduces dripping and will help prevent drips down the side of the jar. 

Are there different colors available?  

Yes, we are offering it in Vintage Blue, Barn Red, Foliage Green and Classic White. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Shipping Information:

For those who live in the United States, shipping will be added to your perk and charged per the policies and procedures of Indiegogo.

International folks!  We have determined that we will be able to ship to the following other countries at the estimated shipping prices.  Shipping will not be charged as part of your perk on Indiegogo, but instead will be charged after the campaign.

Canada (estimated shipping ~$18 USD for 1 to 4; ~$30 for 6)

U.K. (estimated shipping ~$25 USD for 1 to 4; ~$38 for 6)

Australia (estimated shipping ~$18 for 1 Ergo Spout, ~$25 USD for 2 to 4, ~ $38 for 6)

Hong Kong (estimated shipping ~ $25 USD for 1 to 4; ~ $40 for 6)

European Union countries (estimated shipping ~$25 for 1 to 4; ~ $38 for 6) 

India (estimated shipping ~ $25 for 1 to 4; ~ $38 for 6)

If you don't see your country listed, please contact us and we will review policies and costs for shipment to determine whether we will be able to add you to the list.

IMPORTANT:  International shipping costs do not include custom fees, taxes, duties or other charges for the product to enter your country.  Please take into account any additional amounts that you may have to pay in order to receive the product and ensure that the imported product complies with your national and local laws.

Risks & Challenges

After 18 months of designing, prototyping, and testing the designs along the way with many of you, our loyal customers, we are now ready to kick off the tooling, manufacture the product, and bring you the Ergo Spout.

We are working closely with our designers and manufacturer to make sure the product you get is well-designed, functional and comfortable to use.

If something unexpected occurs, we will make sure the Ergo Spout works. We will keep you updated on the progress.

What you are seeing in our videos and pictures are prototypes and/or renderings. The final product will be even better!

Please feel to reach out to us if you have any concerns at support@ergospout.com.  Thanks for your support.
story_txt:
First invented and patented in 1858, the Mason jar is named after its inventor, John Landis Mason.  Originally used in home canning and preserving, the Mason jar has become ubiquitous due to its usefulness. The jar is used for drinking, storage, canning or crafts.  The one thing that sets the Mason jar apart is its standard mouth size.  The regular mouth Mason jar is 2.75 inches (6.985 centimeters) across the top.  The Ergo Spout will fit regular mouth Mason jars, from 12 ounces to half gallon volumes.

 
The Ergo Spout fits Mason jars whether they were recently manufactured or are of vintage age. This is only for regular mouth Mason jars. 
 

 
The Ergo Spout with different sizes of jars.
 

The Ergo Spout has three physical parts:  

The lid is completely removable. It connects inside the spout, creating a hinge for flip-top functionality.
The main spout has a curved lip to reduce dripping and connects to a handle that is comfortable and non-slip.  
A gasket is underneath where the jar comes into contact with the spout.  This provides a complete seal, so there is no leaking between the base of the spout and the top of the mason jar.

story:
Oh! T™ is the world’s first intelligently designed, patent-pending 3-in-1 tea strainer that empowers tea-lovers with ultimate control and efficiency of their loose tea brewing experience. The innovative magnetic tea-lid allows drinkers to adjust the strength of the brew by moving the tea infuser up and down inside cup, letting the infuser sit inside the water or above, while the smart cup design enhances aroma and flavor development for tea brewed to a T!

                             

 

                           

                         

 

                           

Tea brewed exactly as you like it, here's how it works with Oh! T

 

                           

                          Simply fill the stainless steel ball with your favorite loose tea leaves

                           
                           Pour hot water into the glass

                           

                           Attach the stainless steel infuser to the magnetic lid

                           

                           Adjust your brew to your personal liking

                           

                           Remove the tea infuser and use it as a cover lid to keep your tea warm

                           

                           Flip it upside down as a convenient drip tray

 

 

 
 

                              

Oh!T™ has been designed with the tea-lover at heart. The bottom designed to ensure the ball rolls easily and evenly to enhance and reveal the full taste and aroma of the tea.

                              

With Oh!T™ patent-pending design, you can use the magnetic lid to adjust the height of the infuser ball as little or frequently as you want, controlling the exact taste and strength of your tea.

                                   

      

                               

                               

Even the smallest leaves, they won't be trapped in the hotels which makes it easy to clean

 

 

                             

                             

                                

                            

                            

                            

 

Pong is the brainchild of Red Dot award-winning designer Leo Yiu. With a focus on smart product design, Pong products are interesting, functional and beautiful. Modern in design but timeless in functionality, our products are built to inspire and last.

At Pong, we believe that even the most common object has a soul. Every Pong product has a reason behind its design.

We make sure our products are a touch more unique than the ordinary, so that anyone can live each day smarter and happier. 

 

 

Newly formed, untainted by traditional thinking, get the Pong pushes boundaries with a new vision. Innovation is the core of everything they do, creating products that are as enjoyable as they are practical.

Get the Pong looks at the world and see the need for something different. They set out to bring a touch of fun to everyday life. Quality products with a sense of humor. We make every day memorable, because you never forget a smile.

story:
My name is Ann Hurley and I'm the founder of Luv Chicken™ Booster Cushions for Kids. I'm a graphic designer living in Seattle with my husband and two kids, Stella and Stanley. Luv Chicken was created when the mother in me saw a need for a product that did not exist, and the designer in me knew I could be the one to create that product. So I did just that! Through tons of research and hard work, I've been able to build my dream business creating a product that fills a huge gap in the mainstream booster market.



Every parent experiences the day when their child refuses to sit in their baby booster at the table. They really want to sit in their chair like a big kid, yet aren't quite tall enough to sit on an adult chair and properly reach the table. This can make for knee-sitting, squirmy, messiness at mealtime. Enter Luv Chicken™ boosters! 

These boosters give kids a 4" boost so they can sit comfortably and squarely up to the table. The coated fabric is easy to wipe clean. The 15" x 15" booster covers the entire seat of the chair, protecting it from messy spills. The non-slip bottom keeps the booster in place without the use of clumsy buckles or ties. The handle makes the booster totally portable and easy to take anywhere like restaurants, movie theaters and outdoor sporting events. Best of all, kids really love them! These boosters not only look cool, they also foster independence and confidence during the transition from toddler to big kid.




                           

                                      

                     

               
                               

BabyCenter, Parents, US Weekly, Babyzone, Celebrity Baby Trends, SheKnows Parenting, Sweet Southern Lovin, Formula: Mom, ModernMom, SimplyStacie, New York Family, Pregnancy & Newborn, Scooter Traffic, CoolMomPicks, Seattle Magazine, The Little Style File, The Lavish Pear, Mogul Baby


Aside from the amazing write-ups in magazines and blogs, we've also won some honorable mentions and awards!


Luv Chicken™ has been around for a little over 2 years. We have slowly been gaining momentum and listening to our customers very closely every step of the way. Now it's time to bring Luv Chicken to even more kids and make it a household name! We think every child between the ages of 2 and 8 should have a comfy booster to call their own, to foster independence and build confidence. We have received our first substantial retail order and want to begin mass-production to get Luv Chicken in stores nationwide, but we need your help.


We have searched high and low for the right company to manufacture our product and have finally found them! We need $45,000 to begin large scale production so we can fulfill our first big retail order. These costs include:

  • Fabric design 
  • New retail packaging
  • Manufacturing 
  • Warehouse & fulfillment set-up
  • Initial legal & insurance fees

In return for your support, we are offering a number of fun Luv Chicken perks. 

We also have a cool Referral Contest we'll be running. You can win a $25 gift card each week from one of our favorite Seattle-based businesses - like Starbucks, Amazon, Nordstrom and zulily. Plus, the person with the most referrals at the end of our campaign will win a $100 Amazon gift card! Read more on our Referral Contest below.


We are so excited about our product and want to share it with parents and kids everywhere! Your contribution will help make Luv Chicken™ a household name. With your contribution, we will be able to spread awareness about our product by making sure parents everywhere can purchase one at a store near their home.

Large scale production is a new challenge for us. There is much to learn and many expenses involved. We are excited to take on this new challenge. We are confident that we have done our research and can continue to produce a great product as we grow. We are excited to continue to improve our product, expand our brand offerings and continue with our great customer service. We love our product and can't wait to share it with the world!


We know you are an influencer! And with our Luv Chicken™ Referral Contest, we want to give you the opportunity to compete for some great prizes from our favorite Seattle businesses. Thanks to Indiegogo, we have access to powerful analytics to see who is in the lead each week with referrals. We will contact you at the end of each week and the end of the campaign if you end up with the most referrals.

Prizes: Each week we will give away a $25 gift card from a Seattle-based business (think Starbucks, Nordstrom, zulily, Amazon…), to the person with the most referrals to-date. We will post updates on our site as to who the front runners are and how many referrals they have. At the end of the campaign, we will announce who had the most referrals for the entire campaign. They will be awarded a $100 Amazon gift card.

How It Works: First, contribute (you can contribute as little as $1) and select one of the perks listed on this page. Once you have an Indiegogo account (which will be set up automatically when you pledge), use Indiegogo's sharing buttons to let people know about Luv Chicken™ on Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and via email. You can find Indiegogo's sharing buttons under the main video at the top of this page. When you use these sharing buttons, your posts will be automatically tagged with your referral URL.

You can also spread the word about Luv Chicken to your friends all over the Internet! Get creative— Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Stumble Upon, BuzzFeed, Etsy, forums, blogs are waiting! Don’t forget to add your personal referral link to any messages. To find your personal referral link, just click on the Twitter or E-Mail referral links below the video and copy the URL.

People love photos and you can easily share one of the photos on this page. Here's how you do it:

  1. Save a photo from our campaign to your computer.
  2. Log in to Facebook, and click "Add Photos/Video."
  3. Click on "Upload Photos/Video" and browse to the photo you saved.
  4. Write a quick testimonial about our campaign and be sure to share your special referral URL!
  5. Click "Post."

If you are as excited about Luv Chicken™ as we are, but can't contribute, there are other ways you can help!

  • Help get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! Tell your friends, family and social groups to check us out! Use Indiegogo's sharing tools at the top of this page to spread the word.
  • Send us your feedback! If there's a way you think we can improve our campaign, let us know!

Thanks for your support!

To find your personal referral link, just click on the Twitter or E-Mail referral links below the video and copy the URL.People love photos and you can easily share one of the photos on this page. Here's how you do it:
Save a photo from our campaign to your computer.
Log in to Facebook, and click "Add Photos/Video."
Click on "Upload Photos/Video" and browse to the photo you saved.
Write a quick testimonial about our campaign and be sure to share your special referral URL!
Click "Post."
 If you are as excited about Luv Chicken™ as we are, but can't contribute, there are other ways you can help! 
Help get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! Tell your friends, family and social groups to check us out! Use Indiegogo's sharing tools at the top of this page to spread the word.
Send us your feedback! If there's a way you think we can improve our campaign, let us know!  Thanks for your support!

story:
All people have faced a few problems using standard office caster wheels. We are no exception. They scratched and marked a floor in our office, so we had to use a plastic mat for each chair. If I needed to move over the wires and cables, I had to lift my chair, or I could even tip over. Also, these casters are always full of dust and hair, so it gets hard to roll and move. So... We’ve made our own casters to make office & home life easier.

Tired of all these things? No more scratches and marks, no more traces from rubber and plastic wheels, no more floor changing every second year, no more plastic mats, no more moving a chair with hands, and no more wheels as dust & dirt collectors - it’s all in the past. Now you have Stealtho.

This industrial design wheel is made of cheap metal, has a design suitable for a factory but not for an office & home. It has bad mechanical engineering:

- Its construction height is too big. That’s why it increases the height of the chair and it becomes not that convenient to sit at a table, causes the swelling of the legs.

- The distance between axis is 1.38” (3.5 cm), incorrectly distributes the load and contributes to the damage at the base.

- Non Ergonomic locking system. The long brake lever clings to the legs and cloth.

- Unsecured ball bearings. Balls can even fall out of the bearing because of weak construction.

That’s all the real cases and we solved them.

No, really. For any kind of the floor. Hardwood, bamboo, carpet, tile, laminate, and more. You can even create a new type of floor and our wheels will already be safe for it.

All the magic is in the construction and materials. We’re using a soft elastic polyurethane and special wheel forms (angles, dimensions, proportions, etc).                  

British scientists have proven that everyone at least once in their life has caught their finger on a chair in a dark room. We decided to shorten the list of injured fingers, and added some luminophore to our polyurethane wheels. Now you can see it with no light and it’s easier to locate the position of your chair in total darkness.

It

wasn’t an easy task to find the optimal level of luminophores in polyurethane. After dozens of experiments, we found out that the optimum for luminophores is 3%. In this case, we get the good level of light in the dark and still transparent polyurethane as well.

Just look at the numbers. Using plastic wheels is not economically sound. Numbers are taken from open sources as for the average U.S. citizen and even though it cost us more than $1,400 per year to sit on the plastic wheels while using Stealtho Wheels saves us almost $1,000 per year on that.

A lot of those who care about their floors are buying a plastic mat. And now you don’t need to spend any money on this expensive protective office thing, which can be toxic and collects a lot of dirt and bacteria, limits your actions, discolours, and has an unpleasant smell.

 

 

Have you ever fallen or just gotten stuck while moving on your chair? That’s all because of the small diameter and bad wheel proportions. Stealtho Wheels were designed after dozens of tests, and finally, we found the best construction and dimensions to roll over any office & home barrier.

Just 3 easy steps to change chair position and that’s all. You don’t need to call a mechanic or an engineer to change it.

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Our experienced management team has a proven track record of bringing products to market and selling it all around the globe.

Before launching the campaign we've done all our homework properly: the design is finalized, DFM is finished, we already have fully functional prototypes, our contracted manufacturer is signed to start mass production in June, and our shipping contractors are waiting to ship the wheels.

We believe we have mitigated the risk factors as much as possible, and now we just need funding for the first production batch!

story:
Go to thecitywood.com to order your laser cut wood map. This campaign has ended.

 

We are looking for new distributors/re sellers around the world. Contact us at thecitywood@gmail.com

 

IMPORTANT INFORMATION for backers at Indiegogo: After backing one of the map size options, please let us know what city would you like and what frame option. Fill the form here https://goo.gl/E2Hfn8

What is CityWood? 

CityWood is a high-quality minimalist wooden map for map lovers, created with laser-cut precision.  

You can see our recent wood work on Facebook or Instagram

Current City List (alphabetical order): 

Abu Dhabi, Albuquerque, Amsterdam, Ann Arbor, Athens, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Barcelona, Bergen, Berlin, Basel, Bern, Bilbao, Bogota, Boston, Brisbane, Brussels, Budapest, Buffalo, Buenos Aires, Cairns, Calgary, Canberra, Cape Town, Charleston, Charlotte, Chicago, Cincinnati, Cleveland, Cologne, Columbus, Copenhagen, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, Doha, Dubai, Dublin, Dusseldorf, Edinburgh, El Paso, Fort Worth, Florence, Frankfurt, Geneva, Glasgow, Gothenburg, Halifax, Hamburg, Hanover, Havana, Helsinki, Hong Kong, Houston, Indianapolis, Istanbul, Jacksonville, Jerusalem, Kansas City, Knoxville, Krakow, Kuala Lumpur, Kyiv, Kyoto, Las Vegas, Lisbon, Liverpool, London, Long Beach, Los Angeles, Louisville, Lyon, Madison, Madrid, Melbourne, Manchester, Memphis, Mexico City, Miami, Milwaukee, Minneapolis, Montreal, Moscow, Mumbai, Munich, Nashville, New Delhi, New Orleans, New York, Oakland,  Orlando, Osaka, Oslo, Ottawa, Palm Beach, Paris, Perth, Pasadena, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Portland, Porto, Prague, Providence, Reykjavik, Richmond, Rio de Janeiro, Riverside, Rome, Rotterdam, Sacramento, Salt Lake City, San Antonio, San Diego, San Francisco, San Jose, Santa Monica, Santiago, Santo Domingo, Seattle, Seoul, Seville, Shanghai, Singapore, Stockholm, Stuttgart, St Louis, St Paul,  St Petersburg, Sydney, Taipei,Tampa, Tel Aviv, Tokyo, Toronto, Tucson, Vancouver, Venice, Victoria, Vienna, Warsaw, Washington, Wellington, Zurich 

How is this wooden map made?    

The CityWood is created from city data that is transferred into the computer. Features such as roads and rivers are converted into layers to create depth of the design. We use 3/32 inch (3mm) sheets of high-quality plywood, all of which are hand finished. Each layer is laser cut with a one hundredth of a millimeter precision and polished with sand paper to provide smooth clean surface. Wooden surface is finished with varnish to add color and material durability. Each map is unique due to the individual grain of the wood. All maps are assembled by hand with great attention to the creating process. 

CityWood wall art is framed with wood and plexiglass for protection. 

CityWood elements:

  • wooden frame
  • plexiglass
  • street layer
  • water layer
  • wooden background

The design is available in a number of dimensions: 

Desk Size: 5"x7" (12x18 cm) 

Small Size: 11"x14" (28x35 cm)

Standard Size: 18"x18" (45 x45 cm) 

 Medium Size: 24"x24" (60x60 cm) 

 Large Size: 36"x36" (90x90 cm) 

Add frame dimensions (1" on each side) for final size.

Frame color

You can pick a frame color for your map: pinewood, walnut varnish, mahogany varnish, black stain. (if no frame color is picked we go with default: pinewood)

Each art work is signed with its city name. 

Currently available cities: 

United States 

Albuquerque, Ann Arbor, Atlanta, Austin, Baltimore, Boston, Brisbane, Brisbane, Cincinnati, Charlotte, Charleston, Chicago, Cleveland, Columbus, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, El Paso, Fort Worth, Houston, Indianapolis, Jacksonville, Kansas City, Knoxville, Las Vegas, Long Beach, Los Angeles, Louisville, Madison, Mempis, Miami, Milwaukee, Minneapolis, New Orleans, New York, Oakland, Orlando, Palm Beach, Pasadena, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Portland, Providence, Richmond, Riverside, Sacramento, Salt Lake City, San Antonio, San Diego, San Francisco, San Jose, Santa Monica, Seattle, St Louis, St Paul, Tampa, Tucson, Washington, Wellington

Canada 

Calgary, Halifax, Montreal, Ottawa, Toronto, Vancouver, Victoria  

Europe 

Amsterdam, Athens, Barcelona, Basel, Bern, Bergen, Berlin, Bilbao, Brussels, Budapest , Cologne, Copenhagen, Dublin, Dusseldorf, Edinburgh, Florence, Frankfurt, Geneva, Glasgow, Gothenburg, Hamburg, Hanover, Helsinki, Lisbon, Liverpool, London, Lyon, Kraków, Kyiv, Madrid, Manchester, Munich, Nashville, Oslo, Paris, Porto, Prague, Reykjavik, Rome, Rotterdam, Sevilla, Stockholm, Stuttgart, Venice, Vienna, Warsaw, Zurich 

Asia & Oceania

Abu Dhabi, Auckland, Cairns, Canberra, Dubai, Doha, Hong Kong, Istanbul, Jerusalem, Kuala Lumpur, Kyoto, Melbourne, Moscow, Mumbai, New Delhi, Osaka, Perth, Seoul, Shanghai, Singapore, St Petersburg, Sydney, Taipei, Tel Aviv, Tokyo 

Americas 

Bogota, Buonos Aires, Havana, Mexico City, Rio de Janeiro, Santiago, Santo Domingo

Africa

Cape Town

Stretch Goals. 

We would like to add new cities based on request and project scale:

Reached! 5 000 US$ - additional +5 more cities to pick from (you can vote for new cities to be available)

Reached! 10 000 US$ - New Frame Colors and additional +5 more cities to pick from (you can vote for new cities to be available)

Reached! 15 000 US$ - additional +5 more cities to pick from (you can vote for new cities to be available)

Reached! 30 000 US$ - additional +15 more cities to pick from (you can vote for new cities to be available)   

Reached! 45 000 US$ - additional +15 more cities to pick from (you can vote for new cities to be available)

Reached!  60 000 US$ - additional +15 more cities to pick from (you can vote for new cities to be available) 

Reached! 75 000 US$ - additional +15 more cities to pick from (you can vote for new cities to be available)

Reached! 90 000 US$ - additional +15 more cities to pick from (you can vote for new cities to be available)

Help Out and Share CityWood With Your Friends! (#thecitywood) 

We can't do this without you! Know someone who love their city? Great! Share this project with your friends. It is one click away. 

The more friends who know about CityWood, the larger our community will become! With a larger community, we'll be able to make CityWood even better! 

Just hit one of the buttons below: 

Follow our progress on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter! 

You can also visit the website https://thecitywood.com and subscribe to the newsletter.

Questions? Don't hesitate! Shoot us a message or post a comment and we'll get back to you. 

Ideas? We want you to be a part of the creative process as well. Got a creative idea you think we should implement in the project? 

Please note that there is no way for us to charge any additional amount on our end for any applicable VAT/duties that may be a result of a specific country's local tax code. 

Press Kit 

If you are a member of the press and need more resources, please download our press kit or reach us at thecitywood.com 

We are looking for investors, international distributors and retailers. You are more than welcome to contact us at info@thecitywood.com

Risks and challenges

We have made many prototypes of how the final product should look like and focused on how to make it efficiently in the highest standard. 
Although we have a plan in place, we are unable to control mother nature. In the event that there is a delay, whether in the manufacturing or shipping, we promise to keep you guys updated 100% of the way. We want to be completely transparent and honest.

It is one click away. The more friends who know about CityWood, the larger our community will become! With a larger community, we'll be able to make CityWood even better! Just hit one of the buttons below: Follow our progress on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter! You can also visit the website https://thecitywood.com and subscribe to the newsletter.Questions? Don't hesitate! Shoot us a message or post a comment and we'll get back to you. Ideas? We want you to be a part of the creative process as well. Got a creative idea you think we should implement in the project? Please note that there is no way for us to charge any additional amount on our end for any applicable VAT/duties that may be a result of a specific country's local tax code. Press Kit If you are a member of the press and need more resources, please download our press kit or reach us at thecitywood.com We are looking for investors, international distributors and retailers. You are more than welcome to contact us at info@thecitywood.comRisks and challengesWe have made many prototypes of how the final product should look like and focused on how to make it efficiently in the highest standard. Although we have a plan in place, we are unable to control mother nature. In the event that there is a delay, whether in the manufacturing or shipping, we promise to keep you guys updated 100% of the way. We want to be completely transparent and honest.

story:
FREE U.S. SHIPPING ON ALL PERKS!

 

A Professional-Grade Tool For The At Home Barista

 

Nitro Tap Technology

An innovative faucet and tap, designed to keep you pouring like a pro.

A Perfect Pour Every Time

On The Move

Whether you're pouring from the comfort of your home, your office or wherever life takes you, the uKeg Nitro is sure to keep up.

Nitro At a Fraction of the Cost!

Dressed to Impress

With its sleek black chrome plated 18/8 stainless steel and chrome hardware, you'll be the talk of the town with your uKeg Nitro. 

Automatic Nitro Regulator Cap

Charging your uKeg Nitro is as easy as dropping a 16 gram Nitro Charger into the sleeve, twisting onto the cap and turning up the pressure. 

 

Brewing, Storing & Pouring Made Simple

Things Needed:

uKeg Nitro

Nitro Gas Cartridge

uKeg brewing bags (2)

uKeg filling funnel

~2 cups of coarse ground coffee

Filtered cold water

Brewing Instructions:

STEP 1. Fill uKeg with 50 ounces of cold brew coffee, skip to step 6

…OR...

STEP 2. Fill brew bags with ~2 cups of coarse ground coffee

STEP 3. Place in uKeg and fill with water

STEP 4. Let sit overnight (12-24 hours)

STEP 5. Remove bags, top off with water

STEP 6. Charge cap with Nitro gas, pressurize uKeg Nitro to infusion zone

STEP 7. Shake to infuse

STEP 8. Ready to serve

The nitro cold brew is good for at least 2 weeks and ready to pour at any time. Adjust the pressure as you see fit to maintain the best level of Nitro infusion for you.

story:
The ½ Smart Storage System by Botto Design

 

 

INTRODUCING THE MOST SATISFYING STORAGE CONTAINER EVER.

AIRTIGHT. ADJUSTABLE. ALL-PURPOSE.

 

Botto Design presents the “½ (One-half) Smart Storage System” – the most satisfying storage container ever.

 

 

BREAKING NEWS: 2018 HOUSEWARES DESIGN AWARDS “BEST IN CATEGORY” WINNER

Botto Design’s ½ Smart Storage System was awarded the “Best in Category” of Countertop Kitchenware of 2018 Housewares Design Awards. Among other finalists were big brands such as OXO, Cole & Mason (DKB), Mason Cash (Typhoon) and Architec Brands. They did beautiful jobs. But as the judges commented, “Botto Design did better.”

The Housewares Design Awards is the most prestigious design award program focused on housewares design innovation. Founded by HomeWorld Business, it is dubbed as the “Academy Awards” in the industry. 

"Best in Category" of Countertop Kitchenware, 2018 Housewares Design Awards

 

BREAKING NEWS: ASIA DESIGN PRIZE 2018 WINNER

Botto Design’s ½ Smart Storage System was awarded the Winner of Asia Design Prize 2018, one of the most famous design awards in South Korea.

Winner of Asia Design Prize 2018

 

BACKGROUND

We all like our home neat and tidy. But to keep things organized is usually a tedious and an endless work.

Nowadays we can buy almost everything online. Life is getting easier, and we keep more stuff at home.

Our living standards have never been higher, but the way how we organize our belongings has not improved significantly.

 

 

Never wastes your space (and food) again!

 

As a product designer and an interior designer, Terence has seen a lot of beautiful homes in perfect condition. But most of them share the same problem.

Their pantries, cabinets, and even countertops are terribly chaotic. They are in a total mess. Either no storage container is used at all, or more oftentimes than not, no SUITABLE storage container is being used.

Case Study #1: Kitchen Cabinets. Brooklyn, New York.

 

Wrong storage containers trap excess air that spoils the food. Space is also lost because most containers are not fully filled. You might have a gorgeous pantry shelf, but you might be actually wasting your space, your food, and your money.

Case Study #2: Built-in Storage. Richmond, California.

 

Never before did we take the problem seriously. What can we do?

We believe, every problem comes with a solution.

 

THE SOLUTION

With this in mind, Botto Design introduces the “½ (One-half) Smart Storage System” – the most satisfying canister in the world.

Maximizes your space.

 

WHAT IS THE ½ SMART STORAGE SYSTEM?

The ½ Smart Storage System is functional and easy to use. Just open the lid, fill the container with food, close the lid, and press it down. What you get is a larger storage capacity but with less air inside.

Freely adjustable volume from 16 oz to 32 oz.

 

Nothing can do a better job than the one-way check valve to force the air out. No electricity needed! Just push it down!

 

100% clarity from all angles.

 

Perfect for storing coffee beans .

A simple design but with smart functions.

 

The production tooling is ready. We’ve done a small-scale production run. We can go ahead with mass production anytime. But we want to give you the Kickstarter-exclusive offers before we officially launch the product in the mass market.

This is one of the toolings. We are ready to start the production.

 

A newborn baby. And her mother (the tooling).

 

WHAT MAKES THE ½ SMART STORAGE SYSTEM SO SPECIAL? 

1. ADJUSTABLE

16 oz, 17 oz, 18 oz, ... all the way up to 32 oz. Or vice versa!

 

Pull it up or push it down as you wish

 

You can adjust the height by pulling up or pushing down the container to get different storage volumes. For instance, if you want to store 24 oz. of cereal, just extend the container to the fullest, pour the cereal inside, then close the lid, and press down the container. Excess air is forced out and the lid will stop at the top surface of the content. The space inside the container is better utilized. 

 

2. FRESH-KEEPING

Less air keeps your food fresh longer.

The ½ Smart Storage System has a patented one-way check-valve to release the excess air from the inside. When you compress the container, air goes out from the valve. No air can sneak in from there. Much less air is left in the container and it helps keep the food stay fresh longer. Good for storing a wide variety of perishable foods including cereal, coffee beans, sugar, salt, snacks, pasta, grains, and even pet food!

 

3. FLEXIBLE

Flexibility is the key

Makes all your space come alive again. Changeable heights let you fill up the space that was not being wisely used before. Pull up or push down the body to get the height that fits the empty space. Storage capacity is maximized significantly. The ½ Smart Storage System does a beautiful job of keeping things contained and organized!

 

4. VISIBLE

100% transparency

The main body of the container is made of crystal clear transparent plastic. 360-degree clarity helps you get the right one instantly. You can also stack the ½ Smart Storage System vertically and make the most out of your precious space. Our modular design makes sure the containers won’t slide off even you pile them up as long as they are placed on a flat and steady surface. It is so much easier to keep your countertop, pantry, bathroom, garage and office organized.

 

5. FOOD-SAFE

Made of food-safe material

The ½ Smart Storage System is constructed of US FDA-grade, food-safe, BPA-free, phthalate-free and toxic-free materials. The lid is made of polypropylene provided by Sumitomo, one of the largest worldwide conglomerates from Japan. Polypropylene has good chemical resistance over stains and odors. The gaskets are made of silicone that forms tight seals. The body is Styrene-Acrylonitrile Resin which provides the rigidity and transparency. The ½ Smart Storage System is produced by the same manufacturer who makes environmentally-friendly reusable drinkware for Starbucks Corporation.

 

6. DURABLE

Test. Test. Test.

We are very serious about the quality of our products. We inspect our products according to the ANSI/ASQ Quality Control Standards: Z1.4, the same system employed by the U.S. Department of Defense. Every single piece of the ½ Smart Storage System is made to last. We offer limited lifetime warranty on wearable and replaceable parts.

 

7. DESIGNED IN AMERICA

Our blood and sweat...

After two years of research and development, we found the best solution. Different sizes, materials, colors, structures, and capacities were tested.

All the product design, engineering and development are done by Botto Design in the United States. We partner with a reliable manufacturer in China to handle the production. Our representative office in Hong Kong communicates with the manufacturer every day to make sure the production, quality control and delivery are going according to schedule.

 

8. WE ARE READY

The tooling is made. Manufacturing costs are fully priced. Production will start soon. No more surprises, uncertainty and excuses. We plan to ship out the first batch of the ½ Smart Storage System from Hong Kong by July 2018. 

 

The ½ Smart Storage System is made with love by Terence, Anthony, Clara and Kan (from left to right).

Our lil' kitten loves it too... XOXO

 

Smart & Simple

Botto Design aims at improving people’s daily lives by designing smart and simple products.

We are Clara, Terence, Anthony, and Kan.

Team Botto is international. Clara is a lovely Canuck. Terence and Anthony are two Yankee Doodle boys. Kan is a Hongkonger born and bred.

Clara is a seasoned operating executive with more than 15 years of experience building multinational businesses. Terence has years of experience in designing products that are both critically and commercially successful. He is also an expert in product engineering and eco-friendly packaging. Anthony is the financial guy who makes sure we are working within budget. Kan oversees the production, quality assurance, warehousing, marketing, delivery – you name it!

The tooling is ready. All the product engineering issues are solved. So you don’t have to worry about backing a campaign that will never be fulfilled – because we MUST deliver the products. We are asking for your support to let us start the mass production. And once you click the pledge button, you will see your beautiful little parcel at your doorstep (or a large carton if you make a bigger pledge) within 9 months.

Again, if the shipment is held up by the customs or something just happens out of the blue, our jaws won’t drop. Team Botto will keep everyone well informed and do our best to fix the issue whatever it is. We just want you to receive the products as early as possible and enjoy a better life with the most satisfying storage container ever – The ½ Smart Storage System by Botto Design.

story:
We love the taste of coffee

...but we don't love it when it tastes like stainless steel, paper or plastic. GioVia's double walled porcelain will never alter the taste of your coffee. 

 

 

GioVia is double walled to keep your hot beverage hot

Coffee should taste like coffee, not the cup you put it in. GioVia offers the best user-experience over any other travel mug because we looked at taste first, making sure you can enjoy it without harmful toxins getting into your warm beverage. 

Now this is something really special...

Every GioVia comes with a universally fitting lid called PortaVia. What's so special about that? PortaVia can fit a variety of mugs you may already own. This means, you can bring that fun mug you love with you to go! #BYOM.

A design-focused approach to taste

We designed GioVia to deliver the optimal coffee experience for three groups coffee lovers, commuters and office workers. All three group had problems with their to-go coffee tasting like steel from their expensive stainless steel tumblers and plastic from cheap travel mugs and the ubiquitous poly-lined paper cup and polystyrene lid.  GioVia porcelain body and silicone lid solves this problem while keeping your coffee toasty warm and safe to take on the go!

 

 

 

GioVia keeps coffee warm for 45 minutes longer

The double walled porcelain keeps your coffee just the way you like for 45 mins longer than open mugs. Meaning GioVia stays true to the original brew, while keeping the cup’s contents, and your hands, nice and toasty.

 

 

 

 

Top Features of the GioVia and PortaVia

  • PortaVia was designed to fit inside the mug, so you can drink from the rim of the porcelain mug, not the lid
  • Enjoy 13oz of well crafted coffee knowing you're getting the most out of it
  • The double walled design keeps your hands safe 
  • The air gap between the interior layer and the exterior keep your beverage warm
  • PortaVia's 3 tapered seals ensures a reliable seal
  • Easily and intuitively pull on the tab to remove the PortaVia lid

 

 

The Universal Fitting Lid

The world's best sustainable alternative to single-use cups. Bring your own mug with PortaVia!

PortaVia is made from food grade silicone. This one-of-a-kind lid is designed to fit down inside the travel mug, creating a reliable seal, allowing you to drink directly from the porcelain rim, so you don’t have to drink from silicone. 

 

 

 

Timeline: guaranteed to arrive before Christmas 

We are already in production. Your GioVias and PortaVias are already being made and will be in warehouses in November - ready to be shipped to you, your friends and your families.

 

 

Add your favourite colours to personalize your GioVia, make your coffee experience a personal expression

 

 

 

Risks and Challengers - what big issues are there?

 

  • The biggest worry for users is shipping, happily we can confirm mugs are being made as we speak so getting your GioVia before Christmas won’t be a problem
  • Communicating an innovative product is a challenge. Showing the full value of what we have virtually is difficult and will never beat interacting with a product in person. That is why we are interested in making retail partnerships to bring GioVia and PortaVia to a store near to you
  • Finding the right fit for our PortaVia lid has been challenging as well. We’ll never know what kind of mugs are in people’s homes so we’ll be coming out with more mug options. We’re confident knowing GioVia is a great flagship product that delivers on what customers want most in their coffee experience - true favour, stable temperature and the ability to take it to go.
  • Customers have also been very understanding in fitting PortaVia to the mugs and cups that range between 2.9"-3.25" or 74mm-82mm. PortaVia doesn’t fit sizes larger or smaller than these.

 

 

We're putting your pledge to work
 

  • We want to be a reliable supplier to our customers and wholesale partners, so we’re stocking up for Christmas sales
  • We'll continue to develop products that tackle problems by addressing the optimal coffee experience with environmental responsibility
  • Every pledge for a travel mug and lid creates another alternative to single-use plastic cups which otherwise might end up in our streets, landfills and oceans
  • We're putting the man-hours in so you don't have to
  • We need your contribution to continue developing unique solutions to waste while bringing the best way to enjoy your beverages on the go!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
  • If an option doesn’t fit for you but you still want to help this campaign, please spread the word on social media and to your friends and family!
  • Please share this link

We're putting the man-hours in so you don't have to
We need your contribution to continue developing unique solutions to waste while bringing the best way to enjoy your beverages on the go!
 Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
If an option doesn’t fit for you but you still want to help this campaign, please spread the word on social media and to your friends and family!
Please share this link

story:
Who are we: 

We are Coocepts, a group of people who are big fans of the moon and we always dream to catch the moon in the sky. About A year ago, we created our first portable moon light. With the latest 3D printing technology, we are able to create a sphere without any injection gate on the surface. We also place the charging plug and function button to the bottom of the moon light to minimal the affect of the outlook of the moon light.

What we are going to do in this project:   

Although we are very happy to see our first version of the moon light is so popular in the market. But we are still feeling that there are something missing. After our research on the feedback of our customers, we finally found out what it is missing and this is why we create this project.

What the first version Moon Light is missing: 

The moon always floats in the middle of the sky, so we would like to see our moon light floating in the air too. Implementing the levitate device into our moon light give a totally different atmosphere to the scene which bring our moon light to the next level.

The different between our first version and the new version: 

1) Redesign the charging port and the color changing and dimmable button

In order to implement the levitate module into the moon light, we need to redesign the panel on the bottom of our moon light in order to put the whole module into the moon without affecting the out look of the light.

2) The levitating docking 

After months researching about the levitating docking, we have implement strong Neodymium magnets to increase the stability of the floating of the moon and also to increase the ease of the operation in levitation. The docking station also provide wireless charging to the moon light.

How does the Wireless Charging Levitating Moon Light Works:

There will be one touchable button at the bottom of the moon light and one switch on the docking. They will bring the moon light to different light mode with different combinations.

Levitating Mode:

Night light mode: By switching on the docking station and keep the moon light to the off status. Place the moon light to the docking and moon light will be turned on automatically. The brightness of the moon light will stay on at 0.1w and it will not discharge the battery.

Battery mode with cold white light: One touch to the touchable button on the moon while levitating. Then long press to adjust the brightness from 0.1w to 1.5w. Working hours will be 10 - 100 hours depends on the brightness.

Battery mode with warm yellow light: One touch again to the touchable button on the moon while levitating. Then long press to adjust the brightness from 0.1w to 1.5w. Working hours will be 10 - 100 hours depends on the brightness.

If you touch the touchable button again it will back to the night light mode.

Portable Light Mode:

Portable mode with cold white light: One touch to the touchable button on the moon. Then long press to adjust the brightness from 0.1w to 1.5w. Working hours will be 10 - 100 hours depends on the brightness.

Portable mode with warm yellow light: One touch again to the touchable button on the moon. Then long press to adjust the brightness from 0.1w to 1.5w. Working hours will be 10 - 100 hours depends on the brightness.

If you touch the touchable button again it will turn the moon light off.

Charging Mode:

By switching off the docking and place the moon light with the off status, it will charge the moon light. A full charge will take around 2 hours.

Specifications:  

  • Moon Light Dimensions: 15cm and 20cm in diameter
  • Levitating Docking Dimensions: 14cm x 14cm x 4cm
  • Moon Light Material: PLA
  • Base Finish: Walnut wood
  • Lighting Color Options: Warm yellow and cold white
  • LED voltage: 0.1w ~ 1.5w
  • Working Hours: 10-100 hours
  • Charging Time: 2 hours
  • Battery Capacity: 1500mAh rechargeable Lithium Battery
  • Moon Light Power: Wireless Charging with Levitating Docking(Upgraded!!!)
  • Base Power: Power Adapter with US Plug @ Global voltage compatible 100 - 240v

  

Summary of campaign updates:

  • 10/03/2017 - Upgraded to Wireless Charging For Free
  • 13/03/2017 - New Pledge Option Added

For more information about our updates, please refer to the "Updates" page of this campaign.

The Project Timeline:

  • February 2016 - First version Moon Light Launched at the market
  • October 2016 - Concept of levitating Moon Light
  • December 2016 - Design and research
  • January 2017 - Prototype building
  • March 2017 - Kickstarter campaign
  • April 2017 - Testing
  • May 2017 - Manufacturing
  • July 2017 - Shipping

Our Vision

We, Coocepts, is a group of people who bring cool concepts to life. We believe that life is boring. Creativity is at the heart of every dream which makes life more interesting. Every idea, every groundbreaking leap that changes our life should also change yours. Our dream is to construct a unqiue place that would become synonymous with creativity and convenience living. This is why we bulit Coocepts, dreaming to bring creativity to every lives we can touch.

Why we need you in this project:

As big fans of the moon, we need to gain your support in order to continuous our journey. We would like to know that we are making something that people around the world are also exciting to see it's happening. Your support makes this project worthy of spending all our time on bringing this perfect moon light to life. Thank you very much for listening to our story. Please support this project and help us to bring this moon light to live.
story_txt:
Who are we: 
We are Coocepts, a group of people who are big fans of the moon and we always dream to catch the moon in the sky. About A year ago, we created our first portable moon light. With the latest 3D printing technology, we are able to create a sphere without any injection gate on the surface. We also place the charging plug and function button to the bottom of the moon light to minimal the affect of the outlook of the moon light.

What we are going to do in this project:   
Although we are very happy to see our first version of the moon light is so popular in the market. But we are still feeling that there are something missing. After our research on the feedback of our customers, we finally found out what it is missing and this is why we create this project.

What the first version Moon Light is missing: 
The moon always floats in the middle of the sky, so we would like to see our moon light floating in the air too. Implementing the levitate device into our moon light give a totally different atmosphere to the scene which bring our moon light to the next level.
This is a working prototype of our floating moon light. The docking will be made of wood in our final production.
The different between our first version and the new version: 
1) Redesign the charging port and the color changing and dimmable button
In order to implement the levitate module into the moon light, we need to redesign the panel on the bottom of our moon light in order to put the whole module into the moon without affecting the out look of the light.
The one on the left is the redesigned version of our new levitating moon light. We have created a much small switch to control the color and the brightness of the light
2) The levitating docking 
After months researching about the levitating docking, we have implement strong Neodymium magnets to increase the stability of the floating of the moon and also to increase the ease of the operation in levitation. The docking station also provide wireless charging to the moon light.
The final version of the docking will be made of wood.
How does the Wireless Charging Levitating Moon Light Works:
There will be one touchable button at the bottom of the moon light and one switch on the docking. They will bring the moon light to different light mode with different combinations.
Levitating Mode:
Night light mode: By switching on the docking station and keep the moon light to the off status. Place the moon light to the docking and moon light will be turned on automatically. The brightness of the moon light will stay on at 0.1w and it will not discharge the battery.
Battery mode with cold white light: One touch to the touchable button on the moon while levitating. Then long press to adjust the brightness from 0.1w to 1.5w. Working hours will be 10 - 100 hours depends on the brightness.
Battery mode with warm yellow light: One touch again to the touchable button on the moon while levitating. Then long press to adjust the brightness from 0.1w to 1.5w. Working hours will be 10 - 100 hours depends on the brightness.
If you touch the touchable button again it will back to the night light mode.
Portable Light Mode:
Portable mode with cold white light: One touch to the touchable button on the moon. Then long press to adjust the brightness from 0.1w to 1.5w. Working hours will be 10 - 100 hours depends on the brightness.
Portable mode with warm yellow light: One touch again to the touchable button on the moon. Then long press to adjust the brightness from 0.1w to 1.5w. Working hours will be 10 - 100 hours depends on the brightness.
If you touch the touchable button again it will turn the moon light off.
Charging Mode:
By switching off the docking and place the moon light with the off status, it will charge the moon light. A full charge will take around 2 hours.

We have successfully implement the wireless function to our moon light and the docking. So there will be no more charging port on the moon light as shown (the bigger one on the left)

Pledge HKD$100 to get this unique moon light key chain
For more information about our updates, please refer to the "Updates" page of this campaign.

story:
QitaWear Helmets

Hi, my name is Juan

For over three years, individual customers have been demanding my hand made night-glow helmets. Aside from wearing a helmet Tron would be proud to ride with, my hand-made designs have an appeal that combine future-fashion with ultra-high visibility to usher in the safest era of night riding.

I have created a company called QitaWear and am now prepared to mass produce our QitaWear helmets and bring them to a national market. We are raising funds to produce the molds needed to scale this exciting and growing business.  Molds will use and have:
1.Quad Inmold Technology 
2.High Density EPS Liner 
3.Polycarbonate Shell

 This is why I turned to indiegogo so we together can make the biking and active lifestyle safer when out at dusk or night.  

Because molding for mass production is very expensive we are going to go with two model molds to start with. A sports style bike helmet called the QS-1, and the bicycle style helmet called the QB-1. There are many more designs for the future but for now we will take it one step at a time and go wih the two models. One great customization is you get to choose the color lighting you would like on your helmet. There are 10 choices for both the QitaWear Helmets and bike glow kits depending on perks. All our funding will go into the production of our helmets and QitaWear Ultra High Visibility Belts. If anything is left we have many more fashion lines in Qita sports and active wear apparel to apply any leftover funds to.

IMPACT

Bike lights tend to only give light in the direction your light is facing.  This includes helmet lights and bike lights.  QitaWear bike helmets are designs so you have a full 360 degree of lighting spotted from all angles.  The biking community needs a signature system.  Bike lights and reflective elastic just do not cut it.   Our unique helmets for one, make you be seen before the bike.  Second, create a lot of attention and wonder usually forcing people to slow down out of curiosity.  And three, they are just plain fun and cool.

For myself the only time I have for an active lifestyle is early morning or late night, both as equally dark to be out on the road running, walking the dog, or biking.  I have been on both sides of the spectrum with biking, and do not want to be hit by a vehicle or hit someone with my vehicle.  At times I even surprise myself when all of a sudden the siliote of a bicyclist or walker is 10 feet in front of my moving vehicle.   We all know the risks but people still take them, because in reality who really wants to wear a big yellow reflective stylish vest!

  

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Because we are going with a manufacturer to build our molds there may still be risks with a large order. There could be some unforeseen manufacturing delays or quality issues that arise during production of larger batches.  Designs also may have some changes to it for fitting and safety of the helmet.  Also not raising enough funding to complete both molds could cause us to only produce one style helmet to start.  To the extent unforeseen delays arise, QitaWear will do its best efforts to minimize such delays.  We are giving a date further than is expected completion to keep all the unforeseen risks at a minimum with  our perks rewards and QitaWear QS-1, QB-1 Helmets.

 

QitaWear helmets will not make you invincible. So please keep do not ride more dangerously or take more risks on the road. 

Thanks you for your time and hope you decide to join me in changing the future of the biking communities. Cars still have blind spots and people still do not pay attention when driving or texting while driving.   Be Safe, Be Seen!! 

 

Please note and take a look below,  bike lighting will have to be wrapped around the bike frame.

 

 

 

PHOTOS OF  PERKS

ULTRA HIGH VISIBILTY BELT

 

 

HELMETS

QS-1

QB-1

ROSWHEEL BIKE BAG

 

 

BIKE LIGHTING
