story:
The Cheese Chopper is a revolutionary new way to Slice, Shred, and Store your cheese with ease - get the perfect slice everytime! 

 

The Cheese Chopper's ergonomic design is fast, safe, airtight, easy-to-clean, and creates the perfect slice every time, all while fitting every standard 2 lb brick of cheese. 

 

We successfully raised $100,436 on Kickstarter! 

 

Customers continue to ask for pre-orders and we decided to partner with Indiegogo to make it happen!

 

We have finalized designs, partnered with a manufacturer, and ordered our molds. Every dollar pledged will be put towards our first round of inventory delivered straight to your kitchen late-August 2020!

Three handles for all your cheese needs - blade, wire, grater.

 

Perfect Slice, Every Time
 

The Cheese Chopper's patented design lets you choose between a wire or blade,  so regardless of the thickness, you can chop the perfect slice every time!

 

 

 

Save Time and Money. 

 

The Cheese Chopper allows you to take advantage of the price and quality of large blocks of cheese without sacrificing the convenience of pre-processed cheese. You no longer have to pay more for lower quality, pre-sliced or grated cheese and can now slice and grate cheese with ease.

 

No longer are you condemned to purchasing the commercially processed, pre-sliced or grated cheese, coated with harmful chemicals anti-clumping agents. The Cheese Chopper allows you to save money without sacrificing convenience or quality. 

 

 

 

 

Handles to Please All Your Cheese Needs

 

The Cheese Chopper comes with not one, not two, but THREE handles for all of your cheesiest desires. 

 

  •  Wire: for thin, soft slices

 

 

 

  •  Blade: for your hard cheeses

 

 

 

  • Grater: for your quick grated cheese needs 

 

 

 

Long Live the Cheese

 

The Cheese Chopper is an air-tight container that replaces the use of saran wrap and awkward Tupperware containers to extend the life of your cheese. It's easily disassembled (no screws) and dishwasher-friendly.

 

 

Entire Cheese Chopper easily taken apart hassle-free with no tools.

 

Fits Cheese Bricks of All Sizes

 

Big or tall, short or small,  the Cheese Chopper's patented design fits all standard 2lb bricks of cheese. Regardless of the brand, the cheese chopper has you covered. 

 

 

 

 

Rewards

 

For all you Cheese lovers, do we have a deal for you. 

 

Your pledge of $30-$100 will help launch our business and make all of your cheesiest dreams come true. 

 

  •  $30 one early-bird Cheese Chopper with all three handles and a Cheesy Decal

 

 

  •  $50 one early-bird Cheese Chopper, all three handles, one Cheesy T, and a Cheesy Decal!
  •  $100  four Cheese Choppers with all three handles each, and five Cheesy Decals!
  •  $125 three Cheese Choppers with all three handles each, one Cheesy T,  and five Cheesy Decals!

 

Extras

 

Cheesiest of Cheesy Cheese Chopper Decal!

 

 

Cheesy T -  "That's What Cheese Said" T-shirt

 

 

 

Manufacturing is underway and we expect to deliver your Cheese Chopper late-August 2020.

 

Founding story

 

Faced with the problem experienced by millions of Americans, The Cheese Chopper was born out of pure necessity!  Tired of low-quality cheese and paying absurd prices, #CheeseDreamTeam came up with the solution to all our problems and created the Cheese Chopper. 

 

After over 2 years, 36 prototypes, and countless blocks of cheese, the Cheese Chopper was born! 

 

 

 

Cheese Dream Team

 

Tate Koenig (Mr.Cheese),  Founder

Tate graduated from Oregon State University with an International Business Degree and a minor in Entrepreneurship. He has have been a tinkerer his whole life inventing parts and pieces for things from SnowBikes to Man Muffs and everything in between. As much fun as they have all been, he loves nothing more than CHEESE

Favorite food: Cheese, duh!

 

Robbie Dugger, Co-Founder

Bringing an idea to reality is his main Hobby. Robbie has designed and created four different Race-CarTuning and Repair shops over last 7 years. Robbie and Tate Designed and Created the Cheese Chopper together as roommates a few years back. 

Favorite food: Queso Anythng!

 

Charlie Campbell (Chuck E Cheese), Business Operations

Charlie helped start a tree company in China, founded a cross-border e-commerce company, and now is attending business school at the University of Chicago Booth.

Favorite food: Cheese Quesadilla from Taco Bell with extra cheese.

 

IMPORTANT NOTICE:

Please note that YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY CUSTOMS FEE, DUTIES, VAT, IMPORT TAXES, SPECIAL DELIVERY FEES ADMINISTERED BY YOUR GOVERNMENT, AND HANDLING FEES.  These are not included in the cost of shipping or handling of your rewards, and we are unable to estimate those fees for you.

story:
In the aftermath of the Sri Lankan Civil War, in a small predominantly Tamil community close to Jaffna, three sisters and their mother live in a small, shelled house. Three years before, their father and their only source of income passed away. During the crisis, the house was shelled and only three rooms remain. Half of the house is gone, most of the family sleeps on the floor. There are no fans to save them from the notorious Sri Lankan heat. The sisters are 20, 22, and 24. The 20 year old aspires to go to college since the war and father's illness held up the other sisters' chances. The 22 year old is the only current source of income, making only the equivalent of $80 US dollars a month. The 24 year old had a job, but was laid off last year and is now looking for a job. They are living in the ruins of a house. They need a secure place to live in this post-war era. $9,000 will be just enough to repair, extend, and to protect the family.

Note: Names, exact location, and pictures of the family are not given for the family's security and safety.

story:
Our Indiegogo Campaign will be closed, you can get U-Bolt Pro directly on our website

 

U-Bolt Pro is the most secure, and the most versatile deadbolt ever created. With Dual 128-bit AES Dynamic Key Encryption and premium alloy construction, it is unbreakable both physically and digitally. 

Never get locked outside with 6 ways to unlock with or without your smartphone:

- Smartphone App
- Fingerprint
- Passcode
- Proximity Unlock
- Magic Shake
- Mechanical Key

U-BOLT PRO IS NOW IN STOCK, SHIPS IN 1-2 BUSINESS DAYS!

 

Get now the most crowdfunded deadbolt in the history of Indiegogo!

We have successfully shipped and delivered over 7,500 orders!

Orders after 7618 and placed before August 1 will be shipped before August 10.

ULTIMATE KEYLESS ENTRY: 6 WAYS TO UNLOCK

 

 

SMART ENOUGH TO WORK WITHOUT YOUR PHONE

 

 

 

360° Live Fingerprint Identiﬁcation.

 

Add random digits to protect your passcode from prying eyes.

 

BUILT TO WORK WITH YOUR PHONE

 


 

Unlocks when you approach your door.

Get smart notifications when someone unlocks your door.

 

 

 

NEVER GET LOCKED OUT

 

*One dedicated bridge is required for each U-Bolt Pro

 

SECURITY & CONTROL FOR YOUR DOOR FROM ANYWHERE

 

U-Bolt Pro gives you complete control on access and users. Share temporary fingerprint, code, or eKey with a set schedule for the cleaning crew or grant one-time access to a friend.

 

PROTECTS YOU & YOUR DATA

 

All communications are encrypted using secure 128-bit AES via an embedded hardware coprocessor. The second layer of protection is the Dynamic Key. This key code is randomized for every single data transfer. Even if somebody were able to capture the AES encrypted data, the Dynamic Key protection would make it impossible to for them to unlock your door.

 

Two-Layer protection using secure 128-bit AES and a Dynamic Key that will keep you and your data safe.

EASY INSTALLATION

 

 

DOOR COMPATIBILITY

 

 

NOTHING AS COMPREHENSIVE AS U-BOLT PRO EXISTS. SO WE BUILT IT OURSELVES.

 

 

 

 

REVIEWS FROM OUR TESTERS

 

See additional video reviews at the top of the page

WHAT'S IN THE BOX

 

TECH SPECS

 

THE MAKING OF

 

Our designs have been tested and proven. We have been working on perfecting the technology to get it ready to bring home.

 

People asked, and we listened! Our amazing customers loved our first product, the Ultraloq UL3 BT, the bestseller smart lock on Amazon and the UL1, the most funded smart lock on Indiegogo! They loved the build quality, ease of use and multiple unlock features. What they did ask on occasion was why we don't offer a deadbolt version.

...Until now. With more ways of access, better fingerprint technology, 4.0 Bluetooth and new app interface, we are excited to bring the U-Bolt Pro to our loyal customers and everyone who wants to make home security easier and more accessible.

We are thankful for your support and excited to have you along for this journey!

 

SHIPPING

 

We are able to ship worlwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

 

 

​

​

 

 

​

story:
HEI is an experience tea set made of Chinese Yixing clay, which is inspired by ancient Chinese tea ceremony. DEFRONT combined Eastern and Western tea culture, redesigned tea drinking and infusion process, made it adaptable by modern life. It combines the merits of traditional tea ceremony and the convenience of using a tea bag. A Cup, a thermometer, a teapot, three simple pieces can provide an experience that traditional tea ceremony could.

PRESS

    YANKO    |   DEZEEN     |  GOOOOD    |    DESIGNBOOM     |     POINT     |     创次方

 

HEI combines the merits of traditional tea ceremony and the convenience of using a tea bag. A Cup, a thermometer, a teapot, three simple pieces can provide an experience that traditional tea ceremony could.

    HEI is made without glue and could be easily assembled by few steps. First step is to install handle onto thermometer. Then, add boiling water into teapot up to the guide line. Apply thermometer onto teapot and wait until water temperature drops to corresponding requirements. On the surface of thermometer, it is designed to be temperature visible for better instruction. (it has scales to help indicate the required temperature for different kinds of tea.) Add desire amount of loose tea into infuser and connect to the thermometer through magnet. Put the whole part back into the teapot and wait until tea is ready. Take off thermometer and place upside down. The disk can prevent water from running off. Now, let’s begin to explore your wonderful tea adventure.

     

     

     

     

     

    HEI is combined by two marvelous materials of Chinese Yixing clay and 304 stainless steel. Yixing Clay is an ancient Chinese material that first being mined and applied hundreds years ago. It consists of a variety of mineral compositions and enables a better tea tasting experience. The unglazed surfaces of Yixing Clay absorb traces of beverage, creating a more complex flavor. The metal highlights the style of Minimalism and meets the needs of modern life.   

    RELEASED

    *Note：Color Option is available.

     

    $63 - Early Bird (HEI essential pack)

    $68 - Indiegogo Special (HEI essential pack)

    $75- HEI Copper Version(HEI Copper Version essential pack)

    $120 -Indiegogo Special X 2(HEI essential pack X 2)

    $120 -HEI Premium Set（HEIX1+HEI Copper versionX1）

    $139 - Tea Ceremony Gift (Indiegogo limited pack)

    $149 - Tea Ceremony Gift Box-Copper(Indiegogo limited pack)

    $1000 – Corporate Gift (HEI essential pack X 20)

    International Backers: We sincerely appreciate any support given by our backers. However, due to our limited logistics transportation system, there are few countries we are not able to deliver - Russia, India, The United Arab Emirates，South Africa, Brazil, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Ukraine, Yemen and Chile. We wish to bring our products all over the world in the coming future. Please note that you will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region, which in the past have ranged from 0% to 20% in the US and EU countries, to as much as 200% for certain South American countries. Thank you again!

     

    DEFRONT is a design brand established by several talented designers, inventors, technologist, and social workers graduated from University of London, University of the art London, The Ohio State university and Loughborough University. The team now has increased to 30 members. Designers from DEFRONT have multi-culture backgrounds and many years of experience from Johnson&Johnson, Microsoft Cambridge research center, National Metals Technology Center UK (NAMTEC) and Bentley. In 2015, DEFRONT headquartered in Hangzhou, China with operations in New York and London. Hangzhou is famous for its long history of tea culture in China, also holds the leading position of tea production. Inspired by the phenomenon of rigid tea culture among young generation, DEFRONT brought HEI to balance the fast-pace living rhythm and need of exquisite life. HEI tea set enables tea lovers enjoying best tea with minimal skill.

    FAQ

    What’s the volumes of teapot and the cup？

    The volume of cup is 30ml，teapot is 150ml.

     

    What’s the material of the staff in the gift box and the package？

    The spoon is made of copper,the plate is made of bamboo;the main materials of towel is cotton and bast fibre. And the materials of our packaging are paper and EVA foam(an environmental-friendly material).

     

    Is the material safe？

    We did tons of research and talked with crafters before the starting point of our project to make sure our Yixing Clay is qualified for daily use. For further considerations, we have asked our supplier to apply for quality inspection through official departments. It will take several weeks to get the result. We will let every our supporter know when the report comes out.

     

    How to clean or maintain HEI？

    Our HEI is designed to be cleaning friendly. You will find assemble or disassemble it is just as simple as playing Lego game. Each part could be separated, which will make the cleaning very convenient and easy. There is no special caring need for HEI. However, it will keep a better quality by following tips below：

    1. Rinse HEI by using hot water before your tea ceremony for hygiene concern

    2. Clean HEI by using cotton material

    3. Store HEI under dry conditions

    4. Avoid from oily substance

    5. No dishwasher

     

    What’s the maintenance between stainless and copper version？

    The only difference between Copper Version and HEI is its material used for thermometer. The part of thermometer in water （include tea infuser）will continuously use the food graded -304 stainless steel. Another part of thermometer outside on the surface will be crafted by using brass. Therefore, the maintenance will be very similar for these two choices.

     

    Is the Yixing clay specified for a certain kind of tea？

    1. Yixing Clay is not specified for a certain kind of tea based on our research for its history. If you have interests to brew various kinds of tea, make sure to clean up by using hot water before using HEI every time.

    2. For those who have strong interest in tea culture, our advice is to use one teapot for one kind of tea for spirit experience.

    Generally, you can use HEI to brew tea based on your personal favor.

story:
Say Hello to SENS8 Light Cam

NOW, YOUR SECURITY CAMERA AND LIGHT BECOME ONE.

With SENS8 Light Cam, you can monitor your home in HD video, shine the lights on your blind spots and sound the alarm on any suspicious activity – all from your smartphone or tablet.

 

This is what security looks like

Solve the problems

 

Make every day peaceful with SENS8 Light Cam

Peace of mind at your fingertip

The SENS8 app is highly responsive with a sea of options, just customize your SENS8 as you wish. Everything is live on your phone.  

You can share your device with your trusted ones and share the fun moment and sense of security. Also, you can easily control multiple SENS8 devices from your smartphone, free from the trouble to download or switch between various apps. 

You can download the app from App Store and Google Play to both smartphones and tablets.

 

Free and Safe Video Storage

You can directly upload video recordings to your Dropbox/ Google Drive without subscribing to any cloud storage services.

SENS8 also supports 8G local storage, which adopts built-in eMMC memory. Saving 800 clips of 1080p video recordings with bank-level encryption, the memory will NOT be taken away like any SD memory card.

With local storage and connection to Google Drive/Dropbox, you are free from worries that your privacy will be compromised because all video contents are securely stored and directly uploaded to your own cloud without passing through any third-party servers. Your data is only yours, ever.

 

Free from worries even at darkest night

With auto PIR motion detection for light on/off, your SENS8 Light Cam turns on automatically when someone is nearby.

The brightness of the light is 800 lumens, which can be as bright as 800 candles lighting at the same time. It makes the outside view clear as daytime, also works as a deterrent to warn the intruders when they intend to approach. 

 

 

Take care of your delivery even when you are away

If you are at work when your parcel arrives, your SENS8 Light cam will notify you by sending you notifications. You can talk to the delivery man through the 2-way audio and sound the siren when you spot a package thief. 

What makes SENS8 Light Cam Special

Motion-Activated Video Recording   

When SENS8 detects any unusual activity, its camera will be triggered to record what’s happening. You don’t have to check endless hours of footage of an empty street as only important activities will be captured.

WDR Technology

When part of an image is extremely dark but another part is so bright you can’t see any details, that’s dynamic range—the difference in lighting. SENS8 Light Cam, with wide dynamic range (WDR), has special software that balance that lightings for one clear image. 

 

5-Second Lookback

To make sure you never miss anything important, SENS8 captures activity 5 seconds before a triggered event, so you will have access to the whole event, from start to finish.

 

Customised Motion-Detection Zone

The motion detection zone feature allows you to define a specific area that you want your SENS8 Light Cam to detect. Everything outside of the zone is ignored and will not trigger a notification or alert video. You can use motion detection zones to exclude frequently or publicly accessed areas, such as sidewalks or roads.

 

Work with IFTTT as well as Alexa.

IFTTT enables SENS8 to link to other smart home devices and software, building a more secure, interesting and connected smart home for you. 

Working with Alexa enables you to control SENS8 with a voiced order, making it convenient when your hands are busy with other stuff.

 

Weatherproof body

SENS8 Light Cam work perfectly in extreme weather conditions. Operating temperature can be as low as -30°C and as high as 40°C.  Constructed with the IP65 waterproof material,  a durable water-resistant finish to repel rain.

 

Why Do We Make SENS8 Light Cam

Our Mission

Security matters to every one of us. Important as it is, but more often you find it costs a lot for charging installation fees, monthly cloud storage subscription, monitoring service fee, and expensive gadgets.

Maybe peace of mind does not have to cost you so much.

We want to make security more affordable by providing a smart  DIY solution. In developing, quality is always our priority while we spare no effort to cut all unnecessary costs to a reliable security system. Meanwhile, our extensive experience in product sourcing and manufacturing helped us a lot to secure and develop excellent supplier and shipping partnerships so we can offer a high-quality product for the lowest possible price.

Now, we have SENS8 Light Cam.

 

Why SENS8

Thanks to the popularity and quality of our first generation of SENS8 All-in-one Home Security device, we are featured as "Amazon's Choice" at Amazon.com and have gained 4.3 stars out of 5 from reviews of customers.

Our current customers love our first products and therefore show great passionate about an outdoor solution from SENS8. At first, it was an idea to have an outdoor solution to make the SENS8 security system more completed.  By taking ideas and suggestions from our backers, users, and supporters, the idea is getting solid, comprehensive and growing into a prototype at the moment. We are very proud to present the SENS8 Light Cam to you with 18 months of researching, designing, developing, testing and improving.

Building on our previous experience in launching an Indiegogo campaign and 1-year of selling at amazon.com, we are more prepared and professional than any other campaigns in mass production, logistics, and customer service.  

If you have any questions and concerns about SENS8, you are more than welcome to contact us via:

Call customer service: +1 (800) 215-8303 (9am - 5pm PST)

E-mail: support@mysens8.com

Live chat: mysens8.com

SENS8 is a team committed to building security products with top-notch quality. We are featured on a various press and gained popularity in the market.

 

Design and Development

Making SENS8 Light Cam

 

Tech Spec

 

Timeline

Partnered with 

FAQ

The price is very low for an outdoor security camera. How is that possible?

Our extensive experience in product sourcing and manufacturing helped us a lot to secure and develop excellent supplier and shipping partnerships so we can offer a high-quality product for the lowest possible price. 
Crowdfunding certainly helps us to keep the costs down so we can work together with the factory to produce the right amount of units, without dealing with high storage costs and other related expenses.

How is SENS8 Light Cam powered and how long is the power cord?

SENS8 Light Cam is designed to be plugged into a standard power outlet. There’s no need to charge your camera so it can continuously stream live video 24/7 because it never needs to turn off to conserve battery power.

 

What is the Warranty?

We provide a one (1) year limited warranty. 


What is the video resolution?

SENS8 supports three video resolutions, HD 1080p, SD 720p and LD 480p. It will automatically switch video resolution based on the network situation to provide the best user experience. 


How do I share my SENS8 with others?

There are two ways to share your SENS8 with family members. 1) Send an invitation email to the invitees; 2) Invitees scan the QR code of the shared Sens8.


Can I have multiple SENS8s and set them up in different locations?

You can set up as many SENS8 units as you want, and easily access all of them with the SENS8 app.


Do I need an Internet connection to use SENS8?

Yes. SENS8 must be connected to the Internet via Wi-Fi (2.4GHz). The setup process should only take a few minutes.

 

How does SENS8 send alerts when burglaries occur?

SENS8 will send notifications to users’ smartphones and trigger the 95dB+ alarm to deter burglaries. 

 

What is the effective range of SENS8?

SENS8 is designed to be effective in the range of 30-40ft. 

 

Can I turn the alarm on or off using the app?

Yes. You can easily turn the alarm on or off using the SENS8 app. It’s your freedom to take actions when you receive the push notifications of any events.

 

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT/GST?

The backer is responsible for these costs. Please check your country's import duties/VAT/GST before purchasing. It is currently 0% in the US and varies internationally. 
 

Can I get a refund?

Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy.

In the event we are unable to deliver your SENS8 to your location due to any legal restrictions on the import or delivery, we shall refund you 75% of the amount on your Indiegogo campaign contribution. You are responsible for determining whether its legal to import, deliver, and operate the SENS8 at your location. In the event you cancel your Indiegogo contribution more than 10 days after it was made, we will assess an administration fee of 25% of your pledge and shall refund the remainder.

SENS8 must be connected to the Internet via Wi-Fi (2.4GHz). The setup process should only take a few minutes. How does SENS8 send alerts when burglaries occur?SENS8 will send notifications to users’ smartphones and trigger the 95dB+ alarm to deter burglaries.  What is the effective range of SENS8?SENS8 is designed to be effective in the range of 30-40ft.  Can I turn the alarm on or off using the app?Yes. You can easily turn the alarm on or off using the SENS8 app. It’s your freedom to take actions when you receive the push notifications of any events. Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT/GST?The backer is responsible for these costs. Please check your country's import duties/VAT/GST before purchasing. It is currently 0% in the US and varies internationally.  Can I get a refund?Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy.In the event we are unable to deliver your SENS8 to your location due to any legal restrictions on the import or delivery, we shall refund you 75% of the amount on your Indiegogo campaign contribution. You are responsible for determining whether its legal to import, deliver, and operate the SENS8 at your location. In the event you cancel your Indiegogo contribution more than 10 days after it was made, we will assess an administration fee of 25% of your pledge and shall refund the remainder.

story:
Short Summary

 

  • Hi my name is Rody Lipson and this is my senior project at Hampshire College. At Hampshire, students complete a capstone project before graduation. This project will be a culmination of my undergraduate studies, building on my longstanding interests in environmentalism, social justice, and design. I will be working with professor Thom Long, and other architects, who will help me design and execute this project.
  • I learned that I love building things after having a part time construction job for New England Outdoor Center. I gained further experience working with my Dad building a 'meditation gazebo' in our woods. You can see pictures of that project here. This campaign will help me use my passion for design and building to help others.

 

The Impact

 

  • This project is going to have a profound impact on the lives of the refugees who receive a tiny house they can call their own. Transportable, it will be a welcoming first-step to America. It's also a first step in developing my approach to environmentally friendly construction -- work I hope to continue after school.
  • I know from raising money for my brother when he was sick, how effective these crowd funding campaigns can be. I know from building the gazebo how satisfying it is to create something beautiful and functional from the ground up.
  • I have the design faculty at Hampshire College committed and engaged in this project. They will be there with me every step of the way. I've spoken with the head of the Ascentria Care Alliance office in Westfield, and they are very excited to receive this house and give it to a family in need.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

  • Time is a challenge when committing to a project of this magnitude.
  • That's why I'm dedicating an entire year, with two semesters and a summer in between to complete this project.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Even if you can't contribute there are still some ways you can help:

  • Tell others about this campaign. Show people this website, share it on facebook!
  • You can also use the Indiegogo share tools.

Short Summary
 

Hi my name is Rody Lipson and this is my senior project at Hampshire College. At Hampshire, students complete a capstone project before graduation. This project will be a culmination of my undergraduate studies, building on my longstanding interests in environmentalism, social justice, and design. I will be working with professor Thom Long, and other architects, who will help me design and execute this project.
I learned that I love building things after having a part time construction job for New England Outdoor Center. I gained further experience working with my Dad building a 'meditation gazebo' in our woods. You can see pictures of that project here. This campaign will help me use my passion for design and building to help others.


 
The Impact
 

This project is going to have a profound impact on the lives of the refugees who receive a tiny house they can call their own. Transportable, it will be a welcoming first-step to America. It's also a first step in developing my approach to environmentally friendly construction -- work I hope to continue after school.
I know from raising money for my brother when he was sick, how effective these crowd funding campaigns can be. I know from building the gazebo how satisfying it is to create something beautiful and functional from the ground up.
I have the design faculty at Hampshire College committed and engaged in this project. They will be there with me every step of the way. I've spoken with the head of the Ascentria Care Alliance office in Westfield, and they are very excited to receive this house and give it to a family in need.


 
Risks & Challenges
 

Time is a challenge when committing to a project of this magnitude.
That's why I'm dedicating an entire year, with two semesters and a summer in between to complete this project.


 
Other Ways You Can Help
 
Even if you can't contribute there are still some ways you can help:

Tell others about this campaign. Show people this website, share it on facebook!
You can also use the Indiegogo share tools.

story:
NGO Calamity Charity

TO PROVIDE SHELTERS TO VICTIMS OF TYPHOONS IN PHILIPPINES

Shelters are badly needed in Philippines after the typhoon that passed 6 month ago.

We want to produce outstanding shelters made of engineered bamboo. 

Our mission is as well to promote the farming of bamboo as it gives good returns to local farmers.

Help us in our mission, we thank you.

Below some pictures of 1 square meter shelters found up to now, 6 month after.

The GrandPa and his grand son from this shelter above just received a new decent shelter from Hope and GAWAD KALINGA, May 2014. I think they left that place without to much regrets!

Ms. Salazar, 66, leaves in this small space since post Haiyan ! Gawad Kalinga and Yellow boat Hope are gathering funds actually to shelter her in a decent place.


Humanitarian GREEN Shelter Solutions

Shelters and parts of houses from beams and panels from bamboo material.

The bamboo industry in Philippines need processing plants to obtain a higher value material. 

This is sadly lacking actually in Philippines. The shelter we engineered from Bamboo raw material shall provide from first such processing plant.

Beams and Panels, easier construction, better control of strength

                                  

This materials will open a new array of products made out of Bamboo in Philippines. 

It will grow a very profitable industry and decent returns for the provincial farmers.


Today we know that huge typhoons are sadly the new normal, let's anticipate and be prepared !

Engineered bamboo houses are strong and the materials treated, last for decades !

To make all this possible the fabrication has to take place before sad events, the time to treat and process is sad times for many families under tarpaulins or makeshift slum type habitation.

Our mission is to provide safe BAMBOO SHELTERS to help victims of typhoons and promote the culture of Bamboo to boost a new economy enabling decent returns to provincial farmers.

Millions of families with kids need a decent place to live and a roof over their head, today 6 month after typhoon Haiyan devastated the Philippines in November 2013

 

This senior lady was here just told that GAWAD KALINGA has made a shelter for her and that she can move for Mother's Day. 

That was her very last day in that 1 square meter shelter, Thank You Gawad Kalinga and Yellow Boat Hope Foundation.


WITH YOUR HELP WE CAN DO THIS AS BELOW ! We need prepare for future events, we sadly know the nature has more surprise to come.


Today May 2014, millions of people were sheltered in TENTS after Haiyan, some were able to repair their homes, only few, many are in a desparate situation.

YOUR HELP VERY MUCH APPRECIATED

THANK YOU!

story:
The sensors inside uHoo monitors the air you breathe and alerts you when your environment is not safe. uHoo's eight dedicated sensors detect what's in the air and provide recommendations of what you can do to get better air quality.

 

 

Shipping now!

Preview of Production!

 

 

  • Indoor air is 2 to 5 times worse than outdoors (EPA)

  • Air quality is the single largest environmental hazard in the world (WHO)

  • 1 in 12 children and 1 in 14 adults in the US have asthma (CDC)

  • 72% of toxic chemicals we come into contact with are indoors (UL)

  • 50% of America’s 115,000 schools have problems linked to indoor air quality (EPA)

  • 213 million work days lost in the US due to poor indoor air quality (ASHRAE)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

uHoo is especially helpful to those suffering from asthma, hay fever and allergies, but also useful for parents of young children, the elderly and those interested in knowing the air they breathe and how to keep it safe.

 

Identify key factors to track to prevent respiratory conditions.

 

Show the air quality within the home or office.

 

Receive real-time alerts of pollution levels. uHoo sends specific alerts to you and your family or friends when the detected air quality is bad.

Watch what happens when Brian opens up some cans of paint around uHoo!

 

 

 

 

 

 

From now until the end of the uHoo campaign, you can refer your friends to get one free uHoo (referrals must total $1,500) or a free carry case ($750 in referrals)! Check out our rules and rewards below: 

*Free carry cases will only be available once we’ve reached and unlocked our first stretch goal of $75k.

 

 

 

Our small device packs eight dedicated sensors, the most in the industry. uHoo’s simple and striking design makes a sophisticated statement in any home. The beauty is in the details.

 

 

 

 

 

uHoo uses safety thresholds indicated by the EPA and OSHA to inform you of the air pollution level. The sensors will detect toxins and air quality in real time to help you make the right choices and live healthier.

 

 

uHoo is dedicated to providing people with technology to understand the air they breathe and empower them with knowledge to create a healthier home and office environment.

Dustin Jefferson Onghanseng and Brian Lin both share a passion for health and sustainability. When they met, they both had chronic breathing conditions, rhinitis and asthma, respectively. Realizing they could put their passions to good use and solve some major health problems, they used a 24-hour hackathon to build their first Indoor Air Quality Sensor. They won the hackathon, turned it into a startup and are now on a mission to help people live healthier lives.

 

 

uHoo is able to ship worldwide. Please see the FAQ for shipping prices.

 

Orders placed now will begin shipping in November, and we estimate a Holiday 2016 delivery.

*Actual ship dates will vary depending on your country, your location, and when you placed your order. The uHoo team will keep you up to date on every step of the process. 

This is not just a normal pre-order - we are crowdfunding because we share your passion for health, sustainability, and living healthier lives. Your voice will impact every decision made by our product team and our app development team.

If you're here for the deals, that's great too - we have incredible discounts on all uHoo pre-order products in return for your support.

You will never find uHoo at these low prices again!

 

If you need to update your address, be sure to follow these steps on Indiegogo.

 

  1. ABOUT
  2. TECHNICAL SPECS
  3. SHIPPING
  4. CUSTOMER SUPPORT
Please contact support@uhooair.com with any questions or requests for changes in your order.

 

What is uHoo? uHoo is the most advanced air quality sensor in the world. With eight dedicated sensors, uHoo provides allergen and toxin alerts for air quality in the home and office.
How does uHoo work? You simply plug it to a power outlet, set up a user account on your smartphone and uHoo does the rest. It delivers real time minute-by-minute data to your smartphone which can be stored safely in an encrypted space in the cloud. 
How will this benefit me? Knowing the quality of air you breathe helps you make better decisions on the products you use and your habits so you can live a healthier life. Conditions like asthma, hay fever and allergies are triggered by allergens and toxins that are present in the air that you breathe. With uHoo, you would know what is in the air you breathe. 
What’s the main difference between uHoo and competing products? Other air detectors on the market tend to focus on only a select few air quality indicators. uHoo’s technology is the most advanced, with eight dedicated sensors built in to an aesthetically beautiful product that is around the size of a soda can. uHoo detects more chemicals, particles and toxins than any other air detector.
What is the difference between uHoo Classic and uHoo Premium? The key difference between the Classic and Premium is the number of sensors. The Classic has five sensors - Temperature, Humidity, Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs), PM 2.5 (Dust) and Air Pressure. The Premium has all the sensors that the Classic has plus three more - Carbon Monoxide, Carbon Dioxide and Ozone.
How much does uHoo cost? Those who pre-order during the Indiegogo campaign can get the uHoo Classic at a 50% discount for only $99 and get the uHoo Premium at a 40% discount for only $149.
What comes in the box? The package for both versions include the uHoo device, a micro-USB cable, a power adapter and the free smartphone app that you can download on the Apple Store or Play Store.
What mobile support do you provide? The uHoo app is available for both iPhone and Android and can be downloaded for free.
How can I track my health? Sufferers of asthma and allergies can take it a step further by using the Health Diary. You can record information about how you are feeling at any given time and how it may correspond to the air quality of the room you’re in. You can also set up personalized alerts so you stay ahead of the curve.
What’s your privacy policy? Your data is safely stored in our cloud servers and we do not use your data for marketing or other purposes. Your privacy is important to us, so we respect your wish to keep it private or you can choose to share it and with whom.
How portable is uHoo and can I travel with it? uHoo is small and lightweight, making it easy to carry with you wherever you go. It weighs only 200 grams and is only 6.2 inches tall and 3.3 inches in diameter.
Why do I need to be notified when I’m not at home? It’s important to know when there’s a sudden gas leak or when the temperature suddenly rises - such as when there’s a fire, for example. That way, you can immediately act and not be caught off guard when it’s too late. 
How easy is it to read the information? The alerts and messages are written in simple everyday language so it would be easy for you to understand. Each sensor is also color coded based on what it detects. Green is good, yellow is still alright, while red is unhealthy. You have the option to view each data point in more detail. 
Does it make any noise? No. uHoo does not make any sound at all. 
Will this system be able to monitor the whole house, or would I need to purchase multiple sensors for a two-level home? How air flows inside your home is dependent on its design. Doors, walls and partitions restrict the flow of air, thus the air in one room will be different from another if the doors are constantly kept closed. The air on one floor in your home would probably be different from another level. It is best to place uHoo in the area of your home where most people spend their time in because that’s what matters.
Can it prepare reports to be given to my doctor or allergist? You would be able to show your doctor or allergist your indoor air quality information as well as your Health Diary. These are designed to be easily readable and referenced at any time. 
Can this product relate to a person personally, by letting you know if you have an allergy? Since different people have different tolerance levels for different allergens and toxins uHoo allows you to set your tolerance levels on when you want to be alerted. 

 

What types of sensors does uHoo have? With eight dedicated sensors, uHoo is the most comprehensive air quality sensor in the market. uHoo has sensors for Temperature, Humidity, Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs), PM 2.5 (Dust), Air Pressure, Carbon Monoxide, Carbon Dioxide and Ozone.
What are the dimensions and weight? uHoo is small and lightweight, so easy to carry with you wherever you go. It weighs only 200 grams and is only 6.2 inches tall and 3.3 inches in diameter.
Is it customizable so you could focus on the metrics most important to you? Yes, you can customize each air quality metric based on your own tolerance level. That way you get alerts that are more personalized and catered to you.
Does it have a filter to clean the air? uHoo does not filter the air, but provides you with the data you need to make the changes that matter. When you receive an alert about the air quality, the uHoo app will also automatically provide recommendations on what you can do at that moment for better air quality. The data that uHoo provides enables you to make healthy changes.
Does uHoo have a battery? uHoo does not have a battery. It just needs to be plugged into a power outlet.
Will it alert me to precisely what is wrong with the air quality, not just that it's bad? Yes, uHoo will tell you exactly which type of air quality parameter is unhealthy.
Can it be expanded to check for additional allergens and toxins? As of today, uHoo has eight dedicated sensors and can monitor various allergens and toxins. As we progress and build uHoo’s technology, we will be able to incorporate more detection and monitoring capabilities.
Where do I place uHoo in my home or office? uHoo will work in all indoor environments. You can put uHoo anywhere in your home as long as you avoid these locations: under direct sunlight, in front of a blowing air-conditioner or fan, beside your cooking stove or heater or any equipment that emits heat or cold air
Can the device monitor air quality and toxicity for different areas/rooms in my home? Yes, uHoo can monitor air quality and toxicity for different areas / rooms in your home. You have the option of leaving it in one room or you can bring it to another room. Alternatively, if you want to constantly monitor multiple rooms, you can also get a device for every room and you’d be able to have an air quality map of your home, which you would be able to see on the uHoo app.
How big of an area can uHoo cover? Air flows and it depends on the design of your home or office. In a completely open space, uHoo can cover approximately 400 square feet.
Can uHoo check for smoke too? Yes, uHoo can check for smoke too.
How many people can be notified at a time? You can set uHoo to notify as many people as you want. Your family members can also download the uHoo app and add the device(s) you have at home into their uHoo account. You can set this within the uHoo app for every device that you have.
Does it have options to graph air quality over a period time for comparison? Yes, you would be able to see charts on how your indoor air quality changes over time. You can view it by hour, by day, by week or by month.
What kind of maintenance does uHoo require? uHoo doesn’t need any maintenance. All you need to do is wipe it with a cloth or feather duster when you clean your home or office. 

 

When does shipping begin? April 2017
When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps? All Indiegogo Units are expected by April 2017.
Where does it ship? Worldwide. Shipping rates vary depending on your country.
How much is shipping? - 1 uHoo: $20 for US, everywhere else is $30
I'm interested in a distribution partnership. Please email us at hello@uhooair.com if you're a retailer interested in distribution.
I’m interested in purchasing in bulk for my facility (hospital / hotel / school etc). Please email us at hello@uhooair.com if you’re a company interested in making a bulk order.
Do I have to pay VAT / GST? Yes - depending on your location, you may have to pay VAT/GST.
What are the risks & challenges of getting the device today? We are using Indiegogo as a way to validate our product. All of the numbers are real, and the backers are real. We want your help to keep us and our team accountable at every step of the way. If there is anything you need to change or update, just reach out to us! There are risks with production at every step of the way, but luckily for you, we've done all the hard work of getting a product through the tooling process and getting ready for scale. Now, we just want your help to scale the production process and get all uHoo units ready to ship.

 

What happens if my uHoo breaks or stops working (warranty)? uHoo has a one year limited warranty.
What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign? See these steps on How to Request a Refund. During the Indiegogo campaign, you can process the refund at any time by contacting support@indiegogo.com or searching their help center.
What is your return / exchange policy after the Indiegogo campaign is over? Full refunds will be available up until November 1, 2016 for a 15% restocking fee. After November 1, we will not be able to offer a refund. However, an exchange for an equivalent or higher purchase total may be available anytime, based on supply availability. [Purchase total does not include taxes/shipping/handling.]
What is a Perk? A Perk is Indiegogo’s reward for your contribution. We give full details that you'll be pre-ordering uHoo, and not just making a contribution.
How can I check the status of my pre-order? By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.
If I have other questions, who should I contact? Press: press@uhooair.com
Support: support@uhooair.com
Just to Say Hi: hello@uhooair.com

How air flows inside your home is dependent on its design. Doors, walls and partitions restrict the flow of air, thus the air in one room will be different from another if the doors are constantly kept closed. The air on one floor in your home would probably be different from another level. It is best to place uHoo in the area of your home where most people spend their time in because that’s what matters.


Can it prepare reports to be given to my doctor or allergist?
You would be able to show your doctor or allergist your indoor air quality information as well as your Health Diary. These are designed to be easily readable and referenced at any time. 


Can this product relate to a person personally, by letting you know if you have an allergy?
Since different people have different tolerance levels for different allergens and toxins uHoo allows you to set your tolerance levels on when you want to be alerted. 


 



What types of sensors does uHoo have?
With eight dedicated sensors, uHoo is the most comprehensive air quality sensor in the market. uHoo has sensors for Temperature, Humidity, Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs), PM 2.5 (Dust), Air Pressure, Carbon Monoxide, Carbon Dioxide and Ozone.


What are the dimensions and weight?
uHoo is small and lightweight, so easy to carry with you wherever you go. It weighs only 200 grams and is only 6.2 inches tall and 3.3 inches in diameter.


Is it customizable so you could focus on the metrics most important to you?
Yes, you can customize each air quality metric based on your own tolerance level. That way you get alerts that are more personalized and catered to you.


Does it have a filter to clean the air?
uHoo does not filter the air, but provides you with the data you need to make the changes that matter. When you receive an alert about the air quality, the uHoo app will also automatically provide recommendations on what you can do at that moment for better air quality. The data that uHoo provides enables you to make healthy changes.


Does uHoo have a battery?
uHoo does not have a battery. It just needs to be plugged into a power outlet.


Will it alert me to precisely what is wrong with the air quality, not just that it's bad?
Yes, uHoo will tell you exactly which type of air quality parameter is unhealthy.


Can it be expanded to check for additional allergens and toxins?
As of today, uHoo has eight dedicated sensors and can monitor various allergens and toxins. As we progress and build uHoo’s technology, we will be able to incorporate more detection and monitoring capabilities.


Where do I place uHoo in my home or office?
uHoo will work in all indoor environments. You can put uHoo anywhere in your home as long as you avoid these locations: under direct sunlight, in front of a blowing air-conditioner or fan, beside your cooking stove or heater or any equipment that emits heat or cold air


Can the device monitor air quality and toxicity for different areas/rooms in my home?
Yes, uHoo can monitor air quality and toxicity for different areas / rooms in your home. You have the option of leaving it in one room or you can bring it to another room. Alternatively, if you want to constantly monitor multiple rooms, you can also get a device for every room and you’d be able to have an air quality map of your home, which you would be able to see on the uHoo app.


How big of an area can uHoo cover?
Air flows and it depends on the design of your home or office. In a completely open space, uHoo can cover approximately 400 square feet.


Can uHoo check for smoke too?
Yes, uHoo can check for smoke too.


How many people can be notified at a time?
You can set uHoo to notify as many people as you want. Your family members can also download the uHoo app and add the device(s) you have at home into their uHoo account. You can set this within the uHoo app for every device that you have.


Does it have options to graph air quality over a period time for comparison?
Yes, you would be able to see charts on how your indoor air quality changes over time. You can view it by hour, by day, by week or by month.


What kind of maintenance does uHoo require?
uHoo doesn’t need any maintenance. All you need to do is wipe it with a cloth or feather duster when you clean your home or office. 


 



When does shipping begin?
April 2017


When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?
All Indiegogo Units are expected by April 2017.


Where does it ship?
Worldwide. Shipping rates vary depending on your country.


How much is shipping?
- 1 uHoo: $20 for US, everywhere else is $30


I'm interested in a distribution partnership.
Please email us at hello@uhooair.com if you're a retailer interested in distribution.


I’m interested in purchasing in bulk for my facility (hospital / hotel / school etc).
Please email us at hello@uhooair.com if you’re a company interested in making a bulk order.


Do I have to pay VAT / GST?
Yes - depending on your location, you may have to pay VAT/GST.


What are the risks & challenges of getting the device today?
We are using Indiegogo as a way to validate our product. All of the numbers are real, and the backers are real. We want your help to keep us and our team accountable at every step of the way. If there is anything you need to change or update, just reach out to us! There are risks with production at every step of the way, but luckily for you, we've done all the hard work of getting a product through the tooling process and getting ready for scale. Now, we just want your help to scale the production process and get all uHoo units ready to ship.


 



What happens if my uHoo breaks or stops working (warranty)?
uHoo has a one year limited warranty.


What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign?
See these steps on How to Request a Refund. During the Indiegogo campaign, you can process the refund at any time by contacting support@indiegogo.com or searching their help center.


What is your return / exchange policy after the Indiegogo campaign is over?
Full refunds will be available up until November 1, 2016 for a 15% restocking fee. After November 1, we will not be able to offer a refund. However, an exchange for an equivalent or higher purchase total may be available anytime, based on supply availability. [Purchase total does not include taxes/shipping/handling.]


What is a Perk?
A Perk is Indiegogo’s reward for your contribution. We give full details that you'll be pre-ordering uHoo, and not just making a contribution.


How can I check the status of my pre-order?
By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.


If I have other questions, who should I contact?
Press: press@uhooair.comSupport: support@uhooair.comJust to Say Hi: hello@uhooair.com

story:
WHAT IS IT?

The Smart Kitchen Sous Vide Circulator is the only tool you will ever need to cook sous vide and to cook almost any meal. The Smart Kitchen Sous Vide Circulator heats and maintains the water temperature to a precision of 1/10 of a degree, guaranteeing that everything will cook to perfection without ever being able to overcook. You are a busy person, work long hours and don't have time to cook, the Smart Kitchen Sous Vide Circulator will allow you to arrive from work everyday to a hot and delicious meal everytime. 

The Smart Kitchen Sous Vide Circulator is the only sous vide circulator in the world to be entirely encased and made of Stainless steal, making it very durable and giving it a timeless look and design.

WHAT IS COOKING SOUS VIDE?

Cooking sous vide is in very broad terms cooking in a water bath at precise temperatures. This allows products to be cooked to perfection every time without having to worry about burning your food, drying out our proteins, or simply stressing about "is it cooked yet". You can cook a fillet of salmon to perfection in 10 minutes at 55 degrees celcius, but you can "forget" that same salmon fillet for 12 hours and will never be overcooked and will still be insanely moist.

Using our Smart Kitchen Sous Vide Circulator, you can cook entire meal. For the busy person working long hours to the big families needing to cook large meals our Smart Kicthen Sous Vide Circulator is for you.

COMMERCIAL & RESIDENTIAL

The Smart Kitchen Sous Vide Circulator was designed and engineered by reverse engineering other devices currently being sold in the market. We noticed a massive gap between the quality of the residential models in the market and the "laboratory" grade devices available. We created a hybride Sous Vide Circulator that will meet both the needs of the residential and commercial kitchen. Here is what we have done differently:

- Outer shell made 100% of stainless steel construction

- Easy to dismantle for proper cleaning

- Top panel water proof and tactile

- Internal turbine pump for higher circulation of water

- Water intake on bottom and sides to allow suction even when the circulator is sitting at the bottom of a pot or container.

- Reset button in case of misuse of the Smart Kitchen Sous Vide Circulator.

- Micro switch integrated to shut down if the device is pulled out of the water while being on to avoid burning the heating element.

- Pump and heater designed for containers between 5 to 22 liters. For both residential and commercial use.

HOW TO OPERATE?

The Smart Kitchen Sous Vide Circulator was designed to maintain precise temperature in your water bath continuously for up to 99 hours at a time. To do so, each device is equiped with a heating coil, precise thermometer, microcontroller, and a water circulating turbine. From cooking a single item to a full meal, from an egg to an entire rack of lamb, from a single salmon fillet to 20 steaks at the same time, The Smart Kitchen Sous Vide Circulator is very easy to operate by anyone in four easy steps.

1. Turn on

2. Set time

3. Set temperature

4. Start

WARRANTY

We believe so strongly in the quality and performance of our Smart Kitchen Sous Vide Circulator that we are giving a 12 MONTHS 100% GUARANTEED SATISFACTION WARRANTY. This warranty will cover every component of the device. If for whatever reason it stops working or does not work properly, we will either fix or replace your device FREE ON CHARGE. 

OUR DEVELOPMENT

We knew from the get go that we weren't going to change the world of sous vide cooking, but that we could definitely bring major improvements to it. Also, the market is currently being flooded with "low cost" sous vide immersion circulators that don't necessarily cover all the basis. In the past year, we reversed engineered a few dozen devices and have put together from that the best of all worlds. We were also looking at the device itself and wanted to give it a very modern look and a timeless design. We ended up with the Smart Kitchen Sous Vide Circulator. 

We already have established relationships with manufacturers in China to bring this project to life. To this date, we were able to produce two fully functional devices which we have put through their paces for testing and guaranteeing they work as described. We are very proud that our two prototypes work above and beyond our expectations. We now need the help of backers to allow us to go to full production mode and bring the Smart Kitchen Sous Vide Circulator to life.

TIMELINES

story:
Thank you to everyone who contributed to our campaign! If you missed it, you can buy online at www.thegrayl.com on October 25th!

 

 Drink to your Health and
Help the Environment


The GRAYL Water Filtration Cup is patent-pending and all of our design work and tooling are complete.  All we need is to pay for our first production run, and that is where you can help! 

Be one of the first owners of the GRAYL Water Filtration Cup and make a daily difference in your health and the environment.  GRAYL provides clean water on the go, and keeps disposable plastics out of our landfills and recycling bins.

 

.

GRAYL ships with one G3+ Filter –perfect for everyday use. The filter lasts 300 uses (40gal, 150L) .
GRAYL also offers the G3+ Purifier- designed for outdoors, international travel and water emergencies.

 


 Passion for Innovation + Design

GRAYL’s flip lock lid –
one side eliminates the glug-glug,
the other side stops leaks.

 

 

 

 

Team GRAYL (from left to right):
Michael Bargiel, Design Chief
Travis Merrigan, COO & Co-Founder
Nancie Weston, CEO & Founder
Gary Sukovaty,  Global Sales Director
Keri Kliemann, Marketing Director

About GRAYL

GRAYL, Inc.is a woman owned, Seattle-based startup founded in 2012. We make innovative, beautifully designed products that contribute to a health lifestyle and clean environment. GRAYL is designed for busy people who care deeply about both what they put in their bodies and their footprint on earth.

GRAYL was inspired by founder Nancie Weston's concerns about the quality and taste of the tap water she drank at home and, especially, during her business travels.  She no longer wanted to contribute to the environmental impact made by disposable water bottles. She set out to create a device that not only made water safe and taste great, but also that was beautifully designed and made with the highest quality materials. So Nancie invested her life savings, put together a team of dedicated people and 18 months later, GRAYL is ready to launch. 

Now we need your help. 


 

What People are Saying about GRAYL:

 

 

 

 

GRAYL FAQs:

Earlybird Color Selection:

Please put the color choice in the Address Line 2 spot.  If you do not give us a color choice we will contact you to get one when the campaign is done.

I want to buy two or more GRAYLs...

You will have to order them individually, however we can ship them together, so you only have to pay for shipping one time. 

 

Isn't tap water good enough? Which impurities are the GRAYL G3+ Filter and G3+ Purifier effective against?

Both the G3+ Filter and Purifier are effective against a broad range of impurities. They greatly reduce impurities that make water taste and smell bad, like chlorine, certain industrial and pharmaceutical chemicals and certain heavy metals commonly found in tap water. The G3+ Filters removes 99.99% of bacteria, such as E. coli, found when municipal water systems fail. The G3+ Purifier provides a higher level of protection, removing 99.999% of bacteria, cysts (Giardia) and viruses (Hepatitis A). Tests were completed by a certified, independent laboratory according to NSF/ANSI standards 42 and 53.

What is the difference between the G3+ Filter and G3+ Purifier?

The primary difference is that the Purifier has two layers of filter media, the Filter has one. The Filter is sufficient for most people in the US. The Filter strips water of nasty chemicals flavors and odors and filters the bacteria common when municipal water systems fail like E. Coli. The Purifier does everything the Filter does, and adds protection against cysts (Giardia) and viruses - Hepatitis A, SARS, etc. The Purifier needs longer to extract viruses from the water, so it takes about 30 seconds to filter one Water Filtration Cup (16oz - 475ml).

What is the pore size (microns) of the G3+ technology?

Pore size is not relevant to G3+ technology; it's like asking how much horsepower a laptop computer has. Pore size is relevant in 'mechanical filters', which work by forcing water through tiny pores in a filter. In a mechanical filter, the biggest pore must be smaller than the smallest germ. The downside of mechanical filters is that tiny pores prevent rapid flow of water, so mechanical filters work slowly or require lots of pressure. Instead, G3+ technology uses electroadsorption; relatively large pores overlaid with a positively-charged mesh (think: little magnets) that latch onto germs. The result is fast-flowing, clean water so you can Drink Freely.

How long does a filter last?

The replaceable G3+ Filter and Purifier have a lifespan of 300 uses (40gallons or 150L) - about 3 uses per day for 3 months. The Filter should definitely be replaced after 300 uses because its effectiveness declines after 300 uses. Replacement filters are available wherever GRAYL is sold, and through our website.

What is 18/8 Stainless Steel?

18/8 refers to the steel containing 18% chromium and 8% nickel. The rest is mostly iron. 18/8 stainless steel is a strong, corrosion resistant metal that we chose specifically for GRAYL. 18/8 stainless steel doesn't leach BPA or other chemicals like some plastic and aluminum. It's durable and easy to clean. We could have selected a cheaper material, but GRAYL cuts no corners.

What is activated carbon?

Activated carbon absorbs waterborne impurities. Carbon has been used for thousands of years - the ancient Phoenicians (1200 BC) stored water in charred barrels for long sea voyages. Carbon is “activated” with heat and oxygen to create tiny pores, which increases the surface area. GRAYL’s G3+ filter incorporates ultra-powdered activated carbon throughout the filter, creating an even higher surface area than in most filters. The carbon is made from natural coconut husks. Activated carbon’s high surface area adsorbs a wide range of impurities commonly found in tap water, including various metals, organic molecules, industrial and pharmaceutical chemicals.

How fast does the GRAYL Filter water?

The filter in the Water Filtration Cup filters 16oz in about 15 seconds (2 liters/minute). The purifier filters 16oz in about 30 seconds (1 liter/minute). That’s faster than just about any other hand-held filter on the market.

Is the filtered water from GRAYL safe for drinking in the Developing World?

Yes, but use the G3+ Purifier. The G3+ Purifier is your best protection against the full spectrum of waterborne pathogens that cause human disease (bacteria, protozoa and viruses.) Of course, we always recommend filtering the cleanest possible water you can find.
