story:
"You must be 100 percent delighted with Eazytables. If for any reason you are not, simply return your purchase for a prompt refund - that is my promise to you" Deirdre Hogan

The Heart Of The Matter...

Lets face it – lots of kids find maths boring. But worse still, to some kids, maths is just an insurmountable problem.

 

Maths tables is the heart of the matter. If the standard method of rote learning isn't working for your child, they're facing a problem that's going to last throughout their schooling – possibly even for the rest of their lives. Because without a firm grasp of tables, you're never going to master maths. And in the case of children with Dyscalculia or Dyslexia, you're looking at an even more intractable problem.

But now there's a simple solution – even for those difficult cases. EazyTables nips the problem in the bud, before it gets a chance to turn your kids off maths forever.

EazyTables is a physical, tangible learning aid – not a computer programme. And EazyTables also gets the balance right for kids. It's not ”bookish” which can put a lot of kids off. But it's not a game either. EazyTables is a fun way to learn that takes the drudgery out of Homework Time.

Let’s change ‘I HATE MATHS’ to ‘MATHS IS FUN!’. Because with the help of EazyTables that’s possible in a very short period of time.

 

Market Research

Obviously EazyTables isn't yet available to the public at large – a situation we're hoping to change with the help of the Indiegogo community. But we have trialled EazyTables extensively. And we've  done some market research among parents, teachers, resource teachers and students who've used our system. Feed back has been quite remarkable. Below is a sample of 3 students with very different abilities. See the remarkable effect EazyTables has had on their maths tables performance.

Student ‘A’

was finding maths tables a struggle and was getting frustrated with poor results. After 10 weeks Student A was ‘Top of the Class’

Student ‘B’

has a ‘Specific Learning Difficulty’ and was finding it hard to recall and memorise tables. When introduced to EazyTables you can see it all started to make sense – he started to achieve unbelievable results in such a short time that his parents got quite emotional about the turn around.

Student ‘C’

this child is Autistic and was having difficulty with Maths. When introduced to EazyTables she found them easy to use and fun. As her test marks improved over the weeks so did her confidence. She was achieving top marks after just a couple of months.

Note: just 5 minutes a day is all it took these children to achieve these results.

Testimonials

My daughter Emma would have had a very negative attitude to maths’s
tables before EasyTables. Now she has a positive attitude to learning tables, making
homework more fun and easier. Her results are just amazing now.                      Niamh Doyle - Parent


My Son David, is diagnosed with ‘Receptive Language Disorder’ aged 8. He finds school a big struggle and maths particularly. After using EasyTables  within a matter a weeks he really started to understand Maths Tables, his teacher also commented on the vast improvement. David now tells his friends about EasyTables. I couldn’t recommend them highly enough. Thanks for coming up with them.                         Kay Kerr - Parent


My Autistic daughter loved them. As she viewed them as a game she didn’t mind spending just 5 minutes each day with them. I saw her confidence increase greatly in her ability to answer questions.                                                                             Deirdre Costelloe - Parent


No doubt about it, there's educational merit in EazyTables. I believe it will prove a great resource for teachers and parents of children. Best of luck with the project. Brian Gilsenan – CEO, CJ Fallon

 

Our product:

 

 

We Need Your Support!

Dear Indiegogo community, we need your support to get the first batch of EazyTables packs manufactured. Our goal is to get this simple, but extremely effective product out to kids everywhere who are struggling with maths. EazyTables really does empower children and gives them confidence.

Spreading the news is critical to get us to our target. So please, tweet all your friends
and get the word out there about EazyTables. Jump onto our Facebook page and
'Like’ us. Better yet, put in an order today for your very own EazyTables pack, and experience the benefits for yourself!

Or make a donation. However small. Thank you for your support.

EazyTables – The fun way to improve children's maths.
story_txt:
"You must be 100 percent delighted with Eazytables. If for any reason you are not, simply return your purchase for a prompt refund - that is my promise to you" Deirdre Hogan
The Heart Of The Matter...
Lets face it – lots of kids find maths boring. But worse still, to some kids, maths is just an insurmountable problem.
 
Maths tables is the heart of the matter. If the standard method of rote learning isn't working for your child, they're facing a problem that's going to last throughout their schooling – possibly even for the rest of their lives. Because without a firm grasp of tables, you're never going to master maths. And in the case of children with Dyscalculia or Dyslexia, you're looking at an even more intractable problem. 
But now there's a simple solution – even for those difficult cases. EazyTables nips the problem in the bud, before it gets a chance to turn your kids off maths forever.
EazyTables is a physical, tangible learning aid – not a computer programme. And EazyTables also gets the balance right for kids. It's not ”bookish” which can put a lot of kids off. But it's not a game either. EazyTables is a fun way to learn that takes the drudgery out of Homework Time.

Let’s change ‘I HATE MATHS’ to ‘MATHS IS FUN!’. Because with the help of EazyTables that’s possible in a very short period of time.
 
Market Research
Obviously EazyTables isn't yet available to the public at large – a situation we're hoping to change with the help of the Indiegogo community. But we have trialled EazyTables extensively. And we've  done some market research among parents, teachers, resource teachers and students who've used our system. Feed back has been quite remarkable. Below is a sample of 3 students with very different abilities. See the remarkable effect EazyTables has had on their maths tables performance.

Student ‘A’ 

was finding maths tables a struggle and was getting frustrated with poor results. After 10 weeks Student A was ‘Top of the Class’
Student ‘B’
has a ‘Specific Learning Difficulty’ and was finding it hard to recall and memorise tables. When introduced to EazyTables you can see it all started to make sense – he started to achieve unbelievable results in such a short time that his parents got quite emotional about the turn around.
Student ‘C’
this child is Autistic and was having difficulty with Maths. When introduced to EazyTables she found them easy to use and fun. As her test marks improved over the weeks so did her confidence. She was achieving top marks after just a couple of months.
Note: just 5 minutes a day is all it took these children to achieve these results.
Testimonials
My daughter Emma would have had a very negative attitude to maths’stables before EasyTables. Now she has a positive attitude to learning tables, makinghomework more fun and easier. Her results are just amazing now.                      Niamh Doyle - Parent
My Son David, is diagnosed with ‘Receptive Language Disorder’ aged 8. He finds school a big struggle and maths particularly. After using EasyTables  within a matter a weeks he really started to understand Maths Tables, his teacher also commented on the vast improvement. David now tells his friends about EasyTables. I couldn’t recommend them highly enough. Thanks for coming up with them.                         Kay Kerr - Parent
My Autistic daughter loved them. As she viewed them as a game she didn’t mind spending just 5 minutes each day with them. I saw her confidence increase greatly in her ability to answer questions.                                                                             Deirdre Costelloe - Parent
No doubt about it, there's educational merit in EazyTables. I believe it will prove a great resource for teachers and parents of children. Best of luck with the project. Brian Gilsenan – CEO, CJ Fallon 
 
Our product: 

 

 
We Need Your Support!
Dear Indiegogo community, we need your support to get the first batch of EazyTables packs manufactured. Our goal is to get this simple, but extremely effective product out to kids everywhere who are struggling with maths. EazyTables really does empower children and gives them confidence. 
Spreading the news is critical to get us to our target. So please, tweet all your friendsand get the word out there about EazyTables. Jump onto our Facebook page and'Like’ us. Better yet, put in an order today for your very own EazyTables pack, and experience the benefits for yourself!
Or make a donation. However small. Thank you for your support. 
EazyTables – The fun way to improve children's maths.

story:
Award-winning portable projector by XGIMI. Use the power of true 1080p cinematic projection, Android TV system, Harman Kardon sound system, and the cutting edge TV-grade Chipset, created for all your film and music entertainment on the go.

 

 

XGIMI’s revolutionary new DLP technology allows the MoGo Pro projector to provide a sharper, crisp image with a physical resolution of 1920x1080 pixels, which means that it projects in true Full HD, 225% clearer than mainstream 720p projectors. MoGo also supports video format up to 4K Ultra HD, which will provide the sharpest image you will ever see from the projector of its size.

We believe MoGo should be enjoyed by everyone, whether at home or on the go. Because of this, we created the XGIMI MoGo, which is the wallet-friendly little brother of the MoGo Pro. This means MoGo will feature a 540P native projection resolution at a much more competitive price.

Unlike other pico projectors that feature low luminance power and offer a dim and grainy image, XGIMI MoGo Pro offers 250-300 ANSI Lumen power and MoGo offers 210 ANSI Lumen power which can deliver cinematic images with stunning clarity.

 

With XGIMI MoGo and MoGo Pro, you can enjoy your private cinema with an amazing 30’’ - 100’’ Big Screen and great sound. Just put your feet up, sit back and enjoy your perfect movie experience. Who needs to go out when the cinema can be set up in the home or backyard for the kids? 

 

Both MoGo and MoGo Pro are Powered by Harman-Kardon, offering fantastic sound quality with its advanced dual 3 Watt speaker units, which provides extremely cinematic sounds effect. And the sound is professionally toned by Gold Ear Philosophy, making MoGo’s speaker well balanced and perfect for any kind of music. You can also connect MoGo via Bluetooth or 3.5mm Audio cable and use it as an external Bluetooth speaker. You can Enjoy 300 songs on a single charge! 

 

Both MoGo and MoGo Pro are powered by the Official Android TV 9.0 (upgradable). With Android TV, you can access all the contents you love, exactly how you want it. XGIMI MoGo's multilingual user interface also supports 52 languages. 

MoGo works with the Google Play Store for Android TV, and whatever you're into—from Showtime to YouTube and tons of games—there's an app you're sure to love. With 4000+ native apps, Android TV opens a door for a world of entertainment for you.

Quick access to the vast universe of Android games including Final Fantasy, Minions and NBA JAM and more. Immerse yourself with big-screen gaming anywhere you want in the home, at the beach or even setting up a fun outdoor gaming space for the kids during a BBQ (compatible with Switch, PlayStation, and Xbox).

 

Direct casting your favorite entertainment apps—movies & TV shows, music, games, sports and more—from your Android or iOS device, Mac or Windows computer, or Chromebook to the MoGo Pro.  

You can check out this article for references on how to setup up Google Chromecast on Android and iOS devices. https://www.lifewire.com/using-google-chromecas...

 

Android TV now comes with your Google Assistant built in. Just press the mic button on your remote and say “Hey Google" to quickly find the latest blockbuster, check the score of the big game, or dim the lights — all without leaving your seat or what you’re already watching.

 

Up to 40+ degree both Vertically and Horizontally

Just put MoGo at any angle, the patented Smart keystone correction will adjust the project screen up to 40+ degree both vertically and horizontally to give you the best viewing experience.

 

MoGo's Instant 10000+ points autofocus function will automatically adjust the focus within seconds! With XGIMI MoGo, you will never again have to worried about your video getting out of focus.

 

MoGo Pro uses DLP cinema-grade active shutter 3D imaging technology to form lifelike 3D pictures on 100” displays. Say goodbye to your traditional TV and hello to MoGo. 

 

Unlike traditional projectors, MoGo utilizes a highly efficient LED light source, allowing its projections to stay perfectly crisp, clear and bright for its entire LED lifespan for 30,000 hours. Enough for 20,000 movies, meaning you could watch 4 movies with MoGo every day for the next 10 years.  

Instead of using direct light for images that might be harmful to your eyes，the XGIMI MoGo uses diffuse reflection light to protect your eyes from tiredness, swell and irritations.

 

Both MoGo and MoGo Pro boast the brand new Amlogic T950X2 TV chip,  Mali G31 GPU, with 2GB RAM and 16GB ROM, which can provide the most advanced image quality and more intelligent and faster automatic focus adjustment. The new high-performance processor’s speed will blow you away!

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

From now until the end of the MoGo campaign, you can refer your friends to get XGIMI amazing prizes. Let’s begin the fun sharing!

Copy and share your unique sharing referral link with your friends and ask them to join the XGIMI family by placing an order for MoGo/MoGo Pro on Indiegogo. You’ll receive FREE prizes including shipping with 2 confirmed referrals!

 

See below for prize options.

Get $70 XGIMI Accessory Kit with only 2 confirmed referrals.

1x 3D glasses & 1x tripod stand

Get $70 XGIMI Accessory Kit and $60 MoGo Carry Bag with only 5 confirmed referrals.

* The carry bag is still under development and the final color may vary.

The Who:

You must be a MoGo/MoGo Pro backer on Indiegogo to qualify. Referrers who only backed accessory kit without projectors do not qualify. Referral orders without projectors are not qualify for the program.

How to Track Your Results:

Click the “My Profile” option, and check “Referrals” tag for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.

 

“The future of television should be screenless!” 

– Apoll Zhong, the founder of XGIMI

XGIMI is the No.1 Projector Manufacturer in China, located in Chengdu, the hometown for Panda and Hotpot. XGIMI designs and manufactures high-performance multi-functional smart projectors and laser TV, and is determined to improve viewers’audio-visual experience. XGIMI has created a series of game-changing giant screen projection products with key partners like harman/kardon, Texas Instrument, Baidu and Google. Back in 2014 when XGIMI launched its first generation screenless TV, it disrupted the whole projector industry due to its innovative product concept and outstanding user experience.

Along with its development XGIMI has been following three basic principles:

  • Insist on constant innovation to ensure the best products.
  • Focus only on the projector field and be the leader.
  • Always use the most cutting-edge technologies.

By constantly recreating its products, XGIMI optimizes its portfolio and provides the most technologically advanced and user-first experience for consumers.

The creation of XGIMI MoGo also follows the company's principles. We would like to create a small, compact device which is incredibly powerful to create an outstanding immersive home theater experience and also affordable for every home.  

 

It’s been the fourth time XGIMI launch new overseas version products on Indiegogo. People are always questioning why would XGIMI choose Indiegogo again for launching new products as it’s been an established company and ready for retail for a long time.

XGIMI had launched 3 products on Indiegogo since 2016 and attained a bunch of valuable customers on this platform. We really cherish the trust and great feedbacks from every single clients from all over the world. As a return, XGIMI is back on indiegogo again to launch MoGo and MoGo Pro on Indiegogo again and you will be the first batch of users to enjoy the world most powerful Android TV pocket cinema with an exclusive loyal customer price.

XGIMI team had the initial plan of launching Android TV portable projectors in October last year after we successfully establishing the cooperation with Official Android TV team. After rounds and rounds rigorous arguments and analysis, we eventually made the decision of putting Android TV system into our Play series product (Chinese models) and named them MoGo - Movie on the Go, as we want MoGo users to enjoy entertainment and movies at anywhere and anytime they want. From January 2019, our team started to collect customers’ feedback regarding to their expectation of the product specs, functions and price, etc. Having had a deep analysis on the survey, we changed our original plan of launching a 720p product which XGIMI has already made for China market to a 1080p product which will adopt the latest 1080p DMD chip from Texas Instrument. As well as to expand the RAM from 1G to 2G and the ROM from 8GB to 16GB. Unfortunately, XGIMI couldn’t adopt all feedback we received from our potential customers because of the technique limitations at current stage, while we try our best to reshape the products based on our capability and meet your expectations.  

We sincerely appreciate the chances of meeting tech experts and early adopters on Indiegogo. If this product that we created can gain your recognitions, XGIMI would be more confident to launch the product on the global market in the future.

We completely understand that your might have doubts on crowdfunding platform as there are some other projector scams that failed your faith. XGIMI had already done three Indiegogo campaigns, and we had never ever broken our promise in term of function delivery, production and delivering as a trustworthy company.

Once again, we would like to mention our company 3 basic principles that guide us since day 1:

- Insist on constant innovation to ensure the best products

- Focus only on projector filed and be the best

- Always use cutting-edge technologies in the current market

It's our great honor to work with your guys here to create the best pico projector on earth!

story:
Successfully funded on Kickstarter and going on to InDemand!


Short Summary

  •  The Odorless is a rechargeable-battery-operated turbine fan that ELIMINATES #2 Odor and 99% of the bacteria and fungi without letting it escape the bowl!    The results are so incredible you will wonder why every home and office doesn't already have this technology built in!  The Odorless has the potential to rock the world of "air fresheners" as we know it, majorly reduce chemicals and waste in our landfills.

How It Works

Odor & Bacteria are pulled directly from your toilet bowl through the vent pipe inside the tank and are captured by our Activated Carbon Filter. The odor is captured and eliminated naturally without chemicals or so-called "essential oils."

Anyone Can Install it!


About Us

We're life-long inventors who also run full-time businesses.  Combined, we have over 42 years entrepreneurial and manufacturing experience.  We strive daily to solve problems so our lives can be better.  The Odorless solves a problem that has existed since the beginning of man kind and is beneficial in countless ways.

Watch the Smoke Test to see how it works!


Our Goals & What You Get

  • Our main objective is to simply get more people using The Odorless so they will tell others about how it has changed their lives.  
  • We have not had a negative review yet and nothing but amazement has been expressed at the results.  We think you will love it too and its' our hopes your personal reviews will help our company grow exponentially!
  • Back us and you, friends and family can save greatly over the retail price.    
  • Backing us now means being one of the first in the world to own this technology!

The Impact

  • Live a cleaner, healthier life and become as sounding board to make  others aware of the kind of quality lives they too can have.
  • Together we could make a massive impact on the amount of chemicals millions of people breathe and reduce the amount of cans and bottles in our landfills, which also have chemicals left in them to one day leach into the ground.  
  • The Odorless reduces several health risks which you, friends and family are currently exposed. 

Could this make the world better in other ways?

  • Here's a deep thought: it is scientifically proven that we pass harsher moral judgement towards others when exposed to foul odors.  Could owning The Odorless and not exposing yourself to foul odors daily, create a more peaceful world?  We'll just have to wait and see.  

A Few Benefits:

  • Going #2 becomes a much more pleasant experience!
  • Never have another embarrassing face to face "After-Moment"
  • Nobody gets judged or outed for "destroying the bathroom."
  • Parties Goers stay longer and don't Become Party Poopers. 
  • Families that live together may just get along better  (Scientific Fact: we make harsher moral judgments when exposed to foul odor!)
  • Small Offices Become Cleaner, Happier Work Space
  • Everyone will talk about "that incredible thing" in your bathroom!
  • Bed & Breakfasts have less "late-night" flushes that wake visitors 
  • Poop particles have much less of a chance of landing on your toothbrush etc!
  • Your bathroom will feel cleaner, because it is cleaner!
  • What could an Odorless bathroom mean to you?

A couple of our biggest accomplishments

  • Victor Rey started the no minimum custom silicone wristband industry 11 years ago when the majority thought it would be a fad.  Several million custom wristbands later and  it seems everyone acknowledges, they are here to stay.
  • Bill Ball has a company that has been trusted by NASA to deliver thousand of  custom items annually and even through the toughest times, his company continues to grow.

Risks & Challenges

  • Like most products these days, our parts are made overseas.  Our only risks are shipments being delayed. The Odorless is complete.  We have made production runs and we're ready for the next!
  • We have 11 years import experience, we're bonded and have agents in the US, China and New Zealand who help us any time an issue arrives. You can count on our experience to make things move as smoothly as possible.  
  • To date, we have never lost cargo and the delays we have experience have never lasted more that 10-14 days! 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share in every way you can.  Tag your friends in one of our videos with , "You need this!"  That's the most fun way to share our product. Suggest it to everyone, but especially someone who has a holiday party planned or has a small office.
  • Indiegogo provides the tools for sharing too!
  • Ask us questions and provide any feedback you would like to offer.  These are all ways in which you can help up.
  • Also, sign up at https://the-worlds-best.kickbooster.me/ to help promote The Odorless.

Thanks so much in advance for your interest and support!

Rewards and Surprises you may get.

story:
THE SOLUTION



Florists are amazing and creative artists. The depth of floral artistry cannot be captured in an airbrushed photograph. Even when the image is not perfect, the art of floral design can only be captured in real life. There has been 20 years of design innovation that has never been presented to the average consumer...until now. 

Below are some examples of actual floral art that have been for sale, live, in real time, via our patent pending Greenbox technology during the last two years of Beta testing. When a consumer clicked on one of these items directly out of the ULF Stream, the item you see is the exact item the customer received. 

OUR MARKET SOFTWARE IS READY FOR FLORISTS NOW!!!

  •  With our system the florist receives 100% of the price they enter for the designs on their website.
  •  The customer received the EXACT LIVE and FRESH, quality product that was visible to them online in real time, with NO SUBSTITUTIONS and not the approximate reconstruction of a picture. 
  •  Consumers are going to continue ordering online for convenience. Now they can do it with confidence, as though they were actually walking into a florist anywhere in the world.

What the Customer Sees


The Florist's Inventory Management Screen



WHAT WE NEED & HOW IT WILL BE USED

Our market-ready software has been released for individual flower shops to deploy in their stores with Greenbox Floral websites (an example can be seen at www.baackslive.com ).  Pledges will be used to continue development of a universal plug-in that will allow integration of our technology into existing florist websites.  In addition, pledges will be used to develop BuyRealFlowers.com, a centralized consumer portal that will connect flower buyers to the LIVE arrangements available for immediate purchase from REAL florists in their recipient’s area.  Our goal is to change the way flowers are bought online.  One day people will giggle at the fact that they used to order a picture and not REAL FLOWERS.  We work with one of the best development companies in the world.  They have lead projects for companies like PayPal, Expedia, Adidas, Xerox, Toyota, BP, Shell and others.  Estimated development and growth costs are as follows:

  • Infrastructure and Operations
  • Point of Sale Integration
  • API Development
  • Florist/Consumer Acquisition

THE PROBLEM 

***Please watch this video from ABC News' The Lookout as it is very important in defining the problem we are solving***

DECEPTIVE ORDER GATHERERS ("Online Florists") : Order gatherers are not florists at all. They use deceptive marketing to distract consumers away from actual local florists so that they order a picture from their website that they then electronically transmit back to a local florist to fill, deliver, and service the order, while the order gatherer keeps the profit. 

ADDRESSING ISSUES MENTIONED IN THE ABC NEWS REPORT

  •  FTD and Telefora are not pure order gatherers. They are first and foremost a wire service. A wire service transmits orders taken by a florist in one city to a florist in another city. Ironically, pure order gatherers, like From You Flowers as mentioned in the video, take the order and transmit it to the local florist using FTD and Telefora's wire service.  
  • None of those companies "replace" the arrangement. It is the local florist that replaces the arrangement and loses the money. The local florist is faced with either A) filling the arrangement exactly as it is pictured (if they even have the inventory) and losing a significant amount of money on the transaction or B) doing their best to make an acceptable imitation that they can break even with and risk having to do a replacement and suffering a significant loss.
  • If a refund is given, the florist is the only one who loses time and material. The order gatherers experience a minimal loss on the digital transaction. They have sold a picture, not flowers. 
  • The order gatherers claim to keep local florists alive and busy. However, before the invasion of order gatherers in the mid-90s there were approximately 48,000 thriving local florists in the United States. Today, there are fewer than 16,000. Without local florists, the order gatherers cannot exist. They have commoditized an artistic industry and  are simply skimming profit by selling evermore tricked up pictures for an evermore unrealistic price. 
  • Further research on the problem:  link

THE IMPACT

More than 90% of all online flower orders are running through order gatherers.  By the time those orders reach the local florist the profit has been stripped from the order and the consumer if left scratching their head, wondering why the item that was delivered did not match the picture or the value they ordered.
Greenbox Floral and BuyRealFlowers.com seek to turn the floral industry on its FEET.  Right now it is heavily upside down.  Greenbox technology connects the consumer directly with the local florist and the ACTUAL product that will be delivered.  No extra fees, no stripping of profit, NO SUBSTITUTIONS.  WYSIWYG. What you see is what you get.  
No one else in the world is doing what Greenbox is doing for the industry and for the consumer.  We have the opportunity to literally change an entire industry for this and future generations.  A completely disruptive technology and business model.
You contributions and support are the key to making this happen.  Contribute to the technology, spread the word, and let's change the world together! 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Software development can be tricky, and there are several intertwined moving pieces to the development of the plug-in and BuyRealFlowers.com.  We have come through 2 1/2 years of software development and have grown dramatically in wisdom and experience.  The Greenbox Floral market-version software was coded by one of the top development companies in the world, but we do all quality assurance in house. Releasing a beautiful, exciting, fast, intuitive and user friendly platform is the absolute standard.  We have faced dozens of obstacles and "it can't be done's."  We have worked hard, seen more late nights than I want to think about and have always overcome and found a way to do what others said couldn't be done. It is our creative problem solving, determination to find a way, and perseverance that, together is this company's greatest strength.

WAYS YOU CAN HELP US

  1. Blog, share or otherwise yell from the street corner about this great new technology!
  2. Tell your local florist and have them contact us for a 5 minute demonstration
  3. Stop ordering flowers from deceptive order gatherers ("online florists")
  4. Spread the word!
  5. Pledge 500 dollars and get Greenbox Technology into YOUR local florist- FREE of charge!

A LITTLE BIT ABOUT US

My brother Luke and I grew up in the flower industry.  From the time I could waddle I was carrying plants and arrangements out to customer's cars and sweeping leaves and petals into piles on the design room floor.  Luke is a graduate of Texas Tech University, The Benz School of Floral Design at Texas A&M, an award winning floral designer and president of our family's flower shop.  We've witnessed first-hand, the ups and downs of the floral industry and understand the challenges it faces. 

I couldn't wait to do something other than flowers...  I went to Baylor out of high school and enter the Marine Corps when the 1st Gulf War started.  After that I attended Texas Tech and finally graduated from Abilene Christian University after having come home, at the request of my folks, to help during a transitional period at the flower shop.  After that I caught the entrepreneurial bug and started a couple of marketing companies while overseeing our family's Christian Book Store's exit strategy.  Luke and I had started one of the marketing companies together and sold it to one of our partner companies.  The other was a specialty advertising company that went the way of the economy after a booming start.  That was frustrating and humbling during a difficult time personally.  So, I took a step back and went to work for someone else for the first time in many years.  It was while I was working in sales with Toshiba that Luke came to me with an idea...

Luke and I first began ruminating on the Greenbox Floral conundrum in 2009, beginning with a question Luke posed one spring evening.  Luke is an amateur team roper and he was outside practicing roping a dummy (a fake cow, lol) when he asked himself, "Is there were a way that I could make a great design, set it in my cooler, and have it instantly be for sale on the Internet."  I have always been a technology buff so Luke came to me later and asked if I thought this could be done.  I said, "let's figure it out."  Two years later we formed Greenbox Floral and in June of 2012 I left my sales position with Toshiba to work full time on the development of the company.  Shew!  It's been a long, hard, exciting, exhausting, life-giving road, but we finally have a market-ready website that we can begin to do something with and a plan on how to do it.  We need YOU to help us execute that plan.

story:
Hello my name is Alex and...I have a Disney obsession

Yes, it is not a hobby, or just a phase. This has hit full level obsession and I should probably be on some A&E show talking about it. Instead I'm here offering you little things in return for your money. That's my way around saying it's gotten to the point of begging.

April 24th I'm heading to the promise land of California for the nearly biblical trek to the holy grounds of Disneyland. Walking where Walt once walked, seeing his (well that which hasn't been tainted) vision for Disney and the parks. Then heading across the country to wallow around back in Walt Disney World. Why? Because I have a problem.

The real goal here is $231.69. Why? Because after doing ALOT of math and hour setting for work, this is how much I'll be short. Okay, not actually 69 cents but c'mon. I'm 12.

"But Alex, I'm broke and no way am I being an enabler for you."

But random citizen, you're absolutely right. I'm aware of how bad this has gotten and intend on fixing it. However I'm an idiot and booked this flight forever ago. Flights as some of you may know are VERY finnicky about booking policies and as much as I've hmm'ed and haa'ed about just not going at all, $600 is a lot to just watch fly away.So even if I just go and enjoy being away from Ottawa and Tom Hanks it in an airport, it will be fun.

Also, personally, I really liked the idea of doing little perks for people. Thus the ridiculously low cost perks.

SO. Now that begging is out of the way. Take a look at my perks. If something stands out to you as "cool" or "hip" or whatever you kids use these days, consider it. :)

Thanks!

-Alex

story:
Gezi'nin Sesi, Direnişin Medyası, Çapul TV 1 Yaşında

Geçtiğimiz yıl direnişçi dostlarının İndiegogo üzerinden yaptığı bağışlarla stüdyo ekipmanlarını ve kira giderlerinin bir bölümünü karşılayan Çapul TV, önümüzdeki 1 yıl içinde de genişleyen muhabir kadrosuna ekipman sağlamak ve yıllık 40 bin TL'yi bulan kira ve fatura giderlerini karşılamak için dayanışmanızı bekliyor.

6 Haziran 2013'te Gezi Parkı'nda kurulan Çapul TV yayın hayatında 1. yılını dolduruyor.

Yıl boyunca direniş neredeyse orada olan Çapul TV, 2. yaşına girdiği ilk hafta da direniş ve medya üzerine özel programlarıyla yine parklarda, sokaklarda olmaya hazırlanıyor.

Çapul TV sokaklardan, parklardan ve direniş alanlarından kesintisiz süren yayınını bu bir yıl içinde biri İstanbul diğeri Ankara'da olmak üzere gönüllülerin katkılarıyla kurulan iki stüdyosu, İzmir Direniş Muhabirleri gibi "direniş muhabirliği eğitimleri"nde eğittiği yüzlerce gönüllü muhabiri ile zenginleştirdi. Gücünü yalnızca direnişçilerin gönüllü emeği ve katkılarından aldı.

İlkesel olarak reklam ve sponsor kabul etmedi. Çapul TV'yi büyüten bütün emek ve ekipmanlar gönüllü katkılarla sağlandı.

"Alternatif Medya" üzerine etkinlikler ve eğitim çalışmaları düzenleyebilmek ve katkılar için hesap verilebilir bir kanal oluşturmak için Alternatif Medya Derneği'ni kurdu.

"Bu daha başlangıç, mücadeleye devam" diyenlerin mücadelesi 1 yıldır Çapul TV'yi hiç boşa düşürmedi. Bu mücadele sürdükçe Çapul TV de yola devam edecek.

 

Çapul TV'nin 1 Yılı

  • Gezi Parkı'nda (6-15 Haziran) 10 gün boyunca ustream üzerinden yayın yaptığı, yalnızca internet üzerinden 1,5 milyon kişiye ulaştı.
  • Gezi Parkı'nın boşaltıldığı 15 Haziran akşamı, uzun süre gaz altında yayın yapıp, parkı en son terk eden direnişçiler Çapul TV muhabirleriydi.
  • 8 televizyon kanalı (Halk TV, Hayat TV, İMC, TV 10, Ulusal Kanal, Kanal artı 1, Besta Nuçe) Çapul TV yayınlarını kendi ekranlarına taşıdı.
  • 24 Ekim'de İstanbul'da kurduğu stüdyodan düzenli yayına geçti. Ardından bir stüdyo da Ankara'da kuruldu.
  • Bu sürede çoğu periyodik 14 özgün program yayımladı.
  • 145 bin Twitter, 20 bin Facebook takipçisi var.
  • Haziran İsyanı'nın ardından Eylül direnişinde, Berkin Elvan'ın cenazesinde, Soma eylemlerinde yine yüz binlerce izleyiciye ulaştı.
  • Berkin Elvan'ın cenaze törenindeki saldırının görüntüleri gibi dava dosyalarına delil olarak giren kayıtları oldu.
  • Hakkında yerli yabancı sayısız röportaj yayımlandı ve üzerine pek çok akademik tez hazırlanıyor.
  • Kuruluşuna ön ayak olduğu Alternatif Medya Derneği aracılığıyla 15 ilde 200'e yakın kişiye "direniş muhabirliği" eğitimi verdi.
  • Türkiye'de 20 ilden, ayrıca Kıbrıs'tan canlı yayınlar yaptı. Ayrıca banttan yayınlarla Venezüella ve İtalya'dan bildiriyor.
  • Çağdaş Gazeteciler Derneği'nin dayanışma ödülüne ve Halkevleri Halkın Hakları Basın Ödülü'ne layık görüldü.
  • 9. Uluslararası İşçi Filmleri Festivali'nin düzenleyicilerinden biri oldu.
  • Çapul TV i-pad'i, yolsuzluk görüşmelerinin TV'den verilmediği 5 Mayıs günü Melda Onur'un ustream yayınında kullanılmak üzere TBMM'ye girmeyi de başardı.

 

Nasıl Destek Olabilirim?

  • Sağ sütundaki "CONTRIBUTE NOW" tuşuna tıklayın,
  • Destekte bulunmak istediğiniz miktarı dolar cinsinden girin, eposta adresinizi yazın ve "CONTINUE TO PAYMENT" tuşuna tıklayın,
  • Kredi kartı ile destekte bulunmak istiyorsanız kredi kartı bilgilerinizi (kartınızın üzerinde yazdığı haliyle isminizi, kart numarasını, kartın son kullanma tarihini ve kartın arka yüzündeki 3 haneli güvenlik kodunu) ve adresinizi girin ve "CONTRIBUTE" tuşuna tıklayın,
  • Paypal ile destekte bulunmak istiyorsanız "GO TO PAYPAL" tuşuna tıklayın. Açılan ekranda Paypal hesabınıza giriş yapın veya kredi kartı bilgilerinizi ve kişisel bilgilerinizi girin ve onaylayın.

Başka Nasıl Destek Olabilirim?

  • Alternatif Medya Derneği'nin aşağıdaki banka hesabına havale/EFT yapabilirsiniz:
    Akbank Feriköy Şubesi
    Hesap No: 0125952
    IBAN: TR93 0004 6001 4388 8000 125952
  • Aşağıda adresi bulunan Çapul TV stüdyosuna kamera, mikrofon, akıllı telefon, dizüstü bilgisayar gibi ekipman getirebilirsiniz/gönderebilirsiniz.

Daha Başka Ne Yapabilirim?

Çapul TV gücünü yalnızca direnişçilerin gönüllü emeği ve katkılarından almaktadır. Aşağıdaki iletişim bilgilerinden bize ulaşabilir, gönüllü muhabirlik yapabilir, ücretsiz direniş muhabirliği kurslarımıza katılabilirsiniz.

 

İletişim

Web: www.capul.tv
Twitter: @capul_tv
Facebook: CapulTv
Telefon: (553)281 93 05 ve (212)245 90 37
Adres: Cumhuriyet Caddesi No:175/2 (Askeri Müze Karşısı) Harbiye, İstanbul

 

Not

Gezi Parkı'ndaki röportajların video arşivine ulaşmak için: tıklayın.

Çapul TV üzerine makalelerin, Gezi Parkı'ndaki yayın süresinde twitter hesabından paylaşılanların ve seçme bazı röportajların yer aldığı e-kitap'a ulaşmak için: tıklayın.

"Bu daha başlangıç, mücadeleye devam" diyenlerin mücadelesi 1 yıldır Çapul TV'yi hiç boşa düşürmedi. Bu mücadele sürdükçe Çapul TV de yola devam edecek.
 
Çapul TV'nin 1 Yılı

Gezi Parkı'nda (6-15 Haziran) 10 gün boyunca ustream üzerinden yayın yaptığı, yalnızca internet üzerinden 1,5 milyon kişiye ulaştı.
Gezi Parkı'nın boşaltıldığı 15 Haziran akşamı, uzun süre gaz altında yayın yapıp, parkı en son terk eden direnişçiler Çapul TV muhabirleriydi.
8 televizyon kanalı (Halk TV, Hayat TV, İMC, TV 10, Ulusal Kanal, Kanal artı 1, Besta Nuçe) Çapul TV yayınlarını kendi ekranlarına taşıdı.
24 Ekim'de İstanbul'da kurduğu stüdyodan düzenli yayına geçti. Ardından bir stüdyo da Ankara'da kuruldu.
Bu sürede çoğu periyodik 14 özgün program yayımladı.
145 bin Twitter, 20 bin Facebook takipçisi var.
Haziran İsyanı'nın ardından Eylül direnişinde, Berkin Elvan'ın cenazesinde, Soma eylemlerinde yine yüz binlerce izleyiciye ulaştı.
Berkin Elvan'ın cenaze törenindeki saldırının görüntüleri gibi dava dosyalarına delil olarak giren kayıtları oldu.
Hakkında yerli yabancı sayısız röportaj yayımlandı ve üzerine pek çok akademik tez hazırlanıyor.
Kuruluşuna ön ayak olduğu Alternatif Medya Derneği aracılığıyla 15 ilde 200'e yakın kişiye "direniş muhabirliği" eğitimi verdi.
Türkiye'de 20 ilden, ayrıca Kıbrıs'tan canlı yayınlar yaptı. Ayrıca banttan yayınlarla Venezüella ve İtalya'dan bildiriyor.
Çağdaş Gazeteciler Derneği'nin dayanışma ödülüne ve Halkevleri Halkın Hakları Basın Ödülü'ne layık görüldü.

9. Uluslararası İşçi Filmleri Festivali'nin düzenleyicilerinden biri oldu.
Çapul TV i-pad'i, yolsuzluk görüşmelerinin TV'den verilmediği 5 Mayıs günü Melda Onur'un ustream yayınında kullanılmak üzere TBMM'ye girmeyi de başardı.
 
Nasıl Destek Olabilirim?

Sağ sütundaki "CONTRIBUTE NOW" tuşuna tıklayın,
Destekte bulunmak istediğiniz miktarı dolar cinsinden girin, eposta adresinizi yazın ve "CONTINUE TO PAYMENT" tuşuna tıklayın,
Kredi kartı ile destekte bulunmak istiyorsanız kredi kartı bilgilerinizi (kartınızın üzerinde yazdığı haliyle isminizi, kart numarasını, kartın son kullanma tarihini ve kartın arka yüzündeki 3 haneli güvenlik kodunu) ve adresinizi girin ve "CONTRIBUTE" tuşuna tıklayın,
Paypal ile destekte bulunmak istiyorsanız "GO TO PAYPAL" tuşuna tıklayın. Açılan ekranda Paypal hesabınıza giriş yapın veya kredi kartı bilgilerinizi ve kişisel bilgilerinizi girin ve onaylayın.
Başka Nasıl Destek Olabilirim?

Alternatif Medya Derneği'nin aşağıdaki banka hesabına havale/EFT yapabilirsiniz:Akbank Feriköy ŞubesiHesap No: 0125952IBAN: TR93 0004 6001 4388 8000 125952
Aşağıda adresi bulunan Çapul TV stüdyosuna kamera, mikrofon, akıllı telefon, dizüstü bilgisayar gibi ekipman getirebilirsiniz/gönderebilirsiniz.
Daha Başka Ne Yapabilirim?
Çapul TV gücünü yalnızca direnişçilerin gönüllü emeği ve katkılarından almaktadır. Aşağıdaki iletişim bilgilerinden bize ulaşabilir, gönüllü muhabirlik yapabilir, ücretsiz direniş muhabirliği kurslarımıza katılabilirsiniz.
 
İletişim
Web: www.capul.tv
Twitter: @capul_tv
Facebook: CapulTv
Telefon: (553)281 93 05 ve (212)245 90 37
Adres: Cumhuriyet Caddesi No:175/2 (Askeri Müze Karşısı) Harbiye, İstanbul
 
Not
Gezi Parkı'ndaki röportajların video arşivine ulaşmak için: tıklayın.
Çapul TV üzerine makalelerin, Gezi Parkı'ndaki yayın süresinde twitter hesabından paylaşılanların ve seçme bazı röportajların yer aldığı e-kitap'a ulaşmak için: tıklayın.

story:
We all love Anthony and Leah.  They're pretty nice...at least sometimes.

All I've heard as the sister/sister-in-law-to-be and maid of honor is concern for the happiness and convenience of their friends (that would be you :))...This was a huge factor in the decision to have their wedding in America.  They've both given up a lot to do this, but Anthony has realistically given up hope of having his family here.  We all know what Anthony's family has been through, and how much it would mean to all of them to be together for the wedding.  I know I will be saving so much money by not having to fly to/stay in England, and I thought I'd like to give some of that savings back to them -- to help Anthony's family, or at least a few of them, make it out here.  It would be a huge surprise and a great joy to all of them!  If you can't spare a donation, please send out a few prayers!  Or both!  Thank you all!

The goal I've listed would be just enough to get Anthony's siblings and mother out here.  Anything extra would mean some of their spouses/Anthony's nephews and nieces could come too!

story:
Titel/Name Deines Produkts/Services

PLAYSYS - Zeig es Ihnen!

Was möchtest Du tun?

Wir entwickeln eine Software für Bildschirmwerbung, die es kleinen und mittelständischen Unternehmen ermöglicht für 69,90 € pro Monat einen eigenen Werbebildschirm zu betreiben. Unsere Kunden können sich untereinander vernetzen und somit kostenlos ihre Reichweite erhöhen indem sie Werbespots tauschen.

Welches Problem löst Du damit?

Henry Ford erkannte seinerzeit ein großes Problem von Werbetreibenden:

Fünfzig Prozent bei der Werbung sind immer rausgeworfen. Man weiß aber nicht, welche Hälfte das ist.

Mit PLAYSYS liefern wir jetzt für die Bereiche Außenwerbung und POS-Marketing eine Antwort auf Henry Fords Problem, denn wir sind mit unserer integrierten Facetracking-Technologie in der Lage nur die wirklich wahrgenommene Werbung abzurechnen.

Welche Vorteile vor anderen Produkten/Dienstleistungen/Projekten bringt Dein Konzept? Was ist der USP?

Die Vorteile unseres Produktes zu vergleichbaren Lösungen anderer Mitbewerber ist, dass unser Produkt wenig kostet und somit die Einstiegsbarrieren für Bildschirmsysteme um mehrere tausende Euro senkt. Darüber hinaus können wir eine echte Nachweisbarkeit der Werbewirkung erzielen.

Wir arbeiten über Facetracking und können somit zählen wieviele Werberezipienten einen Spot gesehen haben. Darüber hinaus haben wir an unseren Geräten einen Ticketdrucker, auf dem sich der Nutzer das eben beworbene Angebot als "Merkzettel" in Form von Gutscheinen, Kontaktdaten oder Ähnlichem mitnehmen kann. Weiterhin können wir die Kameras, welche in das System integriert sind, dazu nutzen um Augmented Reality Inhalte über sogenannte Tracker darzustellen. Als Tracker kann zum Beispiel das Logo einer Textilmarke fungieren und dem Träger somit ein auf seinen Modegeschmack angepasstes Angebot unterbreitet werden, ähnlich wie z.B. "Nutzer kauften auch" Empfehlungen auf Amazon.

Unser System finanziert sich durch einen anteiligen Verkauf der Drittwerbung. Kunden ohne eigenen Aufstellbereich für einen Bildschirm können sich Werbung im System buchen. Sie bekommen eine Auswertung über "gesehene Spots", ausgedruckte Gutscheine und bei strategischer Abwicklung sogar eine Zurückverfolgung bis hin zum letztendlichen Kundenkontakt.

 

“Go for a cause”: Wofür engagierst Du Dich mit Deiner Idee? Welches Anliegen ist Dir wichtig?

Wir wollen den kleinen Ladenbetreiber in den Mittelpunkt unseres Unternehmens setzen, da dieser in der Regel wenig Budget für Marketing übrig hat. Er bekommt mit PLAYSYS ein Werbetool mit integriertem Marktforschungstools und kann seine Dienstleistungen oder Produkte so präsentieren, wie es bisher nur großen Unternehmen möglich war.

Gleichzeitig wollen wir es Werbetreibenden möglich machen, ihre Angebote zu präsentieren ohne dabei Geld und Zeit zu verschwenden.

Wofür planst Du das Geld, was Du durch das Crowdfunding einnimmst, einzusetzen?

Wir benötigen zur Zeit vor allem Geld um unsere laufenden Kosten zu decken. Unser Team besteht momentan aus 3 Programmierern, 2 Grafikern und 3 freien Mitarbeitern. Wir haben im Zuge unserer Gründung unser Stammkapital bereits fast aufgebraucht und sind jetzt in Verhandlungen mit verschiedenen Banken – das kostet uns leider sehr viel Zeit.

Konkret brauchen wir nun finanziellen Spielraum für 2 weitere Monate. In Zahlen gesprochen sind das ziemlich genau 15.000 €

Was bietest Du deinen Crowdfunding-Unterstützern als Dankeschön für Ihre finanzielle Unterstützung an?

Wir bieten unseren Unterstützern neben einem ewigen Platz in unseren Herzen folgende Möglichkeiten:

PLAYSYS Alien Shirt:
Wir haben für unsere Kampagne ein wunderschönes T-Shirt designt, mit dem Ihr eure Liebe zu PLAYSYS ab sofort auf der Brust tragen könnt. Ihr bekommt bei erfolgreicher Finanzierung eine Mail an eure hinterlegte Emailadresse. Wir sorgen dann für die Produktion der Shirts und senden Euch diese kostenlos zu. Kosten 30 €

 

Netzwerksponsoring:
in unserem Werbenetzwerk senden wir über ein Jahr lang einen Spot mit allen Unterstützern gestaffelt nach Spendenbetrag. Je höher die Summe, desto prominanter die Platzierung. Kosten 10 - 499 €

Bildschirmsponsoring:
ein Bildschirm wird mit dem Namen des Unterstützers beschriftet und es läuft zusätzlich ein Dankeschönspot als Bewegtbildwerbung auf dem Bildschirm. Den Aufwand für die Erstellung übernehmen wir. Kosten: 500 €

Earlybird Werbepartner small:
wir bieten für interessierte Werbepartner unsere Dienstleistung für ein Jahr lang zu extraguten Megakonditionen an. Statt für 50 Cent pro gesehenen Werbespot bieten wir einen Preisnachlass von 80% auf alle Werbedienstleistungen.

Earlybird Werbepartner XL:
wir schalten ein Jahr lang in unserem Netzwerk maximal 3 Spots gleichzeitig zu einem festgelegten Preis. Dazu bekommt man von uns  Auswertungen und mediale Betreuung. 1 Spot: 5.000, 2 Spots: 7.000 3 Spots: 10.000 €

Zusätzliche Informationen

Wir nehmen bereits an verschiedenen Programmen teil. In diesem Zug haben wir bereits eine Zusage vom Gründercampus Niedersachsen über eine Höhe von 18.000 € Förderung erhalten. Weitere spannende Wettbewerbe:

Idee2012 - Projektregion Braunschweig
die 50 kreativsten Deutschlands - Businesspunk (Platz 9 und damit in der kommenden Ausgabe)
goldener Marketing Löwe - Marketingclub Braunschweig
Gründerszene - Wacom Ausschreibung

story:
At Goji, we have developed a technologically advanced, beautifully designed smart lock that gives you complete control over access to your home using your mobile phone. Our Goji Smart Lock is distinguished by its sleek, sophisticated design and its unique ability to send you real-time picture alerts via text or email of the individuals accessing your home.

The Goji Smart Lock

The Goji Smart Lock presents a contemporary new look for a deadbolt lock: a sleek, modern disc in brushed metal with a subtle blue-text LED display that welcomes users by name when the lock is activated. The display also shows the lock/unlock status, and dates and times of all entries and exits. Its elegant simplicity fits with any home décor. 

The Goji Smart Lock is UL listed.

Goji sends picture alerts

The Goji Smart Lock has a built-in camera that takes a picture of anyone activating the lock and sends a real-time picture alert to your mobile phone, providing you with visual confirmation of who is accessing your home. You can also choose to receive real-time app and text notifications on your mobile phone about all the activity around your Goji Smart Lock. All activity is recorded and logged by the system and is available to review at any time via the Goji Mobile App or from your online Goji account.  

Send Goji Electronic Keys to anyone, even for a specific date and time

With Goji, you can send electronic keys to anyone via text or email, and you can set up the access to be unlimited or to include specific date/day and time parameters. No more worrying about getting back your keys from guests or renters. With Goji, you can securely send electronic keys to houseguests or home service professionals (housekeepers, dog walkers, contractors, etc.) so they can access your home using their mobile phones. You can cancel or change the electronic key parameters at any time. This is also a great feature for people who rent their homes to short-term guests through sites such as Airbnb.

 

The Goji Smart Lock works with key fobs and traditional key backups

The Goji Smart Lock is optimized to be used with your smart phone, but you can also program Bluetooth Low Energy fobs that you can use to lock and unlock your door, similar to the way a car's remote works, but with additional personalized time and date access rights. Fobs are great for children or other people who don't carry smart phones yet, or if you want to go for a run and don't want to take your smart phone with you. The Goji Smart Lock also comes with two mechanical keys as backups in case you ever need them.

 

Goji is on call 24x7

With Goji, you will never be locked out of your home. We have customer service representatives available 24/7 to help you lock or unlock your home remotely in case something happens to your phone. Goji can also send a certified locksmith to your home to help you with any installation or repair need. We are with you every step of the way with a certified network of locksmiths always on call.

 

Lock your door from anywhere in the world

Goji´s powerful Mobile App enables you to lock and unlock your door from anywhere in the world. This is a great feature to check to see if you forgot to lock your door and you’re already too far away to run back and check it!

Never again dig in your purse or your pocket for keys

Goji´s Mobile App also enables you to lock and unlock your door automatically using your mobile phone without having to take your phone out of your purse or pocket to activate it. The Goji Smart Lock knows if you are inside your home or if you are coming from the street. If you are coming from the street, Goji will open the door automatically, and if you are inside of your house, Goji will not unlock your door as you approach it before you know who is at the other side.

Works with all Mobile Phones

The Goji Smart Lock connects with your smart phone using Bluetooth Low Energy. The connections are coded with bank-level encryption to enssure your electronic safety.

Simple to install, do it yourself

The Goji Smart Lock is designed to be totally do-it-yourself. It is easy to mount on the door, and includes a simple WiFi set up. The system walks you through every step. The lock is battery operated and will send you app alerts and text messages when the batteries start to get low.  The lock uses AA batteries that will last for one year. 

International installation and shipping

Goji works in any country in the world. If you live outside of the United States, you can order your Goji and install it in your door, too, as all the features still operate anywhere.

Extra costs for shipping will apply, and we will contact you at the time of the shipping to give you the choice of shipping methods. 

Use of funds

We are confident that the sustainable design and manufacturing methods used to create Goji Smart Lock not only will produce a great product, but will give users a true sense of confidence and control over the access to their home. Bringing all the pieces come together has its challenges, but we have done our homework and are ready to bring Goji Smart Lock to market. We will use these funds to start production and finalize the software and electronics of the Goji Smart Lock.

Extra costs for shipping will apply, and we will contact you at the time of the shipping to give you the choice of shipping methods. 

Use of funds

We are confident that the sustainable design and manufacturing methods used to create Goji Smart Lock not only will produce a great product, but will give users a true sense of confidence and control over the access to their home. Bringing all the pieces come together has its challenges, but we have done our homework and are ready to bring Goji Smart Lock to market. We will use these funds to start production and finalize the software and electronics of the Goji Smart Lock.

story:
Some Stupid Thief Actually Stole Their Wedding Gift Money

I kid you not, someone actually stole their wedding gifts.  And, if you don't know Sterling and Tony I can tell you that they are honestly two of the sweeting kindest people I know.  They are the last people this should happen to. 

On December 7th they had a beautiful, intimate, and modest ceremony in Oakland. When the rose petals cleared they noticed that a huge chunk of wedding money was gone. 

This is clearly one of the worst things that someone could do at your wedding but evidently they are not letting it phase them.  According to Sterling " we're fine now. over it for real. happy!" But with a baby on the way I know that they really needed the financial help right about now.   

What We Need To do

We need to pitch in as much money for these two lovebirds (and baby bird) and show them that their community is richer and stronger and connected enough to brush off the impact of one thief.

Other Ways You Can Help

SHARE THIS ON YOUR SOCIAL NETWORKS, SHARE THIS THROUGH EMAIL, Send em your love, bake them a cake, give them a car, knit some baby socks, offer them baby stuff...

No perks?

The perk is helping two people who deserve it.  Give as much or as little as you can.

story:
CAMPAIGN PITCH

Hi! I'm Mary Panesis, and I've been a woodworker for over twenty years. What started as a hobby has now progressed to an obsession; I make beautiful and useful objects from reclaimed and salvaged materials. Up until now, space and equipment has confined me to making smaller objects like trays, serving boards, and tea hutches, but sales have taken off, and it's time to tackle my long-held dream of creating rustic furniture!

The older I get, the more I am upset by the throw-it-away mentality of a convenience store culture. In these times of change, it's more important than ever to give back to nature by working with what has already been felled. I create with love and respect. There is so much plenty in the world, so much amazing and beautiful material that just needs a little love to help its beauty shine. Every tiny step we take away from waste and towards beauty and utility is worth any effort it takes, and the reward is both in the doing and in the product. In my small way I hope to show people how a solid and beautiful piece of wood can help create calm from with in.

My work is supported both by my creative drive and by the many folks who appreciate the high quality products I make. As a contributor, you will be a partner in this creation, and I hope that you will love the beautiful objects we create together.

While this is my first crowdfunding campaign, I have a long history of careful husbanding of my resources. Your contribution will be treated with the greatest gratitude and respect, and used to directly fund the goals below.

WHAT WE NEED

I'm looking to raise $4000. Here's where it's going:

First and most importantly, I need a larger space. The rent on the shop I've found is $600 per month, but it's a perfect space (it's already a woodshop), and it has great road frontage and visibility for local sales. I want to have at least three month's rent in hand ($1800) to tide me over during the transition.

Second, I desperately need an industrial bandsaw. This will run $900, and will thankfully replace my hard-working but weak "hobby" model.

Third, the wood I use is often large, rough, warped, or all three, so a 15" planer is not simply a luxury but a necessity. That's another $900.

Finally, the kiln. Reclaimed wood often is infested with wood borers and other wood-eating bugs, and a kiln will allow me to salvage more wood by killing the bugs. The price for this may vary; I have a good friend who is, yes, a rocket scientist, and may be able to help me design and build a kiln for the cost of materials, but at minimum it will be $300-400.

The remainder will allow me to send you your perks!

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Artistic endeavors always include risk—mostly the risk of not finding a large-enough audience to make it profitable. In my case, the rent is the most difficult variable, since the business will have to bring in enough income to support the monthly expense. Since my sales have been going up, and because there is a growing movement in the US towards appreciation of handmade goods, I am confident that I can keep sales high enough to do this, especially since one key element of selling is having LOTS of things to sell! It is a truism in retail that in order to sell three things you have to have ten on display, and the new shop space will allow me to do this far more easily than in my current situation.

In addition to dabbling in wood for twenty years, I've spent my professional life in retail, (usually in management positions), so I'm well-versed in the marketing of handmade objects. I've already started expanding my online presence, separating Shire Home Furnishings' Etsy store from my parent company, Tuatha (Irish- and Norse-inspired brooches, art and jewelry). This allows me to reach a more targeted audience, further increasing sales. In addition, I will be adding more craft festivals to my roster (currently at 6 festivals a year). Vending as Shire Home will allow me to enter the higher-end, juried shows which are currently closed to Tuatha. In addition, I will continue to post regularly on social media, increasing the visibility and reach of my products. I may also expand the Shire line into rustic-themed wedding accoutrements.

If I don't reach my goal, the new shop is the number one priority. The rent is cheap for the amount of space, and once I have more room I can stockpile more wood and save money for the tools I need.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Hey, I know what it's like to not have ready money to support a campaign like this, but don't worry, I'm grateful for any help you can give me!

Share this campaign on social media, via email or even—gasp!—by word of mouth! (Remember, Indiegogo has awesome share tools.)
Drop me a line and tell me what you think of the products! Feedback is lifeblood to an artisan working in isolation.

story:
If it really has to be safe: Our revolutionary water purifier is the only faucet filter on the market that removes pathogens, proven by accredited laboratories. DrinkPure HOME also reduces any unwanted smell and taste (e.g. chlorine) as well as pesticides. Just screw it onto your faucet and enjoy great water immediately at the highest flow rate available. One filter cartridge lasts up to 130 gallons (500 L) and can easily be replaced. Forget about buying expensive and heavy water bottles from your supermarket. DrinkPure HOME can help your family save more than USD 1,000 per year and will reduce your plastic bottle waste by more than 99%.

Know someone who would love the DrinkPure HOME water filter? Help us spread the word by sharing on your social media accounts!

 

 

We are featured in:

 

DrinkPure HOME is the only faucet water filter in the world that combines all the following features. See for yourself what DrinkPure HOME can do for your tap water!

 

 

It fits on your existing faucet and can be installed within seconds – yes, it is that simple. One filter cartridge lasts up to 130 gallons (500 L) or two months and can easily be replaced.

The water that flows through our filter will always be safe from bacteria and viruses, even after more than 130 gallons. The flow rate will just decrease and the emerging chlorine smell will tell you that it’s time to replace the filter cartridge.

 

 If you would like to get a reminder, just scan the QR code on each replacement cartridge! This sends you a calendar entry reminding you of a possible exchange after two months. It also tells you where to order new cartridges. You do not need to install an app!

 

 

More than 100 million plastic bottles are used worldwide every day. Only 1 out of 5 plastic bottles is recycled.

Using DrinkPure HOME reduces plastic waste by more than 99%. The replaceable cartridge weighs as much as one empty 1 liter plastic bottle and replaces up to 500 x 1 liter or 1000 x 0.5 liter bottles.

This is our cartridge size compared to other available cartridges on the market:

 

 

Most of the bottled water you buy is just glorified tap water. Only a few brands use water directly from springs and mountain streams. 90% of the cost of bottled water is based on marketing and packaging, not the water quality. On top of that, it takes 3 liters of tap water to produce 1 liter of bottled water!

It’s about time that we take back the tap and put an end to this global insanity. One filter can help you save 90% of your current water cost or more than USD 1,000 per year.

 

 

DrinkPure HOME Basic

DrinkPure HOME Chrome

DrinkPure HOME Steel

 

 

 

 

 

DrinkPure Water Softener

Hard water often reduces the taste of your coffee or tea. Therefore we add now in every Filter package a DrinkPure HOME softener cartridge to reduce your lime scale. You can further use this cartridge for your drinking water if you dislike the taste of hard water. It’s a chemical free solution that makes your drinking experience even more intense!

 

You can choose your filter design (basic, chrome, steel) as 2 different packages which include either replacement and water softener cartridges lasting you 2 months or 6 months. You can also buy a 1 year replacement filter package on top of your selected kit.

 

The secret behind DrinkPure HOME is the patented Novamem DrinkPure(TM) membrane (EP2476724 (A1)). Thanks to its very small pores and its special three-dimensional structure, the membrane is able to reduce e-coli bacteria by more than 99.9999% and even the smallest type of viruses can be removed by 99%. Furthermore, our own membrane has a flow rate, which is ten times higher than similar products on the market. This allows us to use additional layers, which results in higher purification levels while at the same time making the filter as small as it is now.

 

 

DrinkPure HOME compared to other common faucet filters


 

 

It has been a long road since we first had the idea to turn tap water into actual drinking water. We believe that clean drinking water is the most important element of health and well-being. It was a huge challenge to concentrate all our ideas in one small device, but we never gave up to make our dream come true. Thanks to our technology and know-how, we are finally able to turn every faucet into a source of healthy and natural tasting water. Moreover, we have created a powerful device to minimize the waste originating from water bottles. After two years of development and more than 50 prototypes, we are just one step away. With your support on Indiegogo we can produce the final injection-mold parts and bring DrinkPure HOME to households all over the world.

 

 

 

WE WANT TO THANK our video producer and all our friends who HAVE helped us for our Indiegogo launch.

 

Creating a new product is always associated with risks. There are unpredictable factors which may emerge. However, we have developed over 50 prototypes. These were tested by many people in different countries. We strongly believe that we will be in a position to deliver DrinkPure HOME according to plan. 
We have prepared the process very carefully and it is already well advanced. But even then, surprises can arise which cannot be avoided. Also, even though we work with established contract manufacturers and parts producers, there is always a chance that something might go wrong. We have carefully selected our partners, with some of them having been partners for years. The patented Novamem DrinkPure(TM) membrane is produced by our own company in Switzerland and is already successfully implemented in an outdoor water filter that has been on the market for more than two years. Having gained experience with product manufacturing, we will do everything we can to deliver DrinkPure HOME in time. 
We are excited to take on this challenge with you to deliver a revolutionary product!

story:
Introducing: The Bathtub Drain Strain®

An Innovative Clog-Preventing Drain Stopper For Your Bathtub

      

 

 

The magic of the Drain Strain® lies in the patented technology. You simply "Turn, Lift & Click" the two side buttons to release a detachable basket that catches all the hairy gunk!
 

 

Incredibly Easy To Install

 

 

 

Three simple steps to clean - 

 
1. Turn a 1/4 turn to the right and lift up. Press the two side buttons to release the basket. Do you see all that hair?!
 




 

2. Empty the contents of the basket. Say goodbye to that gross hairy gunk!







 

3. Reattach the basket and place over the drain. Turn a 1/4 turn to the right and it's ready to catch hair and other fun stuff again. 



 

Finally, the Bathtub Drain Strain® comes in three colors - Chrome, Brushed Nickel and Oil Rubbed Bronze. 


 

Why are we looking for more funding?

Funding will go towards production of Bathtub Drain Strain®  to deliver to backers. If our stretch goal is $75,000 is met, we will be able to release our Shower Drain Strain®, which is currently in design stages, within the 6 months!

Our success on Shark Tank helped put the Bathtub and Deluxe Sink Drain Strains® into more hands - now our mission is to expand our product line with your help and contributions!

Perks

Early Bird - Chrome Bathtub Drain Strain® - $15

That's right! You can now keep your bathtubs clog free with the help of our brand new Bathtub Drain Strain® for only $15. Choose from Chrome, Brushed Nickel, and Oil Rubbed Bronze.

(Qty 250)

Early Bird -  Deluxe Sink Drain Strain® - $12

But wait...there's more! We're also offering our Deluxe Sink Drain Strain®  for only $12. Choose from Chrome, Brushed Nickel, and Oil Rubbed Bronze.

(Qty 250)

Early Bird - Drain Strain® Combo Pack - $27

Why buy one version of the Drain Strain® when you can get both?! Get yourself a Bathtub Drain Strain® AND Deluxe Sink Drain Strain® in our Combo Pack for only $27!

Choose from Chrome, Brushed Nickel, and Oil Rubbed Bronze.

(Qty 250)

Hotel/Plumber Deluxe Sink Drain Strain® Sink Special Pack - $150
15 Drain Strain® DELUXE Packs! No more pouring environmentally harmful chemicals en mass down your hotel, rental property, or clients drains!

Choose from Chrome, Brushed Nickel, and Oil Rubbed Bronze.

Hotel/Plumber Bathtub Drain Strain® Special Pack - $200

Our Bathtub Drain Strain® Special Pack consists of 15 total units. Save money en mass on your hotel, rental, or clients properties.



Water-Conservation Pack $37.00

Get yourself a Bathtub Drain Strain® and Deluxe Sink Drain Strain®, with $9.50 of your order going to the Wyland Foundation's MyWaterPledge Campaign which educates the public about water conservation: https://www.mywaterpledge.com/campaign/national-campaign/

Meet The Owner & Inventor, Naushad Ali

Naushad Ali is the owner and inventor of Drain Strain, LLC. Naushad has worked as a realtor for since the mid-2000's and was strongly impacted by the recession - he and his family lost everything, including their home. While living at an apartment with the family in 2011, Naushad's wife, Shawn, and his daughter’s hair clogged their sink and he had to call a plumber to help. After a $151 bill, he looked for a solution to prevent clogs in the future online and in stores, but had no such luck. His thought was, "Why isn't there something that's easy to install, affordable, and prevents clogs?"  He brainstormed an idea with family and friends, and the Sink Drain Strain® idea was born! 

After working on the design for a couple years, Naushad was able to get the product to a prototype stage when he had the opportunity to appear on ABC’s Shark Tank in February 2015 with and received a deal from Robert Herjavec. With the help and support of partners, Naushad has been able to get the Sink Drain Strain into Home Depot and recently appeared on QVC as well. 

Since the recession, Naushad has been able to turn around his real-estate business enough to become  a a principal owner of Northwest Dream Team, LLC ( www.nwdreamteam.com) , one of the top producing real estate teams in Washington. Naushad's unrelenting focus on consumer experience lands him consistently in Seattle Magazine’s list of 5 Star Agents and in the Top 1% of Realtors Nationally.

 

The Team
 

                                                               
Robert Herjavec                                                                Kevin Harrington                        
ABC's "Shark Tank" Shark                                              Original Shark on ABC's "Shark Tank"
Founder of The Herjavec Group                                    Inventor of the Infomercial
Bestselling Author                                                             Co-Founder of Entrepreneur's Organization

                                                   

Naushad Ali                                                          
CEO & Founder of Drain Strain, LLC.                  
Founder of Disrupt by Design, LLC.                       
Principal Owner of Northwest Dream Team       

Spread the Word

If you're interested in seeing the new Shower Drain Strain® please share this campaign on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and/or via email!

Here are our social media handles.

 

SAY GOODBYE TO CLOGGED DRAINS!

 

Find refills and more information on our website: drainstrain.com

Shark Tank name and logo used with permission. © 2016 Sony Pictures Television Inc. All rights reserved.  No endorsements by the producers/broadcaster of Shark Tank is implied.

Choose from Chrome, Brushed Nickel, and Oil Rubbed Bronze.
Hotel/Plumber Bathtub Drain Strain® Special Pack - $200
Our Bathtub Drain Strain® Special Pack consists of 15 total units. Save money en mass on your hotel, rental, or clients properties.
Water-Conservation Pack $37.00
Get yourself a Bathtub Drain Strain® and Deluxe Sink Drain Strain®, with $9.50 of your order going to the Wyland Foundation's MyWaterPledge Campaign which educates the public about water conservation: https://www.mywaterpledge.com/campaign/national-campaign/


Meet The Owner & Inventor, Naushad Ali

Naushad Ali is the owner and inventor of Drain Strain, LLC. Naushad has worked as a realtor for since the mid-2000's and was strongly impacted by the recession - he and his family lost everything, including their home. While living at an apartment with the family in 2011, Naushad's wife, Shawn, and his daughter’s hair clogged their sink and he had to call a plumber to help. After a $151 bill, he looked for a solution to prevent clogs in the future online and in stores, but had no such luck. His thought was, "Why isn't there something that's easy to install, affordable, and prevents clogs?"  He brainstormed an idea with family and friends, and the Sink Drain Strain® idea was born! 
After working on the design for a couple years, Naushad was able to get the product to a prototype stage when he had the opportunity to appear on ABC’s Shark Tank in February 2015 with and received a deal from Robert Herjavec. With the help and support of partners, Naushad has been able to get the Sink Drain Strain into Home Depot and recently appeared on QVC as well. 
Since the recession, Naushad has been able to turn around his real-estate business enough to become  a a principal owner of Northwest Dream Team, LLC ( www.nwdreamteam.com) , one of the top producing real estate teams in Washington. Naushad's unrelenting focus on consumer experience lands him consistently in Seattle Magazine’s list of 5 Star Agents and in the Top 1% of Realtors Nationally.
 

The Team 
                                                               Robert Herjavec                                                                Kevin Harrington                        ABC's "Shark Tank" Shark                                              Original Shark on ABC's "Shark Tank"Founder of The Herjavec Group                                    Inventor of the InfomercialBestselling Author                                                             Co-Founder of Entrepreneur's Organization
                                                   
Naushad Ali                                                          CEO & Founder of Drain Strain, LLC.                  Founder of Disrupt by Design, LLC.                       Principal Owner of Northwest Dream Team       
Spread the Word
If you're interested in seeing the new Shower Drain Strain® please share this campaign on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and/or via email!
Here are our social media handles.

 
SAY GOODBYE TO CLOGGED DRAINS!
 

Find refills and more information on our website: drainstrain.com
