story:
Don't miss ROIDMI's latest vacuum cleaner. Click to Learn more:

 

 

Update:

Since our last update, more than 200 backers have joined the referral program. As we promised, we will give each of them 6 pieces of mop pads. And we also found three of them brought conversions from their sharing. Really thanks for them. We decided to give each of them a wireless music car charger as reward. 

Our referral program will be continue. Beside the free mop pads, if your successfully refer one person to order a vacuum cleaner, we will give you the car charger for free as reward. The more orders you bring, the more chargers as your rewards.

Don't hesitate. Share to your friends and post your sharing link in our comments. Thanks.

 

 

 

 

Few of us enjoy doing dusting and floor cleaning chores as sometimes it may be very troublesome and requires so many cleaning tools, but for a household to run smoothly these tedious and time-consuming tasks must get done. Cleaning hardwood floors can be a big problem in our daily life and normally we have to clean them twice. First, we have to vacuum away all the grit, pet hair and dust, then wipe with a mop.

 

 

Why don’t we combine the 2 steps together and do the jobs at the same time? Therefore, ROIDMI has invented NEX Storm with a Magic Mop Box, making cleaning & chores easier and more enjoyable!

 

With the water-resistant roller brush and the magnetic mopping component - the Mop Box which can store 180 ml water, just need to fill it with water and attach to the brush head. then it will allow you to deep clean any stain and dirt on the floor more effectively in just one simple step.

 

 

Vacuum first and then mopping at the same time. ROIDMI NEX Storm will help to save you a lot of time and effort as you don’t need extra tools on floor cleaning anymore!

 

The state of art technology: ISD - Intelligent Slow Drip, the patent of ROIDMI is adopted. With ISD, we can control the speed of water drip to keep the pad wet but without holding too much water. That’s the perfect status for mopping the hard floors.

The microfiber pad can pick up and hold the dust and dirt, absorb liquid by mopping down your hard floors, leaves nothing behind. And also it is very convenient to replace the pad easily at a very low cost.

 

 

The first cordless vacuum cleaner that comes with an innovative magnetic wireless charger, which makes charging and storage easier. The magnetic dock is the charger, just simply drop your ROIDMI NEX cordless vacuum cleaner into the wall-mounted charging dock, and ready to grab and go.

 

 

ROIDMI NEX Storm consists of eight 2500 mAh Samsung 18650 lithium battery cells that are the same model used in Tesla, and with the BMS-X Battery Management System. The battery can support the vacuum to operate for up to 60 minutes. Enough for cleaning a whole house of around 380 square meters at once.

 

 

The vacuum cleaner is not only used for floor cleaning. We can also apply it to clean your sofa, bed, vent, keyboard, shelf, cupboard and lots of other things. ROIDMI NEX Storm is the only cordless vacuum that comes with plenty of nozzles and brushes including Electric mites cleaner brush, soft roller floor brush, carbon fiber roller brush, stretch hose, crevice tool, dusting brush, and a cleaning brush. All together 7 cleaning accessories.

 

 

 

Buy one NEX Storm and you will get a vacuum, a mop, an upholstery cleaner, a car cleaner, and a lint roller. Powerful as Dyson and maybe performs even better, but costs much less than a Dyson.

 

 

Connect the ROIDMI NEX Storm to your smartphone via Bluetooth technology. With the ROIDMI Intelligent Life App, you can check battery life, battery usage, cleaning time, filter capacity, current gear endurance and receive alerts to empty the vacuum.

 

 

ROIDMI NEX Storm is ultra-lightweight. Weighting only 1.5kg (3.3lbs) offers amazing portability and easy handling. Easy to grip and hold in one hand. Even kids can handle it easily.

 

The new generation of power and air flow tunnel system with the new generation of Engine-X brushless motors spins at up to 110,000rpm per minute to help generate the strongest powerful suction of up to 140AW and 23.5Kpa, makes the whole machine increase 30% suction for extra deep cleaning. Capture the deep-down dirt or hair thoroughly. 

 

 

 

Replaceable Battery Design

You don’t even have to worry about the battery performance of ROIDMI NEX Storm getting worse with time, as we will provide 2 Years Warranty and Battery Replacement Service.

 

 

What's in the box? It includes: Metal Connecting Roll, Soft Brush, Flat Cleaner Head, Adapter, 
Magnetic Wall Mount, Filter (alternative),  Motor, Electric Mattress Brush, Cleaner for Brush, Multi-functional Brush, Magic Mop Box, 2 Pieces Mop Pads, Instructions.

 

Referral Program

We will offer you 6 extra pieces of mop pad if you share our link on your social media, such as Facebook, Twitter, then post the link of your sharing post in our comment section.

Simply just follow these 3 easy steps:

  1. Find your private link:

You can directly click and copy the link, please don’t miss your privacy ID, the last several digits:

  1. Post the link on your social media with captions, like:
  • Mop and vacuum 2 in 1
  • Only Half the price of a Dyson
  • The next generation of vacuum cleaner
  • Your best gift for your mother

That should be better

  1. After you share the link on social media, please copy the link of your sharing post and paste it on our comments box. Then, we will know you have joined our REFERRAL PROGRAM. We will do record and add on the mops into your package.

Probably you may ask why do I need more mop pads if I have already purchased them? Mop pad is consumable. So never worry finding yourself keeping too many mop pads.

So are you ready? Quickly share the campaign and get the FREE gifts today! Go, go, go.

 

 

Founded in early 2015, ROIDMI is an innovative enterprise focusing on the development of high-quality cleaning products. ROIDMI is an important member of the emerging technology giant Xiaomi’s Ecosystem, which aims to create a smart home appliances ecosystem chain. ROIDMI focus on the original design and take the ultimate user experience as its goal, adhere to the concept of high performance, outstanding appearance and high cost-performance on product development.

International Design Awards

World's most reputable components suppliers

NEW Storm is in product stage

 

The first generation of ROIDMI cordless vacuum cleaner - F8 Storm has been sold to 157 countries around the world. This remarkable product of ROIDMI is highly praised and recognized in the world, and claimed to be the world’s first “smart app cordless vacuum cleaner”. It has already won 3 major industrial design global awards: the Red Dot Best of the best award, iF Golden award and Good Design Best.

story:
The Powerful Robot That Loves to Do the Housecleaning for You!

How would you like to return home after a long day at work and find it immaculate clean? Or how about letting your kid or pet play carefree in the house, without worrying about them making a mess?

Sounds impossible? Well, not anymore.

Designed to exceed the expectations of every struggling housewife, this efficient robot promises to keep your house floor flawless, every time. And the best part? You won’t even break a sweat!

 

 

 

One Touch Operation for Ease of Use

Extremely easy to operate, simply at the touch of a button and a remote controller, this device is wireless, eliminating all the hassle and mess of tangling cables in the house.

 

Powerful Dual-Spin Mop Cleaner

Featuring a powerful, built-in motor (5700RPM) and a unique, rotating, dual-spin mop, EVERYBOT is able to completely remove even the finest dust and leave your floors sparkling clean! Thanks to its compact design, EVERYBOT can easily reach areas of your home that you might overlook, like underneath beds and couches, where dust likes to nest.

 

Wet Mop Cleaning with an Auto Water Supply System

Packed with 2 water tanks and a convenient auto water supply system, EVERYBOT can easily clean your floor using the wet mops, thus saving you from the hassle of refilling the water tank every once in a while.

 

Patented Microfiber Mop

The soft, microfiber mops make cleaning scratch-free and ensure your precious hardwood floors stay perfectly safe from nasty marks.

 

 

7 Cleaning Modes for Different Floor Conditions

EVERYBOT RS500 allows you to select the cleaning mode that you prefer so you can optimize your cleaning experience. Choose among 7 different modes.

 

Handy Cleaning Mode

Users can clean directly to hold the handle of the main unit, so its good to clean desks, tables, glass floors and glass windows, all of which are difficult to clean.

 

 

 

Smart Sensor System for Safety

EVERYBOT has been thoughtfully designed to provide safe and efficient cleaning around the house. Equipped with smart sensors that can detect obstacles and avoid falls, this smart robot will stay away from cliffs and corners.

 

Detecting obstacles by sensor technology

  • Appplied 4pcs of semi-permanent photo interrupt sensor in the front and rear side to improve obstacles avoidance capability
  • The photo interrupt sensor can operate more than 100,000 and uses the high durable non-contact method

Detecting Cliffs or Stairs

  • Appling the PSD sensors to upgrade the detection performance comparing to the IR sensors
  • This solution provide the cleaner to detect the black or mirror floors. This technology improved the floor detection performance
  • OMRON PSD sensors are applied

 

Never Lose Your EVERYBOT Around the House

A special luminance sensor enables EVERYBOT to move to a bright place after cleaning, so that you can easily find it once the job is finished.

 

 

 

Conquered the world with the wet mop cleaning robot, Everybot CEO Woochul Chung, “we made it solely practical”

Everybot, founded in January 2015 by Woochul Chung the CEO, developed the 1st generation personal service robot. Chung is the expert of the expert now that he has been in the robot cleaner industry for 12 years. Chung started off as a development manager at a robot company but since the company was experiencing a financial downfall, he had to stand alone. Everybot consists mostly of the employees from the experts at the previous company, and Chung is actively growing the company. We heard more from Woochul Chung, CEO, who made people around the world fall in love with the unique peanut shaped machine with outstanding technology and reasonable price, about his inspiration for starting the business, his business philosophy, and more.

The birth of “Everybot” from the conceptual shift.

“I have been developing the robot, and the consumers were very interested in the first generation everyday use robot. However, the reality of the robot cleaners was that they could not properly clean because there were obstacles in the way and the consumers were dissatisfied about the high price. After asking a 3rd party to research what the consumers want, we found out that the answers were “cheap price” and “mop cleaning”. The normal vacuum cleaners are not hard to use, but just gets lazy to do it. However, mopping requires strength so the consumers constantly found it needy. So I thought of making a robot cleaner that could mop.”

Of the former robot cleaners, there have been ones that also had the mopping feature. Because they only rely on their weight, they lacked strength like a child would mop. While Chung pondered about how to make it cheaper and still effectively clean, he thought of the car’s alignment, which measures the suspension and caster angles in the front of the car. Chung said, “the car wheels look like they are straight from the naked eye but they have intricate angles within that we cannot see. In order to make the circular mop rotating panel to rotate in a stationary position, it becomes harder to move around but changing angles to this allows for it to move forward. Our product cleans while rotating but also is made to move and work only with the rotating panel and the mop so that we could reduce the unit cost. Therefore, we produced a product, “Everybot,” that meets the practical needs.”

Attract the consumers with a unique identity.

Chung believes that the most important aspect in dominating over the market are unique product and idea, and he said, “the funny thing is that there are globally large-scale companies in the home electronics market but the middle and small sized companies tend to outstand them. This is because they begin with a unique idea and they are able to dominate the market. Also, I think that the design is as important as the technique in making a product. A lot of the products that the middle and small sized companies produce lack in the design aspect. We focus a lot on making the product design, catalog, and web skills all match in style and unique.” He also emphasized that he wants to grow the company and at the same time make everyone around the world think of “Everybot” for the personal service robot by using the B2B (Business to Business) method along with foreign companies to make more profit and provide techniques.

3 conditions to success: challenge, overcome, accomplishment

When Chung was young, he thought “how do people succeed?” and tried to look for the methods to success. The answer was pretty simple. It was “challenge.” He said that he needs to challenge himself because if he doesn’t do anything, nothing happens. Also, he believes that a strong will to “overcome” the obstacles is necessary after challenging himself and when various techniques harmoniously come together, he is able to “accomplish” something. So he highlighted those three words, challenge, overcome, and accomplishment. “We can’t live all our lives by just working and we need to enjoy our lives. We need to work hard and be competent in the social role outside and at home, we need to be great in taking part as the head of the family and a parent, spending good times with the kids.”

I wish the best for Everybot to be the world’s “Everybot” through Woochul Chung’s, CEO, endless challenges and passion for the better quality of life.

 

 

 

Support This Project and Help Make the Lives of Millions of Housewives Easier!

After thorough designing and meticulous patenting, EVERYBOT RS500 is ready to hit the market.

To make this possible, though, we kindly request your precious support. With an estimated, flexible funding goal of $10,000, we are in need of your precious support. Support, invest or help spread the word, so that we can make this awesome product available to everyone.

With every donation, you will be helping people:

  • Establish a completely hassle-free floor cleaning routine
  • Save money on expensive household detergents and cleaning tools
  • Have more free time to spend with their families

 

The Choice Is Yours. Invest, Support and Help Make EVERYROBOT Available to Everyone Today!

Don’t Forget: There are more ways you can help. Remember to use the Indiegogo tools and spread the word – your help is deeply appreciated.

Save money on expensive household detergents and cleaning tools
Have more free time to spend with their families
 The Choice Is Yours. Invest, Support and Help Make EVERYROBOT Available to Everyone Today! Don’t Forget: There are more ways you can help. Remember to use the Indiegogo tools and spread the word – your help is deeply appreciated.

story:
March 1, 2017

Thank you to our original backers!  All of the original Indiegogo campaign units have been delivered successfully and the product name is now officially CarGenerator because you can use it for so much more than just backup furnace power.

We have filed for global patent rights and are now officially patent pending status!

CarGenerator is still amazingly compact and portable at just 16 pounds and now includes several new features: 

  • Bluetooth app functionality and front display voltage monitor 
  • Furnace connection kit included 
  • AC Power meter included for total power your furnace or appliances are using 

We are shipping units and now open for new orders as of March 1, 2017.   

March 1, 2017 - Unboxing video of CarGenerator.... what's inside?

 

As seen on CTV Toronto Evening News...  (time mark 0:30)

 

SUMMERTIME COTTAGE BACKUP POWER

· Backup power at the cottage or cabin for fridges, freezers, laptops, TV's

· Technology device charging, like Smartphones, iPads, BlackBerry etc.

· Portable power for camping , special events, tailgating, or RV travel

· Travelling - Small coffee makers, cappuccino or espresso and milk frothers

· Portable ice makers or fridges/coolers for camping

HOW IT WORKS...

Our mission is to keep your family warm, safe, and comfortable living in your own house as long as you want the next time your electric power goes out.

 

 

 

 

Power up the core essentials of your house during emergencies, keep your gas furnace with hot water radiators running like normal to heat your entire house, and use extra power for fridges, freezers, a few lights or computers, and even a blow dryer or curling iron on low setting…!

In the summertime use the same device to power your cottage when the power goes out to keep fridges running and a few lights and electronics operating.

THE PROBLEM: 

Have you noticed?  The power to your house fails more often these days, and usually at the worst possible time.  Do you check the news anxiously, go get blankets and flashlights and wait and pray for the power to be restored?

 

 

 

THE SOLUTION:  Use your car or truck to power the essentials of your house!

 

Works with regular or hybrid vehicles, using gasoline, natural gas, or diesel.

Provides clean pure power just like from public utility electricity, runs motors, computers, regular and fluorescent lights, fridges, and more.

 

·  the car you already own is your best generator to keep your family comfortable and safe in your own home

·  Fall & Winter - heat your entire house powered from your car, SUV, or truck 

·  Spring & Summer - during blackouts keep your fridges and freezers running safely

·  Power up and charge your electronic devices, iPhone, computers, tablets, Apple iPad, Android, Samsung, Windows phone, Blackberry, internet routers, gaming consoles and TV's running for days or weeks during a blackout

· Provides backup power for your cottage, camping, or tailgate party!

 

 

 

WHERE WE ARE IN DEVELOPMENT

The Car House Heater does all this and we have proven working units that easily provided power for many days.  We have sold units to satisfied customers and have been actively testing under various conditions of weather, load, and different vehicle types for several years.

Our final step is to finalize the perfect enclosure and then move it on to manufacturing.  We are evaluating different colors and styles for the enclosure to decide on the final product.

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

We have fully working models of the Car House Heater we want to put into production to make this a consumer friendly item to be distributed around the world. Our goal is to help as many people as possible when the power goes out next.

Extreme weather is rapidly approaching and time is of the essence to launch this product so you have it in your hands as soon as possible.  We want you to be ready for the next power outage to keep your family warm and safe.

THIS IS WHERE YOU COME IN...  Show you care, Please help us get this to as many people as possible, click at the top of this page to buy one today and let your friends and family know they too can be WARM and SAFE the next time power goes out. 

You can help us to launch this product and put it into production of multiple hundreds and thousands of units to get Car House Heater into the hands of people across the country who need it.  Your support will make this dream possible and be a key foundation in growing a company focused on keeping your family warm, safe and even entertained next time the power goes off.

Thank you for your Support!    Jonathan Schloo 

PERKS FOR OUR SUPPORTERS

Provide support to Car House Heater at any of the levels listed here to obtain your unit for up to 30% off the $699 retail price.  Choose what level of support you'd like on the top right hand side of this page.

 

 

 

 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

F.A.Q.   FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WHY IS THIS BETTER THAN A GASOLINE GENERATOR?

· Small, compact, light, and easily portable

· Car House Heater is safer and all you need to power your home gas furnace

· Easier to use than a big heavy generator, an 8 year old or an 80 year old can do it

· Gas Generator is noisy, smelly, polluting and heavy to lug around

· Gas Generator is expensive to buy and then hard wire into your house

· Need to keep refilling the tiny generator gas tank to keep things running

· Need to store many cans of gasoline and empty them regularly to keep them fresh

· Need to carry a car full of gas cans to the gas station to fill them up

 

IS IT SAFE?

All the internal electrical components are government approved for sale in both Canada and the USA.  We will provide a complete guide and instructions for safe usage and handling.

WHAT YOU CAN AND CANNOT POWER?

You can power your gas furnace and the essentials you need to keep your house warm and comfortable for a power outage of 2-3 days up to weeks or more.  The Car House Heater will provide power to run things like your gas furnace, computers, fans, lights, motors, your gas fireplace if it needs power, or even a hairdryer or curling iron on a low setting! 

This may not be suitable for you if you want to power your entire house and big appliances like air conditioners, laundry machines, lawnmowers, electric baseboard or electric portable heaters, electric hot water heaters, electric kettles or cooking stove-tops. For cooking we recommend using a simple camping stove or a barbq side burner outside.

WILL THIS DAMAGE MY CAR OR VOID MY WARRANTY?

No, your car will self limit the amount of power it can provide.  The CarHouseHeater has an automatic low voltage and overload protection to disconnect if the power draw is too large. 

HOW LONG CAN THIS PROVIDE POWER?

For as long as your car can run on idle for.   Most typical vehicles that would be at least 2 days (48 hours) running,  for hybrid vehicles it would be 3-5 days or more. After that simply drive to a gas station and refill your car,  No messy and smelly gas cans to store and carry around.

HOW DO I POWER MY HOUSE FURNACE?

In order to power up your most important item, your main house furnace to stay warm, beforehand you will need to install a simple bypass electrical plug near your furnace switch.  You can either do this yourself, or your licensed furnace HVAC service technician can easily do it, or you can hire an electrician if you wish.

ANSWERS FOR THE TECHIES IN THE CROWD...

The heart of the Car House Heater is a unique power conversion unit with a special design we've selected and developed to suit this purpose perfectly.   Our unique innovation is  pulling it all together into a usable weatherproof consumer friendly product that anyone can open and setup in minutes without any special skills, and the method and use of connecting it to run your furnace to heat your entire house comfortably. 

 

 

COULD I BUILD THIS MYSELF?

You could go out to Costco, Home Depot, and electrical supply stores to purchase some of the components and do some dangerous experimenting, but why take the risk and go through the hassle?   We have years of research and testing already completed  to make this a no-brainer to keep your family safe and warm.

 

 

HOW MUCH POWER CAN THIS PROVIDE?

The amount of power provided varies by vehicle.  The first and most important goal is to power your gas furnace to keep your house warm.  Our testing shows that a typical furnace needs between 100-400 watts of solid power to run.  After that everything else is a bonus up to the maximum your vehicle can provide.  Once your furnace is running and you see how much power it uses, you can then add cellphone chargers, laptops, ipads, tablets, computers, a few lights, fridges and freezers depending on what your car provides.   You can also rotate devices in shifts, so plug in fridges/freezers for a few hours then switch to power other devices for a few hours to maximize your available power. 

 

THE CAR HOUSE HEATER STORY

Our founder Jonathan has always had a passion for anything technical.  If he goes over to someone’s house and they are having problems with their stereo or computer or just about anything technical, it’s irresistible to him to fix or resolve it.  Jonathan has run a software tech company for the last 20+ years and has learned a thing or two about technology and how to apply it to solve real world problems.

A few years ago Jonathan built a system so his family could go camping “off grid” and have all the power they wanted.  Around the time that hurricane Sandy was approaching, he realized that the same concept could be adapted to power the essentials in their house, and delightfully it did!  The best example happened in December 2013 when Toronto had a complete power outage from an ice storm 3 days before Christmas.  Jonathan hooked up the system to his house furnace and they were completely comfortable for 3+ days with our house temperature 23c/75f degrees and the furnace running like normal, even when all of their neighbors had abandoned their houses, until power was restored on Christmas eve day.  Check out the news story published here: http://www.thestar.com/news/gta/2013/12/24/stories_of_the_toronto_ice_storm.html

OUR RAISON D'ETRE AND WHY WE STARTED THIS

The clincher or raison d’etre that solidified the real world need for this, happened just after the ice storm while Jonathan was speaking with other parents at his daughter’s school and they told him how their house got so cold they were forced to abandon their house, the pipes froze, and massive water damage occurred throughout the house causing extensive repairs of ceiling, drywall and floors, a costly insurance claim, and significant upset for their family.   This could have so easily been avoided, eliminating hassle upset and a big insurance claim.

Just like when Jonathan started his first software tech company 20+ years ago , friends and family were amazed at how he did this and then encouraged him to package the idea up into something that could benefit everyone, and so CarHouseHeater  was born!

story:
RAGAMUF continues on Indiegogo as 'InDemand'

After the initial campaign, RAGAMUF became available for pre-order via Indiegogo InDemand. So you still have a chance to get RAGAMUF chair rug cover at lower Indiegogo price until we have a new and improved RAGAMUF website with web-shop. Our hope is to be able to fly on our own wings soon and provide you with high quality service from our own platform. Later in 2017, RAGAMUF will hit the market at retail price. 

 

Releases etc. of Ragamuf

INSIDER Art: Video: Colorful chair rugs made by refugees, 1.8 milj. displays, 24 t. shares, 02.13.17

Enter and Encounter Exhibition at Designmuseum, March 24 - November 24, 2017

Helsinki Design Weekly: Syrian women weave large rugs in a new Finnish project, 11.15.16

Sight Unseen: Saturday Selects, 01.21.17

Design Indaba: The RAGAMUF: A sustainable chair rug for the home, 02.01.17

Living Corriere: Vestito da sedia, 02.20.17 

 

 

30 seconds of your time could make a difference in helping the RAGAMUF community grow. Hit one of the buttons below (or at the top of the page) and tag a friend or a coworker who would love this!

 

Our mission

We want to create beautiful and high quality design for homes around the world. We want to support Syrian families by employing Syrian refugee women and save the environment by using surplus material from the textile industry. 

 

 

Perks

 

Sizes

We offer RAGAMUF chair rug covers in two sizes.

Small RAGAMUF chair rug fits to armless chairs

The chairs above are examples of sizes, which a small RAGAMUF  chair rug cover fits. Compare the measurements of your chair with the above measurements to see if a small chair rug can be fitted with your chair. Because RAGAMUF chair rug is stretchy it fits different shapes and sizes of chairs.

 

BIG RAGAMUF chair rug cover fits to armchairs

The armchairs above are examples of sizes, which a big RAGAMUF chair rug cover fits. Compare the measurements of your chair with the above measurements to see if a big chair rug can be fitted with your chair.  Because RAGAMUF chair rug cover is stretchy it fits different shapes and sizes of chairs.

RAGAMUF chair rug cover that matches your style

RAGAMUF is available for every taste. You can pick either a mixed or a plain color RAGAMUF chair rug cover. 

Some examples of the mixed color RAGAMUF chair rugs:

 

 

If you want a mixed color one, you will get a voucher to pick your favorite mixed color RAGAMUF chair rug cover from our online store after we have manufactured them all. Mixed color RAGAMUF chair rug is art of its maker - each woman designs her own rug by choosing the colors and figures. We  will produce enough so that everyone will get his or her favorite one! Act quickly, the first picks first! 

Some examples of the plain color RAGAMUF chair rug covers:

If you want a plain color one, we will contact you by an email survey to ask, which color you want.

 

This is the color map for the plain color RAGAMUF chair rug covers:

The shade of colors may slightly differ.

The net base fabric of RAGAMUF chair rug cover is black.

 

How do I use it?

Using RAGAMUF chair rug cover is easy. Shaped cover is just stretched over a chair. 

 

Why get RAGAMUF chair rug cover?

Refresh the look of your favorite chair - restore a chair and bring a strikingly attractive and significant design into your favorite place.

Help to employ Syrian refugee women - employing women affects significantly their chances to act outside home, as well as their dignity and independence. It also contributes to the well being of children, families and community.

Save the environment - recycle an old chair and reuse material that is fabric left over from the textile industry.

Would I like RAGAMUF chair rug cover?

We think so!  Everybody likes beautiful things and feels happy when doing something meaningful. We believe that RAGAMUF gives pleasure for eyes and mind. RAGAMUF attracts people.

Jenni Rotonen, Pupulandia Blogger, Finland​:

''I love the concept of Ragamuf - not only is it a playful, exciting and sustainable design innovation, but also a clever way to support Syrian refugee women by helping them to ge a job.'' ​

 

Veikko Kähkönen, Photographer, Finland: 

''Ragamuf chair rugs are refreshing decor bright spots and arouses interest in people when they visit in my studio. Rugs are soft and high-quality craft, a pleasure to sit!''

Why do we need your support?

We have been working on RAGAMUF for the past year making it perfect, and now we need your help. We have our prototypes ready, and with the support of the campaign's early supporters, we can start manufacturing and sharing RAGAMUF chair rug covers with the world. The larger our community grows the more we will be able to employ the Syrian refugees! With the support we'll be able to open the online shop and continue employing refugees after the campaign also.

So why should you support us?

  • Be the first to get RAGAMUF chair rug cover 
  • Think how awesome it is to help to employ Syrian refugees 
  • Save the environment

Our goal is to keep RAGAMUF chair rug cover as affordable as possible so that many people can join us. Now you can get a 17% discount off our expected retail price. This is a strictly limited offer as a reward for those who support our vision and product first. 

Team

RAGAMUF was created with love by the founder Martta Leskelä and the chair rug was designed by the designer Tuula Pöyhönen. They know what they are doing and what is required to pull this off based on their past experience.

Martta Leskelä, The Founder, CEO

Martta is an economist, a wife and a mother of five children. She grew up in an entrepreneurial family. Her work history includes, in addition to entrepreneurship and other things, fundraising for Finnish Church Aid for developing countries. She has organised the manufacturing and distribution of products through her personal relationships to Turkey. Her past experience and organizing skills are a vital asset for this project - making sure that you will get a great RAGAMUF chair rug. She knows how to tackle obstacles and turn challenges into opportunities. 

RAGAMUF is a result of her long term passion for acting for the sake of people in need of support. She believes that the world would be a better place with more caring and sharing. Her hope is that RAGAMUF can make it reality.

Tuula Pöyhönen, The Designer 

Tuula is a designer and a mother of two boys. She has worked as a head designer for many widely known Finnish design companies, as well as an invited Inhouse Designer for Marimekko. She has also worked in cooperation with  European department stores Stockmann, Globus, Magasin du Nord, de Bijenkorf and Breuninger as a young fashion designer. For Nokia she has designed wearable accessories as well.

The design of RAGAMUF chair rug is an indication of her skillful workmanship and a result of her long term passion for design. With her creativity and innovating spirit she is able to take care of all details of product design.  

RAGAMUF story

The founder, Martta Leskelä, wanted to start a business with a humane cause so she thought of employing refugee women without a livelihood. The Leskelä family lived in Turkey in 2015-2016 so it was natural for her to start working with the Syrian refugee women residing in Turkey. The main idea behind RAGAMUF was to employ Syrian refugee women so that they can live more independent and happy life. 

At the same time, the designer, Tuula Pöyhönen, had an idea for a stretchy chair rug while living in an artists' residence in Scotland in the summer of 2015. There was an ugly old sofa, which she wanted to adorn. She used her previous experience with rags and athletic clothing material to create a chair rug and made a prototype in Marocco in the beginning of 2016. 

In March 2016,  Martta and Tuula shared their ideas and combined their knowledge and passion. RAGAMUF was born as a result of this effort.

Partner

A local non-governmental and humanitarian aid organization in Turkey, is our partner helping us find and employ the most vulnerable refugee women. We hire women with the lowest economical status. With the support of the organization we hire the women through our subsidiary company - this way we make sure the workers get a fair salary.

What does your timeline look like?

The final product of this project is a result of innumerable hours of work. We are perfectionists so we wanted to make sure that this project will be successful. Below, you will see a brief outline of the journey we are on with RAGAMUF - from starting with an idea of it to when you became a part of the story and ending with our future goals.

We are super excited about bringing RAGAMUF chair rug covers into your homes and other important places. You can be assured that we are going to continue working day and night until the very last RAGAMUF chair rug has been delivered.

Help out by sharing RAGAMUF with Your Friends!

Like what you're seeing? Great! Don't be shy about sharing RAGAMUF with your friends. We've made it super easy. Just click one of the buttons below (or at the top of the page).

The more people who know about RAGAMUF, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community becomes, the more of the Syrian refugees will be employed!

We can't do this without your support!

Questions?

Ask away! Shoot us a message or post a comment and we'll do our best to get back to you with an answer.

 

International backers outside of EU

We will ship worldwide except Russia (our delivery partners are not able to deliver to Russia at this moment. We are very sorry about that!).

That being said, there are some unique processes which apply specifically to international backers. Please be aware that we cannot charge customs duties that may be collected by specific countries based on their local tax code. Each backer is responsible for such fees. For your convenience, additional information regarding VAT/customs duties can be found in FAQ below.

 

Backers inside EU

The backers who live in EU don't pay additional taxes. We take care of the VAT/customs duties behalf of you. 

Risks and challenges

We've been involved in many projects and businesses, and we have learned a lot over the years. Even though we have carefully planned the details of design and production, there is always a chance that Mr.Murphy will interfere with that pesky law of his.

If something doesn't happen as planned - whether it's a slow down in the manufacturing process, a delayed shipping date or something else - we promise to communicate honestly with you and work around the clock until the issue is solved.

 

FAQ

What material is used in RAGAMUF chair rug cover? 

Yarn material is knitted rag, which is produced of fabric surplus from the textile industry from Turkey. Stretchy base fabric is polyester.

How much does RAGAMUF chair rug cover weigh?

Small RAGAMUF chair rug cover weighs approximately 4 kg ( 9 lb). Big RAGAMUF chair rug cover weighs approximately 13 kg (29  lb).

Is RAGAMUF chair rug cover washable?

Yes. Waterwash in 40 degrees Celsius of emulsion wash in 30 degrees Celsius. Care and usage instructions come with the product.

How is RAGAMUF chair rug cover made?

It is knotted by hand.  

Why do you employ Syrian refugees? 

Syria’s civil war has created the worst humanitarian crisis of our time. Syrians need support and encouragement to survive the crisis.

Why do you employ women? 

Women living in the middle of the war zone have been put in a very weak position so they need our support. Employing women enables children to receive an education which is necessary for building a better future for their families and the society.

What are the wages? 

Each woman is paid a fair legal wage of each finished product.

How confident are you that you can make a delivery on time?

Our goal is to have every single backers' reward shipped as early as possible, and we will certainly work non-stop to make it possible. However, if you’re familiar with a production process, you probably know that there are many factors that are beyond our control once we start manufacturing. Based on our current schedule, we are extremely optimistic that we will be able to ship and deliver in July 2017, but this date is not guaranteed.

What shipping method do you use?

We’ll use different delivery companies depending of the final destinations. In some of the cases international shipments may be delayed from several days to several weeks once the package has arrived in its country of destination due to how international shipments are handled by the destination country. As soon as the package has passed through the customs process, you will receive your reward. 

How much does shipping cost?

Shipping varies between the destinations. Once you pick a perk the shipping cost are calculated automatically. Perks with two RAGAMUF chair rug covers shipping is for a half price. Because we ship directly from our manufacturer, there is no intermediaries between you and the manufacturer and the RAGAMUF chair rug's price is lower.

Why is shipping so expensive?

We wish that we could ship RAGAMUF chair rug cover worldwide for a few bucks, but unfortunately these are the prices we have been given by various shipping carriers. In fact, the real shipping prices are higher than what we've listed, as we are trying to subsidize some of the cost. 

That being said, we're doing our very best to negotiate lower prices with these carriers so that we can make RAGAMUF chair rugs affordable to everyone, regardless of where they may live. 

Will I have to pay customs duties to receive my reward?

This depends on your country's tax code. Any applicable customs duties outside of EU are the sole responsibility of the backer and not our team. We have absolutely no control over charging each backer additional customs duties at the time the pledge is made so such fees (if applicable) may be imposed at the time of receiving the package. If you are unsure whether or not you will be charged customs duties at the time of receiving your reward, please get in touch with your local post office.

Are RAGAMUFs displayed somewhere?

Right now RAGAMUF chair rug covers are displayed only in Helsinki and Oulu, in Finland. Contact us by email to receive more detailed information of the locations.

What is your refund policy?

We cannot offer refunds to backers once the project has ended with an exception of an unlikely instance of a defective reward being shipped out due to the nature of the Indiegogo campaign. As soon as the campaign ends, the production phase begins. Therefore, we cannot offer refunds once the campaign has ended.

Please refer to Indiegogo's policy here.
story_txt:
RAGAMUF continues on Indiegogo as 'InDemand'
After the initial campaign, RAGAMUF became available for pre-order via Indiegogo InDemand. So you still have a chance to get RAGAMUF chair rug cover at lower Indiegogo price until we have a new and improved RAGAMUF website with web-shop. Our hope is to be able to fly on our own wings soon and provide you with high quality service from our own platform. Later in 2017, RAGAMUF will hit the market at retail price. 
 
Releases etc. of Ragamuf
INSIDER Art: Video: Colorful chair rugs made by refugees, 1.8 milj. displays, 24 t. shares, 02.13.17
Enter and Encounter Exhibition at Designmuseum, March 24 - November 24, 2017
Helsinki Design Weekly: Syrian women weave large rugs in a new Finnish project, 11.15.16
Sight Unseen: Saturday Selects, 01.21.17
Design Indaba: The RAGAMUF: A sustainable chair rug for the home, 02.01.17
Living Corriere: Vestito da sedia, 02.20.17 


 

 
30 seconds of your time could make a difference in helping the RAGAMUF community grow. Hit one of the buttons below (or at the top of the page) and tag a friend or a coworker who would love this!




 
Our mission
We want to create beautiful and high quality design for homes around the world. We want to support Syrian families by employing Syrian refugee women and save the environment by using surplus material from the textile industry. 
 

 
Perks


 
Sizes
We offer RAGAMUF chair rug covers in two sizes.
Small RAGAMUF chair rug fits to armless chairs

The chairs above are examples of sizes, which a small RAGAMUF  chair rug cover fits. Compare the measurements of your chair with the above measurements to see if a small chair rug can be fitted with your chair. Because RAGAMUF chair rug is stretchy it fits different shapes and sizes of chairs.
 
BIG RAGAMUF chair rug cover fits to armchairs

The armchairs above are examples of sizes, which a big RAGAMUF chair rug cover fits. Compare the measurements of your chair with the above measurements to see if a big chair rug can be fitted with your chair.  Because RAGAMUF chair rug cover is stretchy it fits different shapes and sizes of chairs.

RAGAMUF chair rug cover that matches your style
RAGAMUF is available for every taste. You can pick either a mixed or a plain color RAGAMUF chair rug cover. 
Some examples of the mixed color RAGAMUF chair rugs:
 

 
If you want a mixed color one, you will get a voucher to pick your favorite mixed color RAGAMUF chair rug cover from our online store after we have manufactured them all. Mixed color RAGAMUF chair rug is art of its maker - each woman designs her own rug by choosing the colors and figures. We  will produce enough so that everyone will get his or her favorite one! Act quickly, the first picks first! 
Some examples of the plain color RAGAMUF chair rug covers:
 
If you want a plain color one, we will contact you by an email survey to ask, which color you want.
 
This is the color map for the plain color RAGAMUF chair rug covers:

The shade of colors may slightly differ.
The net base fabric of RAGAMUF chair rug cover is black.
 

How do I use it?
Using RAGAMUF chair rug cover is easy. Shaped cover is just stretched over a chair. 


 


Why get RAGAMUF chair rug cover?
Refresh the look of your favorite chair - restore a chair and bring a strikingly attractive and significant design into your favorite place.
Help to employ Syrian refugee women - employing women affects significantly their chances to act outside home, as well as their dignity and independence. It also contributes to the well being of children, families and community.
Save the environment - recycle an old chair and reuse material that is fabric left over from the textile industry.

Would I like RAGAMUF chair rug cover?
We think so!  Everybody likes beautiful things and feels happy when doing something meaningful. We believe that RAGAMUF gives pleasure for eyes and mind. RAGAMUF attracts people.
Jenni Rotonen, Pupulandia Blogger, Finland​:
''I love the concept of Ragamuf - not only is it a playful, exciting and sustainable design innovation, but also a clever way to support Syrian refugee women by helping them to ge a job.'' ​

 
Veikko Kähkönen, Photographer, Finland: 
''Ragamuf chair rugs are refreshing decor bright spots and arouses interest in people when they visit in my studio. Rugs are soft and high-quality craft, a pleasure to sit!''


Why do we need your support?
We have been working on RAGAMUF for the past year making it perfect, and now we need your help. We have our prototypes ready, and with the support of the campaign's early supporters, we can start manufacturing and sharing RAGAMUF chair rug covers with the world. The larger our community grows the more we will be able to employ the Syrian refugees! With the support we'll be able to open the online shop and continue employing refugees after the campaign also.
So why should you support us?

Be the first to get RAGAMUF chair rug cover 
Think how awesome it is to help to employ Syrian refugees 
Save the environment

Our goal is to keep RAGAMUF chair rug cover as affordable as possible so that many people can join us. Now you can get a 17% discount off our expected retail price. This is a strictly limited offer as a reward for those who support our vision and product first. 

Team
RAGAMUF was created with love by the founder Martta Leskelä and the chair rug was designed by the designer Tuula Pöyhönen. They know what they are doing and what is required to pull this off based on their past experience.
Martta Leskelä, The Founder, CEO
Martta is an economist, a wife and a mother of five children. She grew up in an entrepreneurial family. Her work history includes, in addition to entrepreneurship and other things, fundraising for Finnish Church Aid for developing countries. She has organised the manufacturing and distribution of products through her personal relationships to Turkey. Her past experience and organizing skills are a vital asset for this project - making sure that you will get a great RAGAMUF chair rug. She knows how to tackle obstacles and turn challenges into opportunities. 
RAGAMUF is a result of her long term passion for acting for the sake of people in need of support. She believes that the world would be a better place with more caring and sharing. Her hope is that RAGAMUF can make it reality.

Tuula Pöyhönen, The Designer 
Tuula is a designer and a mother of two boys. She has worked as a head designer for many widely known Finnish design companies, as well as an invited Inhouse Designer for Marimekko. She has also worked in cooperation with  European department stores Stockmann, Globus, Magasin du Nord, de Bijenkorf and Breuninger as a young fashion designer. For Nokia she has designed wearable accessories as well.
The design of RAGAMUF chair rug is an indication of her skillful workmanship and a result of her long term passion for design. With her creativity and innovating spirit she is able to take care of all details of product design.  


RAGAMUF story

The founder, Martta Leskelä, wanted to start a business with a humane cause so she thought of employing refugee women without a livelihood. The Leskelä family lived in Turkey in 2015-2016 so it was natural for her to start working with the Syrian refugee women residing in Turkey. The main idea behind RAGAMUF was to employ Syrian refugee women so that they can live more independent and happy life. 
At the same time, the designer, Tuula Pöyhönen, had an idea for a stretchy chair rug while living in an artists' residence in Scotland in the summer of 2015. There was an ugly old sofa, which she wanted to adorn. She used her previous experience with rags and athletic clothing material to create a chair rug and made a prototype in Marocco in the beginning of 2016. 
In March 2016,  Martta and Tuula shared their ideas and combined their knowledge and passion. RAGAMUF was born as a result of this effort.

Partner
A local non-governmental and humanitarian aid organization in Turkey, is our partner helping us find and employ the most vulnerable refugee women. We hire women with the lowest economical status. With the support of the organization we hire the women through our subsidiary company - this way we make sure the workers get a fair salary.

What does your timeline look like?
The final product of this project is a result of innumerable hours of work. We are perfectionists so we wanted to make sure that this project will be successful. Below, you will see a brief outline of the journey we are on with RAGAMUF - from starting with an idea of it to when you became a part of the story and ending with our future goals.
We are super excited about bringing RAGAMUF chair rug covers into your homes and other important places. You can be assured that we are going to continue working day and night until the very last RAGAMUF chair rug has been delivered.


Help out by sharing RAGAMUF with Your Friends!
Like what you're seeing? Great! Don't be shy about sharing RAGAMUF with your friends. We've made it super easy. Just click one of the buttons below (or at the top of the page).
The more people who know about RAGAMUF, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community becomes, the more of the Syrian refugees will be employed!
We can't do this without your support!

story:
The Super Fleece is a cozy, modern, and high performance blanket for your bed. It’s designed to feel plush and familiar like your favorite hoodie, with all the performance benefits of technical apparel. 

The Super Fleece comes in five beautiful color combinations, and is available in Twin, Queen, and King Size. Shipping to you Fall, 2016.


Traditional comforters are completely out-dated. Most use cotton duvets and down feathers, which aren't washable, and hold odor. A spill usually means a permanent stain, and patterns are generally restricted to basic diamonds and squares. 

The Super Fleece is a modern, high performance comforter.  It features beautiful organic patterns, and is made with the same materials found in technical Activewear. These materials are specifically designed to keep you dry and comfortable when you're active, and the Super Fleece offers the same benefits when you're sleeping.


The Rumpl story originated in the outdoors around a roaring fire. Despite significant improvements in modern textiles over the years, we were unable to find a blanket that rivaled our outdoor gear in terms of performance, warmth, and durability. Even more frustrating was the blanket buying experience - home supply mega-stores with shelves full of boring, repetitive patterns encased in clear, plastic zipper bags. We felt that there was an opportunity to create homewear that was both stylish and high-performance. We tested our first product on Kickstarter and received overwhelming support, so we decided to go all-in and set up shop. We owe our entire existence to the Crowdfunding community, and would not be here offering our second product without the support form our amazing customers.

Our second offering, The Super Fleece Blanket, takes all that we've learned from our first product and applies the same rigor and attention to detail for which Rumpl has become known. 


We've got a big idea at Rumpl, and it's called Active Homewear™.

When looking at the fashion industry, the last decade has seen an explosion of performance fabrics. From yoga pants, to wicking tops, everyone is beginning to see the benefits of modern textiles for everyday use. Everyone, except the homegoods industry... We believe that the textiles used in your home should meet the same performance standards as those used for active and outdoor pursuits. We've taken material inspiration from major activewear brands and applied that knowledge to the blanket on your bed. The result is Active Homewear, and it's the perfect blend of performance and comfort that you need every single day.


The Rumpl team is made up of a group of designers who spend their free time outside. We draw inspiration from the gear we use in the outdoors that keeps us comfortable doing what we love. Since our first Kickstarter campaign in early 2014 our team has grown to a modest 4 full-timers that share a passion for design, outdoor experiences, and creating great products. Between the team, we've got over 40 years of experience creating high performance consumer goods out of advanced materials. Our operation gets more dialed each week, and we are excited to get our second product in your hands.

#GoRumpl

story:
Hiroto Mini 1.5 - The Wolrd's Smallest working Kitchen knife Set

Mini 1.5 is a Set of 5 knives .100% Handmade & hand forged, it is handy to use & can be used multi purpose in daily routine, from cutting meat, fruits, vegitables & even as a tactic tool, its designed to work multi tasks.

 

330 Layers of Damascus Steel

2 Sets with different Design & Blade width

-  Pearl Series

-  Black Forest Series

 

 

-  Black Forest Series

 

 

Its compact size makes it ideal to carry any wear & it's Ultra Sharp.

Handles available below:

White bone Handle

Walnutwood Handle

Pakkawood Handle

 

So how small is really the mini ?  See below your self!!

 

 

 9'' inch the smallest knife

 

Our Sizes

 10 cm Chef Knife

 12 cm  Chef Knife

 15 cm  Nakiri knife

 16 cm  Chef Knife

 18 cm  Chef Knife

 Two knives from our Set are of same size with blade difference, the white is of modern shape blade style

A more close up to it below

 

Black Forest Series is the walnut black handle knife blade is wider as compared to the Pearl series

   Close up view for new mini chefs knife in pearl white bone

 Wide length blade chef knifes set an inspiration from French Chef knives  with Walnutwood.

 

So How Small is Mini 1.5 Knife Set !

 

10  12, 16 & 18 cm Chef knife and 15 cm Nakiri Knife

 

 

  A more close up view below:

 

 

Each of these finest smallest knives, have the special hand-made art work in brass & copper pins.

 Fine finishing with Copper rivert & Brass Finishing

 

Risks and challenges

Biggest challenge that i see are the delays with as little as 5% chance as !

- This is a mature project, the crucial risks are already a past tense.
- Specifically,
- The R & D is done.
- The prototypes have been produced.

Creditable manufacturers are in harness and ready to begin. All of the knives video & photos you see here were produced by our partner. However, unseen natural causes or factors which can delay may happen,. but in such case the delay would be only of couple of weeks rather than months as the Prototypes have be produced and tested.

We know how important transparency is and we commit to always keeping you in the loop about the status of our campaign..

Thank you Your Mini Team.

story:
If You Were Going to Buy Me Something...

Over the past few years my perspective on Christmas has changed quite a bit. Yes, I've been guilty of buying tons of gifts for loved ones, and yes, there are only a few things in the world that can compare to watching their faces light up as they unwrap those presents - don't get me wrong, I know the feeling. Life, however; has taken me through a wide range of experiences where I've had, lost, obtained, thought I obtained, and seen the harsh reality of life in developing countries. My origins were humble, but I will never forget witnessing the financial and emotional struggle of children my age who for $.01 could have bought supplies like pencils and notebooks in order to continue with their education. No matter how little we may think we have in this country, we are still blessed with infrastructure that harnesses opportunity. I don't need anything tangible this Christmas. No expensive purses, not even a $5 trinket. I propose a new tradition of gift giving - one that provides growth, promotes sustainability, delivers hope and a promising future for humanity. 

This world is full of many in need, but this year I'd like to focus on enabling women to create jobs and providing basic needs such as medicine, food and education to children; especially to our girls. All I want this season is your support in beginning a new tradition of gift giving. 

What We Need & What You Get

The chart below demonstrates where our contributions will be distributed. For more detailed information on these organizations, feel free to click the hyperlinks on the spreadsheet.

Overview:

  • Punjammies™ : together with the International Princess Project,  their goal is to continue to grow to provide jobs for victims of sex trafficking in India and to provide a supportive atmosphere where women can rebuild themselves emotionally and psychologically.
  • World Vision: an organization dedicated to working with children, families, and their communities in nearly 100 countries worldwide, regardless of religion, race, ethnicity, or gender. They work alongside the poor and oppressed to enable them to reach their full potential by tackling the causes of poverty and injustice. 


I'm aiming to reach $1,440 by December 26th, so besides my close friends, you're welcome to invite others to join in or try building the same initiative with their close circles. Moreover, I will match your Punjammie contribution (up to the target goal) just because they're super cute and I'd like to keep a pair and give some away. If I don't reach my entire goal, the proceeds will go to World Vision and Punjammies as a general donation. Also, be assured that I will post my proof of donation as a follow up to everyone who has contributed.


The Impact

  • Where Most Needed: Hunger: Provides life-saving food and essential care for children where the need is most urgent and where chronic hunger levels and malnourishment puts them at risk for mental impairment.
  • Fishing Kit: Enables two families to continue generating income through fishing, where they previously may have lost their fishing equipment due to natural disasters.
  • Education for Girls: Your donation today can help transform the life of a girl in poverty and give her hope for the future. Education gives girls the potential to earn better wages, raise healthier and more educated children, and have a voice in her community.
  • Girls and Women in Crisis: Millions of girls are subjected to abuse, child labor, sex trafficking, early marriage, and other offenses. Your gift will go where it's needed most, protecting girls and women by equipping skilled, local staff to offer training, education, counseling, medical care, small business loans, and other programs that reach women and girls as well as boys — helping to end cycles of gender-based violence.

  • Life Saving Food & Care: Provides life-saving food, agricultural support, clean water, medicines, and other essential care to hungry children and families around the world. Plus, you'll help feed them for years to come by giving their families vegetable seeds, farming tools, clean water, and other vital assistance.


    • You and I can make a difference this year. As I mentioned earlier, if you're a trustworthy individual who would like to adopt this model of giving, please do, the more the merrier. 


    Merry Christmas folks <3
    Diana Ferrusquia

Life Saving Food & Care: Provides life-saving food, agricultural support, clean water, medicines, and other essential care to hungry children and families around the world. Plus, you'll help feed them for years to come by giving their families vegetable seeds, farming tools, clean water, and other vital assistance.




You and I can make a difference this year. As I mentioned earlier, if you're a trustworthy individual who would like to adopt this model of giving, please do, the more the merrier. 


Merry Christmas folks <3
Diana Ferrusquia

story:
First, I want to thank everyone for taking the time to look at my video, and for checking out what Im about below.

Who am I and what am I doing and why?

My name is Brian Garvey, Im from the West of Ireland

What is the Carbon Comet Desk Light?

The Carbon Comet Desk light is a light that has never been seen before. First off, its unique as you can see and has a catchy name too I think you'll agree. I went to a lot of trouble picking a grade of alloy that anodizes to give a particular shade of grey that is not common to normal anodized aluminium, the finished colour is closer to titanium, which is what I was after. Normal anodized aluminium can look very cheap - I wanted to avoid that at all costs.

The bulbs themselves are also a first in terms of Desk lights. They are high output led technology in festoon format. Being 12volt, they are very safe, and they also consume very little energy. They last many thousands of hours longer than older filament type bulbs and are far superior in general. 

A lot of thought also went into the head of the light. The bulbs can be rotated  as you can see from the video. This allows the user to setup the focal point on what he/she is working on with mininal fuss. As you can also see from the video, the user can look through the shade portion directly at the work should he or she have to take a closer look at something. This idea came to me having spent many frustrating hours trying to light something I was working on, and either the shade getting in the way, or the workpiece ending up poorly lit. 

Of course, if you're not the hands on type this light is also for you. Its very slick looks and fantastic design make it fit into a modern or traditional style setting. Perhaps also, you or someone you know is into fine automotive, from rally, to race, exotics, or F1, they will understand and cherish what this light is all about without question.

There is no doubt, that it has been designed and built from the best materials, with no compromise. 

 

What I Need & What You Get

I want to make a first batch of ten of these lights. I want to put at least that many into the hands of people in order for them to see the quality, and believe in both the product, and my ability, I certainly do.

I have one Carbon Comet built as you can see in the video, it is fully finished bar rubber feet, it has been tested for hours, and is also anodized. 

For that one light, I have all the machine code written to drive the cnc mill used to machine all the parts. 

I do need the funding in order to buy more aluminium, carbon fibre cloth, bulbs, fittings, switches, wire, and name plates. I also have to buy aluminium tool plate and some more cnc cutters in order to make proper jigs so that I can machine batches of parts easily. If full funding is not reached, and you have ordered a light, or anything else in the line of perks, you will recieve them. Im in this for the long haul whatever it takes.

PLEASE, DO NOT FORGET TO ADD THE SHIPPING COST TO YOUR CONTRIBUTION. 

Be it for the photo, T-shirt,  package bundle, or Carbon Comet.

Ireland, 5 dollars, Uk, 7 dollars, USA, 10 dollars, China, 12 dollars. > Perks. 

Ireland, 7.50 dollars, Uk, 10 dollars, USA, 17 dollars, China, 22 dollars. > Carbon Comet Desk Light, track and track postage.

The Impact

By supporting this project in whatever way you can you will be part of something big to come. This is just the tip of the iceberg. I have more ideas I cannot wait to prototype out and get working on but I can only do one at a time. My previous project, My motorsport picture frames were a big hit. You can look at those on my personal website. The Carbon Comet will be on there shortly too as soon as my website bulder is back at work on Monday.

Im sick of poor quality products doing the rounds of late. Lets bring something into the world, granted, and little more expensive, but built to last, and be cherished and admired by all. 

Other Ways You Can Help if you cant fund

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

So what else can you do?

Easy! Spread the word about this cool little light, its simple, just tweet about it, share on facebook, or even email it onto your friends. Everyone has someone that will just love this. 

Show it around at work, at school, in college(dont get in trouble!) at home, or even go out on the street and shout about it!

 

Thats it for the time being folks, I want to thank you all one more time for your support,

 

Regards, 

 

Brian Garvey.

Ireland.

story:
MEET LUI

We believe that furniture for cats can be beautiful, modern, and fit within any stylish interior while not losing functionality and providing your cat with an unforgettable experience.

Meet LUI - the flagship of our clowder.

* cat not included

 

We've been manufacturing and successfully selling LUI and our other scratchers throughout Europe for a couple of years. Now it's time for them to leave the nest and - who knows - maybe even swim over the ocean to explore some new places?
If you want to make your furry friend happy, LUI is the puuurrrrrfect solution :)

WHAT DO YOU GET?

You get the LUI scratcher in one of four colors for - possibly - the best price ever.
But you better hurry up :) - it may not want to wait forever and the quantity on this campaign is limited.

COLORS

DIMENSIONS

WANT TO FIND OUT MORE?

Visit our website www.mykotty.us

story:
SOFF TOWEL IS BACK

with NEW SIZES!

With so many requests, we Re-launched the SOFT TOWEL project on Indiegogo.

THANK YOU for your love and support! 

 

 

 

YOUR TOWELS ARE MUCH DIRTIER THAN YOU THINK!

Your towel comes in direct contact with your face, body, and hair.

Typical towels remain damp and are slow drying

which creates the perfect environment for bacteria to grow.

 

When you use a traditional towel to dry off,

the body becomes buried with germs.

It can be harmful to you and your family.

AND

HERE IS THE ANSWER!

 

 

 

SOFF Towel dry SUPER FAST which eliminates odor.

 

 

 

Rubbing your hair causes serious damage,

which becomes another added stress in your life.

 

Just gently press and squeeze with the SOFF towel.

 

SOFF towel has the best absorbency.

You no longer have to rub!

 

Bring it with you Anywhere, Anytime!

Home | Gym | Outdoor Activities | Swimming | Sports | Beach

 

HOME

 

GYM

 

OUTDOOR ACTIVITY

 

JOGGING

 

BEACH

 
Compare to any other towels, SOFF Towel is suitable for the beach
because the sand is easily shattered.
 

 

SOFF towel is essential because it is used for various purposes,

such as wiping your body after a shower, drying your face and hands, and wiping your feet.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Don't want to bring a dirty towel back home? Don't worry!

You can even clean sand off the SOFF towel

by simply shaking it off just once at the beach.

 

CHOOSE YOUR TOWEL WISELY

Now is the time to experience the BEST towel on the market.

​

  

 

SOFF TOWELS are made in our OWN HEADQUARTERS.

Our high quality microfibers might cost more to make, 

but the quality of our materials speak volumes over other towels.

 

We develop and make luxurious SOFF Towels at our OWN Headquarters and factory.

That's why SOFF can produce and manufacture great quality products at reasonable prices.

Producing and making our own products from high grade fibers and materials are the biggest reason why SOFF can present to you the Best quality and Best priced products.

 

SOFF Towel was made with experience and deep knowledge of good raw materials.

We are constantly developing and researching for new materials.

We develop and make luxurious SOFF TOWELs at our OWN Headquarters and factory.

This is why the SOFF TOWEL is so special.

How it works?

We want to let the world know how great SOFF towel is.

SOFF towel, which has already gained huge popularity in Korea, has started the project

on Indiegogo to show how different and outstanding it is from a regular towel.

It is not just a towel that you imagine.

It is an experience product and I want to inform consumers of the best towel.

We need your help to produce the towels and bring it to you.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 Project collaborated with ideapot. 

Share our project with your family and friends and we will give you 15% of every dollar you helped to raise!

 

 

 

  • We make with the best quality materials and sell the best quality products. This is our philosophy. 
  • We tried our best to perform the softest blanket made of the best materials, and we are confident in our products, the quality and design. 
  • We are aware of potential issues that may arise in the production process. Once our project is funded, we will do our best to do everything we can to deliver the product to you! We will update you about any delays and do our best to resolve any issues that may arise. 
  •  Wrong Address Disclaimer- It is the responsibility of the backer to make sure that she or he enters the shipping address correctly. We do our best to speed up processing and shipping times, hence there is a gap to change your pledge or to change the address of your pledge. It is unavailable to cancel your order or change your shipping address after the campaign survey duration is over. Please message us with an urgent issue. We will do our best to make the change, however we cannot guarantee that we will be able to do so, as there are varying time limits in which we are able to do so. 
  • Delivered but NOT Delivered- All of our shipments will include Tracking number. If the tracking information confirms that the package has been delivered to your address but you have not received your order, please contact us to investigate this issue. We cannot be held accountable for packages where tracking information states the package has been delivered to your shipping address. 
  • Returned packages- If the package has returned back to us due to the storage period elapsed or any other reasons, we can send it back to you again. The shipping charge is yours.

We do our best to speed up processing and shipping times, hence there is a gap to change your pledge or to change the address of your pledge. It is unavailable to cancel your order or change your shipping address after the campaign survey duration is over. Please message us with an urgent issue. We will do our best to make the change, however we cannot guarantee that we will be able to do so, as there are varying time limits in which we are able to do so. 
Delivered but NOT Delivered- All of our shipments will include Tracking number. If the tracking information confirms that the package has been delivered to your address but you have not received your order, please contact us to investigate this issue.
