story:
Designed for a digital lifestyle, Sobro is the furniture of the future. We've elevated the coffee table from a piece of wood that props up unopened large-format books, to an all-in-one center that connects your powered up life. 

Designed with a refrigerator drawer, the Sobro keeps beverages and food chilled and always within reach. Never miss a goal or a moment of the conversation. More than just a cooler, the Sobro uses a compressor to keep your wine, beer and beverages ice cold and features precise temperature controls that you can adjust to your personal preferences. GET A SOBRO FOR FREE! Find out more in the "Perks" section

 Set the mood or start the party with rich deep sound quality. Dual speakers on each side of the Sobro coffee table deliver enhanced sound and rich bass. 

Light it up. LED lights on the underside of the Sobro coffee table make for amazing ambience and set the mood for a Netflix night or your next big bash. 

Connect your TV audio to the table via Bluetooth and get in the game. 

*You'll need a Bluetooth dongle or smart TV but we will provide this (bluetooth dongle) for free if you help us reach our stretch goal.. which now we have reached!

Control Bluetooth, audio, lights and drawer temperature right from the tabletop. No app download required.

With glass, you can kill the coasters and never worry about coffee table rings again. The Sobro features a tempered glass top that is durable and easy to clean. 

Charging ports on the side conveniently charge all your devices, from phones, to tablets, to your miniature indoor drone.

Free yourself from being tethered to the wall. Power up your laptop with the (2) 110v outlets right on the side of the table. When you’re done, roll up your cords and stash them neatly out of sight in the storage drawers.

Store all your remote controls, snacks and magazines out of sight in the two side drawers.

We set out to create the future of furniture but we also wanted the Sobro coffee table to stand on its own as a sleek and beautiful design.

The Sobro is designed to complement your lifestyle and your living room. 

The Sobro coffee table is designed to be the right size for your space. 

The Sobro coffee table is designed to be plug and play. Simply plug in the Sobro to a wall outlet and you’re ready to go.

There’s no assembling drawers or building furniture just simply screw on the legs of the table and plug it in. Using a cord concealer, you can smooth the cord on the floor and put it under the couch where it’s out of the way.

We have a successful track record of bringing innovative technology into unlikely spaces. In 2016, we shipped the PancakeBot, the world's first pancake printer to over 72 countries all over the world.

With the Sobro Coffee Table, we are bringing technology to your home in a way that enhances your every day.

The full retail price is $1500. We are offering our backers a significant savings in order to help us bring this product to market. The heat is on to get the deal. Unleash the hounds.

Only available while supplies last, so don't miss out!

We are so excited to have reached our $1 million goal. As a special Thank You, we are offering you the opportunity to Earn some of your contribution back and to even get your Sobro for FREE!!!!

GET A SOBRO FOR FREE!

We are using Indiegogo’s referral program to offer Sobro contributors a chance to get the following:

-Refer 1 new person to back the current perk for a Sobro and you will receive free shipping for your Sobro*

-Refer 3 separate new people to back the current perk for a Sobro and you will get your Sobro for HALF PRICE **

-Refer 6 separate new people to back the current perk for a Sobro and you get your Sobro for FREE***

To count as a referrer, you must promote the Sobro campaign with Indiegogo’s share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account. This is very important because otherwise, your unique ID won’t be attached to the resulting backers and you will not get any credit for your referral.

When you're logged into your account and use Indiegogo’s share tools to send a tweet, for example, the link in the tweet includes your unique ID. Then, when anyone in your social network reads your tweet, clicks the link and backs Sobro, you're instantly recognized for your referral – entitling you to your Special Thank You! Within 2 weeks from the ending campaign we will reach out to each of you (and we hope it is a lot of you!!!) to give you your Thank You credit.

Thank you to Anyone who already shared the campaign on social when logged into your account and has referrals -You are automatically be eligible for the above. We will be reaching out to you after the campaign to give you our Thank You credit.

* We will credit you back $89.00

** We will credit you back half of your contribution toward one Sobro

*** We will credit you back 100% of your contribution toward one Sobro

+ Please note that if you have purchased the twinsies or the distributor pack, this Thank You referral program only applies to one of your Sobros.

++ We can not accept any claims of referral that do not come through your unique Indiegogo ID.


Show your love for the Sobro with this exclusive, short run graphic Tee Shirt designed just for Sobro supporters.

 

Stretch Goal #1 - $500k 

Help us reach $500k and we will offer every backer a TV connect dongle so that you can stream the audio from your TV through the speakers on your Sobro and really get in the game. 

Stretch Goal #2 - $1M 

We are excited to share that production has just been started on the Sobro

 

 


We chose Indiegogo becasuse the Indiegogo platform allows us to communicate with our customers and make our backers a part of the development process. We want the community's suggestions to help us make the Sobro an epic product and where possible, to incorporate the feedback into the final design.  

Launching on Indiegogo allows us to bring this product to market faster than we would be able to without the support of our backers. We hope that you will join us in bringing the Sobro to life and making our dream of Netflixing while, in fact, chilling a reality. 

If you are a member of the media looking for a press release, click here

Can I claim multiple perks?
Yes, if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk.

What about shipping? 
As you can imagine, properly protecting and shipping your Sobro Coffee Table is expensive.  The quotations we received so far have given us sticker shock.  We don’t want the same to happen to you, so we are capping the maximum standard shipping charge at $89* and we will absorb the remainder. This will put the pressure on us to find the best methods available. We have already started to work with our network of logistics partners and the one factor that substantially reduces the shipping cost is critical mass. Assuming this campaign gets the monstrous support that we are hoping for, we will be able to leverage multiple ports & facilities in regions closer to our backers to reduce distance and when shipping full truckloads, the costs plummet.  If we gain enough efficiency to bring the cost below $89.00*, we will pass 100% of the savings through to the most important component of this campaign - our backers. So help us help you and please share this campaign with your friends, colleagues and anyone you think needs to step toward the future.
*$149 for Canada. Please note this does not include any import/tax duties imposed by Canada as we have no control over this.

What happens if we don't reach our goal?
You will be refunded in full soon after the campaign has ended.

Does the Sobro come with a warranty?
Yes, we are just finalizing the details.

What happens if the project gets pushed back past the delivery date?
With crowdfunding we are expected to deliver a product that can otherwise take years to deliver. While we will do our best to deliver on the estimated time frame, we also want to make sure we produce a quality product that you are extremely satisfied with. There may be certain set backs beyond our control which may delay the project. However, we will always be transparent and keep you all up to date.

Can I get a refund after the campaign has ended?
The money raised here on Indiegogo will go into product development, purchasing of materials, and manufacturing to deliver the Sobro to your home. Refunds will only be issued if we can not deliver the final product after exploring all possible options. We will do our best to be transparent and keep you updated on all developments.
For questions please contact crowd@storebound.com

Can you ship outside of the US and Canada?
We see Sobro in homes around the globe. But each country has different standards for electrics and refrigeration that we must follow. For our initial campaign, we’re limited to the US and Canada, but if we get enough interest from other countries, we can add an international perk. Stay tuned for more. 

Will the Sobro vary from the design above? 
While we have the preliminary design and prototypes build, we may still make some minor improvements. We love hearing from our supporters and if you have any suggestions we will be more than happy to consider it. 

How can I choose my color?
Everyone will have the option to select what color they would like after we reach our stretch goal of 1 million. This will be done in the form of a survey after the campaign has ended. 

Does the Sobro come assembled?
Yes, you only need to screw the legs into the bottom of the table and you are good to go.

How long is the power cable?
Approximately 10ft (3 meters).

Where is the power cable located?
The power cable is located underneath the table.

What is the temperature range of the fridge drawer?
The temperature range of the fridge we are aiming for is 33.8F - 53.6F

What version of bluetooth is being used?
Currently version 4 is used to make it easier to pair with different devices from different manufacturers. However, we are still looking at other versions for audio quality and reliability.

What are the speaker specifications?
Current specifications are - Sensitivity (2.83 V/1m) 90dB, Power Handling 15W RMS 10%, Impedence Nominal 8 Ohm.

Is there an indication so I know when a device is synced?
Yes, it will be shown on the display.

What is the bluetooth range?
Approximately 33 feet. This depends on the environment and type of device being used.

After a device has been synced and it falls out of range, does it auto reconnect when back in range?
Yes.

What type of items can I plug into the outlets on the Sobro?
You can plug any standard outlet type devices with a power rating of less than 200W total (or 100W per outlet). Ideal for laptop chargers, battery chargers, and some projectors. 

What happens if I plug in an item that overloads the outlets?
We are looking at incorporating an overload safety switch.

Number of color LED options for the ambience?
7 single color and 1 fade through all colors.

Can you charge devices using all USB ports at once?
Yes.

What happens if I spill liquid on the display and buttons?
Just wipe it up, the controls are underneath the tempered glass.
story_txt: Designed for a digital lifestyle, Sobro is the furniture of the future. We've elevated the coffee table from a piece of wood that props up unopened large-format books, to an all-in-one center that connects your powered up life. Designed with a refrigerator drawer, the Sobro keeps beverages and food chilled and always within reach. Never miss a goal or a moment of the conversation. More than just a cooler, the Sobro uses a compressor to keep your wine, beer and beverages ice cold and features precise temperature controls that you can adjust to your personal preferences. GET A SOBRO FOR FREE! Find out more in the "Perks" section Set the mood or start the party with rich deep sound quality. Dual speakers on each side of the Sobro coffee table deliver enhanced sound and rich bass. Light it up. LED lights on the underside of the Sobro coffee table make for amazing ambience and set the mood for a Netflix night or your next big bash. Connect your TV audio to the table via Bluetooth and get in the game. *You'll need a Bluetooth dongle or smart TV but we will provide this (bluetooth dongle) for free if you help us reach our stretch goal.. which now we have reached!Control Bluetooth, audio, lights and drawer temperature right from the tabletop. No app download required.With glass, you can kill the coasters and never worry about coffee table rings again. The Sobro features a tempered glass top that is durable and easy to clean. Charging ports on the side conveniently charge all your devices, from phones, to tablets, to your miniature indoor drone.Free yourself from being tethered to the wall. Power up your laptop with the (2) 110v outlets right on the side of the table. When you’re done, roll up your cords and stash them neatly out of sight in the storage drawers.Store all your remote controls, snacks and magazines out of sight in the two side drawers.We set out to create the future of furniture but we also wanted the Sobro coffee table to stand on its own as a sleek and beautiful design.The Sobro is designed to complement your lifestyle and your living room. The Sobro coffee table is designed to be the right size for your space. The Sobro coffee table is designed to be plug and play. Simply plug in the Sobro to a wall outlet and you’re ready to go.There’s no assembling drawers or building furniture just simply screw on the legs of the table and plug it in. Using a cord concealer, you can smooth the cord on the floor and put it under the couch where it’s out of the way.We have a successful track record of bringing innovative technology into unlikely spaces. In 2016, we shipped the PancakeBot, the world's first pancake printer to over 72 countries all over the world.With the Sobro Coffee Table, we are bringing technology to your home in a way that enhances your every day.The full retail price is $1500. We are offering our backers a significant savings in order to help us bring this product to market. The heat is on to get the deal. Unleash the hounds.Only available while supplies last, so don't miss out!We are so excited to have reached our $1 million goal. As a special Thank You, we are offering you the opportunity to Earn some of your contribution back and to even get your Sobro for FREE!!!!GET A SOBRO FOR FREE!We are using Indiegogo’s referral program to offer Sobro contributors a chance to get the following:-Refer 1 new person to back the current perk for a Sobro and you will receive free shipping for your Sobro*-Refer 3 separate new people to back the current perk for a Sobro and you will get your Sobro for HALF PRICE **-Refer 6 separate new people to back the current perk for a Sobro and you get your Sobro for FREE***To count as a referrer, you must promote the Sobro campaign with Indiegogo’s share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account. This is very important because otherwise, your unique ID won’t be attached to the resulting backers and you will not get any credit for your referral.When you're logged into your account and use Indiegogo’s share tools to send a tweet, for example, the link in the tweet includes your unique ID. Then, when anyone in your social network reads your tweet, clicks the link and backs Sobro, you're instantly recognized for your referral – entitling you to your Special Thank You! Within 2 weeks from the ending campaign we will reach out to each of you (and we hope it is a lot of you!!!) to give you your Thank You credit.Thank you to Anyone who already shared the campaign on social when logged into your account and has referrals -You are automatically be eligible for the above. We will be reaching out to you after the campaign to give you our Thank You credit.* We will credit you back $89.00** We will credit you back half of your contribution toward one Sobro*** We will credit you back 100% of your contribution toward one Sobro+ Please note that if you have purchased the twinsies or the distributor pack, this Thank You referral program only applies to one of your Sobros.++ We can not accept any claims of referral that do not come through your unique Indiegogo ID.Show your love for the Sobro with this exclusive, short run graphic Tee Shirt designed just for Sobro supporters. Stretch Goal #1 - $500k Help us reach $500k and we will offer every backer a TV connect dongle so that you can stream the audio from your TV through the speakers on your Sobro and really get in the game. Stretch Goal #2 - $1M We are excited to share that production has just been started on the Sobro  We chose Indiegogo becasuse the Indiegogo platform allows us to communicate with our customers and make our backers a part of the development process. We want the community's suggestions to help us make the Sobro an epic product and where possible, to incorporate the feedback into the final design.  Launching on Indiegogo allows us to bring this product to market faster than we would be able to without the support of our backers. story:
XCLEA H30 Plus is now featured on the big billboard in TIME SQUARE!

Here is a closer look:

 

The News About XCLEA：

Hooray! On September 4th Honor officially launched our XCLEA smart cordless vacuum cleaner live on YouTube! This was our first hand-held cordless vacuum for overseas, and then we launched XCLEA H30 Plus on Indiegogo, we will keep you updated and please stay tuned!

Here is the fragment capture video about us.

 

And here is the whole video：

Starts from 1:31:21, it's the first generation of our smart cordless vacuum cleaner, and there will be an official announcement about our robot vacuum XCLEA H30 Plus is going to be LIVE on INDIEGOGO recently. We will keep you updated and please stay tuned!

 

Unboxing Review About XCLEA H30 Plus

 

 

 

Other robot vacuums on the market are either stupid navigation or can only empty the grimy dust bin manually, and many of them do not even come with both vacuum and mop function. They may not have much practical application and finally becomes a decoration only.
Here we introduce the XCLEA H30 Plus robot vacuum and mop 2 in 1 cleaner for you, with its own self-emptying dust collection base that can completely free your hands.

 

The dust box of most robot vacuum cleaners can only pick up dust under the suction mode, and most robot vacuum & mop cleaners do not pick up dust when the water tank is attached and the mopping mode is on. None of them can be fully automated. The XCLEA intelligent self-emptying dust collection base structurally optimizes the robot vacuum and the dust collector to achieve genuine full automation. You no longer have to remove the water tank manually before switching to the dust collection mode. It's all about convenience, save you lots of time and effort.

 

The 23 Kpa suction power is equivalent to a 3 meters of water column. Under such strong pressure, the self-emptying base will suck to remove all the hair and large particles from the dust bin of the robot. At the same time, XCLEA optimizes the transmission structure and adopts the transmission method of direct suction to reduce the whirling of dust and dirt in the channel without causing blockages. Avoiding the trouble of dredging and maintenance. XCLEA is added convenience and peace of mind to your life.

 

A 3L oversized dust bag is provided in the self-emptying base, which has a large holding capacity equivalent to 30 dust bins. It can hold up to 2000m² area of dust. Greatly reduces the frequency of dust disposal by yourself, keeps you hands clean at all time. Moreover, you’ll be worry free from bacteria and odor with its unique antibacterial and deodorizing system. Simply dispose the bag whenever it’s full.

 

XCLEA H30 Plus Working Test

 

 

 

The attached mop pad on XCLEA closely hugs the ground and cleans the most stubborn dirt and stains from the floor. The unique mopping path imitating human action of mopping, makes cleaning more systematic and efficient.

 

With a large 250ml smart controlled water tank and 3 levels of water flow control, enough to clean a house of 300m² easily. The precision electronic-controlled water tank creates an even mopping, without leaving any watermarks on the floor after air dry. 

 

XCLEA H30 Plus Mopping Test 

 

 

Ultra-strong suction power up to 2700Pa for deep cleaning, can easily pick up dust, dirt, peel, crumbs, cat litter, hair and so much more. Make floor and carpet cleaning more efficient. 

 

The 2 dynamic variable-speed sides brush adjusts their speed automatically according to different cleaning situation along the edge and corner. Leaving no trace of dust. Thereby improving cleaning quality. 

 

The high-precision filtration of XCLEA, leaving it more meticulously clean. The big suspension suction inlet is close to the ground for deep cleaning, which greatly enhance the cleaning efficiency. Easily get all the embedded dust out of floor's grooves.

 

 

XCLEA can sense the environment and figure out an optimized cleaning routine instead of spinning around randomly. The LDS 4.0 LIDAR Navigation and Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM) Technology makes XCLEA the smartest ever just like a super-intelligent robotic “brain”. Utilize a various of detection sensor, infrared cliff, wall, collision sensors plus electronic compass, accelerometer, speedometer etc. XCLEA can 360° scan around to memorize its position and planned route, that can prevent it from falling down the stairs, get rid of common pitfalls, find its way out of trouble spots and keep all your valuables safe. 

 

 

With the latest map management system, the AI algorithm allows XCLEA to partition your home map into individual rooms and identify different area to make it easier for spot cleaning. 
You can even merge, label and rename the rooms. Achieve preset cleaning route or schedule the time to clean designated rooms. Cleaning has never been so easy!

 

Unlike many traditional robot vacuums, XCLEA can recognize different floors of a home and save the maps automatically which is great for multi-level homes. No need to rebuild map. It can even match and switch between the maps automatically, that leads to improvement of cleaning efficiency.  

 

Use the XCLEA APP to set up “No-Go Zone” (from 0.5m to 10m) to protect your valuables.

 

XCLEA  can go exactly where you want it to. Free to redefine and adjust its cleaning behavior accordingly. Simply point on the map to clean wherever you want. It helps to save lots of time, compared to other robot vacuums that can only clean the entire area all over again.

 

 

Support smart voice control speakers with Alexa, Google Assistant. Giving you hands-free control for vacuuming and mopping.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Founded in early 2013, XCLEA is an innovative enterprise focusing on the development of high-quality cleaning products. As an important member of the emerging technology giant HUAWEI HONOR smart home appliances ecological chain, XCLEA and HONOR work together to develop some smart cleaning products. XCLEA focuses on the original de-sign and takes the ultimate user experience as its goal, adheres to develop high per-formance, outstanding appearance and high cost-performance robot vacuums.

 

 

 

 

REFERRAL PROGRAM

It’s not over yet! We have developed a REFERRAL PROGRAM. We are grateful for your valuable sharing and recommendation as they will be super helpful for the success of our campaign. If you share our link on your social media, such as Facebook, Twitter, then post the link of your sharing post with the feature of XCLEA H30 Plus you like the most in our comment section, and we will offer FREE accessories according to the number of orders through your sharing link.

  • How many FREE accessories will I get?

Share your link to your friend and there is one successful order through your link:

5* Dust Bag + 20* Disposable Mops

Share your link to your friend and there are two successful orders through your link:

5* Dust Bag + 20* Disposable Mops + 4* Washable Mops

  • How to participate?

Step 1 - Back and follow us on Indiegogo

Step 2 - Get your referral link on the top right corner of our Indiegogo campaign page (indicated below) and share it with your friends. 

Step 3 - Confirm that your friend has ordered XCLEA H30 Plus

  • How to share?

Following us on Indiegogo!

Share XCLEA on Facebook

Share XCLEA on Twitter

Share the referral link with everyone

 

Program 3: Get a chance to win a FREE XCLEA H30 Plus

 

Step 1:

Leave your comment about “what do you like about XCLEA H30 Plus?” with your #order number# in our comment page. For example: "#1021# I am a big fan of XCLEA. Love the Self-Emptying Base most! “

 

Step 2:

We will randomly generate only one contribution ID on random.org and give away ONE FREE XCLEA H30 Plus alpha version to our lucky backer! The participation will last for 1 week, when the time ends, we'll post an activity termination comment in “Comments”. And a video recording of the draw will be posted in the update on the 5th Oct. The chances are limited, first come, first serve!

P.s:

  • You must be a backer to participate.
  • Those who do not follow the rules to leave the comment will be automatically disqualified from the draw.
  • Repeated comments will be automatically disqualified from the draw.
  • If the selected person does not reply to the email within 24 hours, he/she will automatically be disqualified and we will repick a new winner.

*XCLEA reserves the right of final decision.

*XCLEA reserves the right of final decision.

story:
Woerden Designs is Back!

After raising $123,306 on our titanium chopsticks in 2018, we're back with an upgrade! Introducing our Titanium crystal finish ultralight chopsticks new for 2020! 

What's new

Our Titanium Crystal Chopsticks are:

  • Ultralight: only 14 grams! (Our original titanium chopsticks were 51 grams!)
  • Crystal Titanium finish: We used a special process to heat the titanium in a vacuum at just the right temperature to create an easier-to-clean crystal finish that looks incredible
  • Titanium tube design: These chopsticks are made from super-strong Grade 1 pure titanium tubes
  • Kids version: get your kids started with safe, lightweight chopsticks!
  • Included chopsticks helper: New to chopsticks? No problem! We're including a free helper device so anyone can use them (see below for more details about the helper)

We listened! Many of you asked for a lighter weight chopstick that was easier to clean. Our Titanium Crystal Chopsticks are by far the lightest chopsticks we offer at only 14 grams, making them perfect for all-day use.

 

The Hidden Unhealthy Truth

Traditional wooden chopsticks can harm our environment and our bodies. It takes one aspen tree just to make a few thousand disposable chopsticks. Over 70 billion pairs of chopsticks are consumed around the world each year, which needs to cut 14 million aspens and results in deforestation of more than 9300 acres! 

Being magnified 100x you can clearly see where bacteria can hide in all wooden chopsticks

Sulphur, hydrogen peroxide, sodium sulfite and mold inhibitor are chemical substances commonly used to make disposable chopsticks, even though they are not allowed. That's why the water turns yellow and gave off a pungent smell when you wash the disposable chopsticks. 

The stainless steel tableware itself is not harmful to the human body, but some families have improperly used stainless steel tableware, which has caused chemical changes in stainless steel tableware and produced substances that are harmful to the human body. For example, in life, many households use stainless steel bowls, stainless steel tableware to contain salt, soy sauce, vinegar and other substances. For a long time, stainless steel tableware will undergo chemical reactions under the action of these substances, releasing them to the human body. Harmful substances will harm the human body if used for a long time. They must be cleaned frequently to keep it hygienic and dry.

How it's made

Our new chopsticks have a stylish and unique crystal finish. Mill finish titanium sheets or plates are secured in custom fixtures in a specialized furnace where the vacuum is equivalent to outer space. The furnace is gradually heated to near the melting temperature.

During this precision-controlled cycle, the titanium's natural crystal structure begins to enlarge and re-orientate. The crystals grow in a columnar pattern across the thickness of the titanium. A transition from hexagonal to cubic crystal alignment creates the uniquely faceted specular crystals. The resulting crystalized structure is only available in titanium.

With our Crystal Titanium Chopsticks, we hope to usher in the next era of chopsticks - reusable, resilient, and healthy utensils for everyday use.

The Benefits

HYGIENIC -  Titanium is bacteria-resistant, and inhibits the growth of germ and other harmful pathogens. Because of its non-porous and non-stick nature, nothing seeps inside, both keeping the integrity intact and making it extremely easy to clean.

HEALTHY - Titanium is the most biocompatible and safe metal for the human body.  It is the only element that our body fully accepts - even bone will grow around it. 

CORROSION RESISTANT - It has excellent resistance to corrosion, nearly equivalent to platinum. 

SUSTAINABLE - Titanium chopsticks are durable and reusable. Each meal enjoyed with our Crystal Titanium Chopsticks is another step closer to a greener world.

STRONG & LIGHT-WEIGHT - Titanium was named after Titans of Greek mythology because of its immense strength. It is less than half the density of steel, perfectly weighted for a quality feel and an everyday carry.

Using chopsticks have become more and more popular because of its benefits,

  • Develop hand-eye coordination and  concentration
  • Improve motor skills and dexterity
  • Build new pathways to the brain. 
  • Improve handwriting grips
  • Provide an opportunity for rich social interactions

Save Nature. Protect Family.

Sturdy, stylish and minimalist design for both adults and kids. Keep your family safe and healthy. 

No-slip crystal finish. Be proud of yourself for using chopsticks and enjoy noodles perfectly and securely without worry that noodles will slip.

A perfect match with our titanium sushi plate.

 Eat healthily! 

The cubic design of the tops prevents chopsticks from rolling away while the tips are cylindrical design, which integrates the ancient ideas of the orbicular sky and rectangular Earth. 

Don't know how to use the chopsticks? We include a set of Chopsticks Helpers for free! Using chopsticks helps develop and improve coordination and precision of movement. This utensil turns every meal into an exercise that literally makes your brain work. This type of training is most beneficial for kids, who still learn to use their limbs. 

A chopstick travel case and an elegant box for free. Very convenient to take with you anywhere and anytime, and a perfect gift for those you love!

 

Simple cleaning due to the crystal finish.

Specs:

Adult Chopsticks:

  • Length: 230mm (9 in)
  • Weight: 14g (0.5oz)

Kid Chopsticks:

  • Length: 190mm (7.4 in) 
  • Weight: 12g (0.4oz)

Production Timeline

What people are saying about Woerden

Woerden Designs Collection was created to promote healthier eating and eco-sustainability. 

"These chopsticks are a work of art! The weight is perfect, the balance is superb and the value is excellent. They will last forever! If I had two more hands I would order another set. No more broken splintery evil to the tongue chopsticks for me. Gourmet, homemade or fast food, it all tastes better. This finely crafted set takes one on an exciting adventure with every meal. Even works with cookies and milk! Get a set (or 3) now, your mouth will thank you!" -- Mark S James(Feedback from our Solid Titanium Chopsticks on retail website)

"Nice, light and goes through dishwasher well. Had for 3 months without an issue." -- Mack Flynn (Feedback from our Solid Titanium Chopsticks campaign)

"My girlfriend used to carry a set of wooden ones in her purse, which I found to be gross because wood absorbs things. I bought here these. She's had hers in her purse a few months now and has had no complaints." -- Pierre Markham (Feedback from our Solid Titanium Chopsticks campaign)

"I absolutely love these chopsticks. They're sturdy, but very lightweight. They're square on the top half, which keeps them from rolling. I've found them easy to use, even for slippery things like soups. I couldn't be happier with this purchase." -- Zainab Pitt (Feedback from our Solid Titanium Chopsticks campaign)

"I've been using cheap wooden chopsticks before I got these, and these titanium ones just feel so much better in my hand, and for some reason are easier to control! I feel much better using these. Dead useful for people like me who go camping a lot or work in summer camps that cook on campfires." -- Casey Wills (Feedback from our Solid Titanium Chopsticks campaign)

"I received my set of Zirconium chopsticks yesterday, and I am very pleased. The quality and workmanship is excellent, and I look forward to using these. Definitely my favorite set, hands down, just wish they were not so expensive, so I could purchase more. Even though they were late, the wait was worth it." -- blueumbrella (Feedback from our Solid Zirconium Chopsticks on retail website)

"Beautiful color and polish." -- Todd Hoffman  (Feedback from our Solid Zirconium Chopsticks on retail website)

"Very nice cup. Size is a bit small but keeps warm well." -- Michael Stadnyk (Feedback from our Titanium Coffee Cup on retail website)

"One of the best products I've ever owned. It's light, very durable and is sized just right for a nice cup of coffee or tea. And, it doesn't look like everyone else's mug. No problem with hot liquids at all." -- Isaak Terry (Feedback from our Titanium Coffee Cup on retail website)

"Really Lite and even with scalding hot tea I can comfortable hold the cup without burning myself. Plus no weird metallic taste added to your drink of choice." -- Cora Mitchell (Feedback from our Titanium Coffee Cup on retail website)

"Beautifully made titanium bowl, just right as a rice bowl." -- John N Wood (Feedback from our Double-Wall Titanium Bowl on retail website)

"Pieces are very nicely mirror finished, Wish they were a little thicker , but they are plenty strong as is, just the handling feel would feel better if they were thicker IMO." -- Todd Hoffman (Feedback from our Titanium Cutlery Set on retail website)

"Mine came last week and I used it for rolling out beignets. I concur that it was a little smaller than I was used to, but the solidity and the weight made up for reduction in size. The cleanup was fantastic, no bits of dough to wash off, just a quick wash and done. The action was nice. I've tried marble ones before and found them rather gimmicky and have been relying on wood up until now. Very happy with the decision to back this. Thanks for this campaign. " -- Jed Johnson (Feedback from our Titanium Rolling Pin campaign)

"And it's only fair to add 2 things. 1) the free apron is really good. Much better than the ones normally available for sale. 2) it's a delight to get something before the published delivery date. Happy camper..." -- Iain Drummond (Feedback from our Titanium Rolling Pin campaign)

About Chopsticks

Chopsticks are thought to have a long history of over 5000 years. Originating from China, they began to spread to Japan and Korea by 500 A.D. So far, chopsticks are becoming popular utensils in restaurants and hotels across the globe.

Nowadays, chopsticks serve many new functions besides tableware. For example, you can buy a pair as a gift to your friends and relatives. In Chinese, it reads 'Kuaizi', which means to have sons soon, so a newly-married couple is happy to receive it as their wedding gift. 

Chopsticks are adored and used around the world. A recent experiment shows that many joints and muscles are being exercised, improving your dexterity over time. They certainly make you cleverer, don't they?

Pledge now and help us bring Crystal Titanium chopsticks to life!

story:
Hello Everyone!

My name is Timmi Ryerson. I want to fund a project to create a series of videos that show Landlords, Property Managers and Tenants how to create the best rental experience. Your donation will help that goal to be realized!

 

        Why Do This Project?


                                      

I run a company which offers subscription based property management software called Smart Property Systems. Every day we get customer service calls from subscribers asking for advice on how to handle tenant problems just like the ones we showcased in this video. We also get calls from tenants about problems they are having with their landlords/managers.  After all of these years we have probably a million stories. As a speaker at a  single family home forum earlier this year, I heard directly from owners how there is very little information is readily available today that is suitable to use for training staff and tenants to be better managers and renters for the small investor. So our company has decided to sponsor a public service training series for landlords, property managers and tenants (especially first time tenants).  But we need your help. Since we are giving this series away for free we need to fund it to pay the production costs.

The video above is done by a talented group of actors.  To our surprise, we found out that they also are renters.  So when we presented the ideas for the video to kick off of our crowdfunding campaign, they were excited and energized as they have had first hand experience with some of these very scenarios.  Maybe you have too and know first hand how valuable this series will be.

          So What Will We Give You!

The videos which we will create will showcase a problem and then provide solutions which will teach how to avoid that problem in the first place.  The tenant series will be a very helpful, non threatening way for managers to educate new tenants.  And the best practices for successful property management series will also help to train experienced and new staff in better ways of interacting and getting the job of management done right.


If you are a landlord or manager, you will want to invest in this series because you will be able to use the videos to train your associates and employees and also to educate your tenants.  If you are a tenant, you will want to invest in these videos as you will be able to use them to learn what you should know about what to look for when renting and signing a lease agreement as well as  your responsibilities in a rental agreement. And you will be able to educate your landlord/manager if you are having problems.  Our video team believes that this series of fun, entertaining and message sending videos will help everyone in the rental community. 

 

                                         

                                            


Remember that the crowdfunding is so that we can provide these videos for free to all who need to use them.  We will have the videos posted publicly for all to use on Youtube and Vimeo.  We will also have pointer sites for those who are looking for this kind of information.   

We are so excited to start making the series and know that millions of people around the world will benefit from the work we are doing.  So here is your chance to get involved, be a part of this vision, be part of the solution and get recognized and get the benefits from this fun and educational project.

           What We Need

     

      We need your donation first and foremost.  

            


       We also need public support for this project.   

Send this crowdfunder to your friends!  Have your friends send it out to their friends!  Post it on your facebook and twitter!!!  Talk about this project in Linked In.

Did you know that there are more than 44 million rental properties in the US today alone? Now imagine how many people rent their homes all over the world.  Imagine what we can accomplish with some very well done training videos.  Donate today!

It costs between $6000 and $10,000 to do a quality video.  That is why a project of this type has not been done before.  It has been cost prohibitive.  But with your donation, this series of training videos will finally be made available free to the masses. 

              What You Get

For you, our donors, we will sweeten the pot.  Because we need your donation to be able to complete this project, we will give you something for your money no matter what level at which you donate. You may even be able to choose a  topic to be presented or appear in one of the videos!  Check out the levels and what we are offering for your help!! And remember, if the perk is something that you cannot use, we can transfer the perk to anyone you designate, and your name will still be listed in the credits for the video for which your money is used.

          The Impact of Your Donation is Huge

                        


First, and a very important part of this project, is that the money you contribute will create jobs for the actors, designers, writers and cameramen/women who will work to create these videos.  We will produce the videos about topics which we feel will have the most impact for tenant education as well as for landlord/manager education.  But we are interested in your ideas too.  You can find us on Facebook or Twitter (@smartpropertysys) and leave a message.  You can also come to  ourweb site  and send in a contact form with your ideas.  We will read every one of them.  

It is well known that people retain 60 % more information gained from education done with a video.  Pictures can tell the story,  create the impact and ambience needed to get main points across.  Videos can create emotion, which is a valuable tool when trying to get a point across. We will strive to use humor wherever possible without compromising the message we are sending.  But in life there is also pathos.  So we may employ that tactic to make both sides understand the consequences of their actions or lack thereof.


We believe that  laws regarding a contract where a tenant applies to rent a residential property from an owner/manager are very similar all over the world. With that in mind, we see that these videos will be useful no matter where in this great big beautiful world you live. And if we are able to exceed our goal, we will be able to provide translation for the videos into different languages. The result could help people, ---landlords, managers and tenants all over the world to be more informed and more effective.  Imagine everyone living in peaceful harmony....

                                  Well we can hope anyway!

                  Other Ways You Can Help

Of course we will appreciate any amount that you can contribute to this worthy cause.  But we would also want you to send this Crowdfunding Opportunity to your friends, your landlord or property manager and anyone you can think of who would benefit from having a series of training and right practice videos to use as a valuable resource.  Remember that these "works of art"  (our creative director sure feels like they will be works of art) will be available free to the public.  If you work for a property management company and know that you could make good use of a video series like this one, we hope that you will participate and also encourage your management to support the fundraiser, 

Indiegogo has a great way to share campaigns. You can put them on your facebook page.  You can reference this page in twitter to your peeps and you can forward the email to everyone.

That’s all there is to it.  We are ready world. Are you?  Donate to this very worthy campaign today!!

And remember, if the perk is something that you cannot use, we can transfer the perk to anyone you designate, and your name will still be listed in the credits for the video for which your money is used.
          The Impact of Your Donation is Huge                        First, and a very important part of this project, is that the money you contribute will create jobs for the actors, designers, writers and cameramen/women who will work to create these videos.  We will produce the videos about topics which we feel will have the most impact for tenant education as well as for landlord/manager education.  But we are interested in your ideas too.  You can find us on Facebook or Twitter (@smartpropertysys) and leave a message.  You can also come to  ourweb site  and send in a contact form with your ideas.  We will read every one of them.  It is well known that people retain 60 % more information gained from education done with a video.  Pictures can tell the story,  create the impact and ambience needed to get main points across.  Videos can create emotion, which is a valuable tool when trying to get a point across. We will strive to use humor wherever possible without compromising the message we are sending.  But in life there is also pathos.  So we may employ that tactic to make both sides understand the consequences of their actions or lack thereof.We believe that  laws regarding a contract where a tenant applies to rent a residential property from an owner/manager are very similar all over the world. With that in mind, we see that these videos will be useful no matter where in this great big beautiful world you live. And if we are able to exceed our goal, we will be able to provide translation for the videos into different languages. The result could help people, ---landlords, managers and tenants all over the world to be more informed and more effective.  Imagine everyone living in peaceful harmony....                                  Well we can hope anyway!                  Other Ways You Can HelpOf course we will appreciate any amount that you can contribute to this worthy cause.  But we would also want you to send this Crowdfunding Opportunity to your friends, your landlord or property manager and anyone you can think of who would benefit from having a series of training and right practice videos to use as a valuable resource.  Remember that these "works of art"  (our creative director sure feels like they will be works of art) will be available free to the public.  If you work for a property management company and know that you could make good use of a video series like this one, we hope that you will participate and also encourage your management to support the fundraiser, Indiegogo has a great way to share campaigns. You can put them on your facebook page.  You can reference this page in twitter to your peeps and you can forward the email to everyone.That’s all there is to it.  We are ready world. Are you?  Donate to this very worthy campaign today!!

story:
Thank you for helping Gear reach over 115% of our Goal!

We are now accepting pre-orders on our website.


For too long, the smart home revolution has neglected window shades. AXIS has set out to transform this with Gear, the first ever smart device that motorizes your window shades. With built-in sensors, AXIS Gear allows you to automate the opening and closing of your shades, adding comfort, convenience, and safety for you and your family.

Traditional motorization can cost upwards of $400 per window. AXIS Gear is an affordable luxury that only costs $145. Amazing, or what?

View our press kit by clicking here.


On-device controls allow you to control your shades with the touch of a finger. Group Mode allows you to control multiple shades from a single Gear.

Wake up to sunshine and forget the annoying, heart-wrenching alarm clock. Let the sun warm up the room before you leave your cozy bed.

Use Gear’s mobile app to create and customize a schedule to set when your window shades open and close.

Video demonstration below:


Convenience & Accessibility

Open or close your shades in perfect unison, and control heavy or hard-to-reach shades, all from the comfort of your bed or couch. 

Energy Savings

Cut your energy costs by reducing your reliance on A/C and heating throughout the year. Warm up any room with natural sunlight, and keep heat in by closing the shades when it’s cold.

Luxury 

Wow your guests with a touch of a button. Set the mood or turn your living room into a home theatre. 

Security & Privacy

Come home in the evenings to much-need privacy. Simulate presence when you are away from home, or send alerts to your mobile phone to report any suspicious motion or activity by your windows.

Child & Pet Safety 

According to the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission, there have been 285 incidents due to strangulation in the past 19 years. Gear eliminates this danger by preventing the chain/cord loop from dangling freely, giving you peace of mind.


Regardless of how big, small, heavy or light your shades are, Gear works with:

Gear works with all beaded chains, cord loops, and connectors in any material or size. Installing Gear is as easy as 1-2-3:

Install the provided mounting bracket on to your window frame.

Attach the beaded chain or cord loop of your window shade onto Gear.

Snap Gear onto the mounting bracket.

The provided mounting bracket will allow you to install Gear on both inside and outside mounts, regardless of whether the chain or cord loop is positioned to the left or right of your shade.


Video demonstration below:


Our smart home module lets you integrate Gear with other Smart Home devices that run on Z-Wave or ZigBee such as: 

  • SmartThings
  • Nest (via Weave)
  • Logitech Harmony
  • Fitbit and Jawbone
  • Homey

This add-on vastly extends your range of control and is highly recommended for larger homes. Interested? Add $20 at checkout for each Gear you order.

Gear comes equipped with an external power module that consists of a premium solar panel paired with replaceable AA batteries for optimal longevity. In hand with a backup lithium polymer (LiPo) battery found inside Gear itself, you can expect a reliable and renewable power source for your Gear.

The problem with other solar panels is that they are not designed to operate indoors which is why you usually see them up on rooftops. As a result we designed our solar panel module to be optimized for indoor use with indirect sunlight, exactly the levels of light you can expect to get behind a window.


Check out the Gallery for images of the AXIS Swag T-Shirt!


We have been hard at work for more than a year developing the AXIS Gear, and we can’t wait to get them into your hands. Over the course of multiple iterations, we have incorporated extensive feedback from interior designers, industry experts and everyday users. Our team has been working to develop a device that perfectly balances aesthetics and functionality.

In parallel with product development, we have selected the right partners to put into place a robust supply chain. Our PCB production and final assembly is handled by our local partner in Toronto, Canada to ensure high quality and a shorter production cycle.



 Trung Pham  - Founder, CEO
About.me Profile 
Co-founder of a rapidly growing entertainment app in Toronto, also part-time stunt double for Elon Musk.     

Manu Menon  - Operations & Business Development
About.me Profile 
Significant experience in technology and manufacturing management as well as quoting the gospel of Larry David.  

Alan Cheng  - Industrial Designer
About.me Profile 
Former UX designer at Corel, often eats six to seven lunches a day with no noticeable weight gain.

Marc Bishara  - Product Development Engineer
About.me Profile 
Experience in machine vision and optical systems design, is also working towards building his world domination robots.

Clifton Pereira - Mechanical Engineer
About.me Profile 
Experience in designing, prototyping and manufacturing consumer products, has nothing funny to add to this bio.    

Matthew Vultaggio - Digital Marketing Ninja
About.me Profile 
Matthew has significant digital media experience working in the music industry and was born with a full blown beard.   


Will Gear work with my window shade?
Gear is designed to be compatible with any window treatment that is controlled by either a chain or a cord loop. This would include all types of roller and solar shades, and even many vertical blinds, venetian blinds and draperies - regardless of brand.
If you are still unsure, please send in a photo and description of your window shade to hello@axis.life.


Is Gear strong enough to lift my shade?
Gear can easily lift up to 20 lbs, far exceeding the weight of your normal window shade. To compare, most window shades found in homes require 7-8 lbs of pull force. Larger window shades (think floor-to-ceiling condos) require 10-15 lbs of pull force. 


How do I install Gear?
Installing Gear is incredibly simple and takes just a few minutes. First, screw in the provided mounting bracket onto the window frame next to your shade’s chain. Then, simply loop the chain around Gear’s sprocket and then snap the device onto the bracket. All that’s left to do then is to connect the solar power module to the main body of Gear. Then, make sure to attach the solar panel onto to the window. Done like dinner! 


How do I control Gear?
There are two convenient ways you can control your Gear. Using the downloaded smartphone app, you can lower and raise a specific shade or multiple shades from the comfort of your phone. But what happens when you are already next to the window? It would be a hassle to take out your phone just to lower the shade! That’s why Gear features on-device controls, which allows you to lower and raise that specific window shade or all of the shades within a room from the device itself. 


Can I still manually control my shade using its chain/cord loop?
Absolutely! Unlike other motors, Gear has been designed so that you can still manually control your window shade using its chain. There are two different ways of doing this:

Option 1: Tugging on your shade’s chain will send a notification to Gear, automatically raising or lowering the shade, based on the direction of the tug.

 Option 2: Pressing the power button will disengage Gear from your chain, allowing you to manually control the shade using the chain with the Gear still in place. To turn it back on, just press the power button again. 

 
Does Gear work with smart home systems and other connected devices?
While we believe Gear works great as a standalone device, its true potential is unlocked when it works together with a variety of connected devices. To that end, our team is hard at work building integrations with leading smart home systems and connected devices and designing a slew of IFTTT scenarios. We will keep you posted as these develop. 


Will Gear work with my phone?
Gear will initially launch on iOS and Android with support for other operating systems to follow shortly afterwards. 


How is Gear powered?
We have designed Gear to be a completely wireless solution. It is powered by a combination of a replaceable set of alkaline batteries, a rechargeable LiPo battery and a solar panel module designed to work indoors. The alkaline batteries alone are tested to power the Gear for 1 year of normal usage. Normal usage is defined as completely raising and lowering your shades - 2 times a day. The solar panel module will fit snugly behind the top of your shade and ensure that you never have to worry about replacing batteries - ever! 


When can I expect to receive my Gear?
The estimated shipping date is October 2016. With that said, we are working hard to have your Gear available to you before then. We have already set up our supply chain and struck agreements with our manufacturing partners. Once we wrap up this campaign, we will enter into the design for manufacturing phase, then tooling and molding followed by the actual production run. We promise that we will keep you updated every step of the way so that you are never in the dark about when your Gear will arrive. 


My question wasn’t answered. How can I contact you?
You can always reach us at hello@axis.life! We’re open to any questions, comments or suggestions so don’t hesitate to get in touch. We would love to hear from you!

story:
• In The Beginning
  • Our Goal
  • FAQs
  • Updates / Perks

**Please note that this campaign has absolutely NO affiliation with the Obama/Biden campaign or the Democratic Party. We're just a bunch of Farkers who think this is funny. If we can help some people while getting these lulz, even better.**

**If you have any questions regarding this campaign, please read the FAQ. If that still doesn't answer your question, send your inquiry to joebidenstransam@gmail.com**

In The Beginning...

Joe Biden loved his Trans Am. As soon as it reached about 40 degrees in Scranton, PA, Ole Joe would pull the cover off of his beloved beauty and spend hours detailing her immaculate curves. He'd often be overheard murmuring how sweet his "Bird" was which was completely opposite to his normally gruff demeanor. It also made certain Senate Foreign Relations Committee meetings very awkward.

Senator Biden, now Vice President Biden, has always been known for his fiery and passionate speech and mannerisms. But when he looked at the Bird, he'd hitch up his jorts, rip off of his shirt sleeves and chug a sixer of Ice House.

It was love.

Then came the Great Recession. Biden tried to maintain his Trans AM through 2009, but with the soaring gas prices and the Republican pressure to destroy everything that was General Motors, he was unable to do so. He ended up selling her to a young man about to go to war in Iraq. There were tears in his eyes when he gave the Bird away, but he knew she would be in a better place.

Flash forward to Friday, October 12, 2012...

Unfortunately, not everything on the internet is true, no matter what the internet tries to tell you. Over the past four years one of the internet's favorite political memes is of "Uncle Joe Biden." It started with an Onion article which poked fun at the Vice President because of his blue collar mannerisms and forthright speech when discussing... well... anything.

Joe Biden has made a career about speaking what he means, regardless if it is in his best political interest or if it is the "politically correct" thing to say. Because of this he endures jokes regarding his "gaffes" and verbal miscues; and America (and some of the rest of the world) laugh and chuckle about this Homer Vice President of ours.

All the while, Joe Biden has calmly and quietly been an incredible Vice President. He was one of the first politicians to publicly embrace gay marriage and may have been personally responsible for President Obama coming out in favor of gay marriage and the subsequent change in the Democratic Party's platform. He is also a stunningly intelligent politician who understands the nuance of foreign and domestic policy. He is also not afraid to show disdain for factually deficient arguments.

In order to let Vice President Biden know just how much we appreciate him, while also making a very silly part of the internet come true (we are the internet after all), let's buy Uncle Joe a Trans Am like the one that is featured in The Onion’s article.

Now, Uncle Joe won't be able to accept this behemoth of steely American grace and power. He has these pesky laws and regulations and political-y things to deal with. Taking into consideration his magnanimity and power of personality, he probably wouldn't be able to drive the Trans AM without the gnashing of teeth and wailing of women anyways. .

So the internet will purchase the car and auction it off for charity. All proceeds will be distributed to the Biden Breast Health Initiative, Doctors Without Borders, the Wounded Warrior Project and GLAAD.

Maybe if we ask nicely, Joe Biden will wash it on the White House lawn.

Our Goal

Our goal is to raise $25,000 for some very worthwhile charities and have a great time while we do it - all in true internet style.

Here are some specifics:

  • If we reach our target goal we will purchase a Trans Am like the one in The Onion's article, drive it to D.C., and [hopefully] have Joe Biden and the car mug for the camera on the White House lawn.
  • The car will then be auctioned off and all proceeds will be distributed evenly to the Biden Breast Health Initiative, Doctors Without Borders, the Wounded Warrior Project, and GLAAD.
  • If we DON'T reach our target amount of $25,000, whatever amount we DO reach will be distributed evenly among those same four charities.
  • Any money received above the $25,000 goal will also be distributed evenly among those same four charities.

Give Joe The Bird Campaign FAQ

Q: Are you guys serious?

A: Well, we're serious about this, but not much else.

Q: How did this start?

A: A Farker by the handle "Hack Patooey" suggested that the Internet should buy Joe Biden a Trans Am. After some discussion in the thread it was determined that the lulz would be too much to pass up. This site was started and the wonderful denizens of Fark started to donate and spread the word.

Q: So this was just a random thing... give a Trans Am to the Vice President?

A: The original impetus of this campaign was an article published in The Onion, a satirical publication, describing Joe Biden washing a Trans Am in the driveway of the White House. This has become one of the more amusing political memes: the plain talking Joe Biden as everyman, the guy who would pound a tallboy of Icehouse and spend an afternoon detailing his Trans Am.

Q: Are you really going to give Joe Biden a Trans Am?

A: Yes. Should a car be purchased, we will find a replica and miniature Trans Am of a similar year and color to give to him. The actual Trans Am will hopefully be auctioned off with the proceeds going to benefit our four charities.

Q: OK... so what ARE you going to do with the Trans Am?

A: Ideally, we're going to buy the car, get it to Washington, D.C. and hopefully have the Vice President take a photo with it. Whether or not that works out, we'll be auctioning the Trans Am and the proceeds will be donated to four charities.

Q: "The obama/biden "think I can but don't have a clue how" clown team has been bumbling its way through this economy for almost 4 years now. How does the looney left reward them? Buy biden a car. Thanks for ruining the middle class, here's the keys. Proving once again, the incredibly stupid thinking power of the obamoron rubes."

A: This isn't a political thing. It is an Internet thing. For some reason people cannot comprehend this.ALL PROCEEDS ARE GOING TO CHARITY.

Q: Which charities will be getting the money?

A: Doctors Without Borders, GLAAD, The Wounded Warrior Project and The Biden Breast Health Initiative. Each will receive 25% of the funds at the end of the project.

Q: Why not donate the money directly to charity?

A: Because this way we get to have some fun and hopefully use the popularity of the Vice President, the silliness of making a meme become a reality and the nature of the Internet to make it possible to donate even more to these great causes.

And because we're buying a biatchin' Trans Am for the Vice President!

Q: What happens if you don't raise the target of $25,000?

A: If we're close enough we'll probably try to get the Trans Am and roll with it anyway.

If we don't make enough to get the Trans Am and cover costs to get it to DC, the funds will be distributed directly to the four charities in equal amounts. We will still send a die-cast Trans Am with a card of all contributors’ names/avatars to the Vice President. :)

Q: What happens if you raise MORE than the target of $25,000?

A: Anything not spent on donor perks, the Trans Am, taxes, licensing and delivery will be divided equally among the four charities.

Q: Is anyone on this team getting a share of this money?

A: Not one thin dime. Everything that isn't going to expenses like IndieGoGo's fee, donor perk costs, taxes and so forth will go to the charities. Nobody here will be taking any money you donate.

Q: How can we be sure this isn't a scam?

A: Well, we've got a lot of credibility on Fark; the admins there know who we are and the creator of this IndeiGoGo campaign is a lawyer who is not going to risk his law license to take money away from charities. But in the end, we can't really give you ironclad assurance; this is not a 501(c) or anything like that.

If you don't feel comfortable contributing to this campaign, please consider a direct contribution to one of our four charities. That really is the ultimate goal here.

Q: Is my donation tax-deductible?

A: No. If you want to make a tax-deductible donation, you can directly donate to the causes in question.

Q: This is stupid, Joe Biden can afford his own Trans Am!

A: Please, for all that is holy and sacred please read the above part of the FAQ. Then read the front page of this campaign and then watch the YouTube video. All explain that the Trans Am will be auctioned with the proceeds going to charitable causes. We're trying to make a silly meme a reality while helping some awesome causes.

Q: Why should I support this? I hate Joe Biden!

A: If you don't want to support our campaign, please consider a direct donation to one or more of the charities we're supporting.

Q: Who's behind this?

A: This started with several Farkers. The original suggestion was by "Hack Patooey", the IndieGoGo campaign created by "RichieLaw", the video created by "coeyagi" and the voiceover for the video and other flacking by "Cyclometh". Many others have helped out by contributing ideas in the Fark threads, posting links, tweets and FB statuses. We would also like to thank the staff at Fark, Drew and “Unfreakable” for allowing us to keep the links viable and letting us use their corner of the internet for our brainstorming.

Q: Why does the lousy t-shirt use Comic Sans font?

A: For the lulz.

Updates / Perks

Please note that perks may be updated through the course of the campaign. In order to do this we have to delete the prior perk. I apologize for any inconvenience that this may cause as you will have to come back and claim the new perk. Also, at the end of the campaign we will go through the contributors and make sure that even if they did not claim a perk that they receive the level of perk their donation qualifies for.

New $15 Perk (will be included on all perks $15 and above):

Includes a silicon wrist band that says, "It's a BFD #GiveJoeTheBird".

NEW $25 Perk (as of now will be included on all perks $25 and above):

More perk information! We are currently looking at different options for offering more perks. The difficulty is finding something that will be a good return for the campaign. The goal here is to get as much money to the charities as possible, so we do not want to spend a lot of money on the perks.

If anyone has an idea for additional perks or would like to donate something to use for our perks, please contact joebidenstransam@gmail.com.

Perks in the Works:

Limited edition Fark designed t-shirt. This will be the product of a photoshop and caption contests onFark. It will likely be in the $40 - $60 range once we determine the cost of printing and shipping.

Then came the Great Recession. Biden tried to maintain his Trans AM through 2009, but with the soaring gas prices and the Republican pressure to destroy everything that was General Motors, he was unable to do so. He ended up selling her to a young man about to go to war in Iraq. There were tears in his eyes when he gave the Bird away, but he knew she would be in a better place.
Flash forward to Friday, October 12, 2012...
Unfortunately, not everything on the internet is true, no matter what the internet tries to tell you. Over the past four years one of the internet's favorite political memes is of "Uncle Joe Biden." It started with an Onion article which poked fun at the Vice President because of his blue collar mannerisms and forthright speech when discussing... well... anything.
Joe Biden has made a career about speaking what he means, regardless if it is in his best political interest or if it is the "politically correct" thing to say. Because of this he endures jokes regarding his "gaffes" and verbal miscues; and America (and some of the rest of the world) laugh and chuckle about this Homer Vice President of ours.
All the while, Joe Biden has calmly and quietly been an incredible Vice President. He was one of the first politicians to publicly embrace gay marriage and may have been personally responsible for President Obama coming out in favor of gay marriage and the subsequent change in the Democratic Party's platform. He is also a stunningly intelligent politician who understands the nuance of foreign and domestic policy. He is also not afraid to show disdain for factually deficient arguments.

In order to let Vice President Biden know just how much we appreciate him, while also making a very silly part of the internet come true (we are the internet after all), let's buy Uncle Joe a Trans Am like the one that is featured in The Onion’s article.
Now, Uncle Joe won't be able to accept this behemoth of steely American grace and power. He has these pesky laws and regulations and political-y things to deal with. Taking into consideration his magnanimity and power of personality, he probably wouldn't be able to drive the Trans AM without the gnashing of teeth and wailing of women anyways. .
So the internet will purchase the car and auction it off for charity. All proceeds will be distributed to the Biden Breast Health Initiative, Doctors Without Borders, the Wounded Warrior Project and GLAAD.
Maybe if we ask nicely, Joe Biden will wash it on the White House lawn.

Our Goal
Our goal is to raise $25,000 for some very worthwhile charities and have a great time while we do it - all in true internet style.
Here are some specifics:

If we reach our target goal we will purchase a Trans Am like the one in The Onion's article, drive it to D.C., and [hopefully] have Joe Biden and the car mug for the camera on the White House lawn.
The car will then be auctioned off and all proceeds will be distributed evenly to the Biden Breast Health Initiative, Doctors Without Borders, the Wounded Warrior Project, and GLAAD.
If we DON'T reach our target amount of $25,000, whatever amount we DO reach will be distributed evenly among those same four charities.
Any money received above the $25,000 goal will also be distributed evenly among those same four charities.


Give Joe The Bird Campaign FAQ
Q: Are you guys serious?
A: Well, we're serious about this, but not much else.Q: How did this start?
A: A Farker by the handle "Hack Patooey" suggested that the Internet should buy Joe Biden a Trans Am. After some discussion in the thread it was determined that the lulz would be too much to pass up. This site was started and the wonderful denizens of Fark started to donate and spread the word. Q: So this was just a random thing... give a Trans Am to the Vice President?
A: The original impetus of this campaign was an article published in The Onion, a satirical publication, describing Joe Biden washing a Trans Am in the driveway of the White House. This has become one of the more amusing political memes: the plain talking Joe Biden as everyman, the guy who would pound a tallboy of Icehouse and spend an afternoon detailing his Trans Am.Q: Are you really going to give Joe Biden a Trans Am?
A: Yes. Should a car be purchased, we will find a replica and miniature Trans Am of a similar year and color to give to him. The actual Trans Am will hopefully be auctioned off with the proceeds going to benefit our four charities. Q: OK... so what ARE you going to do with the Trans Am?
A: Ideally, we're going to buy the car, get it to Washington, D.C. and hopefully have the Vice President take a photo with it. Whether or not that works out, we'll be auctioning the Trans Am and the proceeds will be donated to four charities.
Q: "The obama/biden "think I can but don't have a clue how" clown team has been bumbling its way through this economy for almost 4 years now. How does the looney left reward them? Buy biden a car. Thanks for ruining the middle class, here's the keys. Proving once again, the incredibly stupid thinking power of the obamoron rubes."
A: This isn't a political thing. It is an Internet thing. For some reason people cannot comprehend this.ALL PROCEEDS ARE GOING TO CHARITY. Q: Which charities will be getting the money?
A: Doctors Without Borders, GLAAD, The Wounded Warrior Project and The Biden Breast Health Initiative. Each will receive 25% of the funds at the end of the project.Q: Why not donate the money directly to charity?
A: Because this way we get to have some fun and hopefully use the popularity of the Vice President, the silliness of making a meme become a reality and the nature of the Internet to make it possible to donate even more to these great causes. And because we're buying a biatchin' Trans Am for the Vice President!Q: What happens if you don't raise the target of $25,000?
A: If we're close enough we'll probably try to get the Trans Am and roll with it anyway. If we don't make enough to get the Trans Am and cover costs to get it to DC, the funds will be distributed directly to the four charities in equal amounts. We will still send a die-cast Trans Am with a card of all contributors’ names/avatars to the Vice President. :)Q: What happens if you raise MORE than the target of $25,000?
A: Anything not spent on donor perks, the Trans Am, taxes, licensing and delivery will be divided equally among the four charities.Q: Is anyone on this team getting a share of this money?
A: Not one thin dime. Everything that isn't going to expenses like IndieGoGo's fee, donor perk costs, taxes and so forth will go to the charities. Nobody here will be taking any money you donate.Q: How can we be sure this isn't a scam?
A: Well, we've got a lot of credibility on Fark; the admins there know who we are and the creator of this IndeiGoGo campaign is a lawyer who is not going to risk his law license to take money away from charities. But in the end, we can't really give you ironclad assurance; this is not a 501(c) or anything like that. If you don't feel comfortable contributing to this campaign, please consider a direct contribution to one of our four charities. That really is the ultimate goal here.Q: Is my donation tax-deductible?
A: No. If you want to make a tax-deductible donation, you can directly donate to the causes in question.Q: This is stupid, Joe Biden can afford his own Trans Am!
A: Please, for all that is holy and sacred please read the above part of the FAQ. Then read the front page of this campaign and then watch the YouTube video. All explain that the Trans Am will be auctioned with the proceeds going to charitable causes. We're trying to make a silly meme a reality while helping some awesome causes.Q: Why should I support this? I hate Joe Biden!
A: If you don't want to support our campaign, please consider a direct donation to one or more of the charities we're supporting.Q: Who's behind this?
A: This started with several Farkers. The original suggestion was by "Hack Patooey", the IndieGoGo campaign created by "RichieLaw", the video created by "coeyagi" and the voiceover for the video and other flacking by "Cyclometh". Many others have helped out by contributing ideas in the Fark threads, posting links, tweets and FB statuses. We would also like to thank the staff at Fark, Drew and “Unfreakable” for allowing us to keep the links viable and letting us use their corner of the internet for our brainstorming.
Q: Why does the lousy t-shirt use Comic Sans font?
A: For the lulz.

Updates / Perks
Please note that perks may be updated through the course of the campaign. In order to do this we have to delete the prior perk. I apologize for any inconvenience that this may cause as you will have to come back and claim the new perk. Also, at the end of the campaign we will go through the contributors and make sure that even if they did not claim a perk that they receive the level of perk their donation qualifies for.
New $15 Perk (will be included on all perks $15 and above):
Includes a silicon wrist band that says, "It's a BFD #GiveJoeTheBird".
NEW $25 Perk (as of now will be included on all perks $25 and above):


More perk information! We are currently looking at different options for offering more perks. The difficulty is finding something that will be a good return for the campaign. The goal here is to get as much money to the charities as possible, so we do not want to spend a lot of money on the perks.
If anyone has an idea for additional perks or would like to donate something to use for our perks, please contact joebidenstransam@gmail.com.
Perks in the Works:
Limited edition Fark designed t-shirt. This will be the product of a photoshop and caption contests onFark. It will likely be in the $40 - $60 range once we determine the cost of printing and shipping.

story: My daughter Sonia is 3 years old and way too big for her crib. She is sharing a tiny bedroom with my husband and myself due to unfortunate circumstances. Her bedroom flooded during a heavy rainstorm and insurance would not cover it. The carpet and walls are moldy and the air is stale. My husband and I both work but do not make enough money to buy her a bed or fix up her bedroom. This breaks my heart. It hurts when Sonia asks me "Mommy when am I going to have my own big girl bed?" and "Why don't I have my own room--I want Mickey Mouse." Times are very tough and I can deal with that, but it is not fair for a 3 year old to have to sleep in a crib that is too small for her in a cramped room with her parents. She should be able to have her own space. The flooded bedroom is tiny so it would be an easy project. We just need the funding to make it happen. Please help me with this. Every penny counts. Also, If there is anyone willing to volunteer to take care of the carpeting and painting that would be welcome too. I can take before and after photos and videos as well. Thank you everyone! On a lighter note this site is fabolous! It would love to be able to spend my days volunteering but unfortunately I wouldn't be able to afford it. I do volunteer when I can (on weekends) mostly for the MS Society. The ability to help others is the best feeling in the world.
