story:
Tikr is an Interactive Snack Toy that will surprise and delight your doggy pal for prolonged periods of time! 

Fill tikr with snacks, then set the length of playtime by turning the built-in timer dial. Your dog will be continually rewarded as the snacks are progressively released during play. 

There are NO electronics to break, and NO batteries to charge or even replace. Yup, you read that right!

LOAD WITH SNACKS!

SET THE TIMER!

IT'S PAWDY TIME!

  • Playtime can be as short as 5 minutes, or as long as 45. You decide! 
  • Tikr rewards your dog's play and curiosity with gradual access to the snacks inside. 
  • Snacks can only fall out when the timer-controlled holes in the toy align, so your dog remains captivated throughout play.
  • The treat holes are different sizes, so larger snacks are saved until the very end. First the small, then the medium, and finally the large snacks!
  • Oh, and did we mention... no batteries or charging required!

The idea for tikr came from playing with our dogs Misha and Aure. Our dogs love to play. But unfortunately, nothing on the market was keeping their attention for more than a few minutes at best. They needed a stimulating, long-lasting dog toy that would spark their natural curiosity. And we wanted a safe, healthy and affordable solution... 

So, we came up with tikr!

Our concept was to use a timer to MAXIMIZE the time that snacks were captured by the toy. This would ultimately ensure that playtime would last. We took the idea to d:e Creative to transform it from concept to reality...

 

Together we developed tikr to be the ULTIMATE solution: a super fun interactive dog toy that rewards your pup's attention with snacks, and can keep them engaged for an amazingly long period of time - over and over again!

 

Tikr's patented secret is the built-in timer combined with varying hole sizes. As the timer unwinds, the hole in the snack chamber slowly aligns with the increasingly bigger holes in the outer shell. When the inner hole aligns with the outer holes, the snacks are awarded through play. Larger snacks remain inside tikr (until the time is right) because they can't fit through the smaller holes ; )

Yes, it's really that simple!

We've designing special tikr snacks that will be the ideal size. But, you can totally use any snacks or kibble your dog likes! Keep the play experience exciting by varying the timer settings, or amount of snacks used.

 

Tikr is made from a food safe rubber-like blend that's flexible, extremely durable, and easy on your dog's teeth. It uses no electronics or batteries.

 

Tikr is now shipping! Over the past few months we've been hard at work getting more than 5,000 packages out the door. Here are a few photos of our packaging machine and final packaging. 

Thank you for your support!

- The Christensen Family (Misha, Amanda, Maddox, Whit & Aure)

story:
The Science behind Tauso

 

So does it work? Well YES!

 

The simple solution to remove wrinkles from your shirts, requiring 80% less effort than ironing and no electricity.

Just hang your shirt on Tauso, pull it taut and spray any tough creases away. No more ironing!
 
 
It takes around a minute to clip a shirt onto Tauso, whereas ironing a shirt takes on average of 7 - 10 minutes. That's a reduction in effort of around 80%. No need for an ironing board, no need to wait for the iron to heat up, just hang your shirt and spray.
 

No heat, no electricity necessary!

Special Early Bird Discounts Currently Available - Just $55 AUD / £30 / $39 USD with Free Delivery for a Tauso!

 

The Impact

Your contribution however big or small will go towards the making of this amazing product. This product is step away from the electrical grid and a step forward into the sustainable world. Tauso is a brand you can trust.

Tauso doesn't use electricity and is to be manufactured from completely recycled materials. We are looking into supply chains, dealing directly with recycling plants so that we can trust where the recycled materials come from.

We are striving to make sure that the manufacturing process is as sustainable as possible, from start to finish. As product designers of today, we at Tauso strongly believe that we have a great responsibility to the world of tomorrow. That's why Tauso will be made in the most sustainable way possible, as we collectively try and push the world onto a better path.

Chuck Tauso in your Luggage

Tauso is collapsible, thus allowing you to chuck it in your luggage for when you go away. You really never know whether there's going to be an iron at your destination whether it be a hostel, hotel, campsite or a friend's house. Even if there is an iron where you're going, do you really want to cause any hassle by going into a random  utility to use their dodgy old ironing board and iron!? Maybe it’s easier to take Tauso.  

 

Straight shirts on the move.

We all know, shirts get wrinkled when we're on the move. We either have to stuff them in a bag or hope there's an iron where we're going. Not anymore!

 

How does it work?

The process is super simple and so much quicker than ironing. Hang your shirt on Tauso, pull it taut and spray any tough creases away.

Tauso's patent pending hardware harnesses the power of tension pulled throughout the shirt, and the flowing power of H20, to release wrinkles without any need for heat or electrical power.

 

Testimonials and Reviews...

 

Tauso is prototyped, tested and manufacturing is ready to go. All we need are your orders!

Tauso is for men's and women's shirts.

The Perks - What you can get:

As detailed in the perks page ahead, we will be offering:

1) Tauso hanger which comes with a Tauso branded spray bottle as standard:

Options: Male or Female

  • XS
  • Regular (S, M, L)
  • XL

 

2) Tauso & a branded garment carrier for all those moments you need straight shirts while on the move.

Options: Male or Female

  • XS
  • Regular (S, M, L)
  • XL

 

3) Tauso Bundle: 3 x Tauso Hangers, 1 x Tauso Spray Bottle and 1 x Tauso Garment Carrier.

Options: Male or Female

  • XS
  • Regular (S, M, L)
  • XL

 

Get your perks now to get our early bird discount prices.

All we need is 1,000 Tausos sold to get this product off the ground! 

 

Risks & Challenges

Tauso's design has been evolving and developing over the last 5 years through around 40 different prototypes to increase practicality and sustainability. The product is now at it's optimal design but we won't stop there! We will keep revising and improving our design. 

The broad shape and composition of the product will stay the same, however, minor aesthetic features and minor components may change. These changes will be for the better of the product either through increased sustainability or practicality.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • You can get the word out there!
    Please share this page with your friends. We all know someone who could do with an easier way to de-wrinkle their shirts!

story:
Too hot? Too cold? Why can’t it be just right? We designed iTemp to conform with your exact preference. Through our dedicated app, you get personalized temperature control. Whether you want to heat up, cool down, or maintain temperature, you’ll have everything under control.

 

 

iTemp can let you quickly set a specific temperature that you want your coffee or drinks to remain at and stay there constantly.

 

 

What about the trustworthy thermos you say? While, we are certain your thermos can’t do the followings. Heating, setting timer, detecting weight, or maintaining heat for ensuring every sip will be the same temperature as the last.

 

 

Don’t want to line up in the office pantry for the microwave? Craving for a cup of warm milk or ramen but you’re just too lazy to heat it? With iTemp heating solution, you have the ability to heat up your drink and food anytime, anywhere. No longer will you be bound by the limitations of a thermos.

 

 

 

From temperature control, heating timer to hydration tracking, our companion app does it all without breaking a sweat.

 

 

Want to make sure every sip of coffee tastes like it’s straight out of a coffee shop? Simply place it on the coaster and the built-in temperature sensor will measure the heat and keep it constantly warm.

 

 

iTemp app allows you to preset a temperature of your preference. Simply double tap the coaster, it’ll start heating up until it reaches your setting. No more fumbling with the app.

 

 

You can program iTemp to start heating at any time. Select your content, time and temperature, and enjoy the warmest food right through our app.

 

 

Built-in weight sensor detects how much volume of water is consumed. A weekly chart breaks down your water consumption and average drinking temperature. You’ll be able to monitor your hydration level at all times.

 

 

We also designed a smart bowl, with the exact same material, same component, same functionality, except it’s bigger. Enjoy food from soup, ramen, to your mama’s secret stew recipe in our modern looking bowl.

 

 

 

To minimize the trouble of bringing multiple pieces of accessories, we made both the smart bowl and smart mug sharing the same heating mechanism and dimensions, allowing the heating coaster to be used interchangeably.

 

 

iTemp smart bowl can be used as a miniature heating pot to serve your sudden cravings.

 

  • Boil-dry Protection

 

iTemp automatically switches off when there’s no water in the mug. This is made possible with the built-in weight sensor. If the mug wasn't removed for 2 hours, the automatic power-off system will turn on. When the mug is removed from the coaster, power will also be shut off completely to ensure safety.

 

  • Smart LED Indicator

 

The low-key embedded LED light shows different status of your liquid content.You’ll know when your drink is done heating with a quick glance.

 

  •  Bluetooth 4.2 Connectivity  

 

Up to 10m (33ft) range, compatible with iOS & Android.

 

The concept of iTemp was initiated based on our own desire. We wanted to keep coffee and hot beverages at the favorable temperature we like constantly, however, we'd never found any existing product that can fully meet our needs. Therefore, we started brainstorming and conceived the ideas from market research, to technical evaluation, to material sourcing, to iterative design and redesign of every details of the product. After executing lots of tests and several prototypes over more than one year, we're now ready to take our integral design and prototype to the production, and we aim to bring people the best way to enjoy drinks and food at all times.

 

 

Proof of Concept - How It Works

Here we share a time-lapse video that shows our current prototype's functionality of heating up the water from 37 ℃ to 54 ℃ in a few minutes.

 

 

 

 

 

The BlueBeard Studio focuses on the development of a variety of next-generation IoT products and solutions. With the main concept of professionalism and innovation, we are committed to creating the brand-new and exquisite experiences for improving our lives. Each product is made with our enthusiasm and faith, hoping to fully demonstrate the core of the craft.

 What about the trustworthy thermos you say? While, we are certain your thermos can’t do the followings. Heating, setting timer, detecting weight, or maintaining heat for ensuring every sip will be the same temperature as the last. 
 

  Don’t want to line up in the office pantry for the microwave? Craving for a cup of warm milk or ramen but you’re just too lazy to heat it? With iTemp heating solution, you have the ability to heat up your drink and food anytime, anywhere. No longer will you be bound by the limitations of a thermos.  
We made it super intuitive for users to enjoy a cup of warm coffee. Our solution provides a constant heat source, keeping the content warm as long as it's connected to the power. It also comes with a few tricks up its sleeve that will be described later.  From temperature control, heating timer to hydration tracking, our companion app does it all without breaking a sweat.  Want to make sure every sip of coffee tastes like it’s straight out of a coffee shop? Simply place it on the coaster and the built-in temperature sensor will measure the heat and keep it constantly warm.  iTemp app allows you to preset a temperature of your preference. Simply double tap the coaster, it’ll start heating up until it reaches your setting. No more fumbling with the app. 
  You can program iTemp to start heating at any time. Select your content, time and temperature, and enjoy the warmest food right through our app. 
  Built-in weight sensor detects how much volume of water is consumed. A weekly chart breaks down your water consumption and average drinking temperature. You’ll be able to monitor your hydration level at all times. 
  We also designed a smart bowl, with the exact same material, same component, same functionality, except it’s bigger. Enjoy food from soup, ramen, to your mama’s secret stew recipe in our modern looking bowl.   To minimize the trouble of bringing multiple pieces of accessories, we made both the smart bowl and smart mug sharing the same heating mechanism and dimensions, allowing the heating coaster to be used interchangeably.  iTemp smart bowl can be used as a miniature heating pot to serve your sudden cravings. 
 
 Boil-dry Protection iTemp automatically switches off when there’s no water in the mug. This is made possible with the built-in weight sensor. If the mug wasn't removed for 2 hours, the automatic power-off system will turn on. When the mug is removed from the coaster, power will also be shut off completely to ensure safety. Smart LED Indicator The low-key embedded LED light shows different status of your liquid content.You’ll know when your drink is done heating with a quick glance.  Bluetooth 4.2 Connectivity   Up to 10m (33ft) range, compatible with iOS & Android. 
 
 

  

 

 
 The concept of iTemp was initiated based on our own desire. We wanted to keep coffee and hot beverages at the favorable temperature we like constantly, however, we'd never found any existing product that can fully meet our needs. Therefore, we started brainstorming and conceived the ideas from market research, to technical evaluation, to material sourcing, to iterative design and redesign of every details of the product. After executing lots of tests and several prototypes over more than one year, we're now ready to take our integral design and prototype to the production, and we aim to bring people the best way to enjoy drinks and food at all times.  Proof of Concept - How It WorksHere we share a time-lapse video that shows our current prototype's functionality of heating up the water from 37 ℃ to 54 ℃ in a few minutes. 

 
       The BlueBeard Studio focuses on the development of a variety of next-generation IoT products and solutions. With the main concept of professionalism and innovation, we are committed to creating the brand-new and exquisite experiences for improving our lives. Each product is made with our enthusiasm and faith, hoping to fully demonstrate the core of the craft.

story:
Short Summary

During Pride this year, my wonderful boyfriend, Evan Ogden won an HP tablet. It wasn't terribly fancy, but it was just what he really needed to use for a lot of what he does in terms of designing cool stuff and just playing games. 

Unfortunately, last month we let this long-haired blonde asshole from Portland named Matthew Wolton live in our basement for a couple weeks. He was supposed to give us rent, but never did. Instead, two days after Evan's birthday party, he stole food from us, a gallon of bleach (?!) and of all things, Evan's tablet. 

Although it's only a $200 tablet, we cannot afford to replace it right now as there's been a change in Evan's work and my job situation hasn't picked up.  So I'm selling either my comic books or original art that i will create for you specifically to try and get him a new tablet. 


What We Need & What You Get

I'm not asking for much, and i'm NOT asking for handouts. I am offering either comic books that I've created and are in stores now in Albuquerque, Dallas and Los Angeles, or brand-new created just for you art work! My strength is in character drawings, so that's what I'm offering. 

Need a picture of you and your dogs? I can draw it.

Want a cool comic book character drawn by a comic book artist to put on your wall? I can draw it. 

Do you like some of the other drawings I've done for Inktober? Most are available!

Have you missed one of the EIGHT books I have in stores? I can sell them to you direct!

Want them signed by the artist? That's me, so I can do it!


    The Impact

    I love Evan and I really want to replace his tablet. It's not much, but any help anyone wants to give would be greatly appreciated. I don't even need much. The campaign has a minimum of 500$, but I really only need about 250$, so unless there's some crazy demand for my art, I will close the campaign once i reach the 250$ mark 


      Risks & Challenges

      There are no risks. You are helping me get my baby a new tablet and you are getting artwork. It's win-win, baby!


        Other Ways You Can Help

        If you cannot buy online, meet up with me, or simply buy my book in stores. It's in every comic store in Albuquerque, "The Comic Book Store" in Dallas and "Comic Book Hideout" In Los Angeles.

story:
Hi Indiegogo!


We are 32 Square- a design and fabrication shop based out of Brooklyn, NY. We want to build you some dinosaurs!

Let's get to know each other. 32 Square = 32 square feet = 1 standard sheet of 4’ x 8’ material. We design custom furniture, props, and installations for the arts and entertainment industry using the idea of maximum production with minimum waste as a guiding aesthetic. From modular objects to custom décor built from repurposed offcuts, we are design one sheet at a time. You can see completed projects by our fabrication shop here.

Our newest project: Our designers and crew grew up with hands-on toys. From erector sets to capsella to LEGO, all of our favorite things involved the joy of putting something together. We have been developing a series of designs based on the punch-out balsa wood dinosaur puzzles we had as kids, but updated with bright and exciting materials, intuitive assembly, and a massive increase in scale. The balsa puzzles were a joy to put together, but the final product was always a bit of a letdown- we want to make design objects that are as sturdy and visually interesting as the dinosaurs that inspire them. 

We call these our Boneyard Pets

We just completed a successful Kickstarter campaign (over 500% funded!) and have used our first crowdfunding adventure to give our Boneyard Pets a facelift. We are proud to bring you new dinosaurs, more environmentally friendly material, and streamlined production. We thought we would give everyone who missed our first campaign a chance to own their very own dinosaur!

Pledge Perks!

Right now we have 5 Boneyard Pets ready for production, offered in 2 material choices with 4 colors and 2 sizes per material, for a total of 80 possible combinations!

Materials and colors:

Each dinosaur comes in the color of your choice and can be made of 1/8" acrylic, 1/4" acrylic, 1/4" laminated birch, or 3/8" laminated birch. 

Check out some of the possibilities!


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Want to pick up multiple pets? Or all of them? Great! We will be offering discounted pricing on orders of three or more Boneyard Pets. 
(note: multipack pricing is based on non-earlybird Boneyard Pet Prices.

*All Multipack purchases include a free T Shirt in your size-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
For smaller prizes, we are pleased to be able to offer several unique art objects created by Brooklyn artist Jonathan Purtill using the design files and material offcuts from our Boneyard Pets. 

A $5 pledge will get you a postcard. We will send you a high quality 5" x 7" print inspired by the CNC files we use to make our dinosaurs.

                                      

A $25 pledge will get you a 32 Square dinosaur bone t shirt based on our design files, available in adult and children's sizes. 

                              

A $50 pledge will get you a hand made LED lightbox built using the birch and acrylic offcuts that accumulate from our Boneyard Pets. We love to recycle at 32 Square, especially when we can make something fun out of our bits and pieces. Since these will be made using scraps, no two will be alike!

                         


We look forward to building you a dinosaur! Please stay tuned for updates, stretch goals, and new rewards!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Production timeline:

September: preproduction, supplies ordered, labor booked

October: production- beginning with the smallest acrylics and ending with largest birch, the Boneyard Pets will hit the CNC machine

November: packing and shipping. Boneyard Pets are released into the wild!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Risks and Challenges:

The transition from production prototype to mass market product is always a challenge. We have worked hard to ensure that the process will go as smoothly as possible.

All of the cutting, assembly, packaging, and shipping associated with this project will be handled onsite using our own equipment and labor. We have attempted to consolidate the supply chain as much as we can.

Our raw material (acrylic, lumber, and shipping boxes) all come from local vendors. We have had no trouble with inventory availability, but we have sourced several other vendors close to NYC should the unexpected happen.

story:
THANK YOU all sooooooo VERY much!!!  Our Indiegogo campaign is fully funded - and in less than 48 hours!!!  WOW!!!!  Now ... please let everyone know to stop contributing!!  <grin>  How often do you hear that?!  Transparency is critical in a situation like this.  We have what we asked for, and are extremely grateful.  Now - stop sending money.  Watch our videos and our Friends of Rupert Show - pass those links around everywhere.  Or donate one of our books to your local library.  Thank you!  Thank you!  Thank you!!!

 

Summary

I am the author of a growing series of children’s books published by Schiffer Publishing, Ltd. entitled “Rupert’s Tales,” a regular contributor to “Pooka Pages,” an online magazine published eight times annually, I perform “Rupert’s Tales and Tunes” at a wide variety of Pagan festivals, activities and events, and I produce the web-based TV program, “Friends of Rupert Show” through the Illuminati Network which focuses on teaching children Pagan traditions and practices through stories, songs, humor, demonstrations, and short films.

Our Friends of Rupert team has been an official Adopt-A-Road crew, helping to care for Mother Earth, for three years.  And our Hands of the Goddess team helps to support a local women’s’ homeless shelter, along with a wide variety of others who require assistance when they encounter a crisis in their lives.

Since the end of December, we have experienced a series of escalating incidents at our home, which we have affectionately dubbed “The Glitter Dome,” culminating in the use of firearms shot into our occupied home, and acid bombs thrown in our yard, narrowly missing our grown daughter.  She received treatment for chemical inhalation as a result .

Because the investigation of the incidents mentioned is on-going, we cannot share all the specifics with you at this time.  What we can tell you is that, because of the language used during some of the incidents, there is absolutely no doubt whatsoever that these crimes have been perpertrated against us because of the fact that we are Witches and Pagans.

Lady Liberty League,  the religious freedom and civil rights organization sponsored by Circle Sanctuary, an international Wiccan church and Pagan resource center headquartered in Wisconsin which provides information and networking assistance to individuals and organizations with religious freedom issues pertaining to Wiccan ways, Paganism, and other forms of Nature religions has provided a variety of resources to my husband, Randy, and me during this time.  They also provided a comprehensive on-site Threat Assessment Report of our home in an effort to de-escalate the situation and provide long-term safety for our family.

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking assistance to comply with the security measures recommended by Lady Liberty League.  The bulk of the funding received will be to purchase the security cameras necessary to provide surveillence of our unique, colorful home.  The cameras would provide visible deterents to those who would seek to further harass and intimidate us, as well as a means to secure evidence should additional incidents occur.

I am unable to share specific details of the additional security measures recommended by Lady Liberty League in order to maximize the effectiveness of those measures.  You may be assured, however, that full transparency will be shared with the appropriate staff of the Lady Liberty League organization.

What we offer in return for your donation is the opportunity to get your very own Rupert  swag!  Usually, these items are only available at a “Rupert’s Tales and Tunes” performance, as they are specifically created just for these events.

The Impact

If we are successful in funding this campaign, you will be helping our family to continue to move forward with confidence and safety so that additional Rupert’s Tales stories, songs and episodes can be created in an environment filled with peace, friendship, and lots of reasons to giggle!

You will also be helping to send a resounding message of unity and support so others of Nature-based faiths will understand that none of us is alone.

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you are able to contribute or not, please share this campaign with others far and wide.  Not so much, perhaps, as a way to ask for donations, but as way to spread the awareness that we are here and we taking care of each other, no matter which path we may walk; no matter which deity/deities we may serve.

And, while you’re at it, watch, “Like” and share our videos on our Friends of Rupert channel here:  www.youtube.com/friendsofrupert

And join us for the Friends of Rupert Show here:  http://theilluminatinetwork.com/friends-of-rupert/

For more information on the events leading up to this campaign, please follow these links:

http://wildhunt.org/2013/03/shots-fired-at-florida-pagan-authors-home.html

http://newportrichey.patch.com/articles/inidents-at-pagan-author-s-home-raise-concerns#photo-14073165

story:
As featured on:

   

 

The Solar Army is recruiting.

Our Solar Army will change lives. Drop by drop, step by step, just like each soldier - from the privates to the general - helps win a battle, we will change the face of rural India.

This village in India has been living in the dark, for 25 years. A generation, remote and forgotten, has lived without access to electricity. We plan to change that. We’re bringing POWER to them. To empower a change. To bring them back from the past. And we need your support.

 

Mission Gulabganj

Gulabganj is a remote village in Uttar Pradesh, India's most populous state. The state has a huge number of rural households, and is one of the least electrified states in India, with less than 25% households having access to electricity. 

 

 

Gulabganj has had no access to electricity for 25 years. With promises made and broken, the villagers have lost all hope. 

This is until the Solar Army arrived with its incredible Solar technology. 

Our Solar Army is going to rescue pockets of forgotten villages with each mission. And our NEXT MISSION is in Gulabganj. 

Who Are WE?

Solar Soldiers consists of an army of individuals like YOU, who yearn to change the world for the better. 

Contribute to the Solar Army:

- The Soldiers' contributions will be used to build a Solar mini-grid in the villages
- A mini-grid will be self-sustaining and will meet local power needs of households, schools, government center and farms
- You choose your contribution from a list of options
- You earn a rank on the basis of the impact you deliver
- With each rank, you get rewarded with exciting perks!
- Additionally, we will give some very cool rewards to the BEST soldiers, irrespective of rank!

Powered by Sunkalp Energy, the Solar Soldiers will deploy solar technology to bring solutions to the rural POWERLESS. With this mission, we are building a solar mini-grid to power the lives of around 200 villagers without access to electricity.

Let's march, Soldiers!

 

Phased Execution:

What Villagers Say

Life without Electricity

Villagers' Agreement

The Solar Soldiers have already been given a go-ahead by the villagers, who have signed their consent to the installation of the solar grid.

 

The Impact

Rural Electrification

What's the impact, you ask? Well, there are more impacts than you can imagine.

  • Fertility rate reduction: Electrification has proved to reduce fertility rates and improve women health across all developing nations. Here's a look at the Indian states with respect to electrification. Uttar Pradesh has one of the lowest electrification at 25% electrified households. It also has one of the highest fertility rates in the country.

 

 

  • Education: School dropouts are reduced as children get more hours of study and have been observed to perform better in electrified households.
    Locked classrooms on a school day, due to low attendance

  • Eradication of Poverty: There has been a significant increase in people’s earnings after electrification in most developing countries, with an India-focused study quoting increase in household per capita income by nearly 38.6 percent over time. It also measured a decrease in the poverty rate by 13.3 percent.
  • Women Empowerment: There is statistical evidence that the introduction of television in rural households has positive outcomes for women empowerment - with reduction in fertility, increase in autonomy, changing attitudes towards domestic violence and decrease in preference for a male child
  • Time Savings: There is reduction of time spent on fuelwood collection, encouraging pursuit of other activities.
  • Reduction of crime rate due to better lighting and accessibility

Economic Impact

  • Monetary Savings: Substituting electric lighting for kerosene lamps has a quantifiable health benefit of $2.50 per household, adding up lost work days and mortality due to respiratory sickness, according to a World Bank report.

  • Increasing productivity: Villagers can work till late evenings due to availability of light. It can lead to an estimated increase of employment hours by 17% for men
  • New Sources of Livelihood
  • Promotion of Rural Entrepreneurship

 

Post-Campaign

  • We will be introducing higher load capacities to run Chakki (for grinding wheat in mills) and Pumps (for irrigation purposes).

  • Also, with capacity expansion, we will provide television connections to households.

  • We roll out introduction of appliances for cold storage (for vaccines and medicinal purposes) and water purification, etc.
  • Roll out mini grid in other villages

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can’t contribute, it doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Facebook - Spread the word! We are on Facebook too! Catch us on http://www.facebook.com/SolarSoldiers
  • Twitter - Tweet about us! Tell your friends how awesome we are and share your Soldier status with PRIDE! We are http://www.twitter.com/SolarSoldiers
  • We're on Quora! - Yes! Do you love Quora? So do we! We're maintaining a BLOG on Quora, https://www.quora.com/Aakriti-Gupta-3/The-Solar-Soldiers-Blog
  • Thunderclap It -We're on Thunderclap and are looking for Twitter support! Sign up! Here's a link: https://www.thunderclap.it/projects/2359-solar-soldiers-re-mission
  • SHARE THE CAMPAIGN AMONGST YOUR NETWORK AND BE A TRUE SOLAR SOLDIER.

Yes, that’s all there is to it. Contact us with queries at @SolarSoldiers.

Team for this campaign:

Kanika Khanna:

  • Founder, Sunkalp Energy
  • Previous Experience at Cummins Inc.
  • MS, Massachusetts Institute of Technology
  • BE, Delhi College of Engineering

Ravi Kiran:

  • MBA: Great Lakes Institute of Energy Management
  • BE, Vellore Institute of Technology University

Aakriti Gupta:

  • Previous Experience at McKinsey & Company
  • MBA Candidate, IIM Calcutta

Thanikachalam MC

  • Previous Experience at Exide Batteries
  • B.Tech, Central Electrochemical Research Institute

Shalabh Srivastava

  • MBA, Great Lakes Institute of Technology
  • B.Tech, MPCT

This village in India has been living in the dark, for 25 years. A generation, remote and forgotten, has lived without access to electricity. We plan to change that. We’re bringing POWER to them. To empower a change. To bring them back from the past. And we need your support.

 
Mission Gulabganj
Gulabganj is a remote village in Uttar Pradesh, India's most populous state. The state has a huge number of rural households, and is one of the least electrified states in India, with less than 25% households having access to electricity. 
 

 
Gulabganj has had no access to electricity for 25 years. With promises made and broken, the villagers have lost all hope. 
This is until the Solar Army arrived with its incredible Solar technology. 
Our Solar Army is going to rescue pockets of forgotten villages with each mission. And our NEXT MISSION is in Gulabganj. 
Who Are WE?
Solar Soldiers consists of an army of individuals like YOU, who yearn to change the world for the better. Contribute to the Solar Army:
- The Soldiers' contributions will be used to build a Solar mini-grid in the villages- A mini-grid will be self-sustaining and will meet local power needs of households, schools, government center and farms- You choose your contribution from a list of options- You earn a rank on the basis of the impact you deliver- With each rank, you get rewarded with exciting perks!- Additionally, we will give some very cool rewards to the BEST soldiers, irrespective of rank!Powered by Sunkalp Energy, the Solar Soldiers will deploy solar technology to bring solutions to the rural POWERLESS. With this mission, we are building a solar mini-grid to power the lives of around 200 villagers without access to electricity.Let's march, Soldiers!
 

Phased Execution:

What Villagers Say
Life without Electricity

Villagers' Agreement
The Solar Soldiers have already been given a go-ahead by the villagers, who have signed their consent to the installation of the solar grid.

 

The Impact
Rural Electrification
What's the impact, you ask? Well, there are more impacts than you can imagine.


Fertility rate reduction: Electrification has proved to reduce fertility rates and improve women health across all developing nations. Here's a look at the Indian states with respect to electrification. Uttar Pradesh has one of the lowest electrification at 25% electrified households. It also has one of the highest fertility rates in the country.


 
 


Education: School dropouts are reduced as children get more hours of study and have been observed to perform better in electrified households.


Locked classrooms on a school day, due to low attendance


Eradication of Poverty: There has been a significant increase in people’s earnings after electrification in most developing countries, with an India-focused study quoting increase in household per capita income by nearly 38.6 percent over time. It also measured a decrease in the poverty rate by 13.3 percent.

Women Empowerment: There is statistical evidence that the introduction of television in rural households has positive outcomes for women empowerment - with reduction in fertility, increase in autonomy, changing attitudes towards domestic violence and decrease in preference for a male child

Time Savings: There is reduction of time spent on fuelwood collection, encouraging pursuit of other activities.

Reduction of crime rate due to better lighting and accessibility

Economic Impact




Monetary Savings: Substituting electric lighting for kerosene lamps has a quantifiable health benefit of $2.50 per household, adding up lost work days and mortality due to respiratory sickness, according to a World Bank report.


Increasing productivity: Villagers can work till late evenings due to availability of light. It can lead to an estimated increase of employment hours by 17% for men
New Sources of Livelihood
Promotion of Rural Entrepreneurship

 
Post-Campaign

We will be introducing higher load capacities to run Chakki (for grinding wheat in mills) and Pumps (for irrigation purposes).

Also, with capacity expansion, we will provide television connections to households.

We roll out introduction of appliances for cold storage (for vaccines and medicinal purposes) and water purification, etc.


Roll out mini grid in other villages

Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you can’t contribute, it doesn’t mean you can’t help:


Facebook - Spread the word! We are on Facebook too! Catch us on http://www.facebook.com/SolarSoldiers


Twitter - Tweet about us! Tell your friends how awesome we are and share your Soldier status with PRIDE! We are http://www.twitter.com/SolarSoldiers

We're on Quora! - Yes! Do you love Quora? So do we! We're maintaining a BLOG on Quora, https://www.quora.com/Aakriti-Gupta-3/The-Solar-Soldiers-Blog


Thunderclap It -We're on Thunderclap and are looking for Twitter support! Sign up! Here's a link: https://www.thunderclap.it/projects/2359-solar-soldiers-re-mission

SHARE THE CAMPAIGN AMONGST YOUR NETWORK AND BE A TRUE SOLAR SOLDIER.


Yes, that’s all there is to it. Contact us with queries at @SolarSoldiers.
Team for this campaign:
Kanika Khanna: 

Founder, Sunkalp Energy

Previous Experience at Cummins Inc.

MS, Massachusetts Institute of Technology

BE, Delhi College of Engineering

Ravi Kiran:

MBA: Great Lakes Institute of Energy Management

BE, Vellore Institute of Technology University

Aakriti Gupta:

Previous Experience at McKinsey & Company

MBA Candidate, IIM Calcutta

Thanikachalam MC

Previous Experience at Exide Batteries

B.Tech, Central Electrochemical Research Institute

Shalabh Srivastava

MBA, Great Lakes Institute of Technology

B.Tech, MPCT

story:
The video above was shown at ReFrame Film Festival to advertise last January's Community Forum.

Peterborough Greenspace Coalition, who brought you Parks not Parkways, is back.  Continuing our goal for a greener more sustainable Peterborough we are launching our new campaign Smart Growth Ptbo: Change the Balance.

“Smart Growth is an urban planning and transportation practice that concentrates growth in compact walkable urban centers to avoid sprawl. It also advocates compact, transit-oriented, walkable, bicycle-friendly land use, including neighborhood schools, complete streets, and mixed-use development with a range of housing choices.” (Wikipedia)

Peterborough is at a crossroads - if it continues on the path set out by the majority of the current City Council it will become yet another urban sprawl centre of endless suburbs and box stores, ruled by the influence of developers (most of whom are NOT based in Peterborough). As the costs of fossil fuel fuels continue to climb, and climate change worsens, suburbia and the dispersed city will no longer be sustainable.  The costs of maintaining the vast increases in infrastructure necessary for such a car centered culture is already driving up taxes across North America and forcing many cities into massive deficits.
 
PGC has a different vision, of a greener, more sustainable future for our City. One with a revitalized vibrant downtown, greater incentives for inner city redevelopment, and walkable mixed zoned neighborhoods where you don’t need to drive to get the necessities of life.
 
If you donate to this Campaign you will be helping to make Smart Growth and Sustainability a priority for our City, including:
 
o  Promotional efforts to encourage municipal candidates and voters in the current Municipal Election to support Smart Growth and a Sustainable future for Peterborough.
 
o  Continuing to fight a $100 million Parkway through the centre of Peterborough’s heritage Jackson Park and pave over the beautiful Parkway Greenspace and Trail. The Ministry of the Environment is yet to rule on the more than 80 appeals for a more complete Environmental Assessment, including revisiting alternatives.

A $37 Million four-lane bridge would cut through our scenic Jackson Park not far from this entrance and would be visible above the treeline at the back of this photo
photo courtesy of Christy Donnelly

One of the majestic old growth pines which stands in the path of the Parkway's bridge through the wilderness of Jackson Park.

o  Fighting continued single zoned urban sprawl subdivisions in favour of redeveloping the city core.  Especially massive developments like Lily Lake, which would place 8,000 people on the lip of Jackson Park. Due to concerns about the impacts on the natural environment, capital and infrastructure expenses, and long-term sustainability of Peterborough, this proposal has been appealed to the Ontario Municipal Board.

The farm on the left is part of the 500 acres which will be the site of Lily Lake Development. It will abut a Provincially Significant Wetland containing Lily Lake to the right side of the photo.

photo courtesy of Wayne Eardley

The full site of the proposed development is all the farmland to the right of the road. Jackson Creek Trail is in the thin line of trees at the edge of the fields and the Provincially Significant Wetland containing Lily Lake is at bottom right.
photo courtesy of Wayne Eardley
                                    
                                         Please Help us in our Cause

Peterborough Greenspace Coalition is an all volunteer, community, non profit organization and although we have a number of people with various expertise on the environment etc., we are in need of hiring the occasional expert in the field of urban planning and traffic engineering to support our arguments to the Provincial and Municipal governments.  This can be very expensive.

We also are planning another advertising campaign to promote the importance of Smart Growth and Sustainability for our City during the current Municipal Election.  We would like to make it clear that this fundraising campaign is not raising funds directly for individual candidates, nor will the PGC be donating funds directly to any candidates. We will, however, be endorsing candidates with a more sustainable view for Peterborough and we encourage you to support the candidates of your choice with such a sustainable vision.
 
We rely on the generosity of those of like mind in our community to help fund our goals.  Won’t you join us and help Change the Balance!



For more information on our organization and our campaign to elect a more sustainably minded City Council visit our website at:
                                    http://parksnotparkways.ca/


Our $100 Perk

           Our Famous Halloween Ad Print

story:
The Eden Suction Planter is a plant pot that can be attached to any smooth flat surface.  The hidden Oki-Lock suction system holds securely to windows, mirrors, smooth tiles and even the fridge. 

No Glue. No Screws. No Mess!
Space saving and easy to use. There's no need to drill or glue so you can begin to green your home straight away. 



Eden Suction Planter

With the Eden Suction Planter's unique design your plants will have the light, water and space they need to thrive! 
The Eden Suction Planter consists of 3 main parts that slot together seamlessly.
  • The Oki-Lock suction system attaches quickly and securely to any smooth flat surface.
  • The removable inner pot allows for easy planting with a hidden built in reservoir for easy watering.
  • The outer pot's elegant profile fits cleanly and seamlessly against your window or surface


Oki-Lock system - A suction system that works 

Let's be frank. There are many suctions systems on the market that simply do not work. So we made it our mission to design a system that not only looked good but did what it should!

The Oki-Lock is a patented suction system that has been independently tested to hold strong and fast to any smooth flat, shiny surface.

Clean, simple and secure. A superior suction system that works!



Like all great ideas, it started at the kitchen sink...

We love to have plants in our home but like many people, finding enough space and light to grow them can be challenging. 
The herbs growing in our kitchen were constantly being knocked over or moved from space to space to make room for our busy lifestyle.

As we did the washing up and argued over who knocked over the basil plant again it struck us. The ideal place to grow our plants would be on the window!
And so the seed was planted and out of that grew the Eden planter and Oki-Lock system.

Attached to the window our plants now have all the space and light they need to thrive. And we have more space! In fact by moving all our houseplants onto our windows, tiles and the fridge we have freed up a lot more space!



Support our campaign!

The recommended retail price will be USD 21.99 so by pre-ordering your Eden Suction planter now you will receive an amazing deal as a big THANK YOU for your early support!

Pre-ordering couldn't be easier!

  1. Decide which "perk" you like then click  on it. You'll find these at the top right side of this page
  2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.
  3. At the end of the campaign in March we will contact you to confirm your shipping details.
  4. We will prepare your shipment once the stock arrives from our manufacturer and send it to you without delay!
  5. You will receive a message from us letting you know that your order is on it's way.
  6. Receive your order and enjoy growing your own plants straight away!

Perfect for your kitchen, bathroom, living room and office

Happy Plants. Happy you!

Yes it's true! Introducing plants to our living and work spaces improves our health, and makes us happy. Studies also show that plants can clean and filter the air by ridding your home of VOC's and other nasties.

With the Eden Suction Planter you can quickly and easily grow plants in your home. Grow a herb garden in your kitchen, flowers in your living room or ferns in your bathroom.


The Oki-Lock suction system gives you the flexibility to grow your plants in the brightest position in your home. Space saving and easy to use, there's no need to drill or glue so you can begin to green your space straight away. 


During our 15 years in the business of designing and sourcing we have helped many brands bring their own designs to market; identifying the best manufacturing partners for each product, managing the quality, logistics and delivery timelines.

And now we are ready to bring our own design to market. We have notebooks filled with future applications for our system and we can;t wait to get started! 

We hope you will support us to launch our dream of bringing the Eden Suction Planter and Oki-Lock system to you!

What we have achieved so far

We have designed and redesigned. We have researched. We have developed and we have tested.  We have identified our manufacturers, the production moulds are almost ready and we have earmarked the best manufacturing window.
We are now ready to press "GO". But we need your help. 
To take the final step we need your support. By meeting 100% of our goal we will be able to start the first production run and bring the Eden Suction Planter to you!

Our goal

*update
We've reached our goal! Thank you all! We are proud to say that manufacturing has begun.  
We have now added stretch goals so please help us keep the momentum going!

Stretch goal

Stretch goal 1: Help us hit $4,500 so we can start sampling up our new charcoal colored Eden Suction Planter!

Stretch goal 2: Help us hit $5,500 to begin development on the double planter!

Our timeline

Our planned timeline is outlined below. With your help we hope to be able to get the Eden planter off the production line and into your hands by the end of March 2016.


Risks & Challenges

Our combined years of experience in the industry have made us well aware of the challenges of production time lines and the problems that can arise.

In our new roles as both the designers and the production managers on this personal project, our challenge is to ensure that our exacting quality standards are met without any major impact to the delivery schedule.

We are confident that our solid relationship with our suppliers and producers will ensure that we can meet our scheduled delivery times.

Despite our confidence we also recognise that not all things are predictable or foreseeable. At Okidome we believe that communication is key and we pledge to our supporters that we will keep you up to date on any changes to our planned shipping schedule and answer any of your questions as best we can.

Other Ways You Can Help

Money is not the only way to support our campaign! If you like what you see please help us spread the word. Please share our campaign and product freely with your friends and family! 

#edensuctionplanter #okidome #gardening  #plants #indoorplants #grow #herbs #cleanair  #urbangardening #apartmentliving #containergardening

story:
NOW AVAILABLE on our website:

www.bromanshaving.com

----------------------------------------------------

Introducing the Broman razor


As featured in the Digital journal.

The Broman razor & stand complete with 60 superior, Swedish steel, single edge blades

no subscriptions. no clogging. no nonsense. 

The Broman razor, is shaving redesigned. Millions of men suffer daily from shaving irritation due to a bad razor. Expensive replacement cartridges & shaving subscriptions also ruin the shaving experience. The Broman razor is an innovative, easy to use razor with a unique pivoting and flip open head that is patent pending, preventing razor burn and giving everyone the smoothest shave. 

Are you tired of bad shaves, expensive cartridge razor subscriptions, razor burn and ingrown hairs? 

Mastering the art of shaving is no walk in the park. The razor is one of mans most trusted tools  that has evolved over a century. So how is it that many of us today are faced with a poor shaving experience from substandard, over engineered shaving products? A few years ago, we became so frustrated with our shaving experience, we decided to do something about it, because everyone deserves a better shaving experience. 
 

A unique shaving set that saves you time & money

 

The Broman razor comes complete with stand, 60 Swedish steel blades, FREE travel pouch all packaged in a 100% recyclable card box
 

We recruited the opinions of expert barbers and shaving enthusiasts who consistently highlighted that a traditional wet shave using a safety or straight razor was the best shave a man can get - and not a cartridge razor with a million blades designed by a rocket scientist. The Broman razor incorporates the features of a safety razor and combines it with a modern twist, giving you the smoothest shave. 

Precision die cast in zinc alloy with a satin chrome finish, the Broman razor is a real heavyweight in design build and quality.

 

What's everyone saying about us?

We've already received thousands of comments and feedback on social media from the public & shaving experts on the Broman razor. Here are a few...

What are the press saying?

Founder & Design engineer of the Broman razor, is Dan Skinner. From children's products for LEGO and Disney, watches for Swiss watch brands to Christmas decorations for Buckingham Palace, Dan has always enjoyed designing and making beautiful, exceptional quality products. But it was his own frustrations with his shaving experience which forced him to take action and develop a new type of razor - one that gives a better shaving experience that anyone can use at a reasonable price. Here's Dan sharing insight into the idea behind Broman: 

See for yourself how the Broman razor is different from the rest, an innovative, easy to use razor with a unique pivoting and flip open head that prevents razor burn & doesn't clog, giving everyone the smoothest shave. 

However, although the traditional safety and straight razors were the clear favourites for a better shave, men today don't have the time to re-learn how to shave with these traditional tools. So in developing the Broman razor we took the pivoting head features of a modern cartridge razor and combined it with a traditional razor making it easy for anyone to use. The spring loaded head supplies the perfect amount of pressure to allow the Swedish steel blade to glide across your face without any force. Everyone needs an alternative to cartridge razors & expensive subscriptions - you deserve the best shaving experience.

The Broman razor pivots to your face like a ballerina

The idea for the Broman razor was born - a hybrid of a modern pivot razor and a traditional safety razor using low cost, single edge blades. This combination is what makes the Broman razor unique in the marketplace. But that's not all it's also easy and cheap to replace a new blade...

What happens when I need a new blade?

"Just flip open the head, replace the blade, and snap shut"
at only 10p a blade!

Broman shaving razor with replaceable blade

All Broman razors ordered come with 60 Swedish steel precision blades - that's a 6 months supply of shaving provided completely free. And when you run out of that 6 month supply, there's no more expensive replacement blades to buy, as a pack of 60 blades is only £6. That's 10p per blade. We also care about the environment, each blade is recyclable so you're not only saving money it's also better for the environment! 
 

Years in the making...

Luckily, we happened to be product and industrial design engineers with years of product development under our belt. After 4 long years of research, design, engineering and testing, we are proud to announce that at Broman we have come up with the simplest shaving experience ever!

Our engineers have designed a pivoting razor that uses single edge shavette blades (or half a double edge blade) meaning you can now experience a modern pivot action shave using low cost single edge blades to get the smoothest shave.


No nonsense shaving

Use the Broman razor just a modern pivot razor

Watch our video (top of the page) and see how simple it is to use the Broman razor by our man Frankie.

Our Swedish steel blades

Our Swedish steel blades come packaged in a neat little box that doubles up as a stand

Why Swedish steel? We believe Swedish steel is one of the best in the world and provides the backbone of an excellent razor blade. Our blades our super chrome coated, wrapped in wax paper and delivered in a neat little box that doubles up as a stand for the Broman razor. Run out of blades and we will ship you another box of 60 for only £6. That's only 10p a blade! 

But wait... if you want to use your own choice of blades, the Broman razor accepts ANY single edge (or half a double edge) razor blade. 

FREE travel pouch with every razor

We've included a FREE razor travel pouch

We've even gone to the effort of designing a custom travel pouch to keep your razor protected safely in your wash bag.

Materials

We have used the best materials on offer to produce a quality, yet affordable razor built to last many years to come. Weighing in at nearly 80g, the Broman razor is perfectly weighted with an even distribution to allow the razor to apply the pressure to your face without force. 

Personalise your Broman razor with an engraving!

The Broman razor makes a perfect innovative gift for the man that has everything! Or maybe you deserve the gift of the smoothest shave, why not add your name to it or your favourite motto or quote!  Whatever your message let us know and we'll hand engrave a message on the back of the handle for you (up to 30 characters max). If its a gift, let us know and we'll even gift wrap it for you and include a gift note, sent directly to your recipient. 

This makes the Broman razor a best buy

With an RRP of £45, the Broman razor set includes as standard a precision die cast, zinc alloy, satin chrome coated Broman razor, 60 Superior Swedish steel chrome coated single edge blades, razor stand and travel pouch - all packaged in a 100% recyclable box.


The Man behind Broman

The brainchild and founder of Broman is industrial designer Dan Skinner. From children's products for LEGO and Disney, watches for Swiss watch brands, to Christmas decorations for Buckingham Palace, Dan has always enjoyed designing and making beautiful products. But it was his own frustrations with his shaving experience which forced him to dive into the shaving industry and develop a new type of razor.

"Apart from a bad shave, what frustrated me most about the shaving industry was how a century old product with so much evolution has gone from being a beautifully simple and effective product in the early 1900's to an over engineered and cheaply produced one today. Add the fact that modern cartridge blades cost a small fortune, cant be recycled and are fundamentally over engineered, I knew we could do better."
Dan Skinner, Founder of Broman


Why do we need your help?

We're unable to put the Broman razor into production without your support and backing. The £25,000 that we need to raise in the next 30 days is to cover the tooling and production costs for the first batch to be manufactured. Anyone can back and support our campaign today by purchasing our product here on Indiegogo or by providing a donation in support of our project.

By supporting us you will not only receive huge discounts on the Broman razor starting from as little as £25 + P&P with all of the extras, you'll also become part of the Broman community, a community who wants the smoothest shaving experience at a reasonable price.

As a backer we will also keep you updated with our progress throughout our Indiegogo campaign and then into the production of the Broman razor. Once production has completed we will then ship the Broman razor to you with all of the extras in a 100% recyclable box. 

 

Project Timeline

Delivery Costs - available worldwide

You can order your Broman razor to be delivered anywhere in the worldwide. Delivery to the UK is £3 and delivery to the rest of the world is £5.

The order of delivery will be based on when you have backed our project. The sooner you back our project, the quicker you'll receive your Broman razor! If you've personalised your Broman razor too your order will take a little longer as we hand engrave your message (approx 7-10 days longer to deliver). 

Get in touch with us if you looking to purchase multiple razor sets or are placing a wholesale order for retail as we promise to keep delivery costs as low as possible.  

Razor specification

  • Razor weight : 80g
  • Packaging dimensions : L 145mm x W 60mm x D 40mm

1x Pack Contents  

  • 1 x Broman Die cast, zinc alloy, satin chrome razor
  • 60 x Superior Swedish Steel, single edge, chrome coated blades
  • 1 x razor stand / blade box
  • 1 x  felt razor travel pouch

Production updates 

Master Tooling

Our master die-cast and injection moulding tools have undergone three months of machining and have just finished stage 3 of our testing process. We have identified from production samples that we require further fine tuning before we are satisfied with the final tolerances of the components. 

Die-cast tools for handle and razor head (above)

Injection mould tools for blade box (above & below)

Component testing 

The die-cast and injection moulded components go through a strict testing process to ensure they are within the tolerances of the engineering drawings before they are approved for further processing. We have had some unexpected complications with the razor head (pictured right) to ensure the blade sits perfectly inside the head with the correct blade exposure and gap. This has prompted us to make some slight revisions to the design (see next paragraph for details on the tweaks).

Raw die-cast zinc components (above)

Injection moulded head flap (above) and razor stand (below)

Design changes 

To overcome some challenges with blade stability, we have made some minor modifications to the razor head design which has added some further time to our development. We have made the addition of two small protrusions that slot within the top of the blade profile, thus improving blade stability.

From some initial user feedback, we have also increased the thickness of the handle to 9mm - allowing the razor to be gripped easier from the side. 

New thicker handle (top) Previous design (bottom)

Production testing/assembly 

Components that do pass tolerance testing and inspection are processed for satin chrome plating. They are then assembled for physical examination - spring, hinge, blade replacement and most importantly...a shave test! 

Broman razor production line 

We have also been working on developing an improved razor pouch by using a more luxurious and robust black PU leather. Our original wool material just did not live up to our high quality standards and we think these new sleeves add the extra wow factor to the unboxing experience of the Broman razor. 

Diamond Engraving 

For those of you who have ordered an engraved handle for the Broman razor, we have successfully created a template and pre-production test using automated diamond engraving.

Thanks for your support! Happy Shaving!
story_txt:
NOW AVAILABLE on our website:www.bromanshaving.com----------------------------------------------------Introducing the Broman razorAs featured in the Digital journal.The Broman razor & stand complete with 60 superior, Swedish steel, single edge bladesno subscriptions. no clogging. no nonsense. The Broman razor, is shaving redesigned. Millions of men suffer daily from shaving irritation due to a bad razor. Expensive replacement cartridges & shaving subscriptions also ruin the shaving experience. The Broman razor is an innovative, easy to use razor with a unique pivoting and flip open head that is patent pending, preventing razor burn and giving everyone the smoothest shave. Are you tired of bad shaves, expensive cartridge razor subscriptions, razor burn and ingrown hairs? Mastering the art of shaving is no walk in the park. The razor is one of mans most trusted tools  that has evolved over a century. So how is it that many of us today are faced with a poor shaving experience from substandard, over engineered shaving products? A few years ago, we became so frustrated with our shaving experience, we decided to do something about it, because everyone deserves a better shaving experience.  A unique shaving set that saves you time & money The Broman razor comes complete with stand, 60 Swedish steel blades, FREE travel pouch all packaged in a 100% recyclable card box We recruited the opinions of expert barbers and shaving enthusiasts who consistently highlighted that a traditional wet shave using a safety or straight razor was the best shave a man can get - and not a cartridge razor with a million blades designed by a rocket scientist. The Broman razor incorporates the features of a safety razor and combines it with a modern twist, giving you the smoothest shave. Precision die cast in zinc alloy with a satin chrome finish, the Broman razor is a real heavyweight in design build and quality. What's everyone saying about us?We've already received thousands of comments and feedback on social media from the public & shaving experts on the Broman razor. Here are a few...What are the press saying?
Founder & Design engineer of the Broman razor, is Dan Skinner. From children's products for LEGO and Disney, watches for Swiss watch brands to Christmas decorations for Buckingham Palace, Dan has always enjoyed designing and making beautiful, exceptional quality products. But it was his own frustrations with his shaving experience which forced him to take action and develop a new type of razor - one that gives a better shaving experience that anyone can use at a reasonable price. Here's Dan sharing insight into the idea behind Broman: See for yourself how the Broman razor is different from the rest, an innovative, easy to use razor with a unique pivoting and flip open head that prevents razor burn & doesn't clog, giving everyone the smoothest shave. However, although the traditional safety and straight razors were the clear favourites for a better shave, men today don't have the time to re-learn how to shave with these traditional tools. So in developing the Broman razor we took the pivoting head features of a modern cartridge razor and combined it with a traditional razor making it easy for anyone to use. The spring loaded head supplies the perfect amount of pressure to allow the Swedish steel blade to glide across your face without any force. Everyone needs an alternative to cartridge razors & expensive subscriptions - you deserve the best shaving experience.The Broman razor pivots to your face like a ballerinaThe idea for the Broman razor was born - a hybrid of a modern pivot razor and a traditional safety razor using low cost, single edge blades. This combination is what makes the Broman razor unique in the marketplace. But that's not all it's also easy and cheap to replace a new blade...What happens when I need a new blade?"Just flip open the head, replace the blade, and snap shut"at only 10p a blade!Broman shaving razor with replaceable bladeAll Broman razors ordered come with 60 Swedish steel precision blades - that's a 6 months supply of shaving provided completely free. And when you run out of that 6 month supply, there's no more expensive replacement blades to buy, as a pack of 60 blades is only £6. That's 10p per blade. We also care about the environment, each blade is recyclable so you're not only saving money it's also better for the environment!  Years in the making...Luckily, we happened to be product and industrial design engineers with years of product development under our belt. After 4 long years of research, design, engineering and testing, we are proud to announce that at Broman we have come up with the simplest shaving experience ever!Our engineers have designed a pivoting razor that uses single edge shavette blades (or half a double edge blade) meaning you can now experience a modern pivot action shave using low cost single edge blades to get the smoothest shave.No nonsense shavingUse the Broman razor just a modern pivot razorWatch our video (top of the page) and see how simple it is to use the Broman razor by our man Frankie.Our Swedish steel bladesOur Swedish steel blades come packaged in a neat little box that doubles up as a standWhy Swedish steel? We believe Swedish steel is one of the best in the world and provides the backbone of an excellent razor blade. Our blades our super chrome coated, wrapped in wax paper and delivered in a neat little box that doubles up as a stand for the Broman razor. Run out of blades and we will ship you another box of 60 for only £6. That's only 10p a blade! But wait... if you want to use your own choice of blades, the Broman razor accepts ANY single edge (or half a double edge) razor blade. FREE travel pouch with every razorWe've included a FREE razor travel pouchWe've even gone to the effort of designing a custom travel pouch to keep your razor protected safely in your wash bag.MaterialsWe have used the best materials on offer to produce a quality, yet affordable razor built to last many years to come. Weighing in at nearly 80g, the Broman razor is perfectly weighted with an even distribution to allow the razor to apply the pressure to your face without force. Personalise your Broman razor with an engraving!
The Broman razor makes a perfect innovative gift for the man that has everything! Or maybe you deserve the gift of the smoothest shave, why not add your name to it or your favourite motto or quote!  Whatever your message let us know and we'll hand engrave a message on the back of the handle for you (up to 30 characters max). If its a gift, let us know and we'll even gift wrap it for you and include a gift note, sent directly to your recipient. This makes the Broman razor a best buyWith an RRP of £45, the Broman razor set includes as standard a precision die cast, zinc alloy, satin chrome coated Broman razor, 60 Superior Swedish steel chrome coated single edge blades, razor stand and travel pouch - all packaged in a 100% recyclable box.

From children's products for LEGO and Disney, watches for Swiss watch brands, to Christmas decorations for Buckingham Palace, Dan has always enjoyed designing and making beautiful products. story:
Artificial Intelligence + Lasers + Pets

Felik's Artificial Intelligence is designed to make your pets feel a bit less lonely while you are away doing what you do best: working a human job and foraging for those delicious cans of wet food that you bring home.

As Seen On

Felik uses a laser plus an infrared-sensitive camera with a wide angle field of view to TRACK and REACT to your pets' movements. It mimicks real prey, like bugs and mice, to create the most engaging hunting experience technology has to offer.

An Android and iOS compatible mobile app allows you to set play schedules, restrict where the laser can go, and customize Felik's AI behavior to suit your fur-ball's hunting style. You can even check up on your pets over the Internet.

 

 

Other pet toys simply move in random unnatural patterns, or require a human at the controls. Felik REACTS to your pets. 8x faster than a human can. No other pet toy can match this level of intelligence.

Felik can be attached to a wall or placed on a shelf or countertop using the optional stand. Its elegant design will blend in virtually any environment.

Feature Packed

Felik tracks your pets using an infrared-sensitive camera with a wide-angle lense. It can detect which way your pet is facing, and predict what they might do next. Using a powerful quad-core CPU and real-time machine learning inference Felik formulates the optimal laser movement strategy in real time to provide meaningful & engaging play.

Works with any animal, whether it's a cat, dog, or even a duck :) Multiple simultaneous players are welcome!

 

Android + iOS

 

Felik Is in Production

We spent over 3 years developing Felik. At this point we have already created and shipped our first batch of roughly 500 devices to users around the world. We have deployed mobile apps to both Apple App Store and Google Play Store, and have been releasing firmware updates.

     

 

Team

Yuri Brigance

Shaun Kjellman

Alin Zanfirescu

Victoria Cebotar

Software & Hardware

Product Engineering & Manufacturing

Industrial Design

UI/UX & Graphics Design

 

Delivery Timeline

We've learned a lot from producing and fulfilling our first batch of devices. This will be our 2nd production run and we will re-use all of our tooling and suppliers. The goal of this campaign is to make some assembly optimizations, streamline supplier logistics, and offload more of the assembly to our manufacturing partner.

Even though we have done this before, the timeline may be slightly impacted by shipping (ocean freight can be unpredictable) and supplier delays. Our timeline is conservative and attempts to account for that.

Since we will be transitioning partial assembly off to our manufacturing partner, so a bit of time will be spent making sure the devices are assembled correctly. Final assembly and quality checks will be done in Seattle, USA.
