story:
Momo is the first home security assistant with artificial intelligence, all integrated into a discrete and timelessly stylish lamp that complements any living space. It simplifies life by making your home safer and smarter, while you enjoy more comfort, and greater efficiency.

Home Security 

Momo is packed with standalone security features like motion detection, facial recognition, and intelligent sound detection, and applies its intelligence to any additional security systems and connected devices around your home. It will even apply motion detection and facial recognition to images from other connected cameras.

Learn & Adopt Intelligence

Momo learns your habits and environmental preferences thanks to machine learning techniques, and suggests automations for your home to perfectly fit your lifestyle.

Smart Home Super Hub 

Thanks to a full suite of connectivity systems and an open architecture, Momo can automatically sync with and manage nearly all smart home devices, including standard appliances plugged into smart plugs.

 

Momo offers 24/7, intelligent standalone security, in addition to full compatibility with smart security sensors, even applying its facial recognition and motion detection to connected cameras to give you early warning of potential intruders, wherever you are, and without any subscription fee.

 

Thanks to Momo's revolutionary AI capabilities, it can automatically arm your security when you are asleep or away from the home, provide live feeds of abnormal events detected, and even connect you with users in the home in the case of an emergency.

Taking care of you, night and day

Through its unique combination of artificial intelligence and inbuilt sensors for motion, sound, smoke and air quality, Momo protects your home proactively if abnormal or hazardous conditions are present, even when you leave the home or if you are asleep.

Momo will learn the layout of the space it is in, along with the faces and behavior patterns of all residents and friends, provided they are "introduced" by a resident. With its rotating night vision camera, you can stream live video and keep an eye on the home when away. Momo will deliver auditory, light, and app alerts whenever strange motion, abnormal sounds, or changes in air quality alert it to something wrong in the home. Intelligent sound detection can tell the difference between normal home noises and sounds like a cry for help or breaking glass.

Adding intelligence to home security

Momo's intelligence extends to connected security systems in the home, acting as a hub for conveniently controlling them all at once and making them smarter through its own AI features.

Momo connects to wireless door or window sensors, moisture sensors, and additional security cameras, using them to recognize who is there and when they are moving. View all video feeds for connected cameras right from the Momo Home app.
 

Stay in control wherever you are

No matter where you are, Momo will keep an eye on your home for you and keep you informed. Whether it's an emergency or you just want to check in on your loved ones, even in the next room, Momo allows wireless two-way video and audio communication.

When it is connected to WiFi, Momo allows you to make and receive video calls through any connected AV device, like a tablet, computer, or mobile phone. You can also make WiFi voice calls using Momo's speaker and microphone. Momo allows a wide variety of remote functions, like remote activation of devices in Momo's network.

Greater peace of mind

Momo's standalone security features and networking capabilites allow it to fully protect your home, worry-free. Say you've just left the home. Momo will activate security mode, and alert you to any windows or doors equipped with sensors that have been left open. If you choose, it will generate a mock presence in the house by turning lights and music on or off periodically.

If Momo detects something suspicious, such as an unknown presence or strange sound, it will send an alert to the user, sound an alarm, and can even turn on its light and any connected lighting. Stream video through the mobile app to see what triggered Momo. When you return home and Momo recognizes you, it will deactivate security mode.

A healthier home 

Designed to maintain a healthy home environment, Momo’s sensors detect unsafe levels of gas or other pollutants, and check for poor air quality. Momo will send you an alert, flash, and/or sound an alarm to warn you to remedy unhealthy conditions.

You will be able to see exact readings in the Momo Home app, stream video of your home through Momo's night vision camera, and communicate through Momo's speaker and microphones.

Protecting your privacy too

Your privacy is incredibly important - that's why Momo uses 128-bit end-to-end communication encryption running on proven software, thanks to our partnership with Microsoft.

And if you want absolute lock down, you can even choose to physically disconnect Momo's camera and microphone by simply rotating the shade to block them. Momo does not retrieve, store or share any personal data, and prioritizes in-house users' privacy over remote access requests. Momo does not require the internet to function within the home and your data is safely stored on its 256-bit encrypted internal memory.

Momo uses machine learning techniques to learn your patterns of device use and behavior in the home, and suggest automations to make your life easier. Momo's AI will help you create the perfect home environment without having to spend hours managing technology.

A lifestyle you choose

Momo learns your patterns of smart home device usage and behavior, and suggest sets of actions for you to adopt. We call it Learn & Adopt Intelligence.

Say you get home from the office every day at 6:30. You turn on the lights, set the thermostat, play some music, and deactivate your home security. Momo can suggest this set of activities to all happen automatically when you get home each work day. It's your choice how to implement the automation: Now, Always, or not at all.

When you leave the home, Momo can activate security, turn off the lights or turn off connected domestic appliances that have accidentally been left on, detect open doors and windows, and actively keep an eye on the house. Momo will even learn if you prefer to change a connected device's settings through that device's control panel, the Momo Home app, or to let Momo handle it automatically.

You live - Momo learns

Momo is constantly learning, and will adapt to changing environments and situations. Momo will analyze its environment, and adapt to any changes it detects. It can turn on the lights when you enter the room, activate security when you leave the house, and alert you to any appliances that have been left on.

It will suggest different sets of automation for the weekend, when your hours at home are different. It can adapt to being moved to a new location in the home, changing any settings and working with different devices. It will even suggest changes to automations you have adopted if your habits change.

Momo is the ultimate smart home hub, allowing for a fully autonomous, managed experience. Momo amplifies the performance offered by each of your smart home devices by combining and coordinating their features to maximize the overall living experience.

No other smart home hub offers the same artificially intelligent learning that Momo does. Manage all your devices through Momo manually, or let Momo do all the work; the choice is yours.

Easy and intuitive

Momo can detect other smart home devices automatically - setting it up couldn't be simpler.

Once you have downloaded the Momo app, you can make a profile, set your password, and add any additional users. Momo takes it from there - it will automaticaly detect devices it can connect to, and ask if you would like to add them to Momo's network.

Universal compatibility

Momo runs on an open platform, and is the first smart home device that can work with all your other devices without losing any functionality.

With Momo, the possibilities are endless. It will work with natural language virtual assistants like Google Home and Amazon Alexa. Whether you use the native apps for connected devices or the Momo Home app, you will not lose any functionality, and Momo will continue to learn your patterns and preferences.

 

Stream your favorite web radio to connected Bluetooth speakers, set the thermostat to your perfect temperature, adjust the lighting - Momo will let you control any system with wireless connectivity. You can even connect to traditional appliances by plugging them into smart plugs and letting Momo know what appliance is connected. No more leaving the oven on - Momo will alert you if an appliance has been left on in an empty home.

Form meets function

Most smart home devices are ugly plastic boxes, marring the aesthetic of your home. Momo is designed by a professional lighting design studio in Italy as a beautiful and functional lamp, with style that will stand the test of time.

Momo is discrete, and will blend into any room in the home while adding mood lighting you can fully customize. Use gesture control to brighten or dim the lamp, or change scenarios through the gesture-activated pre-set modes - for example, if you're having dinner with friends, using a pre-set mode you can tell Momo to automatically set a soft light, raise the thermostat to 72°F, and play your favorite music.

Momo will illuminate automatically when you enter the room, and can change its brightness based on ambient light. It will even light up if the power goes out, thanks to a backup battery.

Control your way

Interact with Momo however you want, as much or as little as you would like.

With Momo, your level of control is entirely up to you - and any automation is chosen by you. You can control Momo and connected devices via voice commands or the Momo Home app. You can chat with Momo via Telegram, Facebook Messenger, or Skype. Control Momo's lamp with gesture control, and receive alerts from the LEDs, on your mobile phone, or through Momo's speaker.

Momo can autonomously develop and suggest automations for your home, or you can choose to set up your preferred sets of actions manually.

Reduce energy consumption

Save on your energy bills by leaving device management to Momo that intelligently optimizes consumption according to a combination of environment conditions such as lighting levels, temperature, humidity, time of day, and presences.

Thanks to Momo's open platform OS, it offers broad inter-operability, and can connect to devices using a wide variety of industry standards. It will work with devices on closed systems, like Philips lights, without forgoing built in features other hubs do not support.
 
It can connect to closed systems via their API libraries, and will track your use habits whether you interact with your smart devices via the Momo Home app or the device's native app. It can even work independently of an internet connection.
 
Once our campaign reaches $60,000, we will unlock our free More Power package. All Momos will be upgraded to an advanced Quad Core processor, 2GB of ram, a double-sized 32 GB HDD, and a larger back-up battery pack. This will make Momo work faster, letting its algorithms, facial recognition, motion detection and more work at peak capacity.
 

 

 

Davide Scarso

Founder & CIO

Edoardo Scarso

Founder & CEO

Nicola Picone

Co-Founder, CTO

Leo Scarso

Founder, CFO & Chief Engeneer

Luca Bonaccorsi

Co-Founder, R&D Manager, Senior Developer

Fabio Campione

Co-Founder, Chief Executive Developer

Giuseppe Farioli

Multi-layer Software Developer

Cettina Corallo

Digital Communication & Public Relations Manager

Risks and challenges

Our team has accumulated years of experience in developing and selling software, also with artificial intelligence. The software has already been developed and the hardware tested. Our prototypes, first 3D-printed and later produced by a specialized manufacturer in Bergamo (ITALY), have been presented at various trade shows and events, and are ready for final product testing. Despite our years of experience, and the functionality of the Momo prototype, risks and challenges remain.

Any technology campaign faces potential delays related to parts delivery, product engineering, and software development. We are confident that our extensive experience and preparation will help us mitigate these risks and proceed as efficiently as possible.

Momo is the first home security assistant with artificial intelligence, all integrated into a discrete and timelessly stylish lamp that complements any living space. It simplifies life by making your home safer and smarter, while you enjoy more comfort, and greater efficiency.Home Security Momo is packed with standalone security features like motion detection, facial recognition, and intelligent sound detection, and applies its intelligence to any additional security systems and connected devices around your home. It will even apply motion detection and facial recognition to images from other connected cameras.Learn & Adopt IntelligenceMomo learns your habits and environmental preferences thanks to machine learning techniques, and suggests automations for your home to perfectly fit your lifestyle.Smart Home Super Hub Thanks to a full suite of connectivity systems and an open architecture, Momo can automatically sync with and manage nearly all smart home devices, including standard appliances plugged into smart plugs. Momo offers 24/7, intelligent standalone security, in addition to full compatibility with smart security sensors, even applying its facial recognition and motion detection to connected cameras to give you early warning of potential intruders, wherever you are, and without any subscription fee. Thanks to Momo's revolutionary AI capabilities, it can automatically arm your security when you are asleep or away from the home, provide live feeds of abnormal events detected, and even connect you with users in the home in the case of an emergency.Taking care of you, night and dayThrough its unique combination of artificial intelligence and inbuilt sensors for motion, sound, smoke and air quality, Momo protects your home proactively if abnormal or hazardous conditions are present, even when you leave the home or if you are asleep.Momo will learn the layout of the space it is in, along with the faces and behavior patterns of all residents and friends, provided they are "introduced" by a resident. With its rotating night vision camera, you can stream live video and keep an eye on the home when away. Momo will deliver auditory, light, and app alerts whenever strange motion, abnormal sounds, or changes in air quality alert it to something wrong in the home. Intelligent sound detection can tell the difference between normal home noises and sounds like a cry for help or breaking glass.Adding intelligence to home securityMomo's intelligence extends to connected security systems in the home, acting as a hub for conveniently controlling them all at once and making them smarter through its own AI features.Momo connects to wireless door or window sensors, moisture sensors, and additional security cameras, using them to recognize who is there and when they are moving. View all video feeds for connected cameras right from the Momo Home app. Stay in control wherever you areNo matter where you are, Momo will keep an eye on your home for you and keep you informed. Whether it's an emergency or you just want to check in on your loved ones, even in the next room, Momo allows wireless two-way video and audio communication.When it is connected to WiFi, Momo allows you to make and receive video calls through any connected AV device, like a tablet, computer, or mobile phone. You can also make WiFi voice calls using Momo's speaker and microphone. Momo allows a wide variety of remote functions, like remote activation of devices in Momo's network.Greater peace of mindMomo's standalone security features and networking capabilites allow it to fully protect your home, worry-free. Say you've just left the home. Momo will activate security mode, and alert you to any windows or doors equipped with sensors that have been left open. If you choose, it will generate a mock presence in the house by turning lights and music on or off periodically.If Momo detects something suspicious, such as an unknown presence or strange sound, it will send an alert to the user, sound an alarm, and can even turn on its light and any connected lighting. Stream video through the mobile app to see what triggered Momo. When you return home and Momo recognizes you, it will deactivate security mode.A healthier home Designed to maintain a healthy home environment, Momo’s sensors detect unsafe levels of gas or other pollutants, and check for poor air quality. Momo will send you an alert, flash, and/or sound an alarm to warn you to remedy unhealthy conditions.You will be able to see exact readings in the Momo Home app, stream video of your home through Momo's night vision camera, and communicate through Momo's speaker and microphones.Protecting your privacy tooYour privacy is incredibly important - that's why Momo uses 128-bit end-to-end communication encryption running on proven software, thanks to our partnership with Microsoft.And if you want absolute lock down, you can even choose to physically disconnect Momo's camera and microphone by simply rotating the shade to block them. Momo does not retrieve, store or share any personal data, and prioritizes in-house users' privacy over remote access requests. Momo does not require the internet to function within the home and your data is safely stored on its 256-bit encrypted internal memory.Momo uses machine learning techniques to learn your patterns of device use and behavior in the home, and suggest automations to make your life easier. Momo's AI will help you create the perfect home environment without having to spend hours managing technology.A lifestyle you chooseMomo learns your patterns of smart home device usage and behavior, and suggest sets of actions for you to adopt. We call it Learn & Adopt Intelligence.Say you get home from the office every day at 6:30. You turn on the lights, set the thermostat, play some music, and deactivate your home security. Momo can suggest this set of activities to all happen automatically when you get home each work day. It's your choice how to implement the automation: Now, Always, or not at all.When you leave the home, Momo can activate security, turn off the lights or turn off connected domestic appliances that have accidentally been left on, detect open doors and windows, and actively keep an eye on the house. Momo will even learn if you prefer to change a connected device's settings through that device's control panel, the Momo Home app, or to let Momo handle it automatically.You live - Momo learnsMomo is constantly learning, and will adapt to changing environments and situations. Momo will analyze its environment, and adapt to any changes it detects. It can turn on the lights when you enter the room, activate security when you leave the house, and alert you to any appliances that have been left on.It will suggest different sets of automation for the weekend, when your hours at home are different. It can adapt to being moved to a new location in the home, changing any settings and working with different devices. It will even suggest changes to automations you have adopted if your habits change.Momo is the ultimate smart home hub, allowing for a fully autonomous, managed experience. Momo amplifies the performance offered by each of your smart home devices by combining and coordinating their features to maximize the overall living experience.No other smart home hub offers the same artificially intelligent learning that Momo does. Manage all your devices through Momo manually, or let Momo do all the work; the choice is yours.Easy and intuitiveMomo can detect other smart home devices automatically - setting it up couldn't be simpler.Once you have downloaded the Momo app, you can make a profile, set your password, and add any additional users. Momo takes it from there - it will automaticaly detect devices it can connect to, and ask if you would like to add them to Momo's network.Universal compatibilityMomo runs on an open platform, and is the first smart home device that can work with all your other devices without losing any functionality.With Momo, the possibilities are endless. It will work with natural language virtual assistants like Google Home and Amazon Alexa. Whether you use the native apps for connected devices or the Momo Home app, you will not lose any functionality, and Momo will continue to learn your patterns and preferences. Stream your favorite web radio to connected Bluetooth speakers, set the thermostat to your perfect temperature, adjust the lighting - Momo will let you control any system with wireless connectivity. You can even connect to traditional appliances by plugging them into smart plugs and letting Momo know what appliance is connected. No more leaving the oven on - Momo will alert you if an appliance has been left on in an empty home.Form meets functionMost smart home devices are ugly plastic boxes, marring the aesthetic of your home. Momo is designed by a professional lighting design studio in Italy as a beautiful and functional lamp, with style that will stand the test of time.

Momo is discrete, and will blend into any room in the home while adding mood lighting you can fully customize. Use gesture control to brighten or dim the lamp, or change scenarios through the gesture-activated pre-set modes - for example, if you're having dinner with friends, using a pre-set mode you can tell Momo to automatically set a soft light, raise the thermostat to 72°F, and play your favorite music.

Momo will illuminate automatically when you enter the room, and can change its brightness based on ambient light. It will even light up if the power goes out, thanks to a backup battery.
Control your way
Interact with Momo however you want, as much or as little as you would like.

With Momo, your level of control is entirely up to you - and any automation is chosen by you. You can control Momo and connected devices via voice commands or the Momo Home app. You can chat with Momo via Telegram, Facebook Messenger, or Skype. Control Momo's lamp with gesture control, and receive alerts from the LEDs, on your mobile phone, or through Momo's speaker.

Momo can autonomously develop and suggest automations for your home, or you can choose to set up your preferred sets of actions manually.
Reduce energy consumption
Save on your energy bills by leaving device management to Momo that intelligently optimizes consumption according to a combination of environment conditions such as lighting levels, temperature, humidity, time of day, and presences.



Thanks to Momo's open platform OS, it offers broad inter-operability, and can connect to devices using a wide variety of industry standards. It will work with devices on closed systems, like Philips lights, without forgoing built in features other hubs do not support.

 
It can connect to closed systems via their API libraries, and will track your use habits whether you interact with your smart devices via the Momo Home app or the device's native app. It can even work independently of an internet connection.
 


Once our campaign reaches $60,000, we will unlock our free More Power package. All Momos will be upgraded to an advanced Quad Core processor, 2GB of ram, a double-sized 32 GB HDD, and a larger back-up battery pack. This will make Momo work faster, letting its algorithms, facial recognition, motion detection and more work at peak capacity.
 

 




 







Davide Scarso
Founder & CIO


Edoardo Scarso
Founder & CEO








Nicola Picone
Co-Founder, CTO


Leo Scarso
Founder, CFO & Chief Engeneer








Luca Bonaccorsi
Co-Founder, R&D Manager, Senior Developer


Fabio Campione
Co-Founder, Chief Executive Developer








Giuseppe Farioli
Multi-layer Software Developer


Cettina Corallo
Digital Communication & Public Relations Manager



Risks and challenges
Our team has accumulated years of experience in developing and selling software, also with artificial intelligence. The software has already been developed and the hardware tested. Our prototypes, first 3D-printed and later produced by a specialized manufacturer in Bergamo (ITALY), have been presented at various trade shows and events, and are ready for final product testing. Despite our years of experience, and the functionality of the Momo prototype, risks and challenges remain.
Any technology campaign faces potential delays related to parts delivery, product engineering, and software development. We are confident that our extensive experience and preparation will help us mitigate these risks and proceed as efficiently as possible.

customize and control your home’s ambiance right from your phone.

story:
Dan and his long legs: 

We gave Dan some extra long legs. This lets the bikes lean more towards the living space and allows for a staggering display of bikes. You can fit three (medium sized) bikes vertically on an eight foot high wall section.

Laser cut, bend and powder coated steel Made in the USA and GERMANY 

We want Dan to get to you as fast and affordable as possible. Shipping from two locations will allow us to ship easily to Europe, Canada and the USA. The German manufacturer will produce for the European market and the US manufacturer will produce for the rest of the world. 

You will have the choice between three different colors: Blue, White and Red

The things we use everyday should bring us joy.  

The end of the ugly and boring bike hook era is here. Dan comes with a set of googly eyes stickers that conceal two of the four screws. He usually prefers to look at your bike, but it is up to you what Dan is allowed to see.   

Every Dan comes with the KOM sticker kit.

The floor space is for living: 

Life is expensive and your bike is not paying any rent. Consider this, instead of building an addition on your house or a second garage, you could be hanging your bikes up on the wall. Saving yourself thousands of dollars, which could be used to buy more bikes :)

Risks & Challenges

With any project there are risks associated, however it is our job to make sure we minimize these risks for our backers.

Although we have tried to rule out any possible production delay through the prototyping process, there is always a chance that something unforeseen pushes a projects deadline further back. As a supporter, you will be getting updates on a regular basis and will be informed when a later arrival of your reward is anticipated. We are committed to offering the product as promised, if in the unforeseen event anything happens, we will alter our delivery time until our high quality standard is achieved.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please help get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to put end to ugly and boring bike hook era!

story:
The new line of Rollbe measuring tools adds an incredibly durable black titanium carbo-nitride coating. It has a clicking sound feature built-in and the visually highlighted ‘’start mark,’’ which helps to track measurements with ease.

Rollbe super compact versions - 4 Inch and 10 cm are similar to the size of a coin. These versions are super compact and with specially designed carabiner keychain case - easily fit inside your pocket or can be attached to your every day carry on.

Rollbe larger versions - 8 Inch and 20 cm are designed for projects with a more professional position. These rulers are very portable and come in handy at any time. A genuine leather case is available as an add-on option!! 

With its agile functionality, Rollbe rulers have many applications for both professional and daily use.

Daily use

We measure things on a daily basis – straight or curved lines, square or round objects, drawing, cutting, comparing - Rollbe is quick, easy and designed to keep you equipped at all times.

Professional use 

Designers, architects, carpenters, sewers, decorators and many other professionals draft specific layouts and templates. Measuring curves and design details are necessary for these professions. Rollbe allows measuring curves and straight lines or surfaces in a convenient way.

How to measure

It is super easy to use. Place the ‘’start mark’’ on the starting point of the surface or line that you want to measure, roll and count rotations or measuring units by following the click sound or start mark, then add the remaining units.

Example 

If using Rollbe 10 cm, when it passes the number 10, add the extra cm or mm to your measurement. One full circle equals 10 cm, two circles - 20 cm, three circles - 30 cm. Keep on rolling and measure!

Measuring inside corners

The disk is round hence, it is not possible to place the regular start point in the corner. To measure inside corners you have to add the radius or diameter of the ruler to your measurement - You will find the radius indicated on your Rollbe.

Design

Designed and machined with precision to every unit. Core material used is 420-grade stainless steel, micro-blasted, coated with a premium black titanium carbo-nitride coating - tested and proven with a durable coating, Rollbe is built to last.

Finished with laser engraved markings that contrast with the dark surface and provides excellent visibility of the measuring units. The simple design allows you to make accurate measurements comfortably.

The click feature which is built inside the tool’s handle part - provides a very balanced and gentle, clear sound of the click on each rotation when rolling the tool.

For any questions, suggestions or press inquiries feel free to email us at info@rollbe.com

Timeline

Team

 

Thank you! 

- We are passionate about what we do and appreciate all of the supporters that have shared and joined this journey with us. Thank you for your support and encouragement throughout the stages of the project as we bring Rollbe to life!

story:
You can order your AZUME at:

www.AZUME.kitchen

 

We have started shipping!

OK! The shipping has started. The Azume's have arrived at Secoff Office & Design in Rotterdam. From here Sammie will take care of the distribution. We thank our backers for their patience. 

 

This is how you cook Rice in the AZUME Ceramic Rice Cooker

 

 

AZUME Ceramic Rice Cooker

After a successful Crowdfunding Campaign, we now offer you the AZUME Ceramic Rice Cooker as an InDemand offer here at INDIEGOGO.

 

AZUME Ceramic Rice Cooker

 

There are many ways of cooking rice. But will it taste as good? During my travels in Japan and China I got to eat rice that had much more flavour than I had ever tasted before. That was not only because of the rice, it was mostly in the way it was prepared. (Being) cooked in ceramics makes rice especially tasteful. Back in The Netherlands I could not find a good and affordable ceramic rice cooker. I decided to design a great ceramic rice cooker, for easy and delicious rice, myself.

 

TASTY - EASY - BEAUTIFUL

The AZUME Ceramic Rice Cooker is the result. An elegant pot that is practical and affordable. Rice is especially suited for cooking in ceramics. Of course, you could use an electric rice cooker, but who needs extra cords and plugs in the kitchen? Ceramics are also very sustainable in production and use. No plastic parts or electronica parts that can break down. A ceramic rice cooker will last you much longer than any electric rice cooker. Cooking in ceramics is a lot of fun as well. It always works out and the thick bottom prevents the rice from burning. The rice doesn’t just taste delicious; it looks great as well. Instead of a basic side dish, this rice will complete your meal.

    WHY DOES RICE TASTE BETTER WHEN COOKED IN THE AZUME?

     

    You can cook rice in any pan, but not every pan will give you the same tasty result. 

    Cooking any rice, you should first rins it thoroughly, let it soak, cook it for a short time, turn of the heat and keep it covered. The rice will continue to steam until it’s done. Ceramics hold the heat very well and won’t let the rice cool down while letting it sit.

     

    BENEFITS

    TASTE

    The glaze on ceramics is very inert and won’t give off any taste like metal often does. 

    We added some extra benefits like special rims in the lid. The rims make sure that any steam that condensates will drip nicely on the surface of the rice, so the top layer won’t dry out.

     

    LOOKS: taste and style go together

    Tasteful rice should be presented tastefully. The Azume Ceramic Rice Cooker is an elegant, stylized pan and a fine object for your kitchen or dining table. The colour of the pan contrasts with the rice and remains beautiful while using it on fire, you will not see the soot. 
    The pan has a manageable size for 2 to 4 persons. 
    A beautiful detail is the bamboo rice scoop, which you store together with the pan.

     

    Measurements: ø180 x H 180 mm. Material: flameproof ceramics Foodsafe: the glaze has been tested and is food safe.  Colour: anthracite

     

     

    WHERE ARE WE NOW?

     

    Four years ago, the first design sketch was on the table. In the past four years the design has been perfected to the best possible form. A lot of partners, including manufacturers, chefs and marketeers, have contributed to the final product. 

     

    TESTING

     

    We have done extensive testing on the AZUME. Not just us, but also Chef Crista Hammel from Kookstudiomix and Chef Jinai Looi from Het Zesde Geluk. Jinai even introduced the AZUME on Dutch television.

     

     

     

     

    FUNDING

     

    To realise this project we need funds for the following: 

    • Moulds 
    • Production 
    • Packaging
    • Marketing
    • Transportation

     

    TIMELINE

     

    WHO WE ARE

     

     

    The AZUME Ceramic Rice Cooker is an initiative of Ben Oostrum, a Dutch product designer of products such as the Crosslight, be-Happy and Hoppy. He has won multiple awards including the Red Dot Award. Lately the focus of his work is on kitchen products. His enthusiasm for rice quickly attracted this AZUME-team, who all share a passion for good food and beautiful kitchen products. Together we will get the AZUME in production and to market.

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

    Ben Oostrum has won many awards with previous designs, amongst which:

    • 2008 Honorable mention, Mart Stam Award 
    • 2007 Good Design Award of The Chicago Atheneum, Hoppy
    • 2007 Nomination Dutch Design Awards
    • 2007 Bricks 
    • 2006 Nomination Tokyo City Lights
    • 2005 Good Design Award of The Chicago Atheneum, Crosslight 
    • 2004 nomination Designboom's 100% Tiles Competition 
    • 2004 nomination design award of the Federal Republic of Germany 
    • 2003 Red Dot Award, Crosslight 
    • 2003 Nomination Dutch Design Awards, Crosslight 
    • 2000 Nomination AVA keramiek award, Museum Lambert van Meerten, Delft 
    • 1997 VSB-Award

     

     

     

     

    AZUME IN THE PRESS

     

     

     

     

    The Azume on Dutch Television

     

     

    SPECIAL THANKS TO

    A lot of people have contributed to the realisation of the AZUME Ceramic Rice Cooker and this campaign. 

     
    With the risk of forgetting somebody, I would like to thank:  

    Rob Smith & Mart Hulspas from L5, Hans Oostrum & team from Studio Oostrum, Niels de Graaf from Enjoydesign, Ary van Krimpen & Marco Heinen from Van Krimpen Agencies, Petra Smulders, Sammie Oostrum, Katrien van de Eerden from Katrien van der Eerden Food & Books, Crista Hammel from Kookstudiomix, Jinaai Looi from Het Zesde Geluk, Mieke Montagne from Studio Poldergoed, Eva Lukkenaer from Pottenbakkerij de Vuurplaats, Joost Lasschuit, John Hartman from Cap4All, Robin van der Basch, Monica Ophuijsen from Ophuysen, Luc Scholten & Mark Elderson from Sprank,  Marcel Oostrom from Catermaat, Darryll Atema, Harm van der Werf, Shailendra Sripal from SS Administratie en advies, Bart van den Ouden from Cardo Architecten, John van der Tuijn, Martin Oostrum,  Rudi Abels from Melkman, Fatma Aktas, Gerard Rinkes from Solinger, Yolanda van der Jagt, Wim Parent, Hans van de Camp, Jeroen van Zeijl, Maarten Reijgersberg, and of course Swaen Oostrum and Roos Beesemer.

     

     

     

     

    ENCORE

     

    The Best Basic Recipe for Rice

    • Rinse the rice thoroughly until the water is clear (at least three times).
    • Measure the right amount of water: depending on the type of rice that will be approximately 1,25/1,5 cup of water for 1 cup of rice.
    • Add salt of stock for flavour and let the rice soak for 30 minutes. 
    • Place the pan on the smallest burner, at the highest fire. As soon as the water is boiling, turn the fire down and let the rice simmer for 8 minutes. 
    • After 8 minutes, turn the stove off and let the rice steam in the pan for 12 minutes. Don’t lift the lid and don’t stir the rice. Let the Azume do it’s job. 
    • After 12 minutes you can stir the beautiful, light and tasteful rice. Because ceramics hold the heat very well, the rice won’t cool down too much while you finish the rest of the meal. 

     

     

    Eet smakelijk!

    EXTRA

     

     

    Especially for our business customers we provide the option to laser burn YOUR LOGO in the bamboo rice paddle for FREE with an order for 10 AZUME's

     

     

     

     

     

    RISKS AND CHALANGES

    Please share our project with your friends!

    PRODUCTION: 
    We have many years of experience designing and manufacturing interior design products. Therefore, we understand the risks that can occur in the production process. As with any physical item, flaws not picked up in the rigorous testing phase are possible. That may result in a delay on delivery.

    DELIVERY: 
    One challenge is coping with a larger direct-to-consumer delivery than we're used to. That’s why we have already planned for this and have lined up several options for third party logistics, all of whom have crowdfunding expertise.

    PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: 
    As the AZUME gets geared up for production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product. Pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine the product and allow us to incorporate our adjustments and those suggested by experienced manufacturing partners. These will always be for the benefit of you, the consumer, and we will let you know exactly how and why any are made.

    If any issues arise, we'll communicate them to you as soon and openly as possible so you wont be left in the dark.

    SHARING IS CARING 

    Please share our project with your friends!
story_txt:
You can order your AZUME at:
www.AZUME.kitchen
 
We have started shipping!

TASTEThe glaze on ceramics is very inert and won’t give off any taste like metal often does. We added some extra benefits like special rims in the lid. The rims make sure that any steam that condensates will drip nicely on the surface of the rice, so the top layer won’t dry out. 

 
LOOKS: taste and style go together
Tasteful rice should be presented tastefully. The Azume Ceramic Rice Cooker is an elegant, stylized pan and a fine object for your kitchen or dining table. The colour of the pan contrasts with the rice and remains beautiful while using it on fire, you will not see the soot. The pan has a manageable size for 2 to 4 persons. A beautiful detail is the bamboo rice scoop, which you store together with the pan.
 
 
SUSTAINABLE
The Azume Ceramic Rice Cooker doesn’t use electricity and only needs a short time on the stove. The pan will last a lifetime. There are still Chinese Ceramic Pots from 4000 years ago. An electric rice cooker definitely won’t make that. 
 
Chinese Ding Cooking Pot 2000 BC 
PRACTICAL

Suited for every type of rice
Bamboo rice scoop included 
No plugs and cords on the countertop
The AZUME takes up little space 
The AZUME is dishwasher proof (the bamboo scoop is not) 
The handles give good grip and don’t get hot 
The lid lies deep in the pan so when the water boils over it will drip back into the pan, and not all over your stove 
The pan is microwave proof

 
TECHNICAL DETAILS
 
Measurements: ø180 x H 180 mm. Material: flameproof ceramics Foodsafe: the glaze has been tested and is food safe.  Colour: anthracite  
WHERE ARE WE NOW?
 
Four years ago, the first design sketch was on the table. In the past four years the design has been perfected to the best possible form. A lot of partners, including manufacturers, chefs and marketeers, have contributed to the final product. 
 


TESTING
 
We have done extensive testing on the AZUME. Not just us, but also Chef Crista Hammel from Kookstudiomix and Chef Jinai Looi from Het Zesde Geluk. Jinai even introduced the AZUME on Dutch television.
 
 
 
 
FUNDING
 
To realise this project we need funds for the following: 

Moulds 
Production 
Packaging
Marketing
Transportation

 

TIMELINE


 
WHO WE ARE
 
 
The AZUME Ceramic Rice Cooker is an initiative of Ben Oostrum, a Dutch product designer of products such as the Crosslight, be-Happy and Hoppy. He has won multiple awards including the Red Dot Award. Lately the focus of his work is on kitchen products. His enthusiasm for rice quickly attracted this AZUME-team, who all share a passion for good food and beautiful kitchen products. Together we will get the AZUME in production and to market.
 
 
  
 
 AWARDS 
 
Ben Oostrum has won many awards with previous designs, amongst which:

2008 Honorable mention, Mart Stam Award 
2007 Good Design Award of The Chicago Atheneum, Hoppy
2007 Nomination Dutch Design Awards
2007 Bricks 
2006 Nomination Tokyo City Lights
2005 Good Design Award of The Chicago Atheneum, Crosslight 
2004 nomination Designboom's 100% Tiles Competition 
2004 nomination design award of the Federal Republic of Germany 
2003 Red Dot Award, Crosslight 
2003 Nomination Dutch Design Awards, Crosslight 
2000 Nomination AVA keramiek award, Museum Lambert van Meerten, Delft 
1997 VSB-Award

 
 
 
 
AZUME IN THE PRESS
 
 
 
 The Azume on Dutch Television 
 

SPECIAL THANKS TO
A lot of people have contributed to the realisation of the AZUME Ceramic Rice Cooker and this campaign. 
 
With the risk of forgetting somebody, I would like to thank:  
Rob Smith & Mart Hulspas from L5, Hans Oostrum & team from Studio Oostrum, Niels de Graaf from Enjoydesign, Ary van Krimpen & Marco Heinen from Van Krimpen Agencies, Petra Smulders, Sammie Oostrum, Katrien van de Eerden from Katrien van der Eerden Food & Books, Crista Hammel from Kookstudiomix, Jinaai Looi from Het Zesde Geluk, Mieke Montagne from Studio Poldergoed, Eva Lukkenaer from Pottenbakkerij de Vuurplaats, Joost Lasschuit, John Hartman from Cap4All, Robin van der Basch, Monica Ophuijsen from Ophuysen, Luc Scholten & Mark Elderson from Sprank,  Marcel Oostrom from Catermaat, Darryll Atema, Harm van der Werf, Shailendra Sripal from SS Administratie en advies, Bart van den Ouden from Cardo Architecten, John van der Tuijn, Martin Oostrum,  Rudi Abels from Melkman, Fatma Aktas, Gerard Rinkes from Solinger, Yolanda van der Jagt, Wim Parent, Hans van de Camp, Jeroen van Zeijl, Maarten Reijgersberg, and of course Swaen Oostrum and Roos Beesemer.




Ben Oostrum, Rob Smith & Mart Hulspas, Hans Oostrum & Alain de Kruijff & Vera Groen    ENCORE The Best Basic Recipe for Rice
Rinse the rice thoroughly until the water is clear (at least three times).
Measure the right amount of water: depending on the type of rice that will be approximately 1,25/1,5 cup of water for 1 cup of rice.
Add salt of stock for flavour and let the rice soak for 30 minutes. 
Place the pan on the smallest burner, at the highest fire. As soon as the water is boiling, turn the fire down and let the rice simmer for 8 minutes. 
After 8 minutes, turn the stove off and let the rice steam in the pan for 12 minutes. Don’t lift the lid and don’t stir the rice. Let the Azume do it’s job. 
After 12 minutes you can stir the beautiful, light and tasteful rice. Because ceramics hold the heat very well, the rice won’t cool down too much while you finish the rest of the meal. 
 (bon appétit) Eet smakelijk!EXTRA  Especially for our business customers we provide the option to laser burn YOUR LOGO in the bamboo rice paddle for FREE with an order for 10 AZUME's AZUME with Business Logo  Azume with phrase of your choice  RISKS AND CHALANGESPlease share our project with your friends!PRODUCTION: We have many years of experience designing and manufacturing interior design products. Therefore, we understand the risks that can occur in the production process. As with any physical item, flaws not picked up in the rigorous testing phase are possible. That may result in a delay on delivery.DELIVERY: One challenge is coping with a larger direct-to-consumer delivery than we're used to. That’s why we have already planned for this and have lined up several options for third party logistics, all of whom have crowdfunding expertise.PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: As the AZUME gets geared up for production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product. Pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine the product and allow us to incorporate our adjustments and those suggested by experienced manufacturing partners. These will always be for the benefit of you, the consumer, and we will let you know exactly how and why any are made.If any issues arise, we'll communicate them to you as soon and openly as possible so you wont be left in the dark.SHARING IS CARING Please share our project with your friends!

story:
Product Description 

The Solo Stove Bonfire, the worlds most unique fire pit, pushes the limits of both combustion airflow efficiency and minimalist outdoor design. It was painstakingly engineered to provide a backyard fire experience that cannot be duplicated. Using our patented design and specialized construction process, we have created the most beautiful single unit fire pit ever. Prepare yourself to be wowed by the Bonfire's mesmerizing flames and come closer together with friends and family outdoors.

 

Each portion of the bonfire is made of the highest grade 304 stainless steel and perfectly measured and formed. The bonfire presented us with some unique design challenges that required us to create custom tools.  These tools, along with a precision construction process, and intricate multi-step finishing and polishing process result in a product that is both beautiful and durable.

The Bonfire is designed with a double wall to maximize the airflow of the burning process. The bottom holes allow oxygen to the feed the fire from below while simultaneously channeling warm oxygen up between the walls of the stove. This burst of preheated oxygen feeding back into the fire through the top holes causes a secondary combustion that results in a cleaner and more complete burn. 

A more complete burn means no more half burnt logs to deal with. It also means very little smoke which means no more dodging smoke that seems to follow your every move. 

A more efficient burn also means your wood will burn much longer compared to an open fire.  

What Makes The Bonfire Special?

Engineered Airflow

Our proprietary design allows the Bonfire to utilize airflow in the burning process like no other fire pit. Perfectly sized and placed air intake holes are located on the outside bottom and inside top of the fire pit. Each hole has been spaced with precision. The bottom holes of the fire pit draws in oxygen to further fuel the fire from underneath. The air from the bottom holes also travels up through the double wall, being heated along the way and finally channeled out the inner top holes. This entire airflow process is continual and has been deliberately engineered to maximize efficiency.

 

Fire Ring

The fire ring is formed from a single piece of 304 stainless steel. It is deep drawn with precision tooling and hand polished. The fire ring is specifically designed to keep the fire centered and even. It sits securely on the top and when turned upside down, nests inside for simple storage.

 

Easy To Use

The Bonfire’s singular construction completely removes the need for parts and assembly. There is literally no setup. The Bonfire won't scorch the ground under it so it's safe to use on your porch, grass or patio. It was designed so standard sized firewood logs can be stacked inside. After an initial fire has started, the airflow process will begin to help the wood ignite. There is no need to wrestle with burning logs or dodge smoke and sparks. 

 

Easy Storage

Want to take your Bonfire to a friend's house, the beach or out to a campsite? No problem! Each Solo Stove Bonfire comes with a weather resistant nylon carry bag.

 

Solo Stove Buzz

Our Story

Solo Stove has been making high-end wood burning backpacking and camp stoves since 2011. Our products have been tested in the deserts of Jordan by Backpacker Magazine’s editor-in-chief, Dennis Lewon, and pushed to the limits in the hands of survivalists like Matt Graham (Discovery Channel’s Dual Survival) and Joel Lambert (Discovery Channel’s Lone Target). We’ve won numerous awards including gear of the year awards from 50 Campfires and Section Hiker. But what we’re most proud of is being a part of people’s outdoor adventures.

We love the outdoors and we do what we do because making gear that helps people get outside and spend time together is meaningful to us. In today’s busy hustle and bustle lifestyle, we feel there is an ever-increasing need for more of this.

We realize that even though people want to get outdoors together, it’s not easy. Not everyone has time to go on an extended multi-day backpacking or camp trip with friends or family. That’s why we’re making the Solo Stove Bonfire. We’re making it easier for you to enjoy the best part of an outdoor adventure in your own backyard – a killer BONFIRE!

We’ve engineered the Bonfire to be the ultimate backyard fire pit. But the meticulous engineering isn’t what’s most important. What’s most important is how easy it will now be to head outside and enjoy the roaring glow of a Bonfire and the company of friends and family.

story:
J.E.C.A.N.

Meet the team! Our brand name is a representation of these five key members(Left to Right); Julio Zapata, Edward Sanchez, Carlos Velez, Aimara Fontalva, and Norka Haiek.

Carlos Velez is our ever so inspiring Team Leader. He's completing his bachelors in Electrical Engineering. Always achieving for greater success, our Navy veteran has completed several disciplines;  Control Systems, Integrated Nano-Technology, Communications, and Bio-Engineering. Being the glue of this team, he guarantees that our team performs well and stays focused.

Edward Sanchez is our Executive Leader. Being a father, working for FPL, and being a full-time student is no easy task, but Edward gets it done. He's completing his bachelors in Electrical Engineering with his main disciplines being Communications and Power. Edward assures that the team is always knowledgeable on all HVAC topics concerning the project.

Aimara Fontalva is our Treasurer and will be in charge of the funds distribution generated from this campaign. Never one to keep still, she manages several jobs while being a full time student. She's completing her bachelors in Computer Engineering. Her main work has been with Embedded Systems and Integrated Nano-Technology. With previous financial knowledge in managing business accounts she is perfect for our team.

 Norka Haiek is our wonderful Secretary. Working in every trade imaginable, she brings knowledge no other member can bring. Juggling motherhood and full time studies she is on her way to graduating with a bachelors in Electrical Engineering. Her disciplines are in Bio-Engineering and Integrated Nano-technology. She's diligent in keeping the team on task at all times.

Julio Zapata is our Project Manager. He has completed several projects while being a member for Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE). With his knowledge and expertise there is no doubt in the eventual success for our project. Currently completing his bachelors in Computer Engineering. His disciplines are in  Programming and Embedded Systems. He's the brains behind the code that will raise our project to new heights. 

Comprised of electrical and computer engineers, we are hoping to bring forth a working prototype and a working scale model. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are only asking for $2,000 to get the components necessary to make a working prototype and the small scale model with it. 

We have two very exciting perks! The first one is getting bragging rights on our video credits. The second one is becoming affiliated in our final project report.  

First and foremost whatever funds go into this campaign will be to our projects benefit. We have included in the funding goal overhead costs that may arise if components fail or break. Once the small scale prototype is achieved then and only then would any funds left be used to facilitate the projects marketing needs. This could be via shirts, key-chains, business cards, etc. All of which would be available as perks later on.

The Impact

The most helpful aspect you as potential sponsors have on our campaign is exposure. Simply being here on this page has an impact of its own. We hope to achieve a working small scale model that has the potential to be reproduced in large scale and prove that comfort can be for the individual in a communal home.

The Risk & Challenges

The biggest challenge for us is failure in meeting our stated goals. There is no room for negativity, but the reality is components may fail and prototypes may not work. We ask you to take the risk with us! There is no room for failure if you do not even try.

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate the time you took to read our campaign. It is alright if you can not donate to our cause, but you can help us graduate with a bang by sharing this with your friends and family!

story:
Our Story

 A free and independent press for the 99%.

Please contribute! The Occupied Press--North Bay is not funded by large corporations like the mainstream media. We only have you to help us bring this essential publication to the people of Northern California. The monies raised here will help us fund the first two issues and a complimentary website, so the more money we can raise the more people we can reach. Please spread the word to everyone you know to help us achieve our funding goal and thank you so much for your support.
 
While the Occupy movement had its origins in the east coast as Occupy Wall Street it quickly spread throughout the country with Occupies sprouting up in almost major city and even many smaller towns throughout the country and internationally. Early on with this movement much of the focus spread to Northern California, because of all the action that took place and continues to take place in this dynamic region. The Occupy movement soon became the voice of the disenfranchised; the people who have lost their homes, their children’s schools, and their jobs through corporate greed, but you won’t hear this voice on the mainstream media. The best way this voice will be heard is through independent, newspapers, websites, and other independent media outlets.

 

As we attempt to break the iron grip of big corporations on our lives and our government the necessity of a media that represents the people is of paramount importance. If we want to bring this country back to the people we have to be able to discuss issues relevant to us and mainstream media with its content controlled by big corporations and big money is not the place to do this. In Northern California we want to be the free independent source for news written by the people for the people of the 99%. Our project is an eight page broadsheet style bi-lingual regional newspaper with a first print run of 10,000 with a complimentary website and multi-media exposure, which will inspire, motivate and further the efforts of the 99%. We intend to cover the area from north of the Golden Gate Bridge to Mendocino and Humboldt Countries with not only Occupy news, but news covering the important issues of our changing times. The emphasis will be on quality content featuring relevant news articles, editorials, a cultural section, photography, poetry, artwork and humor, all designed to make this a must read for those who want to keep abreast of the issues facing us. Our all-volunteer editorial collective is made up of twelve members with a wealth of journalistic backgrounds and with content contributors derived from the targeted general multi-ethnic community. The editorial collective is complimented by a Planning and Organizing board made up of a diverse group of representatives from the community.>

 

What We Need & What You Get

<p< p="">The money raised here will go towards funding the first two issues, but even if we don’t raise all of it we’ll still publish the first issue while we continue to raise money for the next issues. This is an all-volunteer effort with 100% of the money donated going directly into publishing and distribution. This is an ongoing project with the eventual goal to reach a larger demographical area and to also print a longer edition of the newspaper. We hope to become more than a newspaper by providing writing workshops to help prospective writers hone their writing skills and, at some point, offer other workshops to help educate the community we represent.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us by spreading the word.  Mention us on your Facebook page, Twitter and any other social media site with whom you belong.   We need your help to get the word out.  We can't do this without your help spreading our message so please let your family and friends know about our project.  We can only make a difference in the world if we educate and inform and it's through publications like this that we can do that, but we need you.  Through the donation of a few dollars and spreading the word about this project you can help bring about a positive change for tommorrow.

story:
Ever wished that your makeup mirror came with adjustable 'true light' settings so you could flawlessly apply makeup every time? 
 

Ever wished that you could save the light settings from your favorite places so you're always looking and feeling your best? So have we.

Meet the JUNO Mirror

  • Preloaded with light settings for indoors, office, and evening so you'll always look your best
  • Built-in ring light for professional-looking selfies every time
  • Turns into a reading lamp with the flick of a wrist
  • Integrated storage tray for all your beauty and makeup needs

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

   

Think about the last time you applied makeup -- where did you try to put your mirror?  You most likely positioned your makeup mirror next to a window for a very good reason –- because you get the best light to apply your makeup flawlessly.  

True lighting is designed to help you find the perfect light to match whatever you have planned for the day -- while you're applying your makeup.  The JUNO Mirror comes pre-loaded with settings: daylight, indoors, and evening.        

 

Plus, when you pair your own iPhone or Android phone with the mirror, the light around the JUNO Mirror will automatically optimize. 

Download Android version

Download iOS version 

Reading Light

Turn the JUNO Mirror into a reading lamp with a flick of a wrist. 

 
Perfect makeup. Perfect selfies.
The JUNO Mirror was designed to be the smartest makeup mirror ever. Simple to use, compact, with studio-grade lighting for precise makeup application and incredible photos. Take the perfect selfie every time by turning the JUNO Mirror light into a selfie ring light.

 

JUNO’s SMD LED 

Revolutionary and unconventional. What is it? An SMD LED Module (surface-mount device light-emitting diode module) is a type of LED module that uses surface-mount technology (SMT) to mount LED chips on printed circuit boards (PCB).

 

 

 

As simple as the JUNO mirror is to use, with all the controls you need at the tip of your fingers, the JUNO app can give you even more control. 

Here are all the goodies we have in store for you on the JUNO app: 

  • Choose a specific hue/light warmth. Use the on-app mirror to adjust for the mirror's specific light warmth
  • Save your favorite light settings. Bookmark and quickly access your favorite settings. 
  • Reading light. Choose how bright you want your reading light to be directly on-screen. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 Physical Specs

Mirror: 6 inches (15 cm) Base: 7.9 inches (20 cm) Height: 9.7 inches (24.6 cm) 

The JUNO Mirror comes with a 5x magnifying mirror and charging cord. Storage trays comes without ring holder.

We started JUNO with the goal of bringing together real women to let their lights shine.  We're a community-first brand who believes that the best products are the ones we create together -- and the JUNO Smart Mirror is the first product we're bringing to market with your help.

story_txt:
With three levels of mirror lighting for (sunlight, daylight, and evening lighting) you can sure your makeup will look on-point no matter what time of day you step out of the house. Also, the built-in ring light helps you nail Insta-ready selfies.  Ever wished that your makeup mirror came with adjustable 'true light' settings so you could flawlessly apply makeup every time?  Ever wished that you could save the light settings from your favorite places so you're always looking and feeling your best? So have we.Meet the JUNO Mirror
Preloaded with light settings for indoors, office, and evening so you'll always look your best
Built-in ring light for professional-looking selfies every time
Turns into a reading lamp with the flick of a wrist
Integrated storage tray for all your beauty and makeup needs
               Think about the last time you applied makeup -- where did you try to put your mirror?  You most likely positioned your makeup mirror next to a window for a very good reason –- because you get the best light to apply your makeup flawlessly.  True lighting is designed to help you find the perfect light to match whatever you have planned for the day -- while you're applying your makeup.  The JUNO Mirror comes pre-loaded with settings: daylight, indoors, and evening.         Plus, when you pair your own iPhone or Android phone with the mirror, the light around the JUNO Mirror will automatically optimize. Download Android version
Download iOS version Reading LightTurn the JUNO Mirror into a reading lamp with a flick of a wrist.  Perfect makeup. Perfect selfies. The JUNO Mirror was designed to be the smartest makeup mirror ever. Simple to use, compact, with studio-grade lighting for precise makeup application and incredible photos. Take the perfect selfie every time by turning the JUNO Mirror light into a selfie ring light.

 JUNO’s SMD LED Revolutionary and unconventional. What is it? An SMD LED Module (surface-mount device light-emitting diode module) is a type of LED module that uses surface-mount technology (SMT) to mount LED chips on printed circuit boards (PCB).    
 
 As simple as the JUNO mirror is to use, with all the controls you need at the tip of your fingers, the JUNO app can give you even more control. Here are all the goodies we have in store for you on the JUNO app: 

Choose a specific hue/light warmth. Use the on-app mirror to adjust for the mirror's specific light warmth

Save your favorite light settings. Bookmark and quickly access your favorite settings. 

Reading light. Choose how bright you want your reading light to be directly on-screen.

story:
When we reach our stretch goal of $20,000, every flashlight ordered will come with a FREE bike mount!

Due to the overwhelming popularity of the Luma 900, we have made some design enhancements to the model. It will still include all of the features of our original prototype, plus a few new additions.

Design Enhancement #1: The switch is now made of aluminum, for greater durability.

Design Enhancement #2: The switch doubles as a charging and battery level indicator, with a dedicated LED that will turn red or green according to the battery level.

Design Enhancement #3: Luma 900 now comes with a removable stainless steel belt clip for everyday carry.

Design Enhancement #4: Luma 900 will now have a single Micro USB port on the body of the flashlight. This port has a rubber cover that makes it dust and moisture proof. We will still be providing a car charger with all Luma 900 flashlights, as well as a Micro USB cable, so you can keep Luma ready to go while you’re on the go.

BONUS - Luma 900 flashlights will now have FIVE light modes! High, Medium, Low, Strobe and SOS.

High performance everyday carry flashlights that anyone can use. They are lightweight and small enough for a pocket or bag, and each comes with a storage case.

Three light modes means there is a setting for every occasion – from outdoor adventuring, to roadside emergencies, to looking for monsters under the bed. In fact, we can't think of a situation where Luma wouldn't come in handy:

  • Heading on a road trip? You should pack Luma.
  • Walking the dog at night? Better take Luma. 
  • Lose something under the fridge? Grab Luma. 

Luma has you covered in any situation, so you’ll want to keep one close by.

Luma comes in two sizes: Luma 350 and Luma 900.

Each Luma flashlight comes with two light diffusing cones and a car charger, which tuck away into a convenient case. Everything is right where you need it, when you need it.

 

 

Red and white diffuser cones easily slip on Luma flashlights, converting them into safety wands or lanterns. They are perfect for roadside emergencies, power outages, camping, crowd control, or even curling up with a good book.

 

 

Luma flashlights have a rechargeable Lithium ion battery. This is important to us. You don't have to buy and throw away disposable batteries to keep Luma going, which means less batteries in the landfills and more money in your pocket. Each Luma flashlight comes with it's own car charger and can also be charged in any standard USB port. 

 

 

You can also use the handy car charger to charge your phone while you drive. It has a Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 USB port which will charge compatible devices 10x faster than a USB 2.0 port. It is backwards compatible for older mobile devices, and also has surge protection and short-circuit protection.

 

 

Luma is made of an aluminum alloy, so it's durable and lightweight - the perfect combo for everyday carry. It has an Ingress Protection rating of IP66, so you don't have to worry about rain or the occasional drop in a puddle (or snow bank) when the tail cap is screwed on.

 

 

Just how lightweight? Luma 900 weighs about the same as a D cell battery. Luma 350 weighs as much as a smallish apple. The diamond knurling on the handle allows for a comfortable, slip-free grip for big and little hands alike.

 

We at NiteGear are dedicated to improving upon everyday tech to better fit your life. We’re a team of adventurers and tech-lovers living in the Pacific Northwest who see the high demand for a rechargeable LED flashlight that can be an anytime and anywhere solution for everyone. We are parents, to children and dogs, we check the oil, we change tires, we search for items lost under the fridge. Just like you, we like to be prepared for every outdoor and indoor adventure. No matter the situation, no matter the location, no matter the weather, NiteGear has you covered…with Luma.

Why Indiegogo?
In order to produce the quality of product we believe in, we need your help to manufacture the first run of NiteGear Luma flashlights. Your contributions to this campaign allow us to carefully select every little detail to make Luma series flashlights unique, powerful and efficient, because that's what you deserve.

Is shipping included?
Shipping costs are included in the amount that you pledge to the campaign.

What’s a Lumen?
Lumen is the unit of measurement used to measure how bright a bulb is. 900 Lumens is about as bright as a 60 Watt bulb; 350 Lumens is almost as bright as a 40 Watt bulb.

Are Luma flashlights waterproof?
Luma flashlights have a waterproof rating of IP66 when the tail cap is securely screwed on, which means they are water-resistant from powerful jets and splashes, as well as dust tight.

Are batteries included?
Luma flashlights have an internal rechargeable battery, so you never have to worry about having the right size batteries on hand. So long, disposable batteries!

How do I charge my flashlight?
Each flashlight comes with its own charger, which fits into a 12V accessory port in vehicles. You can also charge the flashlight in any standard USB port.

Can I use the car charger for my phone?
You sure can! The Luma series car charger uses Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 technology, is backwards compatible for older devices, and has both surge protection and short-circuit protection. 9-24V/1A input; 5V/2.4A, 9V/1.5A, 12V/1A output.

What is Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0?
Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 is a technology that allows compatible devices to charge 10x faster than USB 2.0. It is designed to support a variety of power outputs, and intelligently regulates the power that your devices receives.

Can you focus the light?
You bet! Luma flashlights have adjustable focus, allowing you to create a wide beam or a very bright, focused beam.

How can I contact you?
The best way to contact us is by email, contactus@nitegearpro.com.

We think everyone can benefit from Luma flashlights, and we would love your help spreading the word. You can use the Indiegogo share tools above, or stop by and see us on social:

Instagram

Facebook

Twitter

story:
All I wanted was to have a safe place to call home for my daughter and myself.

Having set out on my own, newly single, I bought a house so she could have a safe place to play.

I had the house inspected, I did all my due diligence, I put my heart and soul into making a fresh start to my life.

The house had different ideas.

Parts of my house are sinking.

See the photo with the tape measure in it above? See the grey paint line? That's where my basement floor used to be. Water is coming from somewhere and washing away the dirt from under it.

Water gets into the basement. Water pools, rots out roots and makes my entire property a swamp. There is a long list of other things I wasn't told about, but this one is the deal breaker.

Insurance can't help me, I can't refinance, title insurance couldn't help me, either. I have to do this on my own, the hard way.

The estimated repair costs might exceed the value of the property and I can't sell it without losing everything I worked so hard for.

I have put everything I have into keeping us afloat in everyday, normal life. It would be a lot easier if the unusual burden of insane repair costs was manageable. That's why I am here. I need to boost my cause in the right direction so I can continue to help myself.

Here are the direct links to my progress blog. I encourage you to read more.

About the Campaign - all about the dollars

My Heroes! Thank you to all these wonderful people!

FAQ's - Have technical, logistical, legal or historical questions? Here are the answers

About me - here is my back story. Full of highs and lows

Want to see the pretty, cool and colourful things I can make? Click here!

I have a website that explains in more detail: www.kathydwyer.com I have lots of videos and photos that illustrate how wet my property is, and the damage the water is causing. I keep up the blog there, letting everyone know my progress, such as it may be right now. I only have my artistic skills to offer as thanks, I hope you enjoy my art enough to help me out.

story:
About Cavalry Display Designs:

 

Cavalry Display Designs was conceived by two US Army Cavalry Scout Veterans that decided that display cases should be more than cheap wood, that you should be able to proudly show off your prized possessions. 

We truly believe in the quality of our cases, they are versatile, very durable, and stunningly gorgeous! We have decided that to pursue this worthy cause and to bring forward to you a quality display case that we can actually be proud of, we will need to find contributors like you we can make this dream a reality! People like you that believe in a quality product!

 

About our Product:

          Our display cases are specially designed to be adjustable to your many personal collectible needs with a design to properly illuminate and to show off your prized possessions. From swords, rifles, replicas, and military collectibles of all kinds most collectibles can be easily fitted into our case. Our cases are very versatile, they can be conveniently be placed on table tops, stands, in offices, just about in any place; also depending on your personal preferences it could be hung on the wall in almost any position, vertically or horizontally!

           Unlike most other collectible display cases, ours gives you a better, more open view of the collectible being displayed, while at the same time it also gives you a piece of mind of your treasured item will be locked away securely within the case. Another one of our major features is that our Saber 1 Sword & Rifle case has that other others do not, that it has impressive internal LEDs to illuminate and properly show off your collectible; working in any lighting situation even in lowest of light settings, with our easy to find LED ring button.

  • Dims: 50”w X 16.5”h X 9”d
  • LED lighting w/ external transformer
  • LED Ring Button (on/off switch)
  • Displays items 43” long & 9” wide
  • Clear acrylic 1/4” thick cover
  • Light defusing acrylic light shield
  • Customized acrylic light shield
  • Steel case & mounting hooks (4 single & 2 double)
  • Adjustable mounting panel
  • Customized mounting panel cover color
  • Comes complete w/ all the hardware for all 3 mounting versions mentioned above
  • Comes w/ lock & two keys
  • Plugs into standard wall outlet
  • Has a neoprene seal that helps keep out moisture
  • Designed for home, office & collections

Other Ways You Can Help:

We know that everyone can't donate, but that doesn't mean you can't help out! How may you ask? SHare this campaign! Share with your friends, family, and community! Try to get the word out to as many people as you can! Let's blow this campaign up!

story:
Who are we? 

We are a dedicated team of like-minded highly motivated, tech-savvy, enthusiastic, young and dynamic Engineers who consistently strive for excellence in respective fields. We strive to solve real-world problems faced by the people through technology in a most cost-effective and eco-friendly way possible. We work on both software and hardware technologies to create effective and intelligent solutions.

Our Mission is to be a technology hub globally and provide reliable solutions to the problems faced by mankind through continuous Research & Development and collaboration. One such product is EpSens.

Where it all started?

Hazards are seen everywhere be it at home or office. We realized that we cannot stop a hazard from being happening and restore everything to its previous form after it starts, but if we figure out a way such that we can take necessary precautions to prevent it from being happening. The missing puzzle piece was0 how do we do that? and that is where EpSens was born.  

About the Product

How terrifying would it be if someone breaks into your home in your absence or an unattended LPG leakage in your kitchen which you used just before going out for work? These thoughts would haunt throughout your work. Accidents occurs everywhere and are very uncertain. How would you get information about a fire accident which might engulf your room when you are away? And how helpless would it feel, the thought of “Had I been get to know about it earlier, this wouldn’t have happened”. Getting to know about the accidents or symptoms of accidents, prior to the situation where it would get out of control, would be a great help in order to save life & property and take necessary precautions before things get out of control. Our product is designed just to handle such cases with other cool features. Read on to know more.

EpSens is a product born with an idea of avoiding hazards following the principle of "Precaution is better than Cure".  It provides users, information about the surrounding, collected through 6 sensors built right into a single module, to their Smart phone, to provide a better safety to life. The product targets retail stores, commercial kitchens, office to home consumers in a very affordable price.

 

The features allow users to monitor room temperature, humidity on their mobile phone through EpsumThings App in real-time and corresponding graph can be generated in the app on a daily basis. EpSens also has an in-built buzzer which alerts the users on the spot during any abnormalities such as LPG leakage, Smoke/fire, motion in the operating area of the sensor. The notifications are also pushed to mobile phone to alert user when they are away from the home to take necessary precautions.

It also allows users to snooze notification and enable or disable notification timing for motion detection through app.

Powered by Epsum Labs own IoT platform EpsumThings, EpSens guarantees a lot of improvements on the go, making the device even more smarter through self-learning with a minimum or no firmware upgrade at the hardware end.

This device has a capability to become a heart of a Home automation system. Its built-in temperature, humidity and illumination sensors helps in reducing energy consumption and save money.

Technical Specification

 

 

To use EpSens, a complimentary app is developed called EpsumThings. Android App is already available on the Google Playstore, iOS App to be released soon!

 

  

How are the funds going to be used?

EpSens will be the first product from Epsum Labs, going into mass production. The funds collected from Indiegogo will be used to setup a manufacturing  & controlled testing unit. Every module is thoroughly tested and its functionality is validated before it leaves the production house. We are really excited and need your help to better serve people on a global scale through technology.
