story:
Millions of children suffer from anxiety and sensory-related meltdowns, and it’s only growing worse*. Now, more than ever, we need tools that can help. Weighted objects such as blankets and vests have long been used in therapeutic settings. But, the calming benefit of deep pressure stimulation is still fairly unheard of in most parenting circles. 

Meet FluffyWeight - melter of meltdowns, and dryer of tears. FluffyWeight is the softest, most huggable weighted plush on the market that also helps reduce meltdowns and soothe anxiety. With your generous support, FluffyWeight can help kids everywhere experience the calming benefits of weight.

 

 

FluffyWeight’s gently weighted cozy body and big fluffy paws embrace children with a calming, comforting hug. It’s perfect for when a child is mad, sad, scared, frustrated, restless, anxious or just overwhelmed in the moment. And, it's the only one on the market made with a natural, non-toxic latex filling. It is double-lined for an extra layer of safety and contains no plastic parts.

 

Parents and Professionals Agree - FluffyWeight is Safe and Effective. 

 

​

Occupational-Therapist Approved

 

 

 

 
 

The Science Behind FluffyWeight

Studies* show that deep pressure stimulation has a profound effect on how a child responds to stress. That’s why weighted objects such as plush toys, blankets and vests have long been used in therapeutic settings. 

 

 

1. Weight creates a sense of pressure that stimulates the release of serotonin in the brain. 

2. Serotonin is a neurotransmitter often called the “happiness chemical,” and can reduce anxiety while creating feelings of calm and happiness. 

3. Weight also lowers the stress hormone, cortisol, which in turn lowers the “fight or flight” response.

 

 

 

 

 

The softest, most calming hug you can imagine.

When I designed FluffyWeight, I knew I wanted it to be plastic-free, non-toxic, durable and very safe for young children. Most weighted products are made with glass or plastic beads, which are not as comforting to hug, have chemical off-gassing, and could pose more of a choking risk.

That’s why I searched until I found a manufacturer who could make a natural, non-toxic latex filling. FluffyWeight is also double-lined, and made with a super soft, washable cover, making it as practical as it is huggable. 

 

 

 

What Kids Say

 

 

FluffyWeight Specs

 

Please note these measurements are of the prototype. The actual, delivered product specs may slightly vary.

 

Help Make FluffyWeight a Reality

My campaign goal of $12,000 will cover my first order of FluffyWeights from my manufacturer. By supporting me, not only are you bringing this invention to life, but you’re also getting the first-ever FluffyWeight at the lowest price they’ll ever be sold. 

 

Here's what to expect:

 

 

 

Perks

 

 

Risks & Challenges

  1. Covid is a constant risk to supply chains and manufacturing. It's always possible that our timing may get impacted if there is a larger virus outbreak. 

  2. Lab safety and performance testing might require additional time due to Covid, or to accommodate any additional design adjustments. 

We have built some room for these uncertainties in our estimated delivery time and will keep our backers updated should anything change. 

 

Shipping, Refunds, and Returns

Shipping

We are pleased to ship FluffyWeight anywhere in the US. For this campaign, shipping charges will be:

  • Single FluffyWeight: $5
  • Twin Pack (2): $10
  • Family Pack (3): $15
  • Pro Pack (5): $20

 

We will be offering international shipping in the near future. For our customers outside of the United States, we'd love to work with you so please contact us directly at fluff@fluffyweight.com.

 

Refunds & Returns

This campaign is a pre-order for our product, so the funds raised through Indiegogo will be used to manufacture FluffyWeight for our backers. In accordance with the Indiegogo terms of use, we will not issue refunds or returns for items that are defective. In the unlikely event you receive a defective product, please contact us at fluff@Fluffyweight.com and we will happily work with you to resolve the issue.

 

We will offer refunds during the campaign in accordance with Indiegogo's refund policy:

Indiegogo is able to refund your contribution before any of the following occur:

  1. The contribution funds were disbursed to the campaign owner;
  2. The campaign ends; or
  3. The perk(s) is “Locked”, which means the campaign owner has indicated the perk(s) is ready for shipment, or “Shipped” by the campaign owner.  

 

The Team

 

Elena Foley, Creator

 

I’ve spent years researching and learning about childhood anxiety and sensory processing in order to help my daughter. I wanted to give her something that was safe, effective, and also so lovable that she wouldn’t want to let it go. That product didn’t exist. So I invented it.

My career has been spent working in global consumer marketing for Fortune 100s, start-ups and consumer good businesses. To invent FluffyWeight, I combined my interest in sensory balancing and mindfulness with my knowledge of consumer marketing to research and design a product that is high quality, delightful and most importantly, based in science.

 

 

 

Sarah Larsen, Occupational Therapist

 

I’ve been an occupational therapist for nearly twenty years and I have seen firsthand how implementing small lifestyle changes can have an enormous positive improvement in someone’s life.  I’ve worked with clients of all ages and specialized in working with children and their families for most of my career.  When I help children with anxiety, I always suggest weighted products, lots of heavy work, & a calm environment.  That’s why I was so excited to join the Fluffyweight team and work with Elena to create a product that would calm children when they need it most. 

Now, I run Balanced Home Organization where I help people with developmental and neurological differences find balance and move forward in their lives.

 

 

 

* Research Cited

American Academy of Pediatrics 
Interim Guidance on Supporting the Emotional and Behavioral Health Needs of Children, Adolescents, and Families During the COVID-19 Pandemic

American Journal of Occupational Therapy 
Effects of Deep Pressure Stimulation on Performance and Physiological Arousal

Occupational Therapy in Mental Health
Exploring the Safety and Therapeutic Effects of Deep Pressure Stimulation Using a Weighted Blanket

Journal of Medical and Biological Engineering
Physiological Effects of Deep Touch Pressure on Anxiety Alleviation

story:
What is “What’s in the Box?!”?

“What’s in the Box?!” Pop up shop, is a revolutionary guerrilla project offering designed products set in a new consumer environment that proposes a different shopping experience. This project  promotes young and promising designers, enabling them to reach new costumers and thriving markets.

This Pop- Up-shop offers a new shopping experience: original design- objects set in a magical though baffling environment and sold in simple cardboard blind- boxes in three different sizes and prices. The shop, designed to erect in a few hours at any given location, is intriguing and attractive, and the group of designers participating in the event includes makers from various design fields, allowing a wide and interesting range of products. The consumer/viewer is an active participant in this event; it’s his or her choice whether to join the game: to buy a product that remains enigmatic and secretive until the blind-box is opened. In our shop designers and buyers actually give up control of what they sell and buy.

The project was created as part of the Masters` degree program at the Shenkar Collage of Design and Engineering. “What’s In the Box?!” was presented at the opening of the Design Week 2013 in the Design Museum Holon www.dmh.org.il, and as part of the opening events of the D’day’s Paris 2013 www.designersdays.com

But we can’t do it without you

After three successful events, in two countries (Israel and France) we are currently invited to present at Barcelona Design week! Our shop is a non-profit venue so funds raised at the event are all received by the participating designers; therefore, it is impossible for us to keep this wonderful event going on without your supporting donations. www.barcelonadesignweek.com  

THE BUDGET

To make it to Barcelona Design Week we need about 20,000$, we got a wonderful donation of 5,000$ but we still have a long way to go.

What was in the box.


What do We Need?

We are asking for your support to help fund the cost of the cardboard boxes; the printing of the posters that cover the walls of the  shop; the shipping and handling of the products; professional photos of the products; a local team in Barcelona to help us set up the shop; flights and 3 days sleeping accommodation. Every donation will be greatly appreciated!

Our minimum goal is to raise $12,000 which will cover the cost of the Barcelona event.

If we manage to pass the necessary amount, the money raised on Indiegogo will enable us to start planning our next event, and thus ensure the long-term viability of this unique design/culture project.

THE PERKS

As a Thank-You for helping us reach our stretch goal we will give everybody who has donated $20 a surprise printable product. An email including a file of our original design for self-printing and constructing.

Donate $50 and receive a set of surprise printable products. An email including files of our original designs for self-printing and constructing.

Donate $100 and you join the game! Receive one of our small surprise- cardboard- boxes containing an original design product.

Donate $200 and you are really lucky! Receive one of our medium sized surprise- cardboard- boxes containing an original design product.

Donate $300 and it’s your lucky day! Receive one of our large surprise- cardboard- boxes containing an original design product.

Donate $500 and it’s a full house! Receive a set of three boxes in three different sizes of surprise- cardboard- boxes containing original design products!

Donate $10000 and more and you get a ticket to the event! The Barcelona event held on June 4th is a closed, invitation only event. A donation of 10,000$ will grant you a sure way in. Can't wait to meet you!

Other Ways You Can Help

There’s more than one way to help us make this happen. If you believe in our project and want to contribute, we encourage you to like our Facebook page: facebook.com/winthebox or follow us on Instagram: instagram.com/winthebox  and of course, share this project online and in person with your friends and family, we would appreciate it!

Please help make this happen by spreading the word!

Thanks for your time,

What's in the Box team: Galia Chai, Tal Nahum and Joe Grinbaum

www.winthebox.com

www.facebook.com/winthebox

www.instagram.com/winthebox


MEET THE DESIGNERS

Yael Keila Sagi-

Fashion designer

﻿This project is consisted of three dramatic items – a ring, a bracelet and a necklace, all with a humorous wink to them.

The items combine two contradictory worlds, one tribal-ethnic and colorful and the other urban-modern and monochromatic.
The range of materials is diverse, going from climbing ropes and wooden beads to different types of every day metals and bells which blossom into giant flowers.


Moi Moi studio // Gal Shenfeld-

Fashion and jewelry designer

﻿Jitu ubishi [Swahili : giant jewelry]

Statement accessories, inspired by African “dream machines”, symbols and drawings, abstracted into simple geometric shapes and humorously personified.



Roei Amar-

Jewelry Designer


This project is based on a retrospective look at the hand-craftsmanship of the kibbutz movement, and inspired by a hand carved woodwork my father made for my grandmother. As the chisel causes chips to fly, so the laser burns lines through the carton.
This project stands as an attempt to join together old and new, the inexpensive with the innovative, father to son.

story:
Smart-me in the news


www.smart-me.com

Smart-me is an energy and power meter, a remote switch, a time switch and a temperature meter all in one device. It’s connected to your Wi-Fi network and you can control and monitor smart-me from anywhere with your smart-phone, your tablet or your computer.

Available in a US, UK, Swiss and Europe (Plug Type F) Version

Power Meter

Smart-me is a high quality (class 1) energy and power meter.

In addition to power, the device measures energy, current, voltage and power factor.

For optimal accuracy every device is calibrated at production. We guarantee an accuracy of 99% (max. 1% error).

Remote Switch

Smart-me is also a remote switch. You can switch on or off the power remotely, using either your smart-phone or from the web.

Time Switch

Smart-me is also a time switch. On your smart-phone you can configure when smart-me should switch the power on or off.

Temperature Meter

Smart-me is also a temperature meter. You can monitor the temperature from anywhere.

Sets up in Seconds

The set-up of the smart-me device is very easy. Download and install our free app from the App Store or Google Play and follow the simple instructions. The smart-me app is available for Android and iOS devices.


You can use it for...

Monitoring consumption

Smart-me helps you to monitor your energy consumption. You can use it to monitor the power consumption of any device you can plug into a socket.

As the device can also measure very low power consumption, it is ideal to monitor standby consumption.

Monitoring production

You can use smart-me to monitor your energy production, for example from Solar or Wind Power Systems.

Smart-me measures the energy in both directions (import and export) so you can also use it to monitor and analyse energy production.

Control from anywhere

With your smart-phone you can control smart-me from anywhere. You can remotely switch on or off the power or just monitor the current power consumption. The only requirement is an internet connection.

Switch off unused devices

You can configure smart-me to switch off unused devices at a specified time, helping you to save energy.

Save energy

By enabling you to turn off unused devices, and providing detailed analytics about your energy consumption, smart-me helps you to save energy and money.

Create some nice diagrams and reports

On the smart-me web you can create various diagrams and reports of your energy data, which can be exported in several formats (pdf, excel, etc.)

These diagrams and reports help you to impress your boss or your neighbor!


Details

How it works

The smart-me device is connected to your Wi-Fi Network at home and communicates with the smart-me Cloud Servers. With your smart-phone, or a simple web browser, you have access from anywhere to your smart-me device.

Security & Privacy

The security of your data is important to us. As such, every connection is encrypted and your data is stored anonymously on our servers. Of course, we will never sell your data to advertisers or other third parties. Our servers are located in Germany / Switzerland.

Energy Metering

Smart-me is a lot of things, but first it's a high quality energy and power meter. Smart-me has a high measuring range and an extremely high accuracy, so you can also use it to measure low power consumption such as Standby usage.

To guarantee the best measurement accuracy every device is calibrated and tested by hand.

The device measures the energy in both directions (import and export). This means you can use it to measure your consumptions and you can use it to measure your productions (e.g. from a photovoltaic system).

The measured values are: Energy (kwh), Power (W), Current (A), Voltage (V), Power Factor (cos phi).

Voltage U 110V - 230 V; -/+10 %
Measuring range P 0.1-3680 W
Accuracy 1 % (class 1)
Frequency f 50/60 Hz
Current I 10 A / 16 A
Protection class IP 20
Own consumption 0.1 W (~ 0.8 kWh / Year,  ~ 10 cents / year)

Update Interval

When you are not monitoring your smart-me device with your smart-phone or your computer the device uploads the energy data every minute to the smart-me cloud. When you open the smart-me app or open the smart-me web pages the device uploads the data every second.

Remote switch

Max. switching power:

US Version 1875 W (125V, 15A)
UK Version 3000 W (230 V, 13A)
Europe (Plug Type F) Version 3680 W (230V, 16A)
Swiss Version 2300 W (230V, 10A)

Dimensions:

95 x 54 x 29 mm (3.7 x 2.1 x 1.1 in)

What do I need?

Smart-me needs a Wi-Fi network to connected to the internet. To set up the smart-me device you need an Android or IOS smart-phone or tablet. To access your device you need to set-up a free smart-me account.

Product certification

CE / FCC

Made in Switzerland

Installation


We need your help!

A year ago we started to develop the hardware and software (Firmware, Cloud Software, Web / Smart-phone apps) and we are nearly ready to launch a product we really think you’ll love.

To do this, we need some money to produce the first batch of devices, and that’s why we need your help. By being one of the first to get a smart-me device, you can really help us make this project a reality. Every person backing us makes the difference.

The Team

Dave - Software Engineer

Dave is the software crack. He is specialized in cloud computing and firmware development.

He is responsible for the device communication, the cloud software, the apps and anything else we have to do.

Noldy - Electrical Engineer

Noldy is the hardware and energy metering guru. He has developed the world's first digital energy and power meters.

He is responsible for the hardware design and energy metering firmware.

The device measures the energy in both directions (import and export). This means you can use it to measure your consumptions and you can use it to measure your productions (e.g. from a photovoltaic system).
The measured values are: Energy (kwh), Power (W), Current (A), Voltage (V), Power Factor (cos phi).

Voltage U
110V - 230 V; -/+10 %


Measuring range P
0.1-3680 W


Accuracy
1 % (class 1)


Frequency f
50/60 Hz


Current I
10 A / 16 A


Protection class
IP 20


Own consumption  
0.1 W (~ 0.8 kWh / Year,  ~ 10 cents / year)


Update Interval
When you are not monitoring your
smart-me device with your smart-phone or your computer the device
uploads the energy data every minute to the smart-me cloud. When you
open the smart-me app or open the smart-me web pages the device
uploads the data every second.
Remote switch
Max. switching power:


US Version
1875 W (125V, 15A)


UK Version
3000 W (230 V, 13A) 


Europe (Plug Type F) Version
3680 W (230V, 16A)


Swiss Version
2300 W (230V, 10A) 

Dimensions: 
95 x 54 x 29 mm
(3.7 x 2.1 x 1.1 in)
What do I need?
Smart-me needs a Wi-Fi network to connected to the internet. To set up the smart-me device you need an Android or IOS smart-phone or tablet. To access your device you need to set-up a free smart-me account. 

Product certification
CE / FCC
Made in Switzerland 
Installation
We need your help!
A year ago we started to develop the hardware and software (Firmware, Cloud Software, Web / Smart-phone apps) and we are nearly ready to launch a product we really think you’ll love. 

To do this, we need some money to produce the first batch of devices, and that’s why we need your help. By being one of the first to get a smart-me device, you can really help us make this project a reality. Every person backing us makes the difference.

The Team
Dave - Software Engineer  

Dave is the software crack. He is
specialized in cloud computing and firmware development. 

He is responsible for the device
communication, the cloud software, the apps and anything else we have
to do.
Noldy - Electrical Engineer 

Noldy is the hardware and energy
metering guru. He has developed the world's first digital energy and
power meters. 

He is responsible for the hardware design and energy metering firmware.

story:
UPDATE: This project is fully funded via investors, and production starts January 2015!
You can still use this campaign as a discounted pre-order of The Centurion.
Before we begin ... full knife specifications and features are near the bottom of this page.  There is also a review from a police officer who's been field testing the knife.
You can see more pictures and learn more about this knife here.

A knife for law enforcement designed with law enforcement input

I was approached by a member of local law enforcement about getting a knife that would meet the needs of officers without being too expensive.

The current fixed blade options that were acceptable were either too expensive, or not good enough quality for the average officer to carry while on duty.  All were lacking features officers regularly needed to perform their duties.

As it turned out, I had a design in my head that matched up well with what officers were needing in a knife.  After discussing features they needed on their blades I set to designing a purpose built knife for law enforcement personnel with their input throughout the development process.

The unique nature of police work, and their personal gear, means most standard knives are not ideal.  Many are down right impractical.  Law enforcement has very specific needs in their blades.  This is the first knife to 'check all of the boxes' while meeting the price point the average officer can afford. 

Turns out hunters really like it too

After going through the prototype phase I finally had a version of the knife ready for manufacturing.  It was time to put one in service with a police officer to field test, and show the other prototype off to retailers.

While in a business showing them my design, some deer hunters said if it was for sale they'd make it their hunting knife on the spot.  I'd never thought about this knife being a hunting knife, but several hunters have expressed interest in buying the knife once it goes into production.

How much we need and why

Our manufacturer has a minimum order before we can go into production of this knife.  We need $20,000 minimum to satisfy that order.  If we raise more than $20,000 we can increase the number of knives produced.

If we don't meet our $20,000 threshold, we will seek one of several investors who've expressed interest to make up the difference.

Agamemnon Self-Defense operates as a debt free company, and we prefer to keep it that way if at all possible.  That's why we need your help!

Our manufacturer estimates delivery of all knives within 90 days of our placing the order.

    We already have orders lined up

    Our company already sells knives and self-defense products.  As such, we have many contacts with distributors who supply retail stores with products, and we currently supply retail stores with products ourselves.  

    We already have over 100 of these knives committed to various businesses, and we have interest from other companies to sell this knife too.

    Future plans

    This will be the first run of this knife, and we hope to continue production for the foreseeable future.
    We also hope to produce a mini version of this knife that will be suitable for EDC (everyday carry) and easy concealability by the general public.
    There is a folding version of this knife in the early design phase with a possible automatic knife variant as well.
    We would also like to do small limited edition runs of this knife using exotic materials, super steels, and customizable options.
    We are in this for the long haul, and want to be the 'go to' company for law enforcement personnel.

    Before contributing, please consider the following

    We want to thank Indiegogo for even allowing us to do attempt this campaign. Literally every other crowdfunding site denied us the opportunity.

    We are not allowed to offer the knife itself as a perk on Indiegogo.  We are, however, allowed to offer coupons and vouchers as perks to be used on our site once the knife goes into production.

    Check your local laws before contributing for vouchers towards the purchase of the knife.  This knife has two edges.  Dual edged knives are restricted and/or banned in many areas.  Please ensure you are familiar with the law before contributing.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      PLEASE use Indiegogo's tools to share this campaign with anyone you think may be interested.  Police officers, first responders, military personnel, hunters, and all knife enthusiasts have an opportunity to get in on the ground level of something amazing!

      Centurion Specifications:

      • Overall Length: 8 1/2
      • Handle Length: 5
      • Bottom Edge: 3 1/2
      • Top Serrated Edge: 2 1/2
      • Blade Material: D2
      • Blade Finish: Dark Acid Stonewash, Titanium Coating, Satin, Cerakote (Any Color)
      • Handle Material: G10 (Grenade Pattern)

      Centurion Features:

      • Dual Edged
      • Skeletonized Handle For Paracord Wrapping
      • Removable Handles (Screw system)
      • Seatbelt Cutter/Gut Hook
      • Storage In Handle
      • Glass Breaker/Skull Crusher
      • Kydex Sheath with MOLLE Clip
      Actual honest review by a police officer field testing the Centurion right now.
      Officer Heckman is a Patrolman with the North Liberty Police Department in Indiana.  He is not affiliated in any way with our company, and this is not a paid endorsement.

      So here we are.. After a month and a half of testing, throwing, cutting, prying, you name it I've done it. To what  you ask? The newest knife made to work from Casey at ASD. I'm pretty rough on knives, I came across Casey through a friend of ours. I told him what I was looking for, and he told me he had the idea.

      With that, comes the new knife (name TBD). I put it in my hands and I was shocked. The size, the balance, just the over all feel of this knife made me happy. I rushed home as fast as I could and went to work with it. I've cut a nylon tac vest, roof shingles, rope, cardboard, wire (covered in rubber), more nylon, a leather belt, t-shirt... The list continues, and so does this knife.

      I was Leary at first of using the blade to cut, especially without gloves, in case I slipped. After I cut nylon with ease, I took the gloves off and went to town on the above listed items.. I never lost grip, this blade felt like it was a part of my hand.  I never found resistance with anything I cut. I was sold from this point on.

      To cut the wire, I used the serrations on top of the blade to cut through the rubber and wire with ease. I used it against some wood and cut a pretty good chunk out of it. After all of this, the only thing that happened was I got tired. I was kind of annoyed that I couldn't defeat this blade on anything. I guess that was a good thing though!

      After handing the blade around, I've had nothing but compliments. Mostly the same things I've repeated above. The feel of the knife is just amazing! 

      I've had people tell me numerous times they can't wait to even carry it for work. A couple people I showed (father-in-law and brother-in-law) asked if they could use it to field dress deer. Guess I'll have more videos during gun season!

      All in all I would rate this knife an all around knife, it prys cuts and takes impact very well. No bends in the blade.

      Cody

      Thank you again for looking at our campaign to make the Centurion knife a reality, and thank you for your support!

story:
A new ad. A new message.

You've helped fund our fight for fair pay and you helped keep our ads on the air to call out the lies. 

Almost 400,000 have seen our last ad online - an amazing result.

Now we have a new ad with a strong message for Campbell Newman. We need to make sure as many people see it as possible.

Buy it as a gift for a friend!

Donate in someone's name to give them the gift of the truth! Donations will receive a special certificate displaying your efforts in ensuring our message gets out.
Donating to this campaign will help ensure that our message gets out to more Queenslanders. Campbell Newman's lies on pay are hurting us all.
Everyone who donates will receive a special certificate with their donation amount - you can wrap it up and put it under a Christmas tree, or deliver it as a Secret Santa gift!

What we've achieved so far

  • You can get our message out there before the end of the year.
  • When people chipped in to keep our ad on the air, we were told by Parliament to take it down. https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/keep-our-ads...
  • We've had ads published in the newspapers and they've been seen by hundreds of thousands of people. Your Christmas gift to a friend can be to get this ad out even further.

Let's keep going!

  • People like you have shown before and can show again that Queensland deserves better.
  • We know that this government is already spending hundreds of millions of dollars on taxpayer funded ads to tell us what a great job they think they are doing. They are desperate and are going to throw everything to convince Queenslanders that they deserve another chance in 2015 despite their record of lies, their privatisation spin and pushing down wages. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute financially, and that's OK. In 2015 you can help build a better Queensland by getting active in your local community:

  • Go to www.nomorelies.com.au and stand up for the truth.
  • Like the No More Lies page on Facebook and invite your friends to like it too: https://www.facebook.com/nomoreliesnomorecuts

story:
• Very Low price with FCC certification , only to earn a small profit base.hope to bring more rapid development of IoT.
  • Embedded various interfaces, including SPI, SDIO, UART, and I2C, which can well meet customer's developmental needs and requirements.
  • Supports three modes: AP, STA, AP + STA coexistence mode
  • Perfect simple and efficient AT commands, allowing you to develop more simple.

About ESP8266EX:

ESP8266EX is a wireless SoC that is created for the Internet of Things (IoT), which consists of a high performance 32-bit MCU that can run up to 160MHz, a 10bit ADC with high precision, TCP/IP stack, and all RF components. The high integration density of this single-chip greatly decreases the external components, and tremendously reduces BOM cost of your whole solution. The IC features QFN32 package of only 5mm*5mm, which ideally reflects its high integration density and flexible applicability on your board.

Besides, ESP8266EX has embedded various interfaces, including SPI, SDIO, UART, and I2C, which can well meet customers’ developmental needs and requirements. It also supports functions including system-level power management through an adaptor, reset control, power-saving working mode, and so on, making it a perfect choice of high performance and lower power consumption IoT solution in the field.

For the basic documents ,please refer to link below :

http://xthinklab.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/ESP8266_Specifications_English.pdf

http://xthinklab.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/4B-AT-Espressif-AT-Command-Examples_v0.3.pdf

http://xthinklab.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/4A-AT-Espressif-AT-Instruction-Set_020.pdf

For more  develop  information ,please refer to link below :

http://bbs.espressif.com/index.php?sid=cff11c60a472f5673f92de97cf2029b0

https://github.com/espressif

What can You DO with the module?
Smart home appliances
Smart plug and door locks
Smart lighting
Metering
Remote control
Network consumer devices
……


Thanks your time ,Thanks your help !

story:
As Seen On

 

"Finally, a truly keyless digital solution for your doors that also supports fingerprint recognition! What more could you ask?"

-The Gadget Flow

“Smart lock is convenient, but it is difficult for people who do not have a smart phone. For this reason, Ultraloq has come in combination with the personal identification number and fingerprint authentication as well as smartphone control.”

-CNET

“A new Bluetooth enabled fingerprint and touchscreen smart lock has been created called the Ultraloq UL3 BT, that has been designed to be ‘RealKeyless’ for maximum flexibility and convenience.”

-Geeky-gadgets

“Yes, smart door locks are awesome, allowing you to open the door remotely, automatically, or any other darn time you want it to. Let’s be honest, though – some of the people you live with will probably find the need to use their phone to open the door a bit of a nuisance. That’s why the Ultraloq UL3 BT, pretty much, throws in the kitchen sink, providing you a litany of ways to disengage the locks exactly to your liking.”

-Coolthings

 

"A new smart lock has hit Indiegogo, set to be the lock to rule them all, the Bluetooth enabled Ultraloq UL3 BT is a Bluetooth-enabled lock that has been designed for maximum security and convenience."

-TechNutty

“A convenient smart lock "Ultraloq" that can be opened in a variety of ways has appeared on Indiegogo.”

-TECHJP

“Outfitted with a fingerprint scanner, the 'Ultraloq' can also be accessed via the touch keypad with one major security breakthrough. To help thwart thieves or someone spying the 'Ultraloq' will open even if a randomized set of numbers is entered (given that the correct code is in there somewhere).”

-Trendhunter

“Using integrated fingerprint scanner, anti-peep password and built-in Bluetooth, Ultralog UL3 BT smart lock provides a secure and intelligent method to guard the door.”

-Gadgetsin

-Listen to CROWDFUNDING CAST INTERVIEW

 

 

 

 

You're In. With or Without Phone.

Ultraloq UL3 BT smart lever lock is designed to be "Real Keyless" for maximum flexibility and convenience. You are free to use fingerprint, code, key or smartphone to unlock. You can just knock on your phone to open the door, even when it’s in your pocket. You will be never be locked out again!

 

 

 

 

RealKeyless vs Keyless

 

 

 

 

 

Advanced Fingerprint Identification

Everyone’s fingerprint is unique and no one can steal it from you. Our advanced fingerprint technology uses a scratchproof, dustproof and waterproof sensor to make unlocking easy and secure. 95 fingerprints can be enrolled. Identifies you in less than 0.5 second and works well for kids and the elder.

 

Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy Connectivity

Your smartphone is now your key. Just unlock your door using the Ultraloq App on your phone. Ultraloq UL3 BT uses Bluetooth Low Energy which means that Ultraloq will keep working even in the event of power or internet outages.

 

 

Anti-peep Password

 

“Anti-peep password” ensures that strangers can’t steal your password by looking at worn-out keypad digits or watching you nearby when you enter the password. This function allows the user to type in any number of random digits, and can still gain access as long as the 1 correct password is embedded in the longer set of numbers.

 

Hidden Key

3 mechanical keys for backup. A keyhole is positioned specially on the bottom to give extra security in case of keyhole hackers.

 

Knock to Open

You don't have to open app. Just knock on your phone twice, even when it’s in your pocket and you’re in.

 

 

IP65 Rated

Complete protection from total dust ingress and water spray from any direction.  Ideal for indoor and outdoor installation.

 

 

 

Up to 1 Year Battery Life

3 AA batteries. Up to 8,000 times access. Low battery alerts on display and App. Innovation in clutch design makes UL3 more reliable but 50% less power consumption than traditional clutches.

 

Ultraloq App

Keyless Entry 

Ultraloq App enables you to unlock your door with your smartphone. Ultraloq supports the iPhone 4s (or newer) and Android 4.3 (or newer) phones with Bluetooth 4.0.

 

 

View Users

Knows who has the access to your lock and how.

Just unlock your door using the Ultraloq App on your phone. Ultraloq UL3 BT uses Bluetooth Low Energy which means that Ultraloq will keep working even in the event of power or internet outages.  Anti-peep Password “Anti-peep password” ensures that strangers can’t steal your password by looking at worn-out keypad digits or watching you nearby when you enter the password. This function allows the user to type in any number of random digits, and can still gain access as long as the 1 correct password is embedded in the longer set of numbers. Hidden Key3 mechanical keys for backup. A keyhole is positioned specially on the bottom to give extra security in case of keyhole hackers. Knock to OpenYou don't have to open app. Just knock on your phone twice, even when it’s in your pocket and you’re in.
 

 
IP65 Rated
Complete protection from total dust ingress and water spray from any direction.  Ideal for indoor and outdoor installation.
 
 

 
Up to 1 Year Battery Life
3 AA batteries. Up to 8,000 times access. Low battery alerts on display and App. Innovation in clutch design makes UL3 more reliable but 50% less power consumption than traditional clutches. Ultraloq AppKeyless Entry Ultraloq App enables you to unlock your door with your smartphone. Ultraloq supports the iPhone 4s (or newer) and Android 4.3 (or newer) phones with Bluetooth 4.0.  View UsersKnows who has the access to your lock and how.   

 
Log Record
You can see a Log of who’s entered and exactly when they did from your smartphone.
 
 
 
  
 
Clone
When you install a new lock, just use Clone to transfer all users in one shot.
 
 
 

 
No Phone? No Problem!
You can always use your finger or code to unlock even without smartphone. For user management, just use touchscreen to simply add or delete user on the device. An OLED display with intuitive information will walk you through the whole operation process.Security Strong Outside. Stable Inside.
 
Designed for DIY Installation
Battery operated. No wiring. In about 10 minutes, you are ready to go.
 

 
 
More Features
Touch-On
When you reach out your hand to touch the keypad, Ultraloq will be activated automatically and ready for your entering.

 
Sense-On
When you place your finger on fingerprint sensor, sensor will be activated automatically and no need to press any key to awake the lock from sleeping.
 

 Auto-RelockAutomatically relocks after 4 seconds; no need to remember to relock the door.
 
 
How does Ultraloq Work for You?
 
Tired of forgetting or losing your key?
More options. Fewer headaches. With Ultraloq, you have the flexibility to use your finger, code or smartphone to open your door. Now you will never be locked out again!

 
Your employees quit without returning their keys?
No more waste of time and money replacing locks or exchanging keys. Just take few seconds to delete their fingerprints or codes.
 
 
A rent home owner?
You can manage all renters' access and share them code for their temporary stay. No more key losses. Both you and your renters will have peace of mind.
 
Keep kids away from where gun is stored and protect your valuables 
Our advanced fingerprint technology can keep your kids away from guns and protect valuables in your home office, home to garage door, wine cellar or storage room. Your fingerprint is unique and can never be forgotten or stolen.

 
Colours Available


 
 
 


  Frozen Ultraloq Video in Low Temperature Chamber at U-tec Lab Door Requirement
 

 
 
 
Where are we now?
Fully functional Ultraloq UL3 BT prototype is ready. We plan to start massive production in January. We can guarantee the delivery of all Indiegogo Pre-order in July 2016. U-tec team has already completed all hardware work, including hardware & firmware design and product tooling. We are working on improving Android/iOS Ultraloq App for a better user experience.

 
 

Ultraloq App Demo Youtube Video

In the box

 



 



 
 
 

 
Pre-Order Your Ultraloq Now

 
 

 

 
 



 
Why Indiegogo? 
 
 
 
 
We believe that this is the best and most efficient way for us to get our latest product to the people who want it most: people like you. We want to hear from you and make sure that what we deliver is actually what you do want! 
  
 

 
U-tec TeamIt's all about you.  
We pride ourselves on having a fully in-house multinational team of engineers, designers, marketers and product specialists. Each department works tirelessly to develop top-quality products. We have a passion for turning technology into simple and cost-effective solutions that benefit everyone, not just the very rich or extreme technologically savvy. We love what we do and the people we do it with. 
 
  
We focus on revolutionizing your everyday products. Anywhere, anytime connectivity with simplified and intuitive functionality is what you can expect in U-tec smart products. U-tec dedicated team will stop at nothing to make your life easier, more secure and more enjoyable.
 
 
 
Risks and ChallengesU-tec team has more than 10-year experience in product design and development, meaning that we are well aware of the potential risk of delays due to issues with designs or supply chain.To minimize the risks, we have carefully reviewed Ultraloq for more than 30 times in all details. From mechanical parts to electronic components. In addition, we have our own 54,000 square feet factory in Shanghai China to ensure delivery time and quality.
Though ‘Hardware is Hard’ and there are always risks in the manufacturing of any product, we’re confident that the U-tec team has the experience and knowledge to overcome any issues we face in order to deliver this amazing product to your doors.

story:
"Saving the day for millions nationwide..."                                                    -Aqua Magazine

 

 

What is the Sip-N-Oodle?

The Sip-N-Oodle is a revelutionary new pool product designed to allow you to enjoy a cold beverage on a hot day while you enjoy the pool, ocean, lake, river, or whatever body of water you are in! You no longer have to fight to hold your drink above water or try to keep pool water out AND no more worrying if the kids are going to spill Red Kool-Aid in your beautifully clear pool.

The Sip-N-Oodle is made of a foam pool noodle threaded with FDA approved plastic tubing that holds more than 16 ozs of any beverage you prefer. That's one full can! The foam noodle insulates the tube and keeps even frozen drinks cold on the hottest days of the year. In one end of the tube is a specially designed cap with a straw to allow you to drink hands free without getting out of the water or allowing water to get in. On the end of the straw is a convenient Bite Valve to make sure that nothing ever spills when you aren't using it. Cleaning is a breeze by simply removing the end cap and rinsing the tube. 

Finally a way for you and your kids to stay hydrated in the pool without the worry, mess, and struggle! 

OK, I like it. What do you need?

We need your campaign dollars to accomplish two major milestones. We already have the manufacturers of the component parts set up and ready to produce, but given that the parts are mostly small, minimum order quantities are quite high. First, your campaign dollars will allow us to purchase enough materials to manufacture a starting inventory and begin pursuing product placement in stores. 

Secondly, we have an opportunity to secure a booth as a vendor at the International Pool, Spa and Patio Show in Las Vegas in November 2013. Securing that spot would mean exposure to nearly 200,000 people and nearly half that many small business in the industry around the world. Attending this expo would mean that the Sip-N-Oodle would be that much closer to landing in store near you!

I can help with that. Do I get anything in return?

We have set reward levels so that anyone can get involved in helping make this dream a reality. We also want to bring you the Sip-N-Oodle not only early, but at a discounted price to say thank you for believing in our product and in us. You deserve it! For people willing to go above and beyond in making sure the Sip-N-Oodle reaches stores, we have set some high level rewards that will include being featured in a commercial and on our website. We want to make sure that everyone knows exactly who was responsible for making our product a success and to do that, we are going list all project supporters, regardless of funding level, on our website to say thank you for believing in us!

What will it mean if I contribute?

To truely understand the impact of your contribution, you must first understand some back story. First, it is important to note that this is a family owned and opperated business. The company itself will be run be me, Cameron Parker, while my dad Chip Parker, the inventor of the Sip-N-Oodle, continues to create more fun and exciting new products for you to enjoy. We will be accompanied by a long time family friend and Marketing Professional, Greg Neely. My background is in high level manufacturing practices so one of the primary goals for the company is to assemble and produce the Sip-N-Oodle in the US to provide jobs for people in a desolate economy. I have had extensive training from leading industry professionals while working for a multimillion dollar corporation in Continuous Improvement and Better Business Practices so reaching the lofty goal of creating a new company to provide jobs is not outside my reach as a professional, provided I have the necessary capital to make it happen. Greg Neely, our Sales and Marketing President has lead a marketing team in South Atlanta with huge success over the course of his 26 year career. Greg has plans to provide jobs for salespeople and people desiring to become a distributor as well. My dad, Chip Parker has always had an eye for adapting and creating new things to make life easier and more fun. He already has several other products in the design phase to compliment the Sip-N-Oodle like a 2 Liter presurized cooler with a nozzle to make filling the Sip-N-Oodle easier and would make a great addition to any pool party! Also in design is a larger model to hold even more of your favorite beverage and interchangable sleeves with designs and even collegiate licensing. 

All three of us have dreamed of one day owning a business of our own and providing people with a fun and usable product to make life a little bit better. We are confident that with the proper start up capital and support from people like you, we can make the Sip-N-Oodle a product available for everyone to enjoy AND provide jobs to people all accross the country. 

Money is a little tight right now, but I want to help!

We understand that many people who would want to contribute may not have the means to. Times are tough for millions of people and we understand that. If you can contribute $1 to our campaign, that is just as important as someone who can contribute $1,000. Every penny will help get us there. But even if that is outside your reach and you still want to show support for our project, please tell your friends about it and give us a quick shout out and a link on Facebook, Google Plus, Twitter, or any other social media outlet you are a part of. The more people know about us, the better our chances of success are. And be sure to let us know that you are spreading the word! Send us an email telling us how you shared our project with others and we will be sure to give you a shout out as well on our website to say thank you!

Thank you for considering funding our campaign. We can't do it without you so it means the world that you would step out on this limb with us. Thank you and have a great day!

story:
Botanium is a compact, easy and effortless way of growing. Its a hydroponic pot, which means it grows plants like chilies, herbs and tomatoes without soil. It waters the plants automatically. The result? Faster growth and no need to worry about over or under watering. Leave it for a month and get back to a healthy plant.

Botanium is a simple planter that takes care of the boring parts of growing and lets you enjoy the fun parts. All you need to do is to fill the water tank every now and then, and add some nutrients (included)

 

 

Botanium is a compact, easy and effortless way of growing. Its a hydroponic pot, which means it grows plants like chilies, herbs and tomatoes without soil. It waters the plants automatically. The result? Faster growth and no need to worry about over or under watering. Leave it for a month and get back to a healthy plant.

Botanium is a simple planter that takes care of the boring parts of growing and lets you enjoy the fun parts. All you need to do is to fill the water tank every now and then, and add some nutrients (included)

Grow herbs like basil, oregano or mint. Or chili, tomatoes or strawberries. Botanium works especially well with thirsty plants that normally would require very frequent watering. Plants do however have different nutrient requirements. This is easy to adjust - just add less or more nutrients. The correct amount of nutrients needed for the plant YOU are growing will be specified in the included Botanium User Guide.

 

The steps are very easy: 
1. Fill the tank with water 
2. Add nutrients 
3. Fill with growing medium 
4. Plant a seed 
5. Connect Botanium to an electrical outlet 
6. Sit back and watch as the seedling grow a little bit every day!

Did you know that you can grow inside year-round, even if you live in a cold and dark country? Even here in Sweden it's easy, and you don't need a special "growing light". Just put your plant under a standard CFL, fluorescent lamp or LED. As long as it's not an old incandescent light bulb, the plants will grow, even in the grimmest of winters. 

Hydroponics is not a new method of growing. It has been around for many years and has been the subject of much research. It is a far more effective way of growing than traditional agriculture, and hydroponic vegetables are therefore becoming more and more common. Research has even shown that hydroponically grown food can contain more vitamins than soil-grown food.

 

The great thing about hydroponics is that you can never overwater the plants you grow. Therefore, you don't need to take into account things like letting the soil dry out before watering again (and not waiting too long so your plants wilt). All you need to do is to fill the reservoir when you see the water level getting low. The water lasts several week (depending on the plant, light and heat)

 

Botanium is designed in Sweden, a country that embodies the Scandinavian design movement. This style – often referred to as minimalist – developed during the Second World War, with clean, simple lines and a strong emphasis on functionality. A common theme in this tradition is that beautiful and functional objects should be available to all.

Dimensions: 136 mm (5.3") x 250 mm (9.8")
Color: White, grey or green.
Plug: The wall socket you receive corresponds to the country you specify when backing the project.
Power: 5V
Electronics: The built in timer powers on the pump every 8th hour.
Usage: Indoor use only

  • Botanium
  • Growing medium
  • Nutrients
  • User guide
  • Power plug
  • Chili seeds (will be sent separately)

Botanium comes in three different colors. Make your choice when choosing a perk.

Choose the plug for your country when choosing a perk.

Many prototypes have been made to test different designs. It was important to make sure that it not only looks good and functions as planned, but also that is easy to use. Prototyped versions of Botanium has been used for over a year, so we are confident we have a product that works.

Rasmus Tretow 

Industrial designer and chili growing enthusiast. Passionate about using design thinking to solve problems from a user centric perspective. Experienced in product development, prototyping, form giving, 3d-printing and working with multidisciplinary teams. He has also been working with interaction design.

Johannes Roselius

Development engineer with 10 years of experience in Product development. He has been working with Design engineering, manufacturing, product management etc. Loves to find simplicity in the most complicated problems. Enjoys all types of adventures, everything from business adventures to sailing. Have sailed across the south pacific ocean. Entrepreneur since early childhood and have been running his own consultancy business for over 2 years. 

Mario Sanchez

Technology lover and entrepreneur, project manager and electronic engineer with more than 10 years of professional experience. He has very strong technical knowledge and in leading, designing and implementing complex RnD projects. Experience working in all size of companies, from early stage startups up to corporations. Experience with manufacturing in China, Sweden and Poland. Lately involved as co-founder/CTO of Tinitell, a Swedish startup making a new generation of mobile phones.

Thanks to Artan Mansouri, Mikaela Pedersen, Sofia Tretow, Malin Hertzman, Johan Mörtberg, Andrea Gradin, Plantagon, SSES and Reload Design.

Risks and challenges

Product development is never risk free, however we are confident we have the right competences and experience to bring this product to the market on time. We have a great experience in product development, including mechanical engineering, hardware design, software and industrial design. 
We take things seriously, and apart from being perfectionist and very careful in the design, we have gone through a very thorough selection of our suppliers, which is the point where many hardware startups fail. 

At this point, we are far ahead in the process with the manufacturers, and we have an established relation with them as we have cooperated in other products. Moreover, we should say that all our calculations, pricing and timeframes are based on real quotes.

We need your help to get funds to make this product a reality, so please help us spread the word and become a Botanium ambassador!

story: My name is Eduardo Gonsalez and I was not always motivated as I am now. I have always dreamed of taking part in building a skate park. It was not until my sister passed away from battling cancer. During the funeral service I learned that my sister was very active in her kids school by being head of the PTA. She was very active in her community always helping those in need. Two days after her funeral with a heart full of tears I wanted to do something in her memory. Many people get a tattoo or buy a sticker for there car. I did not want that, her life ment more to me. It wasn't till I went to skate a stair set, I got kicked out but being as I am polite I spoke with the property owner to see if I could skate after hours. She mentioned she would be supportive towards the city building a skate park. That's when it struck me follow my dream and honor my sisters life, build a skate park in her memory. I was born and raised in Longview tx. I received my diploma from Pine Tree High School. I served our country for 4 great years. Now I am attending Letourneau University for my  Bachelor in Business Administration. I want to continue serving my community in a way I can relate. Skateboarding has always been a great passion of mine. Through my skate career I have managed to inspire lots of great kids to challenge there own abilities and give them moral support to overcome personal issues. I want to continue this but on a greater scale on a safe designated area where there will be no fear or getting kicked out or having law enforcement come in and ticket us for trying to be active. In our society that's trending towards being indoors watching movies playing video games, or constantly on social media/YouTube. I want to encourage people that there is a lot to do outdoors. Most kids are required or introduced to football or baseball by parents and school. My goal is to reach out to those who want to take the challenge of skateboarding, bmx or inline skating. A skate plaza would be a dream it doesn't require a great deal of maintenance or up keep like a football or baseball field. I know I can settle with a half pipe. The US Navy core values " HONOR COURAGE AND COMMITMENT" are permanent in my life because I have seen and love how they benefit my everyday life. I would be so deeply honored to be the skater to see this project go through. I have the courage to see this through even against those who doubt or those who don't appreciate these extreme sports. Finally i am committed to not give up until I make my dream, my part in serving my community become a reality. I want to thank anyone and everyone who has taken time to read my story. I will be happy if you dontate one dollar because that's just one dollar closer to my dream, but if you can't please spread the word so my goal can be reached. Once again thank you

Skateboarding has always been a great passion of mine. Through my skate career I have managed to inspire lots of great kids to challenge there own abilities and give them moral support to overcome personal issues. I want to continue this but on a greater scale on a safe designated area where there will be no fear or getting kicked out or having law enforcement come in and ticket us for trying to be active. In our society that's trending towards being indoors watching movies playing video games, or constantly on social media/YouTube. I want to encourage people that there is a lot to do outdoors. Most kids are required or introduced to football or baseball by parents and school. My goal is to reach out to those who want to take the challenge of skateboarding, bmx or inline skating. A skate plaza would be a dream it doesn't require a great deal of maintenance or up keep like a football or baseball field. I know I can settle with a half pipe. The US Navy core values " HONOR COURAGE AND COMMITMENT" are permanent in my life because I have seen and love how they benefit my everyday life. I would be so deeply honored to be the skater to see this project go through. I have the courage to see this through even against those who doubt or those who don't appreciate these extreme sports. Finally i am committed to not give up until I make my dream, my part in serving my community become a reality. I want to thank anyone and everyone who has taken time to read my story. I will be happy if you dontate one dollar because that's just one dollar closer to my dream, but if you can't please spread the word so my goal can be reached. Once again thank you

story:
Family and friends—
Help us support our finances or a small wedding and celebration for our marriage! 


Long story... short... 

My fiancé and I met over two years ago while working in China. We met and fell in love, we have had our ups and downs, as all couples do. But, we have persevered and are trying our best to stay together despite being from different countries, the global pandemic, and both of us not being from the most financially strong families.
 

We are wanting to have a small wedding in Ukraine to celebrate our marriage and take a short trip out of the country of Ukraine to finalize my marriage permit and residence permit, so I can live in Ukraine and not have to continue to fly back and forth to see one another.
 

There are a lot of regulations and rules for us being able to get married and it is quite troublesome and difficult. 
 

With these difficulties comes also financial burdens. 
 

I am asking for your help and support to help us. 
 

My fiancé and I both lost our full time jobs during the pandemic. We are unable to have a large wedding or even close to any kind of reception until a later date. We both have been trying to work online to stay afloat, but even this money doesn’t suffice for all of our bills and food costs. 
 

Chinese companies are shutting down constantly and this is the main source for my fiancé’s and my income, currently. I was also working for a company recently and making money, and the company GoGoKid, completely shutdown. They Chinese government is also changing regulations for hours of teaching— we were once able to teach on Saturdays and Sundays, because we work for trading schools, and the new rules have changed to where we cannot work on these days— and this is also a major hit to our finances, since most of our classes were on Saturdays and Sundays. 
 

Please understand, that COVID and the pandemic have hit people very hard,  people like my fiancé and I and we keep getting affected more by the new regulations. 
 

We are not even able to return to China until the pandemic is completely over, because the Chinese embassy is not issuing visas until then. 

 

My fiancé and I left China in January 2020, during the Chinese New Year, and we never imagined we would not be able to return for almost 2 years now. We were not compensated with governmental aid, as many teachers were in America. Public and University school teachers were still compensated their contract salaries, although they were not working during the pandemic.
 

My fiancé and I  received zero help from the Chinese government, as well as zero help from the Ukrainian or American government. I was unable to apply for unemployment because I was working in a foreign country. I applied for unemployment checks, anyways though, and I received nothing, besides the stimulus checks.

 

I worked online and to my pain and suffering, again, another company I was working for— shutdown, as I said before. 


Along with the fact that half of our belongings are still at  the company we were working for. This company took all of our stuff from our apartment, while we were not there and we have no idea if it is even still all together— including suits, clothing, electronics, kitchenware, iPads— many things that were very costly— all still in China, after almost 2 years.

We have had to buy new clothes, shoes, electronics and other things to suffice— as we have been unable to return. The company has provided us one box of our clothing back, at OUR expense. This international shipping is also very expensive. 
 

This is all very personal, but I am personally in desperate need, to be able to finalize our marriage visa and to receive my residence permit in Ukraine. 

My mother has sent me money to help with my phone bill, and other costs like hospitals do student loan  bills I owe— which is also personal information; but I am willing to be more open and personal as I have never felt like I was drowning more  financially. But, I am very ashamed to contact my family and or friends to help us... so I thought maybe I would just come clean about everything— publicly in hopes someone could help us some. It seems embarrassing to be asking for help, but because the government has not helped us— we are hoping maybe some friends or families could help. We always have tried to give when we have it, but at this point we are struggling. 
 

With your help—

My fiancé and I will be able to pay for....

-Marriage Visa & Residence visa costs 

- flights costs to leave the country (as we have to leave Ukraine to finalize these visas because of regulations... we need to exit the country and go to a Ukrainian embassy in another country) 

-any wedding costs like a suit and dress for photos 

-miscellaneous costs

story:
The intelligently designed iFork line of flatware reinvents dining by keeping surface germs off your fork, knife, spoon & spork and also keeps food from touching your surfaces.


While dining outside one day, we saw our fork and knife lying flush on the table.

A bird came by and landed on the table.  Initially, we were very pleased that a cute little bird had joined us.

However, we quickly realized that the table must be extremely dirty, and we did not want our utensils resting on it.

Table where bird landed



Now don't laugh ...

First iFork Design


This was the design done to explain how the iFork line of flatware would keep germs off of your fork, knife and spoon and food off of your surfaces. We took a hanger and bent it... imagining the top section as the part of the fork with the prongs and the bottom part, the handle... CLEARLY this would not work but we had to start somewhere.

Designing the final product took many days and many dirty tables where we would eat and wish we had an iFork to solve the problem.

Some problems would be as simple as reheating food in the microwave and having no place to sit our forks down while our plates were heating up.  By now we all had become used to holding our forks in our hands for minutes, but we knew there was a better way. We forged on to solve this ever so simple problem of having to set our forks down without getting food residue from our forks onto the table or germs from the table onto our forks.

After many designs and "microwaving moments" the intelligently designed iFork line of flatware was created. 

We also wanted to be able to create cool table settings and do something different... heck... maybe even stack our flatware in the order we should use each utensil when dining. We are not sure about you, but we always forget the order in which to use utensils when it comes to formal dining.

We are happy to say that we have solved these problems with the handcrafted, intelligently designed iFork line of flatware. The "i" in iFork represents that it is intelligently designed to keep the part that goes into your mouth from resting on surfaces.

iFork Stackable line of stainless steel flatware

iFork nesting into iSpoon


Full Disclosure

To be totally honest we were more than happy with our final product until that ONE person who hit us with "I really like the iFork design, but I am not too sure about the stackable hole."  To not be outdone by this comment, we created an additional iFork product line with a slight design tweak... we simply replaced the "stackable hole" with an elegant ball. The result: same iFork, two product lines: 

1.) Stackable and 2.) Stackless.

iFork Stackless ball design

iSpoon Stackless ball design



                            iFork Plastic line of disposables

Of course no line would be complete without having plastic disposables. 

We discovered from Dr. Gerba that school cafeteria tables are one of the surfaces that harbor the most harmful germs. Armed with this information, we created a full line of plastic iFork disposables, including the iSpork to replace the sporks currently used in many school cafeterias.


                              

Your Pledge ... The BIG Dream

As far back as we can remember, fork, knife, spoon, and spork designs have largely remained the same, not to mention BORING. We feel it is time for something different, unique, practical, fashionable, and even fun.

We feel people should have a CHOICE between using flatware that rests flush on surfaces or the iFork line that rises above these surfaces. Your pledge will help make this CHOICE a reality.

We don't want to get overly dramatic, but with your pledge you will truly be part of history. We could actually change the way the whole world eats. We know this may be just a dream... but hey, we are BIG dreamers over here. 

Ideally, if we can get support from the community to make our campaign a HUGE success, then we can begin to also figure out a way to manufacture the stainless steel flatware here in the good ole United States of America.


CURRENTLY THERE ARE NO MANUFACTURERS OF STAINLESS STEEL FLATWARE IN THE UNITED STATES.

This was hard for us to believe as well. According to a New York Times article the last U.S. manufacturer of stainless steel flatware went out of business in 2011.  

http://www.nytimes.com/2011/02/13/business/13every.html?_r=0

So all of the stainless steel flatware you eat with today is manufactured overseas and not one fork was forged here in America. 

For us, this is just a small step to hopefully change that. If we band together, we can create American-made products and employ hundreds, maybe thousands, but we honestly cannot do it without you.


2 iYears

The iFork line of flatware is a project that we have been working on for two years now and it is in the final stages of being fully ready to launch.  All the molds and tooling are complete, all of the trademarks complete (iFork, iSpoon, iKnife, iSpork and even iChop) and many of the patents are filed including the iFork design patent that has been issued.

iFork Design Patent

We often say that you can have the greatest project in the world, but what good is it if no one knows about it?

While much of the work has been done here is where you come in. 

 We need funds to: 

*Complete the iFork website

*Create a successful publicity and marketing campaign 

*File for additional international patents

*Buy cable TV time for the iFork infomercial 

*Manufacture inventory

Sample of iFork website homepage

                               

SCARY FACTS LIVE UNDER THE FORK

This is the part that no one really wants to talk about, but that fact is that independent studies show that viruses like Influenza A (the flu) can survive on surfaces for up to 48 hours. Rhinoviruses (the cause of the common cold) can survive for up to 12 hours. 

Why have your fork, knife or spoon touch surfaces if they do not have to?


Please check out the iFork brochure with quotes and facts from doctors.





Your Pledge will give the option of using flatware that sits flush on surfaces or the iFork that rises above surfaces.  


Key target markets for the iFork line are;

School contracts, restaurants (think McDonald's for the plastic disposables and restaurants like Applebee's, Golden Corral, and the Cheesecake Factory for the stainless steel), hospital contracts, prison contracts, large consumer retailers (Target, Macy's, supermarkets, etc.) and of course direct to consumers through the iFork website, Amazon and other websites.

Thank you in advance for your support, your vision and for being part of our launch.


Just some of the rewards

story:
The yearning for the exceptional drives us. We strive for progress and explore endless space. We ask big questions, attempt to come to terms with the knowledge gained and simultaneously overlook the fact that it is the special thing, we ourselves, that we are looking for.

 

We are part of a stunning world, a garden of life, well-suited to preserve this rare commodity. A tiny island of happiness!

 

 

 

 

The fact that this place does not look like this is entirely due to ourselves and perhaps we are not sincerely making the most of the great gift of faith.

 

 

_________________________________

 

 

WHAT WE WANT!

 

 

Religious conflicts are dark tapestries of hatred. They proliferate and reflect the sad way we have of dealing with each other. Our own faith is defended, fought for and enforced at the expense of peace.

 

If the power of human conviction has so far prevented a better world, it is also capable of making it a reality.

 

 

 

We want to create a global movement in which the essence of faith, spreading goodness, is unleashed. Lighting a candle of hope and breaking through the darkness, in the name of every one of us.

 

 

_________________________________

 

 

HOW YOU CAN CONTRIBUTE!

 

 

Children are a great blessing and embody the cycle of life.

 

Their presence radiates hope, love and faith in the future and as long as not every one of these young souls grows up with a smile on their face and can feel the great good of dependability, our work is not done.

 

 

 

Only together can we tackle these serious burdens and create a better world. Become a part of this global movement and give hope, confidence and security.

 

Donate your contribution and lend a helping hand. Every single child will be deeply grateful for this gift. Cast your vote, because it is more valuable than you believe.


 

 

_________________________________

 

 

WHAT'S THE GOAL?

 

 

There are plenty of good solutions, only too few resources.

 

 

 

You donate a financial contribution for children in need, and we use the revenue to support selected projects to best benefit children in the world. Using the means where they're most needed, with no red tape and quickly. We seek cooperation with large organizations and support useful projects locally.

 

 

_________________________________

 

 

A CONTEST?

 

That's right, we're looking for the

 

"2017 Supporter of Human Goodness"

 

 

It doesn't matter if you support your own faith community or want to lend your voice to the religion that should be shining brightest right now in your eyes. What's decisive is simply your will to help change your courage. With each donation you spark a small ray of hope and provide sorrowful children a little joy.

 

 

We, the entire world, bestow this prize with global recognition and acceptance to the religious community with the highest degree of radiance.

 

  A special kind of honor for special donations and a unique opportunity to use our faith for a good cause, kindly.

 

 

_________________________________

 

 

SAY THANKS!

 

We are convinced that the greatest power to change lies in a global movement. Crowdfunding offers a fantastic way to successfully implement the project to mobilize society and religion and unleash a global generosity that also provides visible results.

 

On behalf of all children in need, we would like to thank you for every single ray of light, every donation and every assistance bestowed and hope for a great and successful campaign.

 

 

 

We have waited far too long for really useful solutions. Ultimately, the scepter has always been in our own hands.
 

 

 

 

Thanks very much!

 

 

 

 

 

 

_________________________________

Special thanks for the impressive picture of our earth, through the
National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA).


https://www.nasa.gov/image-feature/africa-and-europe-from-a-million-miles-away

story:
We're just trying to raise money for a small wedding in the summer.  60 days is all the site will let us fund for, but if we don't reach our goal we still get to keep 91% of the money pledged.

 

We figure $5000 is a nice easy sum for a pleasant wedding, but if we get more than the $5000 we'll just have a fancier wedding :D

 

(The goal is stated at $5500 to cover the 4-9% fees the site charges)

 

 

There are no rewards or incentives.. just the knowledge that you've helped us realize a dream that we have shared for over a decade.

story:
Short Summary

Hi everyone! My name is Ariel Wickers- I graduated from Brewster Highschool in June 2012. Several of my fellow ex-Brewster students and I recently saw an article in the local news about the fact that one of our old teachers, his wife, and his dog just had to escape a fire in their apartment. Luckily it appears that no one was hurt, but we know from past experience how devastating a fire can be, and want to raise money to give to their family to pay for any damages caused or necessary repairs. We want them to know that they're always in our thoughts, to know that our community stands behind their own, and to have the extra help they might need in this awful situation.

If you would like to see the full story, here is a link to the news article:

http://www.lohud.com/article/20130827/NEWS02/308270017/Brewster-High-teacher-wife-escape-apartment-fire?odyssey=mod%7Cnewswell%7Ctext%7C%7Cp


What We Need

We're not entirely sure how much in damages was caused by the fire, but we want to raise enough that, no matter what, the amount we donate has a substantial impact on their situation. That being said, indiegogo takes 4% of funds raised if you meet your goal and 9% if you do not. We'd like to raise at least $10,000 (if not more) because then we can still have a total of $9600 to give directly to the family. Regardless, even if we do not meet our goal, we will give any money we raise directly to them. Again- THIS IS A STUDENT RUN FUNDRAISER. It is not run by the family, but it will be given directly to them. We're doing this as a show of appreciation for everything the Mullane family has done for us as a community, and to let them know that they are certainly not alone.


The Impact

I imagine that most of the people who wind up seeing this fundraiser will probably be current or graduated Brewster students, or friends and family of those personally impacted. Still, whether you know Mr. Mullane and his wife or not, please understand how important they and the rest of the Brewster community are to us. Mr. Mullane truly takes his role as a Brewster teacher seriously, is constantly involved in the school's extracurricular activities, and works hard to ensure that all of his students have the support and resources they need to succeed in the classroom and beyond.  He and his wife are both well loved and well respected throughout the entire district, and it would mean a lot to us all if we could get all the help possible.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that the economy is bad, and that times have been hard on everyone. If you can't donate (which we totally understand) please share this on Facebook and try to get the message out in any way you can think of! It's hugely appreciated!!
story_txt:
Short Summary
Hi everyone! My name is Ariel Wickers- I graduated from Brewster Highschool in June 2012. Several of my fellow ex-Brewster students and I recently saw an article in the local news about the fact that one of our old teachers, his wife, and his dog just had to escape a fire in their apartment. Luckily it appears that no one was hurt, but we know from past experience how devastating a fire can be, and want to raise money to give to their family to pay for any damages caused or necessary repairs. We want them to know that they're always in our thoughts, to know that our community stands behind their own, and to have the extra help they might need in this awful situation.
